1b1(mdo sde): // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yal lota swA/ 
1b2(mdo sde):
1b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya cher ro la zhes bya ba theg kyi
2a1(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
2a2(mdo sde): thos pa'i dus gci ga na/ bcom ldan 'ang sa mnyan yod na/ 
2a3(mdo sde): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
2b1(mdo sde): dge slong khrinyi stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po la/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
2b2(mdo sde): shes ko'u drin+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang
2b3(mdo sde): ldan pa ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa grags
2b4(mdo sde): sbyin dang / tshe dang ldan pa dri ma med dang / tshe dang ldan pa lag bzangs dang / tshe dang ldan pa
2b5(mdo sde): gong po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / 
3a1(mdo sde): / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
3a2(mdo sde): dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe drang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen
3a3(mdo sde): po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka phi na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed
3a4(mdo sde): dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'grags pa dang / tshe dang ldan
3a5(mdo sde): bu dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'ug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / 
3a6(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa sang ldeng nags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yong rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa pha rol tu 'gro
3b1(mdo sde): ba chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa bku la dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa
3b2(mdo sde): legs 'ongs dang / tshe drang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu
3b3(mdo sde): bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa
3b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa/ byang chub sems
3b5(mdo sde): dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thams cad thob
3b6(mdo sde): pabyang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa thams cad thob po/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad shin
3b7(mdo sde): tu rdzogs po byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa/ 
4a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad thob pa/ 
4a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thams cad la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu rdzogs pa sha stag ste/ 'di
4a3(mdo sde): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug
4a4(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa'/ sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i tog dang / byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
4a5(mdo sde): po don grub blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa'
4a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtag par sbyor
4a7(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje cher sems dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis
4b1(mdo sde): skyong dang yang thabs gcig go// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na 'khor ba ni dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i sras dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang / chag
4b2(mdo sde): 'og gi rgyal phran dang / rgyal po'i zham ring ba dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon pa dang / 'khor gyi mi dang / grong khyer ba dang / 
4b3(mdo sde): yul gyi mi dang / mu stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bla mar byas/ sti stang du byas/ mchod pa
4b4(mdo sde): byas so// bcom ldan 'das ni bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba bsod cing mang ba dang / na bza' ba / bsod snyoms dang / gzims tshe dang / snyun gyi
4b5(mdo sde): gsos sman dang / yo byad rung ba brnyes shing / bcom/ ldan 'das ni brnyes pa dam pa dang / grags pa dam pa brnyes kyang / pad+ma la chus mi gos pa ltar/ 
4b6(mdo sde): thams cad du ma chags ma gos par bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang / sgra dang / snyan pa ni 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
4b7(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha
4b8(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya bar 'jig rten du mngon par grags par gyur to// de ni skyon lnga dang ldan pa ste/ 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig
5a1(mdo sde): rten pha rol lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu lha dang mir bcas pa dag rang gis mngon par
5a2(mdo sde): mkhyen pas mngon tu mdzad nas/ nye bar bsgrubs te rab tu ston to// de thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mor dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su
5a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba'i chos ston te/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nam gyi gung thun la/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod
5a4(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ 
5a5(mdo sde): skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug/ tor gyi gseb nas/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran parabya ba la chags pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
5a6(mdo sde): byung ste/ des gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i bu tshad med pa dag yang dag par bskul to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
5a7(mdo sde): 'od zer gyi tshogs de las bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo // ye shes 'od ldan mun bcom 'od mdzad pa// 'od bzang gzi brjid dam pa dri med pa// sku lus rab zhi thugs dge zhi
5a8(mdo sde): ba po shAkya'i seng ge thub dang phrang bar gyis// ye shes rgya mtsho mthu chen dag pa ste// chos kyi mnga' bdag kun mkhyen thub pa'i dbang // mi dang lhas mchod lha'i lhar gyur pa// chos la rang byung
5b1(mdo sde): mnga' dbang mdzad la rton// gang zhig gdul dka'i sems la mnga' mdzad pa/ gang zhig bdud kyi snyi las grol ba'i thugs// de 'dir mthong thos don med ma yin gyis// rnam grol mthar phyin zhi ba'i
5b2(mdo sde): drung du deng // mtshungs med chos la snang bar gyur pa ste// mun sel tshul bzang ston par rab mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyod zhi mkhyen pa dpag med pa// de'i drung du dad pa mchog gis dang // de ni
5b3(mdo sde): sman pa'i rgyal po bdud rtsi gtong // de ni smra ba dpa' bo tshogs ngan 'joms// de ni chos kyi rtsa lag don dam mkhas// de ni 'dren pa bla med lam ston pa'o// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag
5b4(mdo sde): sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba la chags pa med/ ba'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od zer des phog cing / tshigs su bcang ba rnam pa de lta bu de dag gis kyang bskul ma thag tu rab
5b5(mdo sde): tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa mthus bskal pa grangs med/ tshad med/ bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ 
5b6(mdo sde): rjes su dran zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa dag dang / chos bstan pa gang
5b7(mdo sde): yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran par gyur to// de nas de'i nub mo mi nyal tsam na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dga' bo dang / 
5b8(mdo sde): shin tu dga' bo dang / tsan dan dang / mchod byas dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / dul ba'i dbang phyug la sogs pa de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan shin tu mang po kha dog
6a1(mdo sde): 'phags shing / shin du 'phags pa dang ldan pa dag gis/ spyi'i snang bas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der deng nas phyin pa
6a2(mdo sde): dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan
6a3(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rol pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po bsdus pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang
6a4(mdo sde): dag par bstan pa/ dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas 'bab pa dang / ched du dgongs te lhums su 'jug pa'i rnam par rol pa dang / mngal gyi gnas kyi khyad par kun bstan pa/ 
6a5(mdo sde): rigs bzang por skye ba'i sa'i mthu kun tu bstan pa/ byis pa'i/ spyod pa thams cad las yon tan gyi khyad par gyis ni na tu 'da' ba bstan pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i gnas dang
6a6(mdo sde): las kyi gnas dang / yi ge dang / grangs dang / lag rtsis dang / rtsis dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / 'phong dang / stobs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs rnams sems can thams cad las khyad par du/ 
6a7(mdo sde): 'phags pa kun tu bstan pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang / yul gyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa kun tu bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pas yongs su grub
6a8(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu brnyes pa yongs su brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jigs pa bstan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / 
6b1(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos chang ma mchis pa nges par bstan pa/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon tshad gsungs pa mchis te/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i
6b2(mdo sde): bla ma dang / chos kyi tog dang / mar me mdzad dang / yon tan gyi tog dang / yon tan 'byung gnas dang / 'od zer chen po dang / drang srong lha dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / bden pa'i tog
6b3(mdo sde): dang / rdo rje mkhregs dang / thams cad zil gyis gnon dang / gser mdog dang / shin tu mthor gshegs dang / byi ru'i rgya mtsho dang / me tog gi tog dang / gzugs bzang dang / spyan bzang dang / 
6b4(mdo sde): drang srong sbeng dang / dmag tshogs las rgyal dang / mtho ba dang / me tog rgyas pa dang / mdze spu gzi brjid dang / shi na tu rgyas dang / 'od gzer bzang po dang / bkra shis ldan
6b5(mdo sde): dang / bltan bzang dang / seng ge'i gzi brjid chen po dang / blo gros brtan pas byin dang / sos ka'i spos dri dang / bden pa'i phyogs grags rgya chen dang / 'od ldan dang / 
6b6(mdo sde): skaskur rgyal dang / 'jig rten mdzes dang / 'od rgya chen dang / rin chen grags dang / grags shul gzi brjid dang rin po che'i gzi brjid dang tshangs pa'i gzi brjid dang / sgra snyan dang / me tog bzang po dang 'i rab ma
6b7(mdo sde): tog dang / rab tu yid 'ong dbyangs dang / dge ba tshul bzangs dang / rab tu 'dzum pa'i spyan dang / yon tan phung po dang / 'brug sgra dang / kha dog mdzes dang / tshe'i gzi brjid dang / ngom
6b8(mdo sde): bag glang po'i 'gros dang / 'jig rten mngon par smon dang / dgra las rgyal dang / yang dag mchod dang / rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / 'khor ba
7a1(mdo sde): / 'jig dang / gser thub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis kyang sngon chad gsungs pa lags na/ de bcom ldan
7a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba dang / sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang / 
7a3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po 'ang yang brjod pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad pa dang / bdud thams cad zil gyis gnan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
7a4(mdo sde): theg pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi brtson 'grus brtsam pa bskye dad pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi bcad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
7a5(mdo sde): mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa yang kun tu bstan pa'i slad du/ da bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'a/ ngas kyis lha'i bu de dag dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
7a6(mdo sde): lathugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas lha'i bu de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ 
7a7(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ can dan gyi phye ma dang / a ka ru'i phye
7a8(mdo sde): ma dang / me tog man da ra ba dog gis kyang mngon par gtor te/ de nyid mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das nub mo de'i nam nangs pa dang / smig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la
7b1(mdo sde): der gshegs te byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/ gdan bshams pa la bzhug so// bzhugs
7b2(mdo sde): nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mdang 'dir nga'i drung du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dga'
7b3(mdo sde): po dang / shin tu dga' bo dang / tsan dan dang / mchod byas dang / rab zhi dang / dul ba rab zhi dbang phyug la sogs pa de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan shin tu mang po zhes bya ba
7b4(mdo sde): nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhi dan du gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang nga nyan thos chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log
7b5(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rol pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs legs par bstan du gsol/ de ni skye bo mang po la sman
7b6(mdo sde): pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba mdzad pa dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
7b7(mdo sde): po rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / 
7b8(mdo sde): mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge slong dag go nga ni mdang gsum 'dir// gnas pa bzang pos
8a1(mdo sde): bde bar gnas gyur cing // nyon mongs med par rab tu gnas gyur la// rje gcig sems su mnyam par bzhag drung du// rdzu 'phrul che zhing kha dog bzang ldan la// dri med dpal 'bar lha yi
8a2(mdo sde): bu lhags nas// dpal gyis rgyal byed chal 'di snang byas te// dga' bas nga yi gan du mngon par lhags// dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po can ngan dang // dga' bo rab tu sems zhi mchod byas dang // shin
8a3(mdo sde): tu dga' bo zhi ba lha yi bu// bye ba lha mang de dang de dag rnams// nga yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bskor byas te// nga yi mdun du 'dir ni 'khod par gyur// de dag sor mo thal sbyar gus bcas par// de dag
8a4(mdo sde): 'dir ni ngal gsol ba btab// 'jig rten kun la sman pa'i dadon slad du// rgyal ba kun gyis sngon cang gang gsungs pa shin tu rgyas mdo gleng gzhi chen po 'ong // thub pa 'dod chags
8a5(mdo sde): bsal bas de ring yang // byang chub sems dpa'i tsho gas kun gzung bzhed pas// phas kyi rgol dang bdud rnams 'dul mdzad pa// theg pa chen po mchog 'di rab gsung zhing // thub
8a6(mdo sde): pa de slad legs par bshad du gsol// lha'i tshogs kyis gsol ba de gnang phyir// mi gsung gyur pas gnang ba mdzad pas na// thams cad tshim zhing rab dga' mgu gyur nas// dga' ba thob pas/ 
8a7(mdo sde): me tog sil ma gtor// de phyir dge slong dag gis rgyas pa'i mdo// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i don gyi phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis sngon bshad pa// gleng gzhi chen po khyed kun 'dir nyon
8a8(mdo sde): cig/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang ba'o// // dge slong dag de la/ chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/ dge slong dag 'di la byang chub sems
8b1(mdo sde): dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa/ mchod par bya bas mchod pa/ dbang bskur ba thob pa/ lha brgya stong gis bstod cing bkur te/ brjod cing bsngags pa/ bsam pa thob pa/ smon lam
8b2(mdo sde): gyis yang dag par 'phags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par thob pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi mig shin tu rgyas shing yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros
8b3(mdo sde): dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / dga' ba 'bar ba'i blo rlabs po che dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang
8b4(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas pa chen po'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ tshangs pa'i lam byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po la mkhra pa
8b5(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa chen pos sgrib pa med cing / chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba mngon du gyur pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu/ 
8b6(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin pa/ bsod nams
8b7(mdo sde): dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa/ yun ring por rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa/ ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pas/ log pa med
8b8(mdo sde): pa'i tshig gi lam yang dag par smra ba/ drang zhing ma yo la gya gyu med pa'i yid thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / zhum pa thams cad med// 
9a1(mdo sde): pa ta sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos
9a2(mdo sde): ngor lta zhing lta ba'i bzhin dang ldan pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha'
9a3(mdo sde): lding dang / srin po rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i grags pa dang ldan pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu phye ste bstan pa la thogs pa med pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i shes
9a4(mdo sde): ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa ba zung ba la dran pa'i snod 'khrugs pa med pa dang / ga zungs mtha' yas mu med pa rab tu thob pa/ dran pa nye bar
9a5(mdo sde): gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi ya na lag dang / lam dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
9a6(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa'i chos rin po che dang / bsod nams kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi gru chen po'i nged dpon chen po chu bo bzhi'i pha rol tu 'gro ba'i bsam pa can/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba btso/ 
9a7(mdo sde): pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad pa/ g.yul de'i thog ma la rab 'dug pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs 'joms pa/ ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon cha sra ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi
9a8(mdo sde): sems kyi rtsa ba las snying rje chen po'i chu bo lhag pa'i bsam pas skyes pa/ zab cing brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi chos kyi chus mngon par brlan pa/ thabs mkhas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ byang
9b1(mdo sde): chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi ze ba can/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ze 'bru dang ldan pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i mtsho las skyes pa/ nga rgyal dang dregs pa'i gdung ba med pa'i zla bas dri ma med pa'i mngab
9b2(mdo sde): ma brgyas pa/ tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / bag yod pa'i gsung gi ngang phyogs bcur thogs pa med par ldang ba/ 'jig rten na shes pas thub bor gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa/ 
9b3(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po'i pad+ma/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba/ shes rab dang / ye shes kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis mig shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pad+ma mdab ma brgya pa rgyas pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
9b4(mdo sde): rkang pa bzhi'i mchog tu mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ 'phag das pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sder mo dang mche ba shin tu rno ba/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i so drang ba rnyed pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po
9b5(mdo sde): bzhis shin tu bsdus pa'i mgo dang ldan pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis khong du chud pas rim gyis 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
9b6(mdo sde): chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par yo su rdzog pas ral pa can du byas shing rig pa dang ye shes kyi ze ba can/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi kha gdangs pa/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shin tu rnam par
9b7(mdo sde): dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i ri sul gyi phug na gnas pa/ spyod lam bzhi dang / 'dul ba'i nags tshal dang / 
9b8(mdo sde): nags 'dab nas skyes pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / nye ba'i stobs dang ldan pa/ skye ba dang 'jig pa'i 'jigs pa dang / spu g.yo ba med pa/ rtsal la zhum pa med
10a1(mdo sde): / pa/ mu stegs can gyi bong bu dang / ri dgas mang ba'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa/ bangag med par sgra brjod pa'i sa nga ro chen po stog pa/ skyes bu sa / rnam par grol ba dang / bas ga
10a2(mdo sde): gyi dkyil 'khor las shes rab kyi 'od dang / 'od zer gyis mu stegs byed srin bu me khyer gyi tshogs 'od med par byed pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag gi yong tog dang / rab rib med par byed pa stobs dang
10a3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus 'bar ba/ lha dang mi'i nang du bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i nyi ma/ nag po'i phyogs med pa/ dkar po'i phyogs yongasu rdzogs pa/ blta na sdug cing
10a4(mdo sde): yid du 'ong bas mig gi dbang po la thogs pa med pa/ lha ba rgya stong gi skar ma'i tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa/ bsam dgatan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor can/ 
10a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi yan lag gi bde bas zla ba'i 'od zer du gyur pa/ dang lha mkhas pa'i me tog ku mung kha 'byed pa/ skyes bu na po zla ba/ 'khor gyi gling bzhir song ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag
10a6(mdo sde): bdun gyi rin po che dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par sbyor ba/ blo dpyad thogs pa med pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs shin tu phun sum
10a7(mdo sde): tshogs shing rab tu rdzogs pas khyad par du bogs dbyung bar bya ba'i bsam pa can/ chos kyi rgyal po'i chos kyi 'khor lo rin po che mchog dam pa thogs pa med par bskor ba/ 'khor los sgyur gyi
10a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi rgyung du byung ba/ chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba// chos rin po thams cad kyis rab tu gang ba/ zos pas mi ngoms pas
10b1(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya rme la mtha' yas pa'i ye shes dang tshul khrims kyi tshod las mi 'dar pa/ blo rgya mtsho dang sa ltar rgya che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / mnyam pa'i sems gyur pa// 
10b2(mdo sde): ri rab ltar brtan zhing mi g.yo la bskyod par mi nus pa'i yid dang ldan pa/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pa/ na mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma med cing yangs la 'dra ba med par rgya che ba'i blo dang
10b3(mdo sde): ldan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongasu dag pa/ sbyin pa legs par byin pa/ sngon sbyor ba legs par byas pa/ lhag pa'i bya ba legs par byas pa/ bden pa'i rgyan gyis legs par brgyan
10b4(mdo sde): pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su btsal pa/ gos pa/ bya ba bsgos pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nges par byas pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa bdun du dge ba'i rtsa ba thaMd yang dag par bsgrubs
10b5(mdo sde): pa sbyin pa rnam bdun byin pa/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po lnga shin tu bsten pa/ legs par spyad pa lus kyi rnam ga/ sum/ ngag gi rnam bzhi/ yid kyi rnam gsum spyad par gyur pa/ 
10b6(mdo sde): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsten pa dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa brten par gyur pa/ yang dag pa'i smon lam yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa'i smon lam
10b7(mdo sde): btab pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa la zhugs pa/ yang dag pa'i rnam par thar pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa yongasu rdzogs par byas pa/ yang dag pa'i mos la yan
10b8(mdo sde): lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa drang por byas pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu'i rjes su rab tu byung ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong lnga bcu rtsa lnga la sbyin pa phul bar gyur/ 
11a1(mdo sde): // pa/ rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag phyed dang bzhi la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ sems can chad med grangs med pa dag mtho ris dang thar pa'i lam du btsud par gyur pa/ bla na med pa yang dag/ 
11a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ tshe gcig gis thogs pa/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa/ lha'i bu dam pa tog dkar po
11a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba/ lha'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
11a4(mdo sde): 'gyuraro zhes der shin tu mchod pa/ gzhal med khang gnas sum khri nyis stong la rab tu gnas pa ste/ stegs bu dang / ba gam dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa
11a5(mdo sde): brtsegs pa dang / khyams kyis legs par brgyan pa/ gdugasadang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ rin po che'i dri/ khu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla res bres pa/ me tog man da ra dang / 
11a6(mdo sde): man dar dang / man da ra ba chen po dag/ chal par bkram pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu dbyangs len pa/ me tog a ti mug ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / skya snar dang / sa brtol dang / btang zung
11a7(mdo sde): dang / btang zung chen po dang / mya ngan mtshang dang / n+ya grong dang / tin tu ka dang / a san dang / dong ki'i me tog dang / shing ke sa ra dang / ta ma la dang / sa la dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa chen pos brgyan pa/ 
11a8(mdo sde): gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ gzhi mnyam zhing bkod pas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog snang 'od dang / ma li ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / bar shi ka dang / tar ni dang kha li dang / ko ta ra ni dang / 
11b1(mdo sde): mchog tu dri zhim dang / nga nus ka ri dang / lha'i sna ma'i me tog dang / ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mung da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri rab tu zhi ba'i bla re chen po phyogs phyogs su bres pa/ bya 'dab sgren/ 
11b2(mdo sde): dang / ne co dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / kha ba dang / rma ba dang / duru ba dang / kun la dang / ka la bing ka dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya sna tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin pa lta bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mig
11b3(mdo sde): mngon tu phyogs te lta zhing ltad mor bya ba/ chos rgya che ba chen po yang dag pas brjod pas/ 'dod pa la dga' ba'i shugs kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang
11b4(mdo sde): khro ba dang / thab dang / khong khro ba med par gyur pa/ dga' ba dang / ma gru ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dran pa rgya che zhing gsal ba skye ba'i gzhal med khang chen po de na bde bar gnas shing / chos
11b5(mdo sde): kyi yang dag pa'i gtam byung ba dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs brgyad khri bzhi stong po'i sgra de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las dge ba'i tshogs kyis yang dag par
11b6(mdo sde): bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // bsod nams rgya chen tshogs mnga' dran rtogs pa dang // blo gros mtha' yas shes rab 'od mdzad pa// mtshungs med stobs mnga' sgyu rtsal rgya che ba/ 
11b7(mdo sde): mar mi mdzad kyis lung bstan dgongs par mdzod// rgya chen dri ma med pa'i thugs mnga' ba// dri ma gsum spangs rgyags dang skyon zhi ba// dge ba dri med rnam par dag pa'i thugs// sngon tshe ji ltar sbyin spyang
11b8(mdo sde): dgongs par mdzod// zhi gnas tshul khrims brtul zhugs bzod pa dang // dul dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab stobs// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig rnam spyad pa// spyod rigs cher byung dgongs
12a1(mdo sde): mdzod dgongs par mdzog// sems can rnams la thugs bcomadzad gyur cing // sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig khyod kyis mchog/ dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod cag grags mthar
12a2(mdo sde): yas/ de'i dus lags kyis btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ rga shi nyon mongs 'jig mdzad rdul bral ba// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dri za dang // lha min dbang po dag kyang sdod lags kyis// 'chi
12a3(mdo sde): 'bo'i tshul mkhyen 'pho ba bstan par mchog// bskal pa stong du dga' ba spyang gyur kyang // rgya mtsho chu yis ji bzhin mo ngoms kyis// ngoms pa khyod kyi thugs dam dge pa ste// yun rings sgom
12a4(mdo sde): nyin skye bo tshim par mdzod// sman pa med pa'i grags pa dmanga' ba khyod// chos la dgyes par khyod dgyes 'dod mi dgyes// 'on kyang dri ma med pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ 
12a5(mdo sde): bcas 'jig rten dag la thugs brtse mdzod// lha rnams bye/ ba khyod la chos thos pas// ngoms par 'gyur ba ma lags 'on gyis kyang // dal dang mo ldan gyur pa
12a6(mdo sde): ngan song du// gnas par gyur pa dag la gzigs su gsaso// drim med pa'i spyan mnga' phyogs bcu yi// 'dog rten dag gos sa rgyas gzigs gyur cig// de dag rnams las chos
12a7(mdo sde): gsan chos mchog pa// 'jig rten dag la rnam par dbye ba mdzod// dpal ldan khyod kyi bsed rnams dpal gyis mi// dgar ldan po phreng shin tu mdzes mong \u0f7f/ khon kyang thugs
12a8(mdo sde): thugs dang ldan pas ma/ 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan du ni tshor ba phab// rgyal zhugs grub pa byang chub reg ces te// 'dod pa'i khams las rab tu 'das pa yi// gzugs kyi khams na
12b1(mdo sde): lha rnams gang 'khong pa// du ma thams cad mngon par rab tu dga'// mgon po khyod kyi bdud kyi las rnams bcom// khyod gzhan mu stegs can rnams pa ma mdzad ste/ khyod ni byang chub phyag
12b2(mdo sde): mthil bzhag dang 'dra// de'i dus lags kyis btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ nyon mongs rab tu 'bar ba'i 'jig rten la// dpa' bo khyod kyis sprin ltar khyab mdzod de// bdud rtsi'i char ba
12b3(mdo sde): mngon par rab tu phag/ lha mi rnams kyi nyon mongs zhi bar mdzod// khyod ni sman pa khams la mkhas pa ste// yun ring nad pa sman pas bor ba yi// sems can rnam thar gsum gyi
12b4(mdo sde): sbyar sman gyis// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la myur du 'khod// seng ge'i nga ro thos par ma gyur pas// wa rnams 'jigs pa med par sgra sgrog gis// sangs rgyas seng go/ 
12b5(mdo sde): sgra ni rab sgrogs te// mu stegs can gzhan wa rnams skrag par mdzod// sa yi dkyil na stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi// stobs ldan phyag na shes rab sgron ma bsnams/ 
12b6(mdo sde): phyag mthil dam pas sa la brdab mdzod de// 'di rnams khyod kyis rab tu pham par mdzod// gang dag khyod la lhung bzed 'bul ba yi// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po sdod cing mchis// khyod
12b7(mdo sde): bltams gang dag len par 'gyur ba yi// brgya byin tshangs pa khrag khrig sdod cing mchis// blo gros bzang po rigs chen rigs ldan pa// gang la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' yi// spyod pa ston
12b8(mdo sde): 'gyur dam pa rigs skyes pa// rigs kyi nang na btsun pa'i rigs la gzigs// snod gyur gang du nor bu rin po che/ bzhag na dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ba bzhin/ nor bu rin chen lta bur dri med thugs/ 'dzam bu'i
13a1(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan du ni char pa phog/ glu dbyangs sgra las rnam pa 'di lta yi// tshigs su bcad pa mang po byung gyur nas// 'di ni dus lags btang snyoms ma mdzad ces// snying rje'i
13a2(mdo sde): yi dang ldan la skul bar byed// yang dag par spro bar bya ba'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dus de lta bus
13a3(mdo sde): yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhal med khang chen po de nas byung ste/ chos kyis mtho ba zhes bya ba'i khang bzangs chen po gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug cing dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la
13a4(mdo sde): chos ston pa der/ byang chub sems dpa' zhugs so// zhugangs nas kyang seng ge'i khri bzang po zhes bya ba la 'dug go/ de nas lha'i bu gang dag byang chub sems dpa' dang skal
13a5(mdo sde): pa mnyam pa/ theg pa mtshungs pa la zhugs pa de dag kyang / khang bzangs de nyid du zhugs so// gang yang byang / chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa/ byang chub
13a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang spyod pa 'dra ba dag dang / lha'i bu de dag kyang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs rnams bsal cing / lha'i bu phal rnams kyang bsal nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa 'thun pa'i 'khor can
13a7(mdo sde): du byas te/ 'khor bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad brgyad dang / khang bzangs der zhugs nas/ so so ci rigs par rang rang gi seng ge'i khri la 'khod par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub
13a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' lo bcu gnyis na ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de'i tshe/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag 'dzam+bu'i gling du lhags nas/ lha'i kha dog mi snang bar byas te/ 
13b1(mdo sde): dram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur nas/ bram ze rnams rig byed slob tu 'jud de/ gang zhig rnam pa 'di lta bu mngal du zhugs par gyur na/ de ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu cu gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 
13b2(mdo sde): de dag dang ldan na rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gsum du 'gyur ba med de/ de la gal te khyim na gnas na ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po
13b3(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ do rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin
13b4(mdo sde): be che dang / blon po rin po che dang bdun no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor lo rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur
13b5(mdo sde): gso sbyong gi nyi mches bco lnga la mgo khrus byas te/ dbu zung sa su gnas shing / steng gi khyams na bud med kyi chog sa kyis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe/ shar phyogs nas
13b6(mdo sde): lha'i 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs stong yod pa/ mu khyud dang ldan pa/ lte ba dang bcas pa/ thams cad gser las grub pa/ mgar bas ma byas pa/ 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam nas 'byung ste/ 
13b7(mdo sde): rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis thos pa/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur pa/ gso sbyong ginyi
13b8(mdo sde): mches bco lnga la mgo khrus byas te/ dbu zungs su gnas shing steng gi khyams na bud med kyi tshogs kyis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe/ shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po tsha byung bar gyur na/ de ni
14a1(mdo sde): / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes thos na/ bdag gi drung du lha'i 'khor lo rin po che 'ongs pa las na/ bdag kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yin du nges so snyam ste/ de nas rgyal po
14a2(mdo sde): rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bde bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ lag pa g.yas pas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de skor zhing 'di skad du/ btsun
14a3(mdo sde): ba/ lha'i 'khor lo rin po che chos kyis skor cig/ chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig smras pa dang / de nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas bskur
14a4(mdo sde): bas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las shar phyogs su legs/ par 'gro ste/ rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig du rjes su 'gro'o/ 
14a5(mdo sde): sa'i phyogs gang du lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de gnas pa gyur pa der rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bi nas dbang bskur/ de yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu
14a6(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas shar phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de dag dngul gyi snod ni gser phyes bkang ste thogs/ gser gyi snod ni dngul sil mas bkang ste thogs nas/ 'khor
14a7(mdo sde): les sbyar ba'i rgyal po bsu zhing 'di skad du/ lha 'dir legs par gshegs so// lha chur gshegs su gsol/ lha'i chab srid ni shin tu rgyas shing 'byor la bde ste/ lo legs shing nyams
14a8(mdo sde): dgyes la/ spyi bo mang po dang mis gtams pa lags na/ lha nyid kyi yul du byon nas bzhugs su gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po rgyal rogs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas khams
14b1(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po de dag la 'di skad du khyed rang rang gi rgyal srid dag chos gyis shig/ chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no// khyed srog chags ma gsod cig/ ma byin par ma len cig/ 'dod pa la log par
14b2(mdo sde): g.yem par ma byed cig/ brdzun du ma smra zhig/ phramam zer cig/ ngag rtsub po ma smra shig/ tshig kyal pa ma smra shig/ brnab sems can du ma gyur cig/ gnod sems can du ma gyur cig/ log par
14b3(mdo sde): lta bar ma gyur cig/ srog gcod pa la byams par ma gyur cig/ log par lta ba can gyi bar la sems par ma gyur cig/ nga'i yul du chos ma yin pa byung nga re/ chos ma yin par spyod pa la byams
14b4(mdo sde): par ma byed cig ces bsgo nas/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ de ltar shar phyogs su rnam parargyal bar byed do// shar phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byas
14b5(mdo sde): nas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtshol 'gro'o// shar phyogs kyi rgyu mtshol song nas/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las rgal lo// rgal nas kyang lho phyogs su namakha' las rdzu 'phrul
14b6(mdo sde): gyis legs par 'gro ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu 'gro'o// snga ma bzhin du lho phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do// lha
14b7(mdo sde): phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/ nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do// byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byas nas/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la 'gro'o// byang
14b8(mdo sde): phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la song nas/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las rgal lo// rgal nas kyang na mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i pho brang du legs par 'ongs nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgo'i steng
15a1(mdo sde): / du nyams pa med par gnas te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba ni/ 'khor lo rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che rnam pa ji
15a2(mdo sde): lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i glang po rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad thal kar du gyur pa/ yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa/ gtsug gser
15a3(mdo sde): gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ namakha' la 'gro ba/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos can te/ 'di ltar
15a4(mdo sde): glang po'i rgyal po byang chub ces bya'o// gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba glang po rin po che de brtag par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ nyi ma shar kar glang po rin po che de la zhon
15a5(mdo sde): te/ sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa/ rgyam tshe'i mur thug pa dang bcas pa kun tu bskor te/ rgyal po'i/ pho brang du 'ongs nas/ khye'u sus kyi dga' ba myong bar byed de/ 
15a6(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang
15a7(mdo sde): bskur ba'i rta rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad sngon por gyur pa/ mgo gnag pa/ rdog ma lcang lor 'dug pa/ zhon na gus par byed pa/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang bcas pa/ gser gyi rgyan dang ldan
15a8(mdo sde): patagaser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ na mkha' la 'gro ba/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos can te/ 'di ltar rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can zhes bya ba'o// gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal
15b1(mdo sde): rigs spyi ba nas dbang bsgyur ba/ rtan po che brtag par 'dod par gyur pa do che/ nyis shar kar d+harin po che la zhon nus/ sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho mtha' skor dang bcas pa rgya mtsho mur thug pa dang bcas pa kun
15b2(mdo sde): tu bskor te/ phyir rgyal po'i pho brang du 'khor nas/ khye'u sus kyi bde ba myong bar byed de/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni rta rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nor bu rin po che rnam pa
15b3(mdo sde): ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i nor bu rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad du sngo ba/ baiDUr+ya'i rang bzhin zur brgyad du 'dug pa/ shin tu sbyangs
15b4(mdo sde): pa 'byung ste/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par 'gyuraro// gang gi che rgya po rgyal da rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ nor bu rin po che de brtag par
15b5(mdo sde): 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ mtshan mo nam gyi gung la/ mun pa mun nag gi nang du nor bu rin po che de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ bskyed mos tshal gyis bzang po blta ba'i phyir/ 
15b6(mdo sde): song na/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu snang bas gsal bar 'gyur ro// nor bu rin po che de'i 'khor
15b7(mdo sde): na gnas pa'i mi de dag kyang snang ba des gsal bar gyur pa dang / gcig gis gcig mthong / gcig gis gcig shes nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du smra ste/ bzhin bzangs dag longs/ las kyi
15b8(mdo sde): mtha' dag byos shig/ tshong dus dag khrom/ nyi ma shar te nyin mor shes so zhes zer te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de nor bu rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// rgyal
16a1(mdo sde): po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ bud med rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bud med rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ 
16a2(mdo sde): tshul dang 'thun pa/ rgyal rigs su skyes pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi thung ba/ ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang yang mi skem po/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang yang mi gnas pa/ gzugs
16a3(mdo sde): mdzes pa/ tshul du shis pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ de'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ba/ kha nas ud pa la'i ngad ldang ba/ ka tsa lin di'i gos
16a4(mdo sde): ltar reg na bde ba/ de grang ba'i dus na ni lus la reg na dro ba/ dro ba 'idus na lus la reg na bsil ba ste/ de 'khor los sgyur dpa'i rgyal po ma gtogs par gzhan la yid kyis kyang 'dod
16a5(mdo sde): chags su mi byed na/ lus kyis lta ci smos te/ 'khor los sgyu ra ba'i rgyal po ni bud med rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po khyim bdag rin po
16a6(mdo sde): tshe rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i khyim bdag rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ lha'i mig dang
16a7(mdo sde): ldan pa 'byung ngo // de lha'i mig des dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu bdag po dang bcas pa'i gter dag kyang mthong / bdag po med pa'i gter dag kyang mthong ste/ de bdag po med pa'i gter gang yin pa de
16a8(mdo sde): ngag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i nor gyi dgos pa byed de/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni khyim bdag rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po blon po rin
16b1(mdo sde): brnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por blon po rin po che snga ma bzhin du byung ste/ mangs shing gsal la yid gsungs pa'o// de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des
16b2(mdo sde): bsams pa tsam gyis bskosgo bar bya ba'i dpung rnams sgo'o// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po na blon po rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni rin po che sna bdun de dag dang
16b3(mdo sde): ldan pa yin no// de la bu stong 'byung ste/ dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag ste/ des rgya mtsho la thugs pa'i sa chen po ma
16b4(mdo sde): lus pa gnod par sngo ba med cing / 'che ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing / mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos kyis legs par phrab ste gnas so// gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
16b5(mdo sde): na sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa/ 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi/ ston par 'gyur ro zhes rig byed 'don tu 'dzud do// de bzhin
16b6(mdo sde): du lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'dzam+bu'i gling du lhags shing / rang sangs rgyas dag la skul ma 'debs te/ 'phags pa dag da ste lo bcu gnyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi
16b7(mdo sde): lhums su 'jug gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di bor cig ces zer ro// dge slong dag de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ mjug ma sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i ri la/ rang sangs rgyas glang po zhes bya ba
16b8(mdo sde): 'dug pas/ sgra de thos nas rdo ba'i steng du 'ji ba la bya ba bzhin du 'dug ste/ nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du gyen du 'phags so// gyen du 'phags nas kyang / me'i khams la snyoms par
17a1(mdo sde): zhugs te sgron ma bzhin du mya ngan las 'das so// de'i mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu rgyus dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni mes yongs su
17a2(mdo sde): zad par gyur te/ ring bsrel 'ba' shig sa la lhags nas/ rkang rjes de dag ni da dung yang drang srong gi rjes shes grag ste/ yod do// dge slong dag de'i tshe yul bA ra na se'i ri dgas kyi nags drang srong lhung ba na/ 
17a3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya 'khod pa de dag gis kyang sgra de thos nas/ na mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid tu gyen tu 'phags nas/ me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te/ sgron ma bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// 
17a4(mdo sde): de dag gi mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu rgyus dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni mes yongasu zad par gyur te/ ring bsrel 'ba' shig sa
17a5(mdo sde): la lhags so// de ltar 'dir drang srong rnams lhung ngo zhes/ de phyin cad drang srong lhung ba zhes bya ba yang / drang srong lhung ba drang srong lhung ba zhes ming du chags par gyur to// mi 'jigs
17a6(mdo sde): pa byin pa'i ri dgas dag kyang de na gnas pas/ de phyin chad ri dgas kyi nags shes bya ba yang / ri dgas kyi nags/ ri dgas kyi nags shes ming du gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga'
17a7(mdo sde): ldan gyi gnas dam pa na 'dug pa ni/ rnam par lta ba chen po bzhi la rnam par lta ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dus la rnam par lta ba dang / gling la rnam par lta ba dang / yul la rnam par lta ba dang / rigs
17a8(mdo sde): la rnam par lta ba'o// dge slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dus rnam par lta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni thog ma'i dus sems can 'du ba'i tshe/ ma'i mngal du mi 'jug gi/ gang gi
17b1(mdo sde): tshe 'jig rten gsal bar kun nas gnas par gyur te/ skye ba snang bar gyur/ rga ba snang bar 'gyur/ na ba snang bar gyur/ 'chi ba snang bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal du 'jug go/ dge
17b2(mdo sde): slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gling rnam par lta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mtha' 'khob kyi gling du mi skye/ shar gyi lus 'phags por mi skye/ nub kyi bal glang spyod du mi skye/ 
17b3(mdo sde): byang gi sgra mi snyan du me skye'i/ lho'i 'dzam+bu'i gling nyid du skye'o// dge slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yul rnam par lta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na
17b4(mdo sde): mi rnams dbang po rtul zhing blun la lug ltar lkug pa'i rang bzhin ca dan/ legs par bstan pa dang / nyes par bstan pa'i don shes dpar bya ba'i skal ba med pa dag yod pa dag tu mi skye'i// byang chub
17b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni yul gyi dbus nyid du skye'o// dge slong dag ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs rnam par lta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rigs dma' ba gdol pa'i
17b6(mdo sde): rigs sam/ smig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/ shing rta mkhan gyi rigs sam/ g.yung rigs su mi skye'o// bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs kho na ste/ rigs gnyis su skye'o// de la gang gi tshe bram ze'i
17b7(mdo sde): rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe/ bram ze'i rigs su skye'o// gang gi tshe rgyal rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe/ rgyal rigs su skye ste/ dge slong dag da ltar rgyal rigs btsun par bya bas/ de'i phyir byang chub
17b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal rigs su skye ste/ dge slong dag don gyi dang de la brten nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa/ rnam par lta ba chen po bzhi la rnam par lta ste/ de ltar
18a1(mdo sde): // bltas nas cang mi zer bar gyur to// / bam po gnyis pa/ dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ byang chub
18a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rigs rin po che ni ji lta bu zhig tu skye bar 'gyur/ yum ni ji lta bu zhig gi lhums su 'jug par 'gyur zhes 'dri'o// de la la la na re yul ma ga d+ha na lus 'phags kyi rigs 'di 'byor
18a3(mdo sde): cing rgyal la/ lo legs pa dang bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de ni tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
18a4(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni ma yi rgyud kyis dag pa yang ma yin/ dpa'i rgyud kyis dag pa yang ma yin la/ bsod nams chung ngu das byung gi/ bsod nams rgya chen pos mngon par byung ba ma
18a5(mdo sde): yin zhing / rgod la mi brtan te mi gnas pa yin la/ yul de yang nga nye 'khor gseg mas gang ba/ bskyed mos tshal dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u dag kyang mi mang la/ ri brags ltar mtha'
18a6(mdo sde): 'khob kyi gnas su gyur pa ste/ de'i phyir de ni tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re ko sa la'i rigs 'di 'khor mang zhing bzhon pa mang la nor che ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum
18a7(mdo sde): gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ko sa la'i rigs ni/ gdol pa'i rigs las shi 'phos nas skyes pa yin/ 
18a8(mdo sde): te/ pha dang mas dag pa yang ma yin la/ dma' ba la mos pa ste/ rigs mtho bar yang mi bya/ nor dang rin po che'i gter yang tshad med par phun sum tshogs pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir de ni tshul dang
18b1(mdo sde): 'thun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re rgyal po bad sa la'i rigs 'di 'byor cing rgyas la lo legs pa dang / bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i
18b2(mdo sde): gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang de'i tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po bad sa la'i rigs ni phal ba ste/ gtum la/ gzi brjid 'bar ba yang ma yin
18b3(mdo sde): zhing / skyes pa gzhan las skye ba grub pa/ pa ma nyid kyi gzi brjid kyi las kyis grub pa ma yin la/ de'i rgyal po yang chad par smra ba ste/ de'i phyir de yang tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro// 
18b4(mdo sde): la la na re grong khyer chen po yangs pa can 'di ni 'byor cing rgyas dal/ lo legs pa dang / bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ nyams dadaga' la/ skye bo mang po dang mis kun tu gang ba/ stegs bu
18b5(mdo sde): dang / ba ga ma dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs dag gis legs par brgyan pa ste/ me tog gi ra ba dang / nags tshal
18b6(mdo sde): gyi phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin la/ lha'i pho brang dang 'dra ba yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang tshul
18b7(mdo sde): dang 'thun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag la ni phan tshun du rigs par smra ba med do// chos spyod pa med do// gong ma dang / bar ma dang / rgan pa dang / gtso bo dag la yang / rim gror
18b8(mdo sde): bya ba med cing / re re zhing yang 'di snyam du bdag ni rgyal po'o// bdag ni rgyal po'o snyam du sems pas/ slob mar khas len pa med cing / chos khas len pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir de'ang tshul dang 'thun
19a1(mdo sde): // pa ma yin no zhes zer ro// la lan re grong khyer 'phags rgyal na/ rab snang gi rigs 'di ni dpung che zhing bzhon pa mang ba/ pha rol gyi g.yul ngor rgyal ba thob pa yin te/ de ni byang chub
19a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni khro zhing gtum la/ brlang
19a3(mdo sde): zhing gzu lums can/ rgod pa ste/ las yod par lta ba yang ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de yang byang chub sems dpa' de lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re/ 
19a4(mdo sde): grong khyer bcom brlag 'di 'byor cing rgyas la lo legs pa da dang / bde ba dang ldan pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis kun tu gang da bar yin pas/ rgyal po lag bzangs sde dpa' ba'i bdag
19a5(mdo sde): po'i rgyal po'i pho brang de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
19a6(mdo sde): rgyal po de ni log par lta ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes pa ste/ ma rgod dang 'dra ba'i rgyal po yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni log par lta ba'i rigs su skye bar mi rigs te/ de'i phyir de yang
19a7(mdo sde): tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re grong khyer ha sti na pu ra 'di'i rgyal po ni skya bseng gi bu'i rigs kyi rgyud las skyes pa/ dpa' zhing rtul phod pa dang ldan pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs
19a8(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gyi sde 'jom pa ste/ rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa' de lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir
19b1(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di ltar skya bseng gi bu'i rigs su skyes pa dag gis rigs kyi rgyud rnam par 'khrugs par byas te/ g.yul ngor brtan pa la ni chos kyi bu zhes zer/ 'jigs sde la ni rlung gi bu zhes zer/ srid sgrub la
19b2(mdo sde): ni dbang po'i bu zhes zer/ rig byed dang lhar bcas la ni tha skar gyi bu zhes zer te/ de'i phyir rigs de yang byang chub sems dpa' de lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes zer ro// la la ni ri grong
19b3(mdo sde): khyer bcom brlag 'di ni shin tu yang nyams dga' zhing phan tshun 'byor gyi steng du/ rgyal po bzang po'i bshes gnyen bzhugs pa'i sa yang yin la/ rgyal po de yang glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / 
19b4(mdo sde): dpung bu chung dang / dpung gi tshogs mang po dang ldan pa/ gse/ da dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / da dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / nor
19b5(mdo sde): dang / yo byad shin tu mang ba/ rgyal po dang / blon po thams cadazil gyis mi non pa'i stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / ldan pa/ mdza' ba dang ldan zhing chos la dga' ba ste/ 
19b6(mdo sde): rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po bzang po'i bshes gnyen
19b7(mdo sde): yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa de yod mod kyi/ de ni shin tu rgas pas bu bskyed pa'i mthu yang med la/ bu'ang mang bas de'i phyir rigs de yang byang chub sems dpa' de yum gyi lhum su 'jug pa'i
19b8(mdo sde): gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes zer ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha de dag gis 'jam+bu'i gling gi yul chen po bcu drug po thams cad na/ rgyal po'i rigs mthon po mthon po
20a1(mdo sde): gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la bltas na/ thams cad kyang nyes pa dang bcas par mthong ste/ de dag de ltar sems pa'i yid la byed pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu ye shes tog gi
20a2(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ theg pa chen po 'di la nges par gyur pa zhig yod pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang / lha'i 'khor chen po yod pa de dag la 'di skad
20a3(mdo sde): ces smras so// grogs po dag tshur shog/ byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi drung du dong ste/ rigs rin po che yon tan ji lta bur phun sum tshogs pa zhig tu srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
20a4(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur ba dri'o zhes smras pa dang / legs so zhes te/ de de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dang de'i drung du phyin te dris pa/ skyes bu dam pa'i rigs rin po che
20a5(mdo sde): yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ji lta bu zhig tu byang chub sems da pa'i srid pa tha ma pa skye bar 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dbas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang / lha'i
20a6(mdo sde): tshogs chen po de dag la rnam par bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i rigs de ni/ rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi phun sum
20a7(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin te/ drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs de ni btsun pa yin/ rigs de ni kun gyis mngon par shes pa yin/ rigs de ni phran tshegs med cing gnod par byed pa med pa
20a8(mdo sde): yin// rigs de ni rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni tshe 'brang phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni sngon gyi skyes bu zung phun sum
20b1(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni btsun pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni kun gyis mngon par shes pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni dbang che bar grags pa'i// 
20b2(mdo sde): skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni skyes pa mang ba yin/ rigs de ni bud med mang ba yin/ rigs de ni 'jigs pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni dman pa med cing zhum pa med pa
20b3(mdo sde): yin/ rigs de ni brkam pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni blon pos blta zhing longs spyod la spyod pa yin/ 
20b4(mdo sde): rigs de ni bzod don yod pas bshams shing longs spyod la spyod pa yin/ rigs de ni mdza' ba brtan pa yin/ rigs de ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags kyi srog
20b5(mdo sde): la lta ba yin/ rigs de ni byas pa gzo ba dang ldan pa yi/ na/ rigs de ni brtul zhugs shes pa yin/ rigs// de ni 'dun pas mi 'gro ba yin/ rigs de ni zhe sdang gis
20b6(mdo sde): mi 'gro ba yin/ rigs de ni gti mug gis mi 'gro ba yin/ rags de ni 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba yin/ rigs de ni kha na ma tho bos 'jigs pa yin/ rigs de ni gti mug la mi gnas pa
20b7(mdo sde): yinate/ rigs de ni lag skabs che ba yin/ rigs de ni bya ba la mos pa yin/ rigs de ni gtong ba la mos pa yin/ rigs de ni sbyin pa la mos pa yin/ rigs de ni zho sha shes pa yin// 
20b8(mdo sde): rigs de ni rtsal brtan pa dang / rigs de ni mthu rtsal dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni rtsal mchog dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni drang srong mchod pa yin/ rigs de ni lha mchod pa yin/ rigs de ni
21a1(mdo sde): mchod rten mchod pa yin/ rigs de ni mchun rjed pa yin/ rigs de ni khon du 'dzin pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni phyogs bcur sgra grags pa yin/ rigs de ni 'khor chen po dang ldan pa
21a2(mdo sde): yin/ rigs de ni 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni bla na med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni rigs kyi nang na gtso bor bya ba yin/ rigs de ni rigs la dbang thob pa yin/ rigs
21a3(mdo sde): de ni dbang che bar grags pa yin/ rigs de ni phar 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni mar 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni dge sbyong du 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni bram zer 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni nor dang
21a4(mdo sde): 'bru'i bang mdzod mang ba yin/ rigs de ni dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / 
21a5(mdo sde): rdzas dang / yo byad mang ba yin/ rigs de ni glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / lug shin tu mang ba/ yin/ rigs de ni bran po dang / bran mi dang / las byed pa dang / 
21a6(mdo sde): zho shas 'tsho ba shin tu mang ba yin/ rigs de ni thub par dka' ba yin/ rigs de ni don thams cad grub pa yin/ rigs de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes pa yin/ rigs de ni sngon
21a7(mdo sde): gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i grogs kyis bskyed pa yin/ rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su rigs btsun par skyes pa yin/ rigs de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs
21a8(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i nang na/ rigs la smos pa'i skyon gyi kha na ma tho ba thams cad dang bral ba ste/ grogs po dag gang du byang chub sems dpa' srid
21b1(mdo sde): pa tha ma pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs de ni rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa yin no// grogs po dag srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bud med gang gi mngal du 'jug par 'gyur/ 
21b2(mdo sde): ba'i bud med de ni/ yon tan gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni kun gyis mngon par shes pa'i bud med
21b3(mdo sde): kyi mngal du 'jug go/ kun gyis mngon par shes pa dang / spyod pa la glags mi thod pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshe 'brang phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / 
21b4(mdo sde): ming phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu zheng phun sum tshogs pa dang / sngon chad ma bcas pa dang / tshul khrims phun sum tshogs da ba dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bzhin 'dzum pa
21b5(mdo sde): dang 'thun par 'dzin pa dang / gsal ba dang / dul ba dang / 2jigs pa med pa dang / mang du thos pa dang / mkhas pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / mi khro ba dang / phrag dog
21b6(mdo sde): med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / mi rgod pa dang / mi g.yeng ba dang / ca co med pa dang / bzod cing des pa dang ldan pa dang / ngo tsha shes shong khrel yod pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
21b7(mdo sde): gi shas chung ba dang / bud med kyi skyon dang bral ba dang / khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs dang ldan pa dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bud med kyi mngal du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa
21b8(mdo sde): 'jug go// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa bud med gang gi mngal du 'jug pa'i bud med de ni/ yon tan gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa yin no// grog po dag byang chub
22a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni zla ba mar gyi ngol ma'i mngal du mi 'jug gi/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tham pa ni/ zla ba yang gyi ches bco lnga'i zla ba nya ste/ rgyas pa la skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa'i tshe/ ma
22a2(mdo sde): gso sbyong blangs pa'i dngal du 'jug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' las rigs yongs su dag pa dang / ma yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de
22a3(mdo sde): dag thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ skyes bu dam pa 'dis rnam pa ji snyed du bstan pa de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i rigs de gang zhig la yod snyam du sems so// de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa
22a4(mdo sde): la zhugs pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya'i grong khyer 'di 'byor cing rgyas la/ bde zhing lo legs pa dang ldan te/ nyam ngas dga' zhing skye bo mang po dang / mis gang ba yin la/ rgyal po
22a5(mdo sde): zas gtsang ma yang ma'i rgyud kyi dag pa/ pha'i rgyud kyis dag pa chung ma dag pa dang ldan pa/ las kyi mtha' la nyon mong/ sa pa med pa/ dpe byad bzang ba/ shin tu mdzangs pa/ bsod
22a6(mdo sde): nams kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ grags pa chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes pa/ nor dang / gter dang / rin po che dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ las yod par
22a7(mdo sde): lta ba/ sdig pa'i lta ba med pa/ shAkya'i yul kun na yang rgyal po de gcig pur zad de/ tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / 'khor gyi mi thams cad kyis rim gror bya zhing mchod pa/ mdzes pa
22a8(mdo sde): blta na sdug pa/ ha cang yang mi rgan/ ha cang yang mi gzhon zhing / gzugs mdzes la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/ bzo shes pa/ dus shes pa/ bdag shes pa/ chog shes pa/ sems can shes pa/ 
22b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten shes pa/ mtshan shes pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chas kyis rjes su ston pa'o// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po don sems can dge ba'i rtsab bskyed pa rnams kyi gnas te/ gang dag pa sa/ 
22b2(mdo sde): par gyur pa de dag kyang de dang skal pa 'dra ba dag go// rgyal po zas gtsang ma de la lha mo sgyu 'phrul zhes bya ba/ shAkya'i bdag po shin tu legs par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i bu mo zhig yod pa'ang / phyugs
22b3(mdo sde): cung gzhon zhing dar la bab pa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ sngon chad ma btsas pa/ bu dang bu mo med pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ bu don la bris pa ltar blta na sdug pa/ lha'i bu mo ltar rgyun
22b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i/ bud med kyi skyon rnams dang bral bar bden par smra ba/ mi drag pa/ mi bslang ba/ mi gcor ba kha na ma tho ba med pa/ gyo mo'i sgra lta bu med pa/ ca tso med pa/ 
22b5(mdo sde): 'jam zhing snyan la/ yid du 'ong bar smra ba/ mi nges pa dang / khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags kha dang / khro ba med pa/ phrag dog med pa/ dus su smra ba/ 
22b6(mdo sde): gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ khyos mchog par 'dzin pa/ khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs can/ skyes pa gzhan la bsam pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral ba/ mgo dang / rna ba dang / 
22b7(mdo sde): sna gnas su phebs pa/ bung ba'i mchog gi kha dog lta bu'i sgra dang ldan pa/ dpral ba legs pa/ smin tshugs legs pa/ khro gnyer med pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ gsong por smra ba/ 'jam zhing snyan
22b8(mdo sde): pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ 'thun par 'dzin pa/ drang ba/ gya gyu med pa/ sgyu med pa/ g.yo med pa/ khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa/ mi rgod pa/ mi g.yeng ba/ khang na mi smra ba/ 'chal pa'i tshig med pa/ 'dod
23a1(mdo sde): chags dang / se s+yA dang / ga mgag shes chung ga nga nges shing bzad pa dang ldan pa/ nang lag dang / mig dang / blo shin tu bsrungs pa/ rkang lag shin tu 'jam pa/ kaN lin da'i mas
23a2(mdo sde): ltar reg na bde ba/ pad+ma gzhon nu'i mdab ma ltar mig shin tu rnam par dag pa/ sna dbyings legs shing mdog sdug pa/ yan lag shin tu brtan pa/ 'dza'i dbyings ltar shin tu 'dud pa/ yan lag dang / 
23a3(mdo sde): nying lag shin tu 'byes pa/ yan lag la smad du med pa/ mchu bim pa ltar dmar ba/ blta na mdzes pa/ mgul rim bzhin du 'dug pa/ rgyan dam pa dang ldan pa/ sna ma'i me tog dang / bar sha ki ltar so/ 
23a4(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par dag pa/ phrag pa legs par byin gyis 'tsha dam pa/ rim gyis legs par grub pa'i dpung pa dang ldan pa nga rked pa gzhu'i chang zungs ltar phra ba/ gzhogs nyams pa med
23a5(mdo sde): pa/ lte ba khung zab pa/ sta zur 'jam zhing yangs la/ zlum zhing brtan par grub pa/ rdo rje ltar mkhregs shing mtshung / sa pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ glang po'i sna ltar mnyam zhing
23a6(mdo sde): legs pa'i brla dang ldan pa/ byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i lta bu/ log pa dang / rkang pa'i mthil rgya skegs kyi khu ba ltar 'dug pa/ 'gro ba'i mig tu sdug pa/ mig gi dbang po nyams pa med pa/ yid
23a7(mdo sde): du 'ong zhing blta na sdug pa/ bud med rin po che'i gzugs las khyad par du 'phags pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ sgyu 'phrul sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs su 'dug pa/ sgyu 'phrul zhes ming gi brdar btags pa/ 
23a8(mdo sde): sgyu rtsal la mkhas pa/ dga' tshal gyi lha'i bu mo lta bu zhig rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum du chul dang 'thun gyis/ gang byang chub sems
23b1(mdo sde): dang satshigs dag las bstan pa de ni shA kya'i rigs nyid la snang gi/ gzhan la ni ma yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dag pa'i sems can chos mtho 'ang bzangs ma/ chos bzangs seng+ge'i khri la rab tu
23b2(mdo sde): 'dug/ byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ldan pa dang // skal ba mnyam pa'i lha rnams drang srong 'khor// de na 'dug cing de ni 'di snyam sems// rigs gang rnam dag rab tu shes dang ldan// byang
23b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' skye dang tshul 'thun gang // pha ma gang zhig dag pa'i dngos dang ldan// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di kun tu rnam bltas na// rgyal rigs rgyal rgyud che ba gang yin pa// kun kyang skyon dang bcas
23b4(mdo sde): par rjes bsams nas// shAkya'i rigs ni skyon dang bral bar mthong // zas gtsang rgyal po'i rigs nang rigs dang ldan// mi drabang rgyud na rnam dag cho rigs can// 'byor cing rgyas la 'khrug
23b5(mdo sde): pab med pa ste// skye bo dam pa chos ldan rim gro can// ser skya/ ra brjod pa'i grong khyer sems can gzhan// kun kyang bsam pa rab dag chos dang ldan// bskyed mos kun dga'
23b6(mdo sde): gzhal med khang gis brgyan skye ba'i sar ni ser skyar brjod pa mdzes// kun kyang tshan chen stobs dang ldan pa ste// glang po gnyis sam gsum gyi stobs kyang bdog/ 'phong rtsal bslab pa'i pha rol mthar
23b7(mdo sde): phyin kyang // srog gi don tu gzhan la gnod mi byed// zas gtsang rgyal po'i bud med dben pa de// bud med dam pa stong gi mchog tu phyin// yid du 'ong ba sgyu 'phrul sprul pa'i gzugs// de yi ming yang
23b8(mdo sde): lha mo sgyu 'phrul te// mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang lha'i bu mo bzhin// 'byes pa'i lus ldan yan lag dri med sdug/ lha dang mi rnams gang yang rung ba dag/ sgyu 'phrul mthong na gang ngoms de med kyang
24a1(mdo sde): 'dod chags zhen med sdang bas zhe sdang med// de ni 'jam snyan drang ba'i ngag dang ldan// mi brlang mi rtsub shin tu nges pa ste// de ni bzhin 'dzum khro gnyer rab tu spangs// ngo tsha khrel
24a2(mdo sde): yod chos spyod ldan pa ste// nga rgyal med cing ma khengs rgod pa med// phrag dog med cing sgyu dang g.yo med de// gtong la dga' zhing rtag tu byams sems ldan// las yod lta zhing log pa'i sbyor ba
24a3(mdo sde): spangs// bden la gnas shing lus dang yid rab bsdams// sa la gang yod bud med skyon mang tshogs// de dag thams cad de la yod ma yin// mi yi 'jig rten dri za'i 'jig rten nam// lha yi/ 
24a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten dag na bud med gzhan// lha mo sgyu 'phrul mtshungs med dag la lhag/ drang srong chen po'i mar ni de 'os te// / tshe rabs lnga brgya kho nar tshang bar yang // de ni byang
24a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i mar gyur to// de dang der ni yab kyang zas gtsang ste// de'i yon tan ldan pa ma yi 'os// dka' thub can ltar de ni brtul zhugs gnas// brtul zhugs
24a6(mdo sde): rjes spyod rtag par chos kyang spyod// rgyal pos gnang ste mchog sbyin thob pas na// 'dod pa ma spyad zla ba sum cu gnyis// gang gi phyogs na de 'dug 'greng ba 'am// nyal zhing 'gro bar gyur pa'i
24a7(mdo sde): gnas dag kyang // de yi las dge gzhol ba'i 'od zer gyis// shin tu snang bar 'od kyis gsal bar 'gyur// lha dang lha min mi rnams gang yang rung // 'dod chags sems kyis blta bar nus pa
24a8(mdo sde): med spyod lam rnams su 'phags pa'i yon tan ldam / de la kun kyang mi dang bu mor lta// sgyu 'phrul lha mi dge ba'i las kyi rgyus// rgyal po'i sring ni rab yangs rnam par 'phel// rnams kyi rgyal po'ang / 
24b1(mdo sde): 'jug par mi byed cing // rgyal po'i grags dang brjod pa rnam par 'phel// de ltar sgyu 'phrul snod du 'thun gyur cing // de ltar sems can dam pa mchog mdzes pas// de nyid yon tan mchog dang ldan pas ma// 
24b2(mdo sde): 'di ni bur 'gyur de ni ma yi 'os// lha mo yon tan mchog dang ldan pa ste// gla bo khri'i stobs bdog ma gtogs par// 'ja m+bu'i rgyal mtshan 'di na mi mchog de// 'dzin par nus pa'i bud med gang yang med
24b3(mdo sde): deskad che ba'i lha yi bu rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rgya chen dag/ shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' bar mdzad pa yi// yum du legs ldan sgyu 'phrul 'gyur zhes zer// rigs yongs su dag pa'i le'u
24b4(mdo sde): ste gsum pal/ dge slong dag de ltar byang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rigs la rnam par bltas nas/ dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang chen po mchu dang rgyar/ 
24b5(mdo sde): dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'a dug ste/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la chos ston pa rgyal ma/ chen mthon po zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' ngo
24b6(mdo sde): gzhal med khang chen po der song nas phyin pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa/ khyed rnams 'dir 'du bar gyis shog/ 'chi 'pho ba rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos rjes su dran pa
24b7(mdo sde): chos rjes su bstan pa tha ma'i chos mnyan pa byang chub sems dpa' las nyon cig de skad kyi tshig thos nas/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad lha'i bu mo'i tshogs dang bcas te/ gzhal med khang chen po
24b8(mdo sde): der 'dus so// der byang chub sems dpas 'khor gyi khyams gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam du yangs par byin gyis brlabs par gyur nas/ de de tsam du bzang zhing de tsam du blta na sdug la/ 
25a1(mdo sde): de tsam du rgyan gyis rgyas shing / de tsam du yid du 'ong bar gyur pa des/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad rang rang gi khyim gyi bkod pa la dur khrod lta bu'i 'du shes skyes par/ 
25a2(mdo sde): gyur to// de la byang chub sems dpa' rang gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu 'thun pas yongs su brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che du mas rtsa ba spras pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu'i stan du ma bting ba/ 
25a3(mdo sde): lha'i spos zhim po du mas bsgos pa/ bdug spos dam pa mchog tu bya ba du mas bdugs pa/ lha'i me tog kha dog du ma'i dgram pa bkram pa/ nor bu dang / rin po che'i 'od brgya stong du ma 'bar ba'i gzi
25a4(mdo sde): brjid can/ nor bu rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ rin po che dadril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma'i sgra byung bas mngon par dga' rab dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu brgya stong du ma mngon par
25a5(mdo sde): dkrol ba'i sgra dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong du mas ma ngas su gsal bar gyur pa/ rin po che'i gdugs brgya stong du mas kun nas bkab pa/ dar brgya stong du ma rab tu dbyangs
25a6(mdo sde): pa/ dar gyi phreng ba lnga ldi brgya stong du mas shin tu brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo brgya stong du mas glu blangs/ gar byas/ rol mo byas pa/ yon tan brgya stong du ma kun tu brjod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba brgya stong du mas
25a7(mdo sde): rjes su bsrungs pa/ brgya byin brgya stong du mas phyag byas pa/ tshangs pa brgya stong du mas rab tu btud pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bzung ba/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
25a8(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mtha' yas par dgongs pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par pha rol tu phyin pa tshogs su byas pa'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa
25b1(mdo sde): las byung ba de lta bu la 'dug go// dge slong dag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri chen po yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa la 'dug nas/ lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag byang
25b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i lus bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa la ltos/ shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcu kun na byang chub sems dpa' dga'
25b3(mdo sde): ldan gyi gnas dam pa na 'khod cing / thams cad kyang srid pa tha ma pa la mngon du phyogs pa/ lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ shi 'pho'i rnam pas lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo
25b4(mdo sde): yang dag par ston pa tshad med pa/ grangs med/ bgrang ba las 'das pa dag la ltos/ de nas lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis bslabs kyis byang chub
25b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag mthong bar gyur te/ mthong bar gyur nas kya / byang chub sems dpa' ga la der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad
25b6(mdo sde): du 'di ltar bdag cag gis bltas pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyed cig mthong ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ legs so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du
25b7(mdo sde): brjod do// de nas byang chub sems dpas yang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la bos nas/ 'di skad ces smras te/ grogs po dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' de dag lha'i bu de dag la gang ston pa shi 'pho'i
25b8(mdo sde): rnam pas lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo nyon cig/ grogs po dag/ chos snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ lha'i
26a1(mdo sde): / 'khor la gdon mi za bar yang dag par bstan par bya ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grogs po dag dad pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bsam pa mi phyed par 'gyur ro// dang ba ni chos
26a2(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rnyog pa can dang bar 'gyur ro// mchog tu dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro// dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rnam par dag par
26a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// lus kyi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus kyi nyes pa rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// ngag gi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ngag gi nyes pa bzhi yongs su spong
26a4(mdo sde): pabar 'gyur ro// yid kyi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba spong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni chos snang
26a5(mdo sde): pa'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// chos rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos bstan/ pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni
26a6(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro// gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rdzas thams cad rab tu spang bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo
26a7(mdo sde): ste/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// lha rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rgya chen por 'gyur ro// byams pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i
26a8(mdo sde): dngos po thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// snying rjeni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rnam par gartse ba med pa lhur len par 'gyur ro// dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi dga' ba thams cad sel/ 
26b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// btang snyoms ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'dod pa la smod par 'gyur ro// mi rtag par ma mar rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod / 
26b2(mdo sde): chags las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal dus sar rtog pa na chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ smon lam kun tu chad par 'gyur ro// bdag med par mo sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgoste/ 
26b3(mdo sde): bdag la mngon par zhen pa med par 'gyur// zhi bar so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rjes su 'chags pa 'bar ba med par 'gyur ro// ngo tsha shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ nang nye bar zhi bar
26b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// khrel yod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ phyi rol nye ba dar zhi bar 'gyur ro// bden pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lha dang mi rnams mi slu bar 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ni chos
26b5(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag slu ba med par 'gyur ro// chos spyod pa/ ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos la rton par 'gyur ro// gsu ma la skyabs 'gro ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ngan song gsum
26b6(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// byas pa gzo ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa rnams chud mi za bar 'gyur ro// byas pa rig pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gzhan la brnyas pa med/ 
26b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// bdag shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag la bstod pa med par 'gyur ro// sems can shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gzhan la smod pa med par 'gyur ro// chos shes pa ni chos
26b8(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la nan tan byed par 'gyur ro// dus shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mthong ba don yod par 'gyur ro// nga rgyal bcom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 
27a1(mdo sde): / ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung bar 'gyur ro// khon du 'dzin pa med pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 
27a2(mdo sde): 'gyod pa med par 'gyur ro// mos pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ the tsom med par lhur len par 'gyur ro// mi sdug par so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa spong bar 'gyuraro// 
27a3(mdo sde): gnod sems med pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa spong bar 'gyur ro// gti mug med pa ni chos spang ba'i sgo ste/ mi shes pa rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro// chos don tu
27a4(mdo sde): gnyer ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ don la rton par 'gyur ro// chos 'dod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos snang ba thob pa ngar 'gyur ro// thos pa tshol ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ tshul
27a5(mdo sde): bzhin du chos la so sor rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa 'i sbyor ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ yang dag par nan/ tan byed par 'gyur ro// ming dang gzugs yongs su shes
27a6(mdo sde): pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// rgyur lta ba yang dag par 'joms pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rig pa dang rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur
27a7(mdo sde): rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mtho bar sems pa med cing dma'i bar sems pa med par 'gyur ro// phung po la mkhas pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sdug bsngal yongs su
27a8(mdo sde): shes par 'gyur ro// khams mnyam pa nyid ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ kun 'byung ba spong bar 'gyur ro// skye mched bsal ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lam sgom par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i bzod pa ni
27b1(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'gog pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro// lus la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus dben par 'gyur ro// tshor ba la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ tshor ba
