27b2(mdo sde): thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// sems la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog par 'gyur ro// chos la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rab rib dang bral/ 
27b3(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhin chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bani
27b4(mdo sde): ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro// dad pa'i dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gzhan gyi dring mi da'ajog par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni chos snang ba'i
27b5(mdo sde): sgo ste/ shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dran pa'i dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ las legs par byas par 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni chos snang ba'i
27b6(mdo sde): sgo ste/ sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mngon sum gyi ye shes su 'gyur ro// dad pa'i stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdud kyi stobs las yang dag
27b7(mdo sde): par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// dran pa'i stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgra sgra'i phrogs par gyu ti 'dzin gyi stabs ni chom snga brim ste rnam par rtog
27b8(mdo sde): pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi thul par 'gyur ro// dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes par
28a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos
28a2(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo ste/ shin tu rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ting nge 'dzin sgrub par 'gyur ro// shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub
28a3(mdo sde): kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bya ba byas par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni tshes snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par 'gyur ro// btang
28a4(mdo sde): snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ skye ba thams cad la smod par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa lta ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ skyon med par 'jug par 'gyuraro// yang
28a5(mdo sde): dag pa'i rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa thams cad spong bar 'gyuraro// yang dag pa'i ngag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ yi ge dang / sgra dang / 
28a6(mdo sde): skad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad brag cha dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni chos snang ba'i sgran+ti kiHlas med cing rnam par smin pa med par 'gyur ro// yang
28a7(mdo sde): dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ tshol ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ pha rol gyi ngogs su phyin par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i dran pa ni
28a8(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems mi 'khrugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi
28b1(mdo sde): sems ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro// bsam pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med par 'gyur ro// lhag pa'i bsam pa ni chos
28b2(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la lhag par dmigs par 'gyur ro// sbyor ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
28b3(mdo sde): ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing / ser sna can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
28b4(mdo sde): tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi khom pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las yang dag par 'da' zhing / tshul khrims 'chal dpa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// bzod
28b5(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gnod sems/ dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa spong bar 'gyur zhing / gnod sems can gyi
28b6(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dge ba'i chos brtsam pa thams cad nyams su len par 'gyur zhing / le lo can gyi sems
28b7(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa thams cad skyed cing / sems g.yengs pa can gyi sems can
28b8(mdo sde): yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa mun nag dang dmigs pa'i lta ba spong zhing / shes rab 'chal pa'i sems
29a1(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// thabs mkhas pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can ji ltar mos pa bzhin du spyod lam ston cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub par
29a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad sdud cing byang chub brnyes pa las chos nod par 'gyur ro// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni tshe snang ba'i sgra ste/ bdag
29a3(mdo sde): gi bde ba la mi chags shing yongs su skyo ba med par 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ro// bsod
29a4(mdo sde): nams kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// ye shes kyi tshogs ni chos snang ngaba'i sgo ste/ stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zhi
29a5(mdo sde): gnas kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ de bzhin gshegs kha'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// lhag mthong gi/ tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ shes rab kyi mig thob par
29a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos kyi mig thob par 'gyur ro// rton pa la 'jug pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su dag par
29a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// gzungs thob pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro// spobs pa thob pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can tha sems cad leg par
29a8(mdo sde): bshad pas tshim par byed par 'gyur ro// rjes su 'thun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang 'thun par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni chos
29b1(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo ste/ lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sa nas sar 'phar ba'i ye shes ni
29b2(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mngal du 'jug pa dang / gtses pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / 
29b3(mdo sde): dka' ba spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston par
29b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// grogs po dag/ 'di dag ni chos snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa ba rgyud ces bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpas 'chi 'pho ba'i dadus kyi che/ lha'i 'khor du gdon mi za bar gang bstan par
29b5(mdo sde): bya ba'o// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas chos snang ba'i sgo'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ lha'i 'khor de dag las lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
29b6(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// lha'i bu sngon yongs su sbyangs pa byas pa sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha'i bu bye ba sum cu rtsa drug ni chos rnams la chos kyi
29b7(mdo sde): mig rdul med cing / dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ dga' ldan gyi gnas thams cad kyang lha'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du yogs par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas
29b8(mdo sde): lha'i 'khor de dag rgya cher dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ de tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang gi tshe na dga' ldan gnas mchog nas// 'dren pa skyes bu seng ge 'chi 'pho'i tshe// lha rnams dag
30a1(mdo sde): / la tshig tu smra ba ni// bag med mtha' dag rnam par spongs shes smra// lha'i dga' ba rnam mang ji snyed pa// yid kyis bsams pas 'byung ba dpal ldan pa// thams cad las dge'i rgyu
30a2(mdo sde): las byung ba ste// de ni dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin// de lta bas na byas pa gzo bar gyis// sngon gyi dge bsags 'di ni zad gyur te// gang du mi bde sdug bsngal myong 'gyur ba// ngan song dag tu
30a3(mdo sde): song bar gyur ta re// nga la gus par bya ba bskyed nas ni// chos gang thos par gyur pa de dag la// nan tan gyis ni rab tu sgrubs shig dang // bde ba mtha' yod par thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad/ 
30a4(mdo sde): mi rtag brtan pa yin// ther zug ma yin rmo lam 'dra ba ste// smig rgyu dang ni sgyu ma rnams dang 'dra// glog dang dbu bo 'dra ra zhing 'gyur ba yin// 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gi dga' bas ni/ 
30a5(mdo sde): lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs bzhin du ngoms mi 'gyur// gang dag rdul med 'jig rten 'das pa yi// shes rab ldan pa de dag/ ngoms par 'gyur// lha mo dag dang 'grogs dang glu dbyangs
30a6(mdo sde): ni/ gar gyi ltad mo pa dang mtshungs shing 'dra// dper na 'dus pa dag ni khri las su// phan tshun 'gro bar sbyor ba byed dang mtshungs// dge ba'i las byas rjes su 'brang byed cing // phyi bzhin 'gro bar byed pa ma
30a7(mdo sde): gtogs par// 'du byas dag la grogs yod ma yin te// mdza' bshes nye du med cing 'khor kyang med// de lta bas na lhan cig 'thun byos la// phan tshun byams sems phan pa'i sems byos te// chos kyi
30a8(mdo sde): spyad pa dag ni spyad par gyis// srung pa legs par spyad la gdung ba med// thos dang tshul khrims sbyin la dag gyur cig/ bzod dang nges pa phun sum tshogs gyis te// sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang dge 'dun da / 
30b1(mdo sde): de bzhin bag yod pa dag dran par gyis// rtag pa med cing sdug bsngal bdag med la// rgyu dang rkyen rnams ngag ni ldan gyur cing // bdag po med la bems por gyur pa yi// chos 'di dag la tshul bzhin
30b2(mdo sde): brtag par gyis// nga la rdzu 'phrul dag ni gang yod dang // spobs pa ye shes dbang rnams gang thob pa// kun kyang las dge'i rgyu las byung ba ste// thos dang tshul khrims bag yod rnams las byung // sems/ 
30b3(mdo sde): can don dang phan dang byams don du// nga yi tshul khrims dang ni thos pa dang // bag yod pa dang sbyin dang dul ba dang // yang dag sdom pa'i rjes su bslab par gyis// ngag dang skad dang sgra rnams tsam gyis ni// 
30b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos rnams sgrub par mi nus kyis// nan tan snying por bya bas sgrub byos la// ji skad smras pa de bzhin bya bar byo// nas// gzhan gyi gleng ba'i skabs ni ma dbye bar// bdag gis
30b5(mdo sde): rtag tu sgrims pa 'bad par gyis// la las byas shing sbyin pa yod ma yin// ma byas par yang 'grub par 'gyur ba ma // sngon chad 'khor bar 'khor tshe sdug bsngal dag/ myong
30b6(mdo sde): bar gang gyur de ni dran par gyis// khyed cag log pa nyid du nges pas na// mya ngan las 'das 'dod chags bral ma thob// de lta bas na dal dang bshes gnyen dang // tshul dang 'thun pa'i yul du gnas pa dang // 
30b7(mdo sde): chos mnyan dam pa thob par byas nas ni// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs zhi bar gyis// nga rgyal dang ni rgyags dang dregs thong la// rtag tu mnyen zhing dran la g.yo med cing // mya ngan 'das par
30b8(mdo sde): 'gro la gzhol byos te// lam rtogs bya ba'i phyir ni sbyor bar gyis// gti mug rnyog pa'i mun pa thams cad kyang // shes rab sgron mas rnam par bsal bar gyis// ngag la nyal bcas skyon gyi drab
31a1(mdo sde): / rnams// ye shes rdo rje yis na rnam par sgrol// shin tu mang por sgru ba cing dgos te// don dang yang dag ldan pa'i chos de la/ khyed cag gnas pa byas par mgyur na// de la chos kyis ldan pa
31a2(mdo sde): ma yin no// gang tshangs ni byang chub thob gyur te// 'chi med 'gro ba'i chos char 'bebs pa'i tshe// rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa khyed// chos kyi dam pa mnyan pa'i phyir sheg shig/ chos snang
31a3(mdo sde): ba'i sgo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la chos kyi gtam 'di yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ 
31a4(mdo sde): yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas/  bzod par byas nas/ lha'i 'khor bkra shis dang ldan pa rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag kho bo ni 'dzam+bu'i gling du 'gro'o/ 
31a5(mdo sde): kho bo sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems ca/ na rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba da don spyad pa dang / don 'thun par bya ba bzhi las 'gron du bos
31a6(mdo sde): la grogs po dag da kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar 'dug pa de ni/ kho bos byas pa ma shes shing rigs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro// de nas dga'
31a7(mdo sde): ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la 'jus te 'di skad ces 'dzer to// skyes bu dam pa khyod mi bzhugs na/ dga' ldan gyi gnas 'di mdzes par mi 'gyur ro// 
31a8(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dis khyed la chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras te/ de nas byang chub sems dpas
31b1(mdo sde): rang gi mgo las thong dang cod pan phog ste/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i mgo la bzhag nas 'di skad du/ skyes bu dam pa khyod ni nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par/ 
31b2(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras te/ de nas byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gyis gnas dam par dbang bskur nas/ yang lha'i 'khor
31b3(mdo sde): chen po de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag/ kho bos ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis ma'i mngal du 'gro bar bya// de la kha cig na re bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su gshegs par rigs so zhes zer ro// la
31b4(mdo sde): la na re brgya byin gyi gzugs su la la na re tshangs pa'i/ gzugs su/ la la na re rgyal po chen po'i gzugasu/ dal la na re rnam thos kyi bu'i gzugs su/ la la na re sgra
31b5(mdo sde): gcan gyi gzugs su/ la la na re dri za'i gzugs su/ la la na re mi 'am ci'i gzugs su/ la la na re lho phye chen po'i gzugs su/ la la na re dbang phyug chen po'i
31b6(mdo sde): gzugs su/ la la na re zla ba'i gzugs su/ la lan re nyi ma'i gzugs su/ la la na re namakha' lding gi dbang po'i gzugs su bzhud pa'i rigs so zhes zer ro// de nas tshangs ris kyi lha'i
31b7(mdo sde): bu gzi brjid dam pa zhes bya ba sngon drang srong las shi 'phos pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig 'dug pa des 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze rnams kyi
31b8(mdo sde): gsang sngags kyi tshig rig byed kyi bstan bcos las ji skad du 'byung ba de lta bu'i gzugs su byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su bzhud pa rigs so// de'ang ci 'dra zhe na/ glang po dam pa
32a1(mdo sde): / lus chen mchog gyur pa// mche ba drug can gser gyi dra bas g.yogs// mgo bo rab tu dmar zhing shin tu mdzes// 'gram nas zag cing gzugs ldan dpal ldan pa'o// rig byed bstan/ 
32a2(mdo sde): bcos yang dag mkhas pa yi// bram zes rnam pa de 'dra de shes nas// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan 'gyur zhes// yang dag nyid du lung ni ston par 'gyur// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas skye ba'i
32a3(mdo sde): dus la bltas nas/ dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas bzhin du/ rgyal po zas gtsang mi khyim dam pa der snga ltas brgyad bstan to// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim de rtsa dang / sdom dum dang / tsher
32a4(mdo sde): ma dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing / dri ma med la/ chag dachag legs par btab pa dang / phyag dar legs par byas shing / rlung rdul can dang / mun pa dang / rdul dang bral ba dang / 
32a5(mdo sde): sbrang ma dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / phye ma leb dang / sdi/ ga sbrul med cing / me tog gis kun tu gang ba/ lag ma/ thil ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung
32a6(mdo sde): ba dang po'o// ri'i rgyal po gang ri la bya 'dab spen dang / ne co dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / ngur pa dang / kun la dang / ka la bing ka dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pa/ sgro
32a7(mdo sde): gshog sna tshogs mdzes pa yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i bya'i tshogs gang dag gnas pa de dag der 'ongs nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa de'i stegs bu dang / ba gam dang / 
32a8(mdo sde): babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs kyi steng dag tu gnas shing / dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ rang rang gi sgra skad dag 'byin
32b1(mdo sde): te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba gnyis pa'o// gang yang rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba dang / nags tshal nyams dga' ba dang / bskyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba dag na/ me tog dang
32b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs dus tha dad par 'byung ba de thams cad kyang kha 'bus shing me tog rgyas par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba gsum pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i chu'i longs spyod kyi rkyen rdzing
32b3(mdo sde): la sogs pa gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / pad+ma 'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/ tshad shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam dag gis khebs par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba bzhi pa'o// 
32b4(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa de na mar dang / 'bru mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram gyi dbu ba dang / sha kha ra la so gas pa bza' ba'i rnam pa gang dag yod pa de dag kyang yongs su
32b5(mdo sde): spyad pas zad par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gang bar snang ste/ 'di ni lnga ltas byung ba lnga pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'i khyim mchog dam pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor chen po dag na
32b6(mdo sde): rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / pi bang dang / gling bu dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg la sogs pa rol mo'i cha spyad gang dag sngo pa de dag thams
32b7(mdo sde): cad kyang ma blangs/ ma dkrol bar yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rang sgrog par gyur to// 'di ni snga ltas byung ba drug pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog dam pa na/ gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / 
32b8(mdo sde): mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru la sogs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang kha bye zhing / dri ma med la rnam par dag cing rab tu gang bar snang ste/ 
33a1(mdo sde): 'di ni snga ltas byung ba bdun pa'o// nyi zla'i 'od zil gyis rlag par byed cing / lus dang sems dga' ba skyed pa'i 'od dag cing dri ma med pas snang bar gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba brgyad
33a2(mdo sde): pa'o// ta 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po gsum pa/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul yang khrus byas/ lus byug pas byugs/ rgyan sna
33a3(mdo sde): tshogs kyis lag pa shin tu brgyan te/ gos shin tu 'jam pa mchog bgos shing / btsun spu dang bcas la/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa thob nas/ bud med stong phrag bcus
33a4(mdo sde): bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma rol dmo bya ba'i khang bzangs na/ bde bar gnas pa'i drung du phyin te/ g.yas rol na khri bzang po rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa la
33a5(mdo sde): 'dug nas/ 'dzum pa'i bzhin khro gnyer med cing // rab tu dang / ba'i mdog gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal po sa bdag legs par bdag la
33a6(mdo sde): gsan du gsol// rgyal po khyod la gsol gyis bdag la de gnong shig/ bdag gi bsam pa yid la ci mchis cir dga' ba// de dag bdag la gsan cing thugs dgyes rangs par mdzod// lha bdag
33a7(mdo sde): nyer gnas tshul khrims brtul zhugs len par gsol// bdag ni 'gro la byams pas yan lag brgyad len te// srog chags gnod pa spang shing bsam pa rtag dag pas// ji ltar bdag la byams pa de
33a8(mdo sde): ltar gzhan la dgyi// rku sems rnam par spang ste 'dod dang dregs pa spang // rgyal po 'dod pa rnams la log par g.yem mi bgyid// bden la gnas shing phra ma ma mchis zhes gcod spang // mi dge kyal
33b1(mdo sde): pa'i tshig kyang yongs su mi spyod do// gnod sems zhe sdang tha ba gti mug rgyags pa dang // brnab sems kun spang rang gi nor gyi 'tshal bar bgyi// yang dag sbyor bas kha gsag tshul 'chos phrag dog spang // dge/ 
33b2(mdo sde): bcu'i las lam 'di dag bdag gis spyad par bgyi// bdag ni tshul khrims brtul zhugs mngon dga' rab bsdams kyis// mi yi dbang po bdag la bzhed pas sred ma mdzad// rgyal po khyod la yun ring mi
33b3(mdo sde): dger gyur tu mchi// bdag gi tshul khrims brtul zhugs nyer gnas dgyes par mdzod// rgyal po bdag gi 'tshal ba 'di lags de myur stsol// khang bzangs bsil khang ldan pa dang skya ldan pa'i nang / 
33b4(mdo sde): me tog bkram pa'i mchis mal 'jam zhing dri bda' bar// grog ngas mos rtag tu bskor cing bde dgar gnas snyam bgyid/ skyes pa nyung rum rnams dang de bzhin khye'u dag dang // bud med
33b5(mdo sde): phal ba rnams kyang mdun na mchis mi 'tshal// snyan cing yid mchi sgra snyan nyan pa ma gtogs par// gzugs dang sgra gsung yid du mi mchi bdag mi 'chal// bcings dang
33b6(mdo sde): btson rar stsal pa thams cad dgye bar gsol// nor gyis brel ba'i mi rnams nor dang ldan par mdzod// zas skom rang pa shing rta khyogs dang bzhon pa rta// 'gro ba bde ba'i slang du dgung bdun bsal ba
33b7(mdo sde): mdzod// pho brang 'di na skyes pa khye'u dang bud med dag/ ji snyed mchis pa 'thab rtsod khro ba'i tshig bral zhing // phan tshun byams pa'i yid ldan phan dang des sems kyis// dga' tshal gnas pa'i lha ltar 'thun
33b8(mdo sde): zhing bde spyod mdzod// rgyal po'i chad pa che phra gnyer gyis gda' ba dang // gnod par bgyi dang brdeg brtsog sdigs ru mi mdzad par// kun la'ang dang ba'i thugs kyis byams dang phan dgongs te// lha yis skye
34a1(mdo sde): po rnams la sras gcig bzhin du gzigs// rgyal pos de skad tshig thos rab tu dga'agyur nas// smras pa/ khyod ni ci 'dod de kun de bzhin bya// khyod kyis bsam pa yid kyis gang rnams
34a2(mdo sde): rjes bsams shing // khyod kyis mchog blangs gang yin de ni ngas sbyin no// rgyal po'i dam pas rang gi 'khor la bsgo ba ni// khang bzangs dam pa'i steng du phun sum tshogs pa shoms// me tog mdzes pa
34a3(mdo sde): khrom la bdug spos mchog gis bdugs// gdugs dang ba dan ta la'i phreng ba'i rgyan kyang gyis// 'thab phong stong phrag nyi shu sna tshogs go cha can// mnga' mdung lcags mnga' mdung thung ral gri
34a4(mdo sde): thogs pa dag/ yid 'ong sgra gcan dang skya ldan pa skor gyis te// lha mo 'jigs pa med par bya phyir srung zhing gnas/ dakhrus byas spros byugs gos mchog dag gis yan lag brgyan
34a5(mdo sde): bud med rnams kyis de bskor lha yi bu mo 'dra// yid du 'ong ba 'a sgra ldan sil snyan stong blangs te// lha mo der zhugs lha yi bu mo bzhin du gnas// lha yi rin chen rin thang chen pos rtsi
34a6(mdo sde): sbas pa// khri la gos mchog mang pos yid 'ong mal bshams te// mal phyin gtsug gi nor bu rin chen klong byas nas// 'dres pa'i nags tshal lha yi bu mo bzhin du gnas// dge slong dag de nas
34a7(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang // lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / bdud kyi bu ded dpon dang / 
34a8(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / mdun na 'don tshangs mchog dang / mdun na 'don tshangs bzangs dang / 'od bkod pa dang / 'od gsal dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi dbang phyug chen po dang
34b1(mdo sde): mthar thug dang / 'og min pa dang / de dag la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang lha brgya stong mang po 'dus te/ gcig la gcig 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'
34b2(mdo sde): gcig pu gnyis su med par gshegs su gsol na/ bdag cag gis byas pa ma shes par 'gyur te/ bdag cag la mi chas/ grogs po dag khyed kyi nang nas/ byang chub sem dpa' thog ma yum gyi
34b3(mdo sde): lhums su gshegs pa dang / lhums su bzhugs pa dang / bltams pa dang / thor bu dang / byis pa'i nang na rol pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / rol mo gzigs pa dang / 
34b4(mdo sde): mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba skyod pa dang / byang chub kyi sti dang por gshegs pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo/ 
34b5(mdo sde): bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan gyi bar du phan pa'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / nges pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / gnyen pa'i
34b6(mdo sde): sems kyis rtag par rgyun tu byang chub sems dpa'i zha 'bring na 'khod par su dag spro/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// khyed las su zhig rtag tu dga' yid kyis// gzugs
34b7(mdo sde): mchog mnga' ba'i zham ring byed par spro// su dag rang gi bsod nams gzi brjid dang // stobs dang grags pa rnam par spel bar 'dod// gang zhig lha yi pho brang 'di dag na// lha mo dag dang 'dod pa'i
34b8(mdo sde): yon tan gyi// lha yi bde bas dga' bar 'dod pa dag/ dri med zla ba'i zhal gyi zham ring gyis// de bzhin 'dres pa'i nags tshal mdzes pa mchog/ lha yi 'byung gnas lha yi pho brang na// gser
35a1(mdo sde): / mdog me tog rgyas par dga' 'dod na// dri med gzi brjid mnga' ba'i zham ring gyis// gang gis sna tshogs shing rta de bzhin du// dga' tshal me tog man dar 'dab rgyas su// lha mo lhan cig rtse
35a2(mdo sde): pabar 'dod pa dag/ skyes bu chen po 'di yi zham ring gyis// 'thab bral bdag po 'am dga' ldan bdag po 'am// yang na dbang phyug 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang // 'gro ba kun gyi mchod 'os 'dod pa dag/ grags pa
35a3(mdo sde): mtha' yas 'di yi zham ring gyis// gang zhig 'phrul dga'i khang pa mdzes pa dang // dbang sgyur lha yi gnas su rtse 'dod cing // yid kyi 'phrul gyis thams cad spyod 'dod pa// yon tan mchog mnga' 'di yi
35a4(mdo sde): zham ring gyis// bdud kyi dbang po zhes sdang yid med pa// rdzu la phrul dbang phyug kun gyis mthar phyin pa'i// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dbang mthar phyin 'dod na// phan pa mdzad pa 'di dang lhan cig
35a5(mdo sde): deng / de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' byas te// tshangs/ pa'i gnas su gnas par su 'dod pa// de ni tshad med pa/ zhi yi gzi mnga' ba// skyes bu chen po'i zham ring deng nas gyis// 
35a6(mdo sde): 'on tam gang zhig mi yi nang dag tu// 'khor los sgyur yul yangs par skye 'dod na// rin chen 'byung gnas mi 'jigs bde sbyin pa// bsod nams yangs pa mnga' ba'o zham ring gyis// gang zhigs bdag de
35a7(mdo sde): bzhin tshong dpon bu// phyug cing sgyid la nor mang tshogs chen dang // dgra yi dpung bcom 'khor dang ldan 'dod pa// de ni phan mdzad 'di dang lhan cig deng // gzugs dang longs spyod de bzhin dbang phyug dang // 
35a8(mdo sde): snyan pa grags dang spobs dang yon tan dang // gzung 'os tshig dang mnyan pa'i tshig 'dod pa// de ni tshangs dbyangs mkhas pa'i gan du song // lha dang mi yi 'dod pa gang yin dang // srid pa gsum gyi bde ba thams
35b1(mdo sde): cad dang // bsam gtan de dang dben pa'i bde 'dod pa// don chos kyi dbang phyug zham ring gyis// 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang spang ba dang // nyon mongs mun pa sel bar su 'dod cing // zhi bar bzhi nyer ni ying ldan/ 
35b2(mdo sde): pade ni thugs dul zham ring myur du song // gang zhig slob dang mi slob rang rgyal dang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob 'dod dang // stobs bcus seng+ge'i sgra sgrogs su 'dod pa// de ni yon tan rgya mtshom pa
35b3(mdo sde): drung song // gang zhig ngan song rnams kyi lam gcod cing // bzang 'gro 'chi ba med pa'i lam dbye dang // yan lag brgyad lam 'gro bas 'gro 'dod na// 'gro lam mthar phyin 'di yi zham ring gyis// gang zhig bde
35b4(mdo sde): gshegs yongs su mchod pa dang // thugs rje mnga' ba de las chos nyan dang // dge 'dun yon tan thob par 'dod pa ni//  yon tan rgya mtsho 'di yi zham ring gyis// skye rga na 'chi'i sdug
35b5(mdo sde): bsngal zad pa dang // 'khor ba'i bcings pa rnam par grol ba/ dang // namakha'i mtha' mnyam rnam dag spyod 'dod pa// de ni sems can dag pa'i zham ring gyis// 'gro ba kun na yid 'ong sdug
35b6(mdo sde): mdzes shing // gzugs mchog mtshan dang yon tan rgyas pa dang // bdag dang de bzhin gzhan yang 'gro la 'dod pa// de ni blta sdug mkhas pa'i gan du song // tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab dang // 
35b7(mdo sde): zab cing blta dga' gting dpag dka' ba yi// rnam grol thob 'dod mkhas pa gang yin de// sman pa'i rgyal po'i gan du myur du song // yon tan 'di dang gzhan yang rnam mang dang // srid pa'i bde dang de bzhin
35b8(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das// yon tan thams cad rab tu rdzogs 'dod pa// de ni brtul zhugs grub mkhas gan du song // tshig de thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
36a1(mdo sde): gyi lha 'bum dang / 'thab bral gyi lha 'bum dang / dga' ldan gyi lha 'bum dang / 'phrul dga'i lha 'bum dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyis byung ba drug khri dang / tshangs ris kyi lha
36a2(mdo sde): drug khri brgyad stong dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha brgya stong mang po dag 'dus par gyur pa dang / gzhan yang shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs nas lha'i bu brgya stong mang po 'dus
36a3(mdo sde): par gyur pa de dag las gang dag mchog tu bya ba'i lha'i bu dag gis lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdag cag rnams kyi bsam pa yang dag ci 'dra yi// tshig 'di lha yi
36a4(mdo sde): dbang po khri gsan du gsol// 'dod pa'i dga' 'byor bsam gtan bde ba mchog spangs te/ sems can dag pa dam pa'i dra yi zham ring bgyi// lhums su gshegs dang lhums na bzhugs
36a5(mdo sde): dang bltams pa'i tshe// bdag nyid chen po mchod 'os shin tu mchod par bgyi// bsod nams ngag gis bsrungs pa'i dra/ nga srong yongs bsrungs nas// zhe sdang sems kyis sus kyang
36a6(mdo sde): glags rnyed 'gyur ma mchis// glu dbyangs sil snyan rol mo'i dbyangs sgra legs bsgrags pas// yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i yon tan bsngags brjod de// gang thos skye bo byang chub mchog tu sems
36a7(mdo sde): bskyed par// lha dang mi rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyi// rgyal po'i pho brang me tog sil mas rgyas par dgang // a ka ru mchog nag pos bdugs te dri zhim bgyi// de yi dri tsher lha mi rab tu dga'
36a8(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing // nad med rim nang bral zhing bde bar 'gyur bar bgyi// me tog man dar dang kun nas 'du ba dang // sim byed rab tu sim byed sA la rnam snang dang // me tog bzang pos phrin las dge las byung ba
36b1(mdo sde): de mchod pa'i slad du sel skya'i grong kun dgang bar bgyi// ji srid yum gyi lhums na dri gsum ma gos bzhugs// ji srid rga shi mthar phyin paltam par gyur gyi bar// de srid dus su dang ba'i yid kyis zham
36b2(mdo sde): ring bgyi// blo gros che mnga' mchod pa bgyi bar bdag cag sems// bltams nas gom pa bdun gshegs brgya byin tshangs pa yis// lag tu blangs te spos chu dag gis sku bsil ba// sems can rnam
36b3(mdo sde): papar dag pa de ni mthong ba yi// lha mi de dag thob pa rgya chen legs par thob// ji srid bar du 'jig rten rjes su 'thun mdzad cing // 'dod pa'i nyon mongs 'joms mdzad btsun mo'i nang bzhugs la/ 
36b4(mdo sde): srid cig na rgyal srid kun spangs khab nas 'byung // de srid dadus su dang ba'i sems kyis zham ring bgyi// ji srid cig/ na ran bsnams byang chub snying por gshegs// ji srid cig na
36b5(mdo sde): bdud bcom byang chub reg gyur cing // tshangs pa khrag khri/ ga 'khor lo bskor bar gsol btab pa// de srid bde bar/ gshegs la mchod pa brgya chen bgyi// sems can bye ba khrag
36b6(mdo sde): khrig 'chi med btul gyur te// stong gsum khams su sangs rgyas phrin las nam lags nas// zhi zhing bsil ba'i mya ngan 'das par gshegs gyur pa// de srid kun gyis drang srong grags chen gtang mi
36b7(mdo sde): bgyid// dge slong dgang na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can dag pa mchog dam pa 'di lta
36b8(mdo sde): bu 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i na chung de ni ji lta bu zhig yod snyam nas/ de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa mchog tu bya ba dag khyer nas lha'i lus yid las grub pa thob cing / 
37a1(mdo sde): / bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlabs pa de dag skad cig de nyid la lha'i pho brang de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ ser skya'i grong khyer chen po dam pa bskyed mos tshal brgya
37a2(mdo sde): stong gis brgyan pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog khang bzangs chen po dang skya ldan zhes bya ba lha'i dbang po'i pho brang lta bu der phyin nas/ lha'i bu mo gos lcug lhug po gyon pa/ dge ba dri ma med pa'i
37a3(mdo sde): bsod nams gzi brjid kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ lha'i rgyan gyis lag pa shin tu brgyan pa de dag gis lha mo sgyu 'phrul mal mchog gi steng na 'dug pa mthong nas/ phan tshun 'dzub mos ston cing / namakha'i
37a4(mdo sde): dkyil na 'khod de gcig la gcig tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ lha gnas 'khod pa'i lha yi bu mo rnams// yid 'ong byang chub sems dpa'i sku mthong nas// de tshe de dag 'di snyam sems gyur te// 
37a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i yum 'gyur ci 'dra snyam// lag na me tog phreng can de dag rnams// the tshom skyes nas rgyal po'i/ pho brang du// me tog de bzhin byug pa thogs nas su// sor bcu
37a6(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te 'dud cing lhags// lcug lcug gos gyon 'jo bag gzugs 'chang bas// lha mo sgyu 'phrul mal steng gnas mthong nas// lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mos phyag byas te// mi yi bud med
37a7(mdo sde): gzugs la legs ltos 'dzer// bdag cag nga rgyal sems kyis mngon sems pa// lha yi bu mo'i gzugs mchog yid 'ong snyam// rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di yi gzugs mthong na// lha yi lus kyang
37a8(mdo sde): zil gyis non par mthong // 'di ni gang zag mchog gi yum 'gyur du// yon tan ldan pas shin tu gsha' zhing 'os// nor bu rin chen snod bzang gnas pa ltar// lha mo 'di ni lha yi lha snod yin// 
37b1(mdo sde): rkang lag mthil dang spyi bo man chad du// yan lag gi yid 'ong lha las lhag pa ste// mig gis bltan ngoms par 'gyur ma yin// yid dang sems ni phyir zhing dga' bar 'gyur// 'di yi kha bzhin lus
37b2(mdo sde): mdzes sdug pa ni// nam pa'i dkyil na zla ba mdzes pa 'dra// nyi ltar dri med me ltar 'bar ba ste// 'di yi lus las 'od gsal bzang po 'byung // gser snam bco ma'i bzang po'i gser bzhin du/ 
37b3(mdo sde): lha mo 'di yi kha dog rnam par mdzes// 'di yi skra ni 'jam gtsang dri zhim ste// bung ba mchog gi mdog 'dra lcang lor 'khyil// 'di yi mig ni pad+ma'i mdab ma 'dra// rnam dag so ni na mkha'i skar ma bzhin// 
37b4(mdo sde): rkeng pa gzhu ltar phra zhing sta zur yangs// phrag pa zlum zhing rmi dgas rnams mngon pa med// brla legs glang po mchog gi sna 'dra ste// byin pa shin tu legs pa byin gyis phra// rkang lag
37b5(mdo sde): mthil mnyam shin tu dmar ba ste// 'di ni gzhan mon lha yi bu mor nges// de ltar rnam mang du mar blta byas nas/ me tog gtor te bskor ba byas nas ni// grags ldan rgyal
37b6(mdo sde): ba'i yum la bstod byas te// skad cig gcig gis phyir yang lha gnas dong // de nas phyogs bzhi skyong ba bzhi po dang // 'thab 'bras rab dang brgya byin 'phrul pa dang // lha tshogs lha min grul bum
37b7(mdo sde): srin po dang // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye ches smras pa// skyes bu mchog gi mdun du khyed deng la// skyes bu dam pa de la bsrung dang bskyab pa gyis// 'gro ba dag la yid kyis snang ma byed// mi rnams la yang
37b8(mdo sde): gtse ba ma byed cig/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim mchog gang gnas pa// der ni 'thun par 'khor dang lhan cig kun// mda' gzhu ral gri mdung thung mtshon thogs la// nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te blta bar
38a1(mdo sde): gyis de ltar shi 'pho'i dus shes lta bu rnams// me tog de bzhin byug pa thogs nas ni// sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar te 'dud byos la// dga' ba'i sems kyis sgyu 'phrul drung du dang / swA/ 
38a2(mdo sde): ba'i seng+ge'i dus ni deng lags kyis// 'jig rten kun la thugs rje brtse bskyed de// mi dbang sems can dag pa 'chi 'pho ston// mchod sbyin don du bdag cag gsol ba 'debs// dge slong dag de nas byang chub
38a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe/ shar phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong phrag mang po dag/ byang chub sems dpa' la
38a4(mdo sde): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhag sa so// de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang nga chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ dga' ldan
38a5(mdo sde): gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong phrag mang po dag/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang 'gal ba der lhags so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
38a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang nas/ lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing / byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhag so// 
38a7(mdo sde): de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna/ 
38a8(mdo sde): tshogs len cing byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' khang pa brtsegs pa chen po bsod nams thams cad kyis/ 
38b1(mdo sde): yang dag par byung ba dpal gyi snying po lha rnams kyis kun nas blta ba'i nang du 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 
38b2(mdo sde): dga' ldan gyi gnas pa nas bskyod par brtsams so// dge slong dag de ltar bskyod par brtsams pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ltar rgyar
38b3(mdo sde): cher zhing yangs la/ thag gru che ba 'dir sngan chad ma byung ba'i 'od snang ba lha'i 'od las shin tu 'das pas yongs su gsal zhing snang bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi bar gang sdig pa sdig pas khebs nas/ 
38b4(mdo sde): mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/ snang ba med pa gang du nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pas kyang / 'od dang / 
38b5(mdo sde): kha dog dang / gzi brjid kyis lam mer ma gyur/ tha ler ma gyur/ lha der ma gyur pa der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang rang gi lag pa brkyang ba'ang mi mthong ba de dag tu
38b6(mdo sde): 'ang de'i tshe/ snang ba chen pos rgyas par khyab par gyur cing / der skyes pa'i sems can de dag snang ba des khyab par gyur nas gcig gis gcig mthong zhing / gcig gis gcig shes de/ 'di skad du kye grogs
38b7(mdo sde): po dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so// kye grogs po dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so zhes zer bar gyur pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las bkye'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
38b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug dang / ltas chen po bco brgyad du g.yos// rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu
39a1(mdo sde): / rab tu ldeg go// 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// che mchem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu che mchem mo// 
39a2(mdo sde): mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to// dbus dma' na mtha' mtho bar gyur to// shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho bar gyur to// nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho bar gyur to// lho phyogs dma'
39a3(mdo sde): na byang phyogs mtho bar gyur to// byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho bar gyur to// de'i tshe sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba tshim par 'gyur ba/ mgu bar 'gyur ba/ dang bar 'gyur ba/ sim par 'gyur ba/ mnyan
39a4(mdo sde): par 'os pa/ bsngags par 'os pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ mnyan na gtang mi bra ba/ mi mthun pa med pa/ dngang bar 'gyur pa med pa dag kyang grag par gyur to// skad cig de la sems
39a5(mdo sde): can gang la yang gnod pa 'am/ 'jigs pa 'am/ dngang pa 'am/ bag non pa med par gyur to// skad cig de la nyi zla/ dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag
39a6(mdo sde): gi 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur to// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la sdug bsngal
39a7(mdo sde): dang bral zhing bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod par mi 'gyur/ zhe sdang gis gnod par mi 'gyur/ gti mug gis gnod par mi 'gyur zhing
39a8(mdo sde): praphrag dog gam/ ser sna 'am/ nga rgyal lam/ 'chab pa dang / rgyags pa 'am/ khro ba 'am/ gnod sems sam/ yongs su gdung bas gnod par 'gyur ba med par gyur te/ sems can thams cad
39b1(mdo sde): kyang skad cig de la phan tshun pa ma tsam du sems pa'i 'du shes su gyur nas/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// lha dang mi'i rol mo sal snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong / 
39b2(mdo sde): dag kyang ma dkrol ma blangs par yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin par gyur to// lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang lag pa dang / phrag pa dang / spyi bas gzhal med khang chen po de 'degs cing khyer bar gyur to// lha'i
39b3(mdo sde): bu mo brgya stong dag gis kyang rang rang gi glu dbyangs blangs te/ mdun dang rgyab dang / g.yas g.yon dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ khyod kyis sngan
39b4(mdo sde): cad dge las bsags pa dang // yun rings dus kyi dge bas byung ba dang // khyod kyis chos rnams kun gyi tshul sbyangs dpas// de ring mchod pa rgya chen byung bar gyur// bskal pa bye
39b5(mdo sde): mang por khyod kyis sngon// sras mo sras sdug sbyin pa mdzad pa/ sa na// lha yi me tog char du bab pa 'di// sbyin pa spyad pa de yi 'bras bu lags// gtso bo khyod kyis rang gi sha bcang
39b6(mdo sde): de// srang la gcal nas thugs byon bya phyir btang // sbyin pa de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// yi dgas 'jig rten rnams kyang zas skom thob// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon// tshul khrims ma
39b7(mdo sde): zhig ma nyams bsrungs pas nas// tshul khrims de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// mi khom ngan song yongs su dag par gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon// byang chub bsgrub pa'i gzhir ni
39b8(mdo sde): bzod pa bsgoms// bzod pa de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// lha dang mi kun byams pa'i sems su gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon// brtson 'grus ma gong dam pa bsgoms pas na// 
40a1(mdo sde): // brtson 'grus de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// sun ri rab bzhin du mdzes par grug// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis ston// nyon mongs spyang spad bsam gtan bsgoms mdzad pas/ 
40a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// 'gro ba kun la nyon mongs gnod mi 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyi sngon// nyon mongs gcod pa'i shes rab bsgoms mdzad pas// shes rab de spyad
40a3(mdo sde): pa yi 'bras bu des// 'od gsal dam pa rnam par snang zhing mdzes// byams pa'i go mnabs nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing // sems can kun la thugs rje che byung ba// dgyes pa mchog brnyes btang
40a4(mdo sde): snyoms mchog ldan pa// bde gshegs tshangs gyur khyod la daphyag 'tshal lo// shes rab sgron ma'i 'od dang gzis da'aphags shing // gti mug skyon gyi mun pa kun sel ba// 'dren
40a5(mdo sde): pa stong gsum dag na mig gyur pa'i// thub pa lam ston khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa mngon shes mchogal mkhas// bden pa gzigs shing dam pa'i don bslabs pa/ 
40a6(mdo sde): brgal nas srog chags gzhan dag sgrol mdzad pa// bde gshegs grol gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thabs dang mngon shes dam pa kun la mkhas// 'chi 'pho 'chi 'pho med pa'i 'pho ba ston// 
40a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten chos kyi rjes su 'thun mdzad kyang // 'jig rten gang du'ang chags pa khyod mi mnga'// gang dag khyod ni nyan tam ltar lhags pa// de dag thob pa dam pa bsam mi khyab// khyod las chos
40a8(mdo sde): nyid thos te gang dad cing // dga' ba yangs pa skyes pa smos ci 'tshal// dga' ldan gnas rnams kun ni mog mog gyur// 'dzam+bu'i gling du nyi ma mngon du shar// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig bsam
40b1(mdo sde): mi khyab/ nyon mongs gnyid kyis log las sad par mdzad// deng ni pho brang 'byor cing rgyas gyur la// bye ba khrag khrig lha rnams lang long gyur// lha yi bu mos sil snyan sgra phyung bas// rgyal/ 
40b2(mdo sde): po'i khab na sgra snyan grags par gyur// bsod nams gzi brjid rdzogs shing las dge ba// bud med gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan gyur pa// de yi sras gyur de ni de ltar 'byor// dpal gyis 'jig
40b3(mdo sde): rten gsum ni zil gyi gnon// mi mchog 'byung ba de yi gzi brjid kyis// deng phyi phyin chad pho blang dam pa 'dir// lus can rnams la 'dod sdang 'thab rtsod med// kun kyang byams pa'i sems
40b4(mdo sde): kyis sri zhur bcas// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs rgyal dbyung bas na// rgyal po'i rigs ni rab tu 'phel bar 'a gyur// ser skya'i grong 'di shin tu phun sum tshogs// rin
40b5(mdo sde): chen mdzod kyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin srin du grul bum gsang ba pa// lha dang lha min tshogs rnams dbang por bcos// mi mchog srung ba gang dag gnas pa
40b6(mdo sde): rnams// de dag nga por mi thogs thar pa 'thob/ gus dang srinu la ni gnas nas su// 'dren pa khyod bstod bsod nams gang bsags pa// kun kyang byang chub ni yongs su bsngo// mi yi ma pa khyod
40b7(mdo sde): ltar myur du shog/ bskyod par brtsams pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar dgun 'das te// dpyid kyi dus la dpyid zla tha chung gi tshe// skar mas ga
40b8(mdo sde): la bab pa'i dus kyi dam pa la/ shing rnams kyi lo ma rgyas shing me tog mchog tu rgyas nas/ grang dro dang / mun pa dang / rdul med cing sa'i gzhi sngo gzhon nu skyes pas khebs par gnas pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten
41a1(mdo sde): gsum gyi gtso bo 'jig rten gyis mchod pas dus la bab pa'i tshod la rnam par gzigs nas/ ches bco lnga'i zla ba nya la skar ma rgyal gyi dus su/ yum gso sbyong blangs pa'i rum du/ byang
41a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas 'phos te/ dran zhing shes bzhin du glang po'i phrug gu thal kar mche ba drug dang ldan pa/ mgo'i kha dog srin bu ldum bu chu gsher gyi mdog lta bu/ 
41a3(mdo sde): mche ba la gser 'tshig pa/ yan lag dang nyin lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ dbang po nyams pa med par byas te/ ma'i glo g.yas pa nas zhugs so// zhugs nas kyang glo g.yas logs su brten te
41a4(mdo sde): gnas kyi/ blo g.yon pa logs su nam yang ma brten to// mo sgyu 'phrul ma la bde ba na nyal ba des kyang rmi lam 'di lta bu mthong ngo // glang po kha ba dngul mdog mche ba drug/ rkang
41a5(mdo sde): lag rab mdzes mgo bo dmar sdug pa// 'gros bzang lus tshig sa rdo rje bzhin brtan pa// glang po'i mchog cig khong du song snyam byed// des ni de 'dra'i bde ba brgya lamana'ang // ma
41a6(mdo sde): mthong ma thos myong bar ma gyur te// lus kyang bde zhing sems kyang bder gyur nas// bsam gtan mnyam par bzhag pa bzhin du gyur// de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rgyan dang gos lcug lhug por gyon cing
41a7(mdo sde): thogs pa las/ lus dang sems bde bar gyur te/ dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / nyams bde ba thob nas/ mal dam pa de las langs te/ bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du
41a8(mdo sde): bdar nas/ khang bzangs de'i steng nas babs te/ shing mya ngan mchang gi nags tshal ga le ba der song nas/ de mya ngan mtshang gi nags tshal du bde bar 'dug ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du pho nya
41b1(mdo sde): btang nas/ rgyal po gshegs su gsol/ lha mo de khyod kyi zhal mthong bar bzhed do zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshig de thos nas rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ lus g.yos nas khri bzang po las/ 
41b2(mdo sde): langs te/ blon po dang / grong rdal pa dang / 'khor dang / gnyen pa'i skye bo dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ mya ngan mchang gi nags tshal ga la ba der song ngo // song nas kyang bdag gi
41b3(mdo sde): lus shin tu lci ba snyam byed nas/ mya ngan mtshang gi nags tshal du 'gro ma nus te/ de mya ngan mtshang gi nags tshal gyi sgor 'dug nas cung zad cig bsams te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// 
41b4(mdo sde): bdag ni g.yul du dpa' ba'i phul phyin pa// deng ltar lus lci ba dag gis myong mi dran// bdag gi khyim du'ang 'gro bar dang ma nus// kye ma 'di ci su la dri bar bya// gnas gtsang ma'i
41b5(mdo sde): ris kyi lha dag/ nam pa'i dkyil na 'khod nas lus phyed mngon par sprul te/ rgyal po zas gtsang mal tshigs su bcang/ de smras pa/ dka' thub brtul zhugs yon tan ldan pa
41b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod// byams dang snying rje thob pas bsod nams ye shes dbang bskur ba'i// byang chub sems dpa' che ba dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos gyur te// rgyal po khyod kyis sras gyur lha mo sgra
41b7(mdo sde): 'phrul mngal du zhugs// de tshe rang gi mgo cog sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas te// rgyal po rim gro bya bar ldan gyur de yi nang du zhugs// nga rgyal dregs pa med pas lha mo sgyu 'phrul ngor bltas te// ngas ni khyod
41b8(mdo sde): la tsi bya ci sbyar khyod kyis nga la smros// lha mos smras pa/ kha ba dngul gyi mdog 'dra nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags pa ste// rkang lag legs shing rab 'byes mche ba drug ldan che ba nyid// glang po'i
42a1(mdo sde): dam pa rdo rje bzhin du tshigs brtan gzugs bzang ba// bdag gi rum du zhugs kyis de yi lo rgyus gsan par gsol// stong gsum khams 'di mdzes par rab rib ma mchis bdag gis
42a2(mdo sde): mthong // bdag ni nyal zhing mchis na lha rnams bye bas rab tu bstod// 'on kyang bdag la khro zhing 'tshig dang zhe sdang rmongs ma mchis// zhi ba'i sems su gyur cing bsam gtan bde dang ldan snyam bgyid// 
42a3(mdo sde): bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni rigs la dge 'am dngos 'am ci// bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni yang dag ldan par lung ston pa// rig byed rmi lam gzhung la mkhas shing gza' yi cho ga mkhan// rgyal po myur du bram ze/ 
42a4(mdo sde): 'dir ni legs par dgug tu gsol// de skad tshig zos rgyal dpos de yi dus kyi skad cig la// bram ze rig byed bstan bco sa gzhul shin tu mangs pa gnyer// sgyu 'phrul bram ze rnams kyi
42a5(mdo sde): mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras// kho mos rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong na de yi lo rgyus gson// bram ze rnams kyis smras pa// / lha mo bka' stsal tu gsol/ khyod kyis rmi lam ci 'dra ba
42a6(mdo sde): zhig gzigs// thos nas kyang dpyad par bgyi'o// lha mos smras pa/ kha ba dngul gyi mdog 'dra nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags pa ste// rkang lag legs shing rab 'byes mche ba drug ldan che ba nyid// glang
42a7(mdo sde): po'i dam pa rdo rje bzhin du tshigs brtan gzugs bzang ba// bdag gi rum du zhugs pa de yi lo rgyus mnyan par gyis// de skad tshig thos nas ni bram ze rnams kyis 'di skad smras/ rigs la dngos po ma
42a8(mdo sde): mchis dgyes brgya chen brnyes par 'gyur// khyod la sras mnga' mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa skye bar 'gyur// rgyal po'i rigs su rigs ldan 'khor los sgyur ba che ba nyid// gal te 'dod pa/ 
42b1(mdo sde): dag dang rgyal sring po brang spangs gyur te// 'jig rten kun la thugs brje chags med rab tu byung gyur na// de ni 'jig rten gsum na sbyin gnas sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste// bdud rtsi mchog gi ro yos 'jig
42b2(mdo sde): rten thams cad tshi ma mdzad 'gyur// de skad tshig snyan lung bstan te// rgyal po'i pho drang zan zos nas// bya dga' byin pa blangs nas su// bram ze de dag phyir dong ngo // dge slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas
42b3(mdo sde): gtsang mas bram ze mtshan dang lhas shes shing rnam par 'byed pa dang / rmi lam gyi gzhung shes pa dag las de skad kyi tshig de thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs la/ rab tu dga' zhing / dga' ba
42b4(mdo sde): dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bram ze de dag bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / myang ba mang po nyams su bsod pas tshim nga zhing ngoms par byas nas/ bya dga' byin te bkye'o// de nyid kyi
42b5(mdo sde): tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de'i sgo bzhin// grong khyer gyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo thams cad du sbyin pa byin te/ ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' la
42b6(mdo sde): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos/ 
42b7(mdo sde): phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha/ gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni gnas/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tshe ba byin no// dge
42b8(mdo sde): slong dag de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'di khyim gang na 'dug na bde zhing nyon mongs pa med par 'dug par 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas skad cig de nyid la rgyal po
43a1(mdo sde): chen po bzhi/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// lha thugs las su ma mdzad par btang snyoms su bde bar bzhugs shig/ bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i
43a2(mdo sde): pho brang bsham mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// skyong ba'i gzhal med khang rnams ngan// sum cu rtsa gsum pa yi bzang // byang chub sems
43a3(mdo sde): dpa'i pho brang ni// rnam par rgyal tsam bdag gis dbul// de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo'i khang khyim mthong gyur nas// brgya byin bye
43a4(mdo sde): ba ngo mtshar gyur// 'thab bral rab kyi dpal ldan khang // rgyal ra ba'i sras la bdag 'bul lo// de nas lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad
43a5(mdo sde): ces smras so// grags pa che mnga' sngon chad ni// dga' ldan gang du bzhugs gyur pa// pho brang dam pa 'dzin pa de// rgyal ba'i sras la bdag 'bul lo// de nas lha'i bu rab 'phrul
43a6(mdo sde): dga' rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// dpal ldan yid las grub pa'i khang // de ni rin chen rang bzhin te// byang chub sems dpa' mchod don tu// rgyal po bdag gis
43a7(mdo sde): dbul bar bgyi// de nas lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'dod pa'i khams gnas ji snyed pa// gzhal med khang mdzes gang yod pa// 
43a8(mdo sde): bdag gi gzhal med khang drung na// 'od dang mdog kyang stor bar snang // de bas dpal ldan bdag gis dbul// byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// rin chen rang bzhin pho brang bzang // de ni rgyal
43b1(mdo sde): bo blang bar gyis// lha yi me tog rab bkang ste// lha yi spos kyi dang ldan pa'i// pho brang yangs pa bdag gis dbul// der ni lha mo bzhugs par gyis// dge slong dag de ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i/ 
43b2(mdo sde): dbang po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i phyir/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa der rang rang gi khyim phul bar gyur to// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang me'i las ni
43b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis/ lha yir ni ma gyur pa bshams par gyur te/ de la byang chub sems dpas bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus/ khyim de dag thams cad du lha mo sgyu 'phrul mngon par bstan to// byang
43b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/ glo g.yas phyogs logs su skyil mo krung bcas te gnas par gyur to// lha'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyang so so nas
43b5(mdo sde): bdag nyid kyi khyim na byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dug gi/ ga zhan ma yin no zhes de ltar shes par gyur to// de la'/ de skad ces bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin bkod pa che la gnas gyur te/ 
43b6(mdo sde): sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab sbrul byas nas// lha rnams thams cad bsam pa rdzogs par byas// rgyal po'ang de lta yid bzhin bsam pa grub// de nas lha'i 'khor de'i nang nas// lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam
43b7(mdo sde): du sems te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ros kyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang mi'i lus kyi dri bron skyo zhing 'byol na/ de ma yin pa'i lha gzhan sum cu rtsa gsum pa 'am/ 'thab bral lam/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dag lta smos
43b8(mdo sde): kyang ci dgos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' gtsang zhing dri nga ba dang bral ba/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ sems can rin po che dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/ yum gyi
44a1(mdo sde): lhums mi'i lus dri mi nim par bzhugs par gyur snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du
44a2(mdo sde): bud med kyi lus ni smad pa lags pa dang / 'dod chags la spyod ces bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ngo mtshar che na/ bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par
44a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa/ sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa/ 'di ltar dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/ yum gyi lhums mi'i lus su glo g.yas phyogs su brten te bzhugs so zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rab tu yang ngo // 
44a4(mdo sde): mtshar che ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mdzad do zhes de skad du smra bar ni bdag la spro ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
44a5(mdo sde): bo khyod byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa/ rin po che dko/ da pa zhes bya ba gang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gan sa pa'i yongs su spyad par gyur pa mthong bar 'dod dam/ gsol
44a6(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus ni da lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus ni da lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de bstan te mthong na glob dga'o// de nas bcom
44a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do// de nas mi mjed kyis bdag po tshangs pa/ tshangs pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig gi tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan
44a8(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas/ nges bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dud cing phyogs
44b1(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa khyod kyis sngon nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i ma'i rum na zla ba bcur 'dug
44b2(mdo sde): 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyod pa blangs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa de de ga la
44b3(mdo sde): yod ston cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na mchis lags/ dka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa de'i phyir zla ba bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de 'dir khyod kyis ston
44b4(mdo sde): cig dang / ji tsam du 'dus byas pa shes par 'gyur ro// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ tshangs pa dag la 'di skad ce/ sa smras so// kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po
44b5(mdo sde): che bkod pa de blang gis de'i bar du khyed 'khod cig/ de nas mi ma jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas mi
44b6(mdo sde): snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig de nyid la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin to// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha'i bu tshangs pa bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po khyod song la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
44b7(mdo sde): 'di man chad / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas yan chan du/ sgra sgrogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bkur na/ khyed kyi nang nas
44b8(mdo sde): mthong bar su dga' ba myur du sheg shig ces sgras go bar gyis shig/ de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i
45a1(mdo sde): / yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa blangs te tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang chen po dpag tshad sum brgya pa'i steng du bzhag nas/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor te/ 'dzam+bu'i
45a2(mdo sde): gling du phab bo// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'dus pa chen por gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de yang lha'i gos dang / lha'i phreng ba dang
45a3(mdo sde): lha'i spos dang / lha'i me tog dang / lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / lha'i longs spyod rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas par gyur cing / lha dbang che bar grags pa dag gis yongs su bskor bar gyur pa ni 'di tsam
45a4(mdo sde): ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su 'dug nas ngargyang ring po nas/ gdong thal mos skyabs te/ mgo byol na das bltas kyang mthong bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i nang
45a5(mdo sde): na tshangs pa dag ni mthu che ba ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bra/ la dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan/ 'phrul dbang byed kyis lha dag kyang de dag gi drung na dma' ba yin
45a6(mdo sde): na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i sgra de dag zhi bar mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de thos pa tsam gyis 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mi
45a7(mdo sde): rnams myo myo por 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir ro// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi drung du lhags nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che
45a8(mdo sde): bkod pa 'di bdag cag gis mthong bar mi nus na ji ltar bgyi/ des de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag kho bos kyang ji ltar bya/ kho bo nyid kyis kyang mthong bar mnus so// grogs po dag 'on kyang de ni nam
45b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phul ba de'i tshe mthong grang ngo // de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i dbang po de bas na/ ci nas kyang myur du mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar mdzad du gsol/ smras pa/ grogs po dag lha'i bu mngon
45b2(mdo sde): par 'phags pa/ mngon par 'phags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/ dga' bar bya ba'i tshig rjod par gyur gyi bar du sdod cig/ de nas de dag phyogs gcig tu 'khod de mgo byol nas/ 
45b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das logs su lta zhing 'khod par gyur to// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su
45b4(mdo sde): spyad par bya ba rin po che bkod pa de khyer te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la ba der phul lo// byang chub sems dpa'i yongasasu spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de ni/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes
45b5(mdo sde): pa bltan sdug pa/ grub ni lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ steng la nga ba brtsegs pas legs par brgyan pa ste/ de'i tshad ni 'bong du 'di lta ste dper na/ byis pa bcas nas zla ba drug lon pa
45b6(mdo sde): tsam mo// khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du khri bshams pa ni 'di lta ste dper na/ byis pa bcas nas zla ba drug lon pa 'dug pa'i stegs bu tsam mo// byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad par bya ba rin po che
45b7(mdo sde): bkod pa de'i kha dog dang dbyibs ni 'di lta bu ste/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na de'i dbyibs dang / kha dog 'dra ba gang yang med do// lha mo rnams kyis de mthong na yang mig 'khrugs shing ngo mtshar du
45b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhag na lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ste/ dper na mgar ba mkhas pas gser shin tu bzhu ste/ legs par sbyangs nas/ dri ma'i skyon med par byas pa'i
46a1(mdo sde): // gser bzhin du khang ba brtsegs pa de rnam par mdzes so// byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de'i nang du khrig gams pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dung mgrin ma gtogs par lha dang bcas
46a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten na de'i dbyibs dang / kha dog 'dra ba gang yang med do// tshangs pa chen pos gos bgos pa de yang byang chub sems dpa'i khri de'i drung na mdzes par mi snang ba/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung
46a3(mdo sde): dang / char gyis btab pa'i la ba nag po bzhin no// khang pa brtsegs pa de ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas pa ste/ de'i phye ma zhog cig la'ang stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyis rin du mi chog go// khang
46a4(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa de ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po de lta bus kun nas bskor ba ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dang 'dra ba gnyis pa gcig kyang khang pa brtsegs pa dang po de'i nang na ma chags ma reg par 'dug go/ 
46a5(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa de kho na dang 'dra ba gsum pa gcig kyang / kha/ nga ba brtsegs pa gnyis pa de'i nang na ma reg ma chags/ par 'dug go/ spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa de'i nang
46a6(mdo sde): du khri de bzhag ste/ gdan bting ngo // tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po de'i kha dog ni rnam pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bai DUr+ya sngon be rigs dam pa dang ldan pa bzhin no// spos kyi khang pa
46a7(mdo sde): brtsegs pa de'i 'khor na/ me tog lha'i las 'das pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma bskyed par/ byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pas khang pa brtsegs
46a8(mdo sde): ba der skye'o// byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa'i rin po che bkod pa de ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin te/ sra zhing brtan la mi shigs pa ste/ ka tsa la ni de'i gos ltar reg na bde ba'o// 'dod pa na spyod
46b1(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas bkod pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkrod pa der kun tu snang ngo // gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' ma'i ram du
46b2(mdo sde): 'jug pa de'i nub mo 'og gi chu'i phung po nas bzung ste/ sa chen po'i rngams dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad brtol te/ pad+ma byung bas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags so// 
46b3(mdo sde): pad+ma de ni kha lo sgyur ba skyes bu dam pa dang / tshangs pa chen po brgya phrag bcu'i stong la dbang bas mthong du zad kyi/ gzhan sus kyang mthong ba med do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
46b4(mdo sde): 'di na snying khu dang / snying po dang / bcud ji snyed yod pa de dag tham sa cad pad+ma chen po de la zil mngar gyi thigs pa chags te 'dug nas/ de tshangs pa chen pos bai DUr+ya'i snod bzang pos
46b5(mdo sde): blangs shing / byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas/ byang chub sems dpas kyang de blangs te tshangs pa chen po la snying pa/ rtse ba'i phyir 'thungs par gyur to// snying khu'i thigs pa de
46b6(mdo sde): 'thungs na byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa/ byang chub sems dpa'o sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ma gtogs par de yang dag par bde bar zhu bar nus pa/ sems can gyi khams na sems can
46b7(mdo sde): de lta bu de gang yang med do// las gang gi rnam par smin pas snying khu'i thigs pa de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' la yod par gyur ce na/ byang chub sems dpas sngon yun ring por byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
46b8(mdo sde): pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can nad pa dag la sman byin pa dang / sems can bsam pa la rten pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang / skyabs su 'ongs pa rnams yongs su ma gtang ba dang / rtag par
47a1(mdo sde): me tog gi phud dang / 'bras bu'i phung dang / ro'i phud de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams dang / 
47a2(mdo sde): pa dang ma la phul zhing phyis bdag nyid yongs su spyod spyod pas las de'i rnam par smin pas tshangs pa chen po/ zil mngar gyi thigs pa de byang chub sems dpa' la 'bul lo// khang pa brtsegs pa der gnas kyi
47a3(mdo sde): khyad par dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dang / phreng ba brgyus po dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa/ 'phags pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas der byung / 
47a4(mdo sde): bar snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che dbakod pa der/ gos stong phrag brgya'i rgyan ces bya ba phrugs gcig byung ste/ de'i de 'byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha
47a5(mdo sde): ma pa ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na sems can de lta bu de gang yang med do// gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg pa mchog tu bya ba dam pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
47a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang khang pa brtsegs pa de na med pa gang yang med do// / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bzhi pa/ yongs su spyang
47a7(mdo sde): par bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa de ni 'di ltar phyi nang shin tu yongs su grub pa/ 'di ltar shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na yul ka ling ka nas byung ba'i dar ltar reg na bde ba'o// de yang 'ol/ 
47a8(mdo sde): byiphyir bstan par zad kyi/ de la dpe med do// byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di ni bsams pas 'grub ste/ gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar
47b1(mdo sde): mngon par byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / ma gang gi rum du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i rum g.yas par khang pa brdertsegs
47b2(mdo sde): pa rin po che bkod pa dam pa sngar mngon par 'grub cing / phyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos te/ khang pa brtsegs pa der dkyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug par 'byung ba dang / byang chub
47b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa'i lus nur nur po dang / mir mer po dang / lngar lngar po dang / reng reng por 'gyur ba med cing / yan lag dang / nying lag dang / mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs par
47b4(mdo sde): 'dug bzhin du 'byung la/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi rmi lam du glang po chen po 'ongs par mthong ba 'din chos nyid do// de de ltara'adug pa la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po
47b5(mdo sde): bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gang las lag na rdo rje skyes pa'i gnod sbyin gyi rigasagasang ba pa zhes bya ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum
47b6(mdo sde): du zhugs par shes nas/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' la rim rgo byed pa'i lha mo pa ni yod po u khu li zhes bya ba dang / mu khu li zhes bya ba dang / 
47b7(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / 'di dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs par shes nas/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang par srung ngo // lha'i dbang po brgya
47b8(mdo sde): byin yang lha'i bu lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa shes nas rtag tu rgyun mi chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur te// byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs
48a1(mdo sde): pa'i lus ni rnam pa 'di lta bur gyur te/ dper na/ mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na/ ri'i sbol mo'i phung po chen po 'dug pa ni dpag chad gcig nas kyang snang / dpag tshad lnga'i bar nas
48a2(mdo sde): kyang snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa'i lus mngon par grub pa yang de lta bur gyur te/ 'od gsal zhing gzugs bzang la mdzes shing blta na sdug par gyur pa de/ khang pa brtsegs
48a3(mdo sde): pade'i nang du skyil mo krung du 'dug na/ gser gyi sa le sbam rigs dang ldan pa rin po che bai DUr+yas brgyan pa ltar shin tu mdzes par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i mas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rum na 'dug
48a4(mdo sde): pa mthong bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ sprin gyi tshogs chen po'i nang nas glog byung ba ni snang ba chen po skyed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa yang dpal dang / 
48a5(mdo sde): gzi brjid dang / kha dog gis nye bar rin po che'i khang pa rtsegs pa dang po nga snang bar byed do// snang bar byas nas spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa snang bar byed do// spos kyi
48a6(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa snang bar byas nas/ spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa snang bar byed do// spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa snang bar byas nas/ ma'i lus thams cad snang bar byed do// 
48a7(mdo sde): de snang bar byas nas/ de stan gang la 'dug pa de snang bar byed do// de snang bar byas nas/ khyim thams cad snang bar byed do// khyim thams cad snang bar byas nas/ 'od 'phro ba khyim gyi steng du byung ste/ shar
48a8(mdo sde): phyogs snang bar byed do// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcu kun tu rgyang grags tsam du phyogs re rer yang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i
48b1(mdo sde): rum na 'dug pa'i dngal dang / gzi brjid dang / kha dog gis snang ba byas par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan
48b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad gnod sbyin lnga brgya nam dag dang lhan cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe 'ongs te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas de dag 'ongs par rig nas
48b3(mdo sde): lag pa brkyang ste/ mdzub mo bsgreng nas stan ston to// 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa de dag kyang ji ltar bting ba'i stan la 'khod par gyur te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug bzhin
48b4(mdo sde): du/ skyes zin pa'i gzugs dang 'dra bar lag pa bskyod cing 'di dag la/ rnam par spyod cing gzhog par mthong nas de dag dag da' mgu zhing nyams bde ba thob ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la
48b5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag de ltara'akhod pa mthong nas// chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag paraston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng
48b6(mdo sde): bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed do// gang gi tshe de dag 'dong bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang byang chub sems dpas de dag gi sems sems kyis rnam par shes nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ de
48b7(mdo sde): dag 'dong ba'i brda ston to// de ltar lag pa brkyang ste 'dong ba'i brda snyan nas/ phyir skum par byed de/ ma la gnod pa med do// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni/ byang chub
48b8(mdo sde): sems dpas kyang 'dong bar gnang ngo snyam sems shing / de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dong bar gyur to// de ltar byang chub sems
49a1(mdo sde): dang nu mo minyal nas lag pa g.yas pa bzung shing / brkyang nas kyang skum pa dang / bskums nas kyang dran zhing shes bzhin du/ lag pa de 'jog pa'i d+hu ni de yin no// rkyen ning yin no/ 
49a2(mdo sde): gzhan yang gang gi tshe skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo su yang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa de'i tshe/ thog mar ni byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar bya ba smra'o// der/ 
49a3(mdo sde): 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i ma dga' bar smra'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sngar dga' bar bya ba sgrub la mkha par gyur te/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ mi
49a4(mdo sde): 'am/ mi ma yin pa su yang rung / byang chub sems dpa' la sngo/ na du dga' bar bya ba'i tshig smra bar nus pa med do// byang/ chub sems dpa' nyid thog mar dga' bar bya ba smra zhing / de'i
49a5(mdo sde): 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i ma dga' bar bya ba smra'o// de nas snga dro'i dus zad de/ nyi ma gung la bab nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu mngon par
49a6(mdo sde): 'phags pa/ mngon par 'phags pa dag byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang / de la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / byang chub sems dpas de dag rgyang ring po nas 'ong
49a7(mdo sde): bar mthong nas/ gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag dga' bar byed cing / 'dzub ma brkyang ste stan ston to// dge
49a8(mdo sde): slong dag de'i tshe'ang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyir bzlog ma nus nas ji ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan
49b1(mdo sde): ngag kyang 'khod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpas de ltar 'khod par rig nas chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jugayang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar
49b2(mdo sde): byed do// byang chub sems dpas lag pa gang du brkyang ba de logs su byang chub sems dpa'i ma yang lta bar gyur to// de nas kyang lha de dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang dga' bar bya ba
49b3(mdo sde): sgra'o snyam mo// de dag re re zhing yang 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag 'ba' shig la smra ste/ bdag 'ba' shig la dga' bar bya ba sA'o snyam mo// khang pa brtsegs pa der lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum/ 
49b4(mdo sde): curtsa gsum pa'i lha de de dag gi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur to// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i longs spyod yongs su dag par gyur pa de lta bu ni gzhan dag na med do// dge
49b5(mdo sde): / slong dag gang gi tshe/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / de ma yin pa'i lha 'i bu gzhan dag 'dong bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang / byang chub sems dpas de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs
49b6(mdo sde): su shes nas/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ de dag 'dong ba'i brda ston to// brda bstan nas phyir bskum pa byas te/ dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa bzhag kyang ma la gnod pa med do// de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya
49b7(mdo sde): dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu sum cu rtsa gsum pa dag kyang 'di snyam du/ bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dong bar gnang ngo snyam du sems shing / de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang byang chub sems dpa'i
49b8(mdo sde): ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dong bar gyur to// dge slong dag nyi ma phyed kyi dus 'das nas/ phyi dro'i dus la bab pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun
50a1(mdo sde): / du bdar te/ lha yul ba'i snying khu'i thigs pa de khyer nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der/ byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan/ 
50a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir 'ong bar gyur to// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas te 'ongs par shes nas/ byang chub sems dpas yang gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pa
50a3(mdo sde): brkyang ste/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag la dga' bar bya ba smras te/ mdzub mo brkyang nas stan ston to// dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa'i
50a4(mdo sde): bka' las bzlog ma nus nas/ ji ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la mim dadzed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan dadag kyang 'khod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpas de ltar
50a5(mdo sde): 'khod par rig nas/ chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed/ byang chub sems dpas
50a6(mdo sde): lag pa gang du brkyang ba de logs su lha mo sgyu 'phrul yang lta bar gyur to// de ltar na lha de dag kyang bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' dang dga' bar bya ba'i gtam byed do snyam ste/ lha'i bu de dag re re zhing yang
50a7(mdo sde): 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag ba' shig la sgra ste/ bdag 'ba' shig la dga' ba'i gtam byed do snyam mo// dge slong dag gang gi tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i
50a8(mdo sde): bude dag 'dong bar 'dod par gyur pa do'i che yang / byang chub sems dpas de dag gi sems kyi rtog sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ de dag 'dong ba'i bar ston to// de ltar
50b1(mdo sde): 'dong ba'i brda bstan nas phyir bskum pa byas te/ dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa bzhag kyang ma la gnod pa med do// de'i tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang tshangs ris kyi lha de dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni
50b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dong bar gnang ngo snyam du sems shing / de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dong bar gyur to// byang chub sems
50b3(mdo sde): dpa' yang dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa 'jog par gyur to// dge slong dag shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcu kun nas kyang byang
50b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos ma nyan pa dang / chos yang dag par brjod par bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar
50b5(mdo sde): gyur to// de dag de ltar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas lus las 'od bkye ste/ 'od kyi bkod pa de dag seng+ge'i khrir sprul nas/ de ltar sprul pa'i khri de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de
50b6(mdo sde): dag 'khong du bcug ste/ de dag de ltar 'khong par shes nas 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid rgya cher rnam par dbye ba'i don tu dris te brtags kyang / skal pa mnyam pa'i lha rnams ma gtogs par gzhan sus
50b7(mdo sde): kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas nub mo mi nyal nas lus las 'od bkye ba'i rgyu ni de yin no// rkyen ni de yin no// dge slong dag lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa'
50b8(mdo sde): mami'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/ lus lci bar mtshor te/ gzhan du na yang ba dang / 'jam pa dang / bde bar tshor zhing lto ma bde ba'i sdug bsngal gang yang myong bar ma gyur to// 'dod chags kyis yongs su
51a1(mdo sde): / gdung ba 'am/ zhe sdang gis yongs su gdung ba'am/ gti mug gis yongs su gdung bas kyang yongs su gdung bar ma gyur/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'am/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'am/ 
51a2(mdo sde): 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la yang rnam par rtog par ma gyur te/ grang ba 'am/ tsha ba 'am/ bkres pa 'am/ skom pa 'am/ mun pa 'am/ rdul dang / ngal ba tshol ba 'am/ mthong bar ma gyur te/ de la
51a3(mdo sde): gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg yid du mi 'ong ba snang bar ma gyur to// rmi lam ngan pa yang mthong bar ma gyur to// de la bud med kyi sgyu 'am/ g.yo 'am/ phrag dog gam/ bud med kyi nyon mongs
51a4(mdo sde): padag kyang nyams su gnod par byed par ma gyur to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ma ni/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te/ tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
