97b6(mdo sde): bskor bskor te/ sa'i steng du bor yang de'i lus la gnod par gyur pa med do// de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ de lta bu gnod par 'gyur bas chog gis thams cad cig tu 'dus te brgal bar gyis
97b7(mdo sde): shig/ de nas de dag thams cad nga rgyal gyis rlom zhing byang chub sems dpa' la rub par gyur to// de nas de dag byang chub sems dpa' la reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid dang lus
97b8(mdo sde): kyi mthu ma bzod de/ byang chub sems dpas reg pa tsam gyis sa la dgyel bar 'gyur to// de nas lha dang mi brgya stong de dag/ e ma a la la zhes zer zhing / ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong phyung ngo // nam
98a1(mdo sde): ma pa'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang me tog gi char chen po mngon par phab ste/ dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams
98a2(mdo sde): ji snyed pa// de dag gyang chen stobs po che 'dra la// cig char skyes bu'i mchog la rub gyur kyang // reg pa tsam gyis sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur// lhun po ri rab rdo rje'i 'khor yug dang // phyogs bcu dag na ri
98a3(mdo sde): gzhan gang yod pa// lag pas mnyes shing dmig med phyir klog na// mi lus snying po med pa mtshar ci che// 'di ni shing dbang mchog drung sdang ba'i gyang // dpung bcas bdud rnams rgyal mdzad sder bcas pa/ 
98a4(mdo sde): nag po'i rtsalag byams pa'i stobs kyis 'jom// bla med byang chub zhi bar 'chang yang rgya// de ltar byang chub sems/ dadapa' de gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par gyur to// de nas
98a5(mdo sde): lag na be con can gyis/ shAkya gzhon nu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di dag ni sad kyang zin/ mthong yang d+ha na gyis/ nga ni 'phong zhig bstan par gyis shig/ ngo'i che kun dga'
98a6(mdo sde): bos rgyang grags gnyis kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du bcugs so// de'i 'og tu lhas sbyin gyis rgyang grags bzhi'i pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so// de'i 'og tu mdzes
98a7(mdo sde): dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du bcugs so// de'i 'og tu shAkya lag na be con can gyis rgyang grags brgyad kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so// 
98a8(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol tu lpags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du bcug ste/ de'i drung ngu shing ta la bdun dang ra nas/ de'i pha rol tu lcags kyi phag nod kyi gzugs 'khrul lalo/ 
98b1(mdo sde): du byas pa gcig btsugs so// de nas kun dga' bos rgyang grags gnyis kyi pha rol ni rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs nas phog par gyur te/ de phan chad kyil phog par ma nus so// lha sbyin gyis rgyang grags
98b2(mdo sde): bzhi'i pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs nas phog par gyur te/ de phan chad kyil phog par ma nus so// mdzes dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs nas phos/ 
98b3(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ de phan chad kyil phog par ma nus so// lag na becon can gyis dpag tshad gnyis kyi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs nas phog par gyur te/ thal phyung du phyin nas de phan chad
98b4(mdo sde): kyi la phog par ma nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' la gzhugang dang gang byin pa de dag la la ni gzhu rgyun chang / de la la ni chag nas/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grong khyer
98b5(mdo sde): 'di ni gzhu gzhan la la bdag gis brdung bzod pa 'am/ lus kyi stobs dang / mthu bzod pa mchis sam/ la pos smras pa/ bu yod do// gzhon nus smras pa/ lha de lta
98b6(mdo sde): bu gang na mchis/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu khyod kyi mes seng ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i snam ru da ltar lha khang na spos dang phreng bas mchod de/ de ni sus kyang brdung bar yang mi nus na/ dgang
98b7(mdo sde): bar lta smos kyang ci dgos pa zhig yod do// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lha de blang du gsol/ sad par bgyi'o// de nas gzhu de blangs te 'ongs pa dang / shAkya gzhon nu thams cad kyis nan tan gyi
98b8(mdo sde): mchog gis bsgrims kyang gzhu de brdung bar yang ma nus na/ dgang bar lta smos kyang ci dgos te ma nus so// de nas gzhu de shAkya lag na be con can gyis lus kyi mthu stobs thams cad phyung ste/ 
99a1(mdo sde): gzhu de brdung bar brgal nam brdungs so// de nas gzhu de byang chub sems dpa' la byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpas gzhu de blangs te/ stan las ma langs par dkyil mo krung phyed bcas
99a2(mdo sde): telag pa g.yon pas bzung nas/ lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo gcig gis brdungs so// gzhu de de ltar brdungs pa'i tshe/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad du sgra mngon par grag par gyur
99a3(mdo sde): to/ grong khyer gyi mi thams cad kyang skrag skrag por gyur to// gcig la cig 'dri zhing 'di ltar ci'i sgra zhig ces zer ro// de la la la na re gzhon nu don grub kyis mes kyi snam ru brdungs nas/ de'i sgra byung ba
99a4(mdo sde): ni 'di yon no zhes zer ro// de nas lha dang mi brgya stong da dag/ e ma a la la zhes zer zhing / ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to// na mkha'i dkyil nas 'khod pa'i lha'i bu/ 
99a5(mdo sde): ngag gis kyang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / skye bo'i tshe/ gas phal po che de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gdan las ma bzhengs brtsal ba ma mchis su// thub pas snam ru
99a6(mdo sde): 'di 'dra brdungs pa las// gdon mi 'tshal bar dgongs pa rdzogs gyur te// bdud kyi sde bcom myur du thub pas byon// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas mnga' blangs nas gzhu de dang sbyar
99a7(mdo sde): te bkangs nas 'phangs pa'i mthu stobs kyis/ kun dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang / lha sbyin gyi 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang / mdzes dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang / lag na be con
99a8(mdo sde): can gyi 'ben du rnga btsugs pa de thams cad las kyang thal nas/ rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol tu bdag gi 'ben lcags kyi rnga gtsugs pa dang / shing ta la bdun dang ra ba dang / phag rgod kyi gzugs
99b1(mdo sde): 'khrul 'khor du byas pa las kyang thal te mda' des la zug nas mi snang bar nub par gyur to// sa phyogs gang du mda' de zug ste nub pa'i sa phyogs der khron pa lta bu'i khung zhig byung nas/ da ltar yang
99b2(mdo sde): mdor khron pa zhes bya ba yin no// do tshe lha dang mi brgya stong dag e ma a la la zhes zer zhing / ca co dang / gzhi'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par 'gyur to// shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung
99b3(mdo sde): ba thob ste/ kye ma ngo mtshar to// 'dis ni bslabs kyang ma bslabs par rtsal gyis shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes zer ro// nam pa'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang rgyal po
99b4(mdo sde): zas gtsang ma dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// de lta bu ngo mtshar yang che ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni sa yi snying po sngon gyi sangs rgyas gangan la
99b5(mdo sde): bzhugs// zhi gnas snam ru thogs shing stong pa dang / ga med mnga' rnams kyis// nyon mongs dgra rnams bcom ste lta ba'i dra ba bral nas su// byang chub dam pa zhi ba rdul med
99b6(mdo sde): mya ngan med pa 'thob// de skad ces smras nas/ lha'i bu de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te/ dong ngo // de bzhin du mchongs pa dang / yi ge dang / 
99b7(mdo sde): lag rtsis dang / rtsis dang / grangs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang / rgyang nas phog pa dang / bang dang / tshar dang / rkyal dang / 'phong dpyad dang / glang po che'i gnyar bzhon pa dang / rta rtsal dang / 
99b8(mdo sde): shing rta'i thabs dang / mnga' gzhu'i thabs dang / brtan pa dang / mthu dang / dpa' ba dang / 'gyed stobs dang / lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang / zhags pa'i thabs dang / bdun du bsnur ba dang / 
100a1(mdo sde): phyir bsnur ba dang / bzur ba dang / 'dzin stangs dang / goms stabs dang / thor tshugs dang / gcad pa dang / dral ba dang / dbugs pa dang / gzhig pa dang / gshegs pa
100a2(mdo sde): dang nyami tshor bar phog pa dang / gnad du phog pa dang / sgra grag par phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dang / tshe lo'i rtse mo dang / snyan dngags sbyar ba dang / lam dang / ri mo dang / gzugs dang / gzugs kyi
100a3(mdo sde): las dang / thags kyi dpyad dang / me'i las dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / gar dang / glu dang / yi ge klag pa'i mig 'or dang / gtam dang / bzhad gad dang / rtsed mo dang / bro dang / sgeg pa dang
100a4(mdo sde): phreng ba rgyu ba dang / rlung yab g.yob pa dang / nor bu tshon gyis bsgyur ba dang / gos tshon gyi bsgyur ba dang / mig 'phrul gyi cho dag dang / rmi lam gyi dpyad dang / bya'i skad dang / 
100a5(mdo sde): bud med kyi mtshan dang / skyes pa'i mtshan dang / glang po'i mtshon da nga / rta'i mtshan dang / ba lang gi mtshan dang / ra'i mtshan dang / lug gi mtshan dang / khyi'i mtshan
100a6(mdo sde): dang shes gsal dang / sgra nges par sbyor ba dang / nga ro sgyur ba dang / sngon gyi rabs dang / sngon byung ba dang / rig byed dang / lung bstan pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / yi ge lci yang dang / 
100a7(mdo sde): tshig sdeb pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi cho ga dang / skar ma'i lugs dang / grangs can gyi lugs dang rnal 'byor gyi lugs dang / las kyi tshogs dang / bye brag pa'i lugs dang / nor gyi rig pa dang / 
100a8(mdo sde): phur bu'i lugs dang / chu'i lugs dang / lha ma yin gyi lugs dang / bya dang ri dgas kyi skad dang / gtan tshigs kyi rig pa dang / rgya skegs kyi 'khrul 'khor dang / spra tshil gyi las dang / 
100b1(mdo sde): 'drub shur dang / brko bzhog dang / lo ma dra ba dang / spos sbyar ba la sogs pa'i sgyu rtsal 'jig rten pa dang / lha'i dang mi'i las 'das pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig khyad par du
100b2(mdo sde): 'phags par gyur to// de'i tshe shAkya lag na be con can gyis/ rang gi bu mo sa 'tsho ma byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang de'i rim gyis bag mar blangs te/ byang chub sems
100b3(mdo sde): dpa' la phul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten dang 'thun pa tsam du bya ba'i phyir bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang du 'dug ste/ dga' zhing rtse la yongs su spyod pa ston to// bud med
100b4(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad kyi nang nas shAkya'i bu mos mtsho/ ma btsun mo'i mchog tu dbang bskur bar gyur to// de/ nas shAkya'i bu mos 'tshom gyo skyug gam/ nang mi
100b5(mdo sde): gang mthong yang rung ste/ gdong mi sbeng ngo // de dag kyang de la bag sar mo ni zhum zhum por 'dug pa'i rigs na/ 'di ni rtag tu ma g.yogs so zhes 'phya smong cing mi snyan par
100b6(mdo sde): zer ro// de nas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho mas gtam de thos nas/ nang mi rnams kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dug dang 'greng dang 'chag pa la// 'phags pa dag ni ma
100b7(mdo sde): g.yogs mdzes// nor bu rin chen 'od gsal ba// rgyal mtshan rtse mor gsal na mdzes// 'phags pa 'gro na'ang mdzes pa ste// 'ong na'ang de bzhin mdzes pa yin// 'greng ba'am de bzhin 'dug
100b8(mdo sde): pa dang // thams cad du'ang 'phags pa mdzes// 'phags pa smra na'ang mdzes pa ste// mi smrar 'dug kyang de bzhin mdzes// dper na ka la bing ka ni// mthong dang sgra tsam thos bzhin no// ku sha'i gos
101a1(mdo sde): ni gyon pa dang / gos ngan gyon dang lus ring ba// de ni rang gi gzi yis mdzes// yon tan ldan pa yon tan brgyan// gang la sdig pa med gyur pa// 'phags pa kun tu dge ba yin// byis pa
101a2(mdo sde): sdig pa byed pa ni// ji snyed brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin// gang dag snying la sdig pa yod cing tshig 'jam pa// de dag dug gi bum par bdud rtsi blugs pa bzhin// brag gi ser ga rtsub pa lta bur nang yang rtsub// de/ 
101a3(mdo sde): 'dra de dag sbrul gyi kha la nyug pa bzhin// des pa de dag gan du kun 'ong kun phyag 'tshal// 'bab stegs thams cad lta bur 'gro ba kun gyi gsos// 'phags pa dag ni rtag tu'o zhes bkang bum 'dra// bdag
101a4(mdo sde): nyid dag pa de 'dra mthong na bkra shis dge/ gang dag sdig pa'i grog das po yun ring yongs spong zhing // dge ba'i bshes gnyen rin po ches ni yongs bzung la// sdig pa rnam spong sangs rgyas
101a5(mdo sde): chos la mngon chags pa// de lta bu dag mthong na bkra shis 'bras bu yod// gang dag lus bsdams lus kyi skyon rnams rab bsdams dang // gang dag tshig bsdams rtag tu tshig
101a6(mdo sde): 'tshal med gyur la// dbang po sbas shing shin tu bsdam la yid dang ba// de lta bu dag gdong g.yogs te ni ci zhig bya// gal te lus la gos ni stong gis g.yogs gyur kyang // gang dag sems bshus
101a7(mdo sde): ngo tsha med cing khrel med dang // gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan med cing bden tshig med// de dag sgren mo bas kyang sgren mor 'jig rten rgyu// gang zhig sems sbas rtag tu dbang po bsdams gyur cing / 
101a8(mdo sde): bdag gi khyos chog sems can gzhan la mi sems pa// de 'dra ba dag nyi zla bzhin du ma g.yogs snang // de 'dra ba dag gdong g.yogs te ni ci zhig bya// gzhan yang drang srong bdag nyid che dang gzhan
101b1(mdo sde): sems blo mkhas dang // de bzhin lha tshogs dag gis kho mo'i bsam pa dang // kho mo'i tshul khrims yon tan sdom dang bag yod mkhyen// de lta bas na kho mos gdong bkab ci zhig dgos// dge slong dag rgyal
101b2(mdo sde): po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tshe ma'i stobs pa bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thos so// thos nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba
101b3(mdo sde): skyes nas/ ras bcos bu bzang po rin po che du mas spras pa zung cig dang / mu tig gi do shal srang bye ba brgya stong ri ba dang / mu tig dmar po bzang pos spras pa'i gser gyi phreng bas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma la
101b4(mdo sde): bkab nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kho bo'i bu ni yon tan ci 'dras brgyan pa dang / mna' mas rang gi yon tan ji ltar rab smras pa/ sems can dag pa de gnyis phrad par
101b5(mdo sde): gyur pa ni// mar dang mar gyi snying khu ji ltar 'dra ba bzhin// rgyuHla bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
101b6(mdo sde): po'i mdo// bam po brgyad pa/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa na/ gang dag byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las byed par spro bar gyur pa/ lha dang / 
101b7(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba du ma de dag rang rang gi dga' ba'i sgra
101b8(mdo sde): 'byin cing lhags par gyur to// de la dge slong dag dus gzhan zhig na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / rnam par ldang dang / mibam ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 
102a1(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba mang po dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ ma la skyes bu dam pa 'di btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du hacang yun ring du thogs par gyur na/ 
102a2(mdo sde): sems can gang dag 'dis yun ring po nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pas yongs su smin par byas pa dang / gang dag 'dis byang chub thob
102a3(mdo sde): nas chos bstan pa shes par 'gyur ba/ chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dag med par gyur nas/ phyis byang chub sems dpa' mngon par phyung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
102a4(mdo sde): bapar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gcig tu mi 'gyur grang ste dam mo// de nas de dag gus pa dang bcas/ rjes dang bcas dpar thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
102a5(mdo sde): nasanam zhig na bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' dam pa mchog rab dag pa 'di mngon par 'byung ba dang / mngon par byung nas kyang / shing gi rgyal po chen po de'i drung du
102a6(mdo sde): 'dug ste/ bdud dpung dang bcas pa brtul nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin
102a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa dang / lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med
102a8(mdo sde): bskor zhing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par bshad pas tshim par byed pa mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa'i
102b1(mdo sde): bsam pa de lta bus sdod cing 'khod par gyur to// dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa nas bzung ste/ yun ring por rtag par rgyun tu 'jig rten pa dang / 
102b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par gyur cing / dge ba'i chos spyod pa thams cad la bdag nyid slob dpon du gyur pa yin la/ yun ring po nas dus shes pa dang / 
102b3(mdo sde): chod shes pa dang / ran pa shes par gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pa las ma nyams pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rtse ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa
102b4(mdo sde): dang / dbang po la mkhas pa dang / dus dang ma yin pa shes pa dang / dus la lta zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar dus ran pa las mi yol bar gyur pa'o// de mngon par shes pa ye shes kyi stobs
102b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pas 'di ni rab tu bzung ba'i dus so// 'di ni tshar ba cad pa'i dus so// 'di ni bsdu ba'i dus so// 'di ni phan gdags pa'i dus so// 'di ni btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i
102b6(mdo sde): dus so// 'di ni smras pa'i dus so// 'di ni mi smra bar bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i dus so// 'di ni rab tu 'byung ba'i dus so// 'di ni kha ton bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni tshul bzhin yid
102b7(mdo sde): la bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni rab tu dben par bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni rgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so zhes bya ba nas/ 'di ni bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi bar gyis nang du 'gro ba'i dus so// 
102b8(mdo sde): 'di ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dge
103a1(mdo sde): slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so// 'di ni chos bstan pa'i dus so// 'di ni nang du yang dag par gzhag pa'i dus so// 
103a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba thams cad bdag nyid kyis shes so// byang chub sems dpa' dus thams cad du rtag par dus shes par gyur cing / dus la lta ba yin yang / dge slong dag 'di ni chos nyid kyi thob pa yin te/ srid pa
103a3(mdo sde): tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'khod pa rnams la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams glu dbyangs dang sil snyan gyi sgra las/ 
103a4(mdo sde): chos kyi sgo rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag gis yang dag par skul ba ma dzad do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can mchog gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs// de dag mthu yis
103a5(mdo sde): sil snyan sgra dag las// tshigs gtsang sgra snyan 'di dag byung ba/ yis// mi mchog dam pa rnams la yang dag skul// sdug bsngal brgya grang sems can mthong nas ni// 'gro ba'i
103a6(mdo sde): mgon dang skyabs dang gnas 'gyur zhing // phan byed mchog dang dpung gnyen gyur cig ces// khyod kyis sngon ni smon lam de skad btab// dge ba dpa' bo sngon gyi spyod pa dang // 'gro phan bya zhes smon
103a7(mdo sde): btab dran par byos// 'di ni khyod kyi dus chod yin gyis// drang srong mchog rab mngon par 'byung bar byos// sangs rgyas lha mi 'dul byed 'jig rten mchog/ yon tan brgyas gang bar ni gyur cig ces// 
103a8(mdo sde): de'i phyir khyod sngon mgo dang rkang lag dang // nor gyi dam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang btang // khyod ni khrims kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad/ khyod ni bzod pas 'gro la phan pa byed// khyod ni brtson pas
103b1(mdo sde): yon tan brgya yis gang // bsam gtan shes rab srid gsum mnyam pa med/ khro bas non cing za ba'i dri mang ba// de dag pade gshegs khyod kyi byams pas khyab// dge ba'i yon tan bral ba log par
103b2(mdo sde): des// mi mkhas rnam mang dag la khyed snying rje// bsod nams ye shes dge bas lus khyab cig/ rdul bral bsam gtan mngon shes lham mer 'dug/ phyogs bcu 'di dag rnams su rab tu gas la// 
103b3(mdo sde): sprin meng zla ba dri ma med pa 'dra// 'di dang gzhan yang snyan pa rnams gang gis// sil snyan las dag rgyal bas sgra bsgrags te// mngon par khyod 'byung dus ni 'di yin zhes// lha mis mchod par 'os la
103b4(mdo sde): skul ma 'debs// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' khyim dam dab mchog yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bde bar gnas pa dang / 'thun pa/ 
103b5(mdo sde): lha khang khyim lta bu stegs bu dang / sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs mchog dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi
103b6(mdo sde): rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ga bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'adra ba du mas brgyan pa/ dar gyi lnga ldi brgya stong du ma mngon par
103b7(mdo sde): dbyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu dpyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi spang leb can gyi zam pas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi phreng ba dang / chun po mang pos
103b8(mdo sde): dpyangs pa/ pog snod nas spos kyis bdugs pa/ dar la'i bla re bres pa/ dus thams cad pa'i me tog dri mchog tu zhim zhing shin tu mdzes pa dag bkram pa/ rdzing me tog pad+ma dkar po dang / pad+ma dang
104a1(mdo sde): rdzun pa'i chu gnas yongs su spyad par bya ba mang ba/ bya'adab spyong dang / ne co dang / ri sogs dang / khwa brug dang / rang pa dang / rma bya dang /  ba dang / kun la dang / kal ring ka dang / 
104a2(mdo sde): shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/ bai DUr+ya sngon po'i sa gzhi'i gnas yongs su spyad par bya ba/ gzugs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan kun tu ston pa/ blta bas
104a3(mdo sde): mi ngoms par nyams dga' ba/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dam pa'i bskyed pa'i dam pa mchog de na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' khang pa mdzes pa chen po mchog na gnas pa/ dri
104a4(mdo sde): ma med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba/ yan lag dri ma med pa/ phreng ba dang / nga rgyan ma bor ba/ dri mchog tu zhim pa dam pa'i byug pas lus bskus pa/ dkar zhing bzang la dri ma med cing rnam
104a5(mdo sde): par dag la dri ma dang bral ba'i gos gyon pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ mal cha lha'i ras bcos bu bzang po phra ba du ma bting ba/ 'jam pa ka tsa lin di'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ yan
104a6(mdo sde): lag dam pas spras pa'i mal bzang po'i steng na 'dug pa btsun mo'i 'khor dam pa lha'i bu mo dang 'dra ba/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa/ blta ba dang 'thun pa/ spyod pa bzang pos mdzes par byas
104a7(mdo sde): pagazugs bzang ba'i nang na 'dug pa/ dung dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga dang / kha rnga dang / pi bang dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg dang / ki mA la dang / na khul dang / sgra snyan
104a8(mdo sde): dang / gling bu snyan pa'i sgra phyung ba'i sgra dbyangs dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs dang ldan pa bslab pa la bud med kyi tshogs kyis kyang / sgra mnyen zhing 'jam pa snyan la yid du 'ong ba dang / 
104b1(mdo sde): gling bu 'thung pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' slong ngo // phyogs btsun bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byin gyis rlabs kyis sil snyan gyi sgra phyung ba'i sgra skad de dag las
104b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // bud med gang dag rab tu yid dga' sems dang bas// sil snyan yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin che// phyogs bcu'i
104b3(mdo sde): rgyal ba dam pa dag gi mthu yis ni// tshigs bcad rnam pa sna tshogs rnam mang 'di dag byung / rtag tu mgon med gyur pa'i 'gro ba 'di mthong nas// go 'phang mya ngan med mchog rdul med sangs rgyas te/ 
104b4(mdo sde): skye dang rga dang sdug bsngal dag las sgrol lo zhes// dpa' bo khyod sngo ngan smon lamang skad btab par gyur// de phyir dge myur grod dakhyer mchog 'ong nas// byung ba sngon gyi drang srong zhabs
104b5(mdo sde): bcags pa// sa phyogs de ni rab tu mnan nas su// rgyal ba'i/ ye shes mtshungs med 'tshang rgyar gyis// khyod kyis sngon chad sna tshogs rin chen nor// rkang lag 'phangs
104b6(mdo sde): pa'i lus kyang btang bar gyur// drang srong chen po de ring khyod du 'di // chos kyi chu bo mtha' yas 'gro la phye// khyod kyi tshul khrims ma nyams dri med dge/ sngon chad khyod ni rtag tu mchog gi brgyan// drang
104b7(mdo sde): srong chen po khyod khrims 'dra ba med// 'gro ba nyon mongs rnam pa mang las khrol// khyod kyis srid pa brgyar ni bzod pa spyad// khyod ni 'gro bas ngan brjod rnam mang bzod// bzod pas bzod cing dul
104b8(mdo sde): bas de'i pa'i bdag/ rkang gnyis dbang po mngon par 'byung blo gyis// khyod brtson brtan zhing mi g.yo g.yo ba med// bde bar gshegs pa sngon mthar rgya chen gyur// g.yon can bdud ni sde dang
105a1(mdo sde): // bcas brtul te// ngan song gsum po mtha' dag skams par gyis// gang phyir khyod kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad// dus ngan nyon mongs snyigs ma bsregs gyis la// khyod kyis bdud rtsi
105a2(mdo sde): chu bo'i char phob ste// mgon med ring nas sgom pa tshim par gyis// 'chi med mya ngan med gnas sangs rgyas te// skom pas nyams thag bdud rtsis tshim bya zhes// khyod kyis sngon smras tshig mchog dran byos te/ 
105a3(mdo sde): grong khyer dam pa 'di nas myur du byung // khyod ni shes rab mchog gi spyod pa mkhas// khyod kyi ye shes mtha' yas dri med che// rmongs pa'i yid gnyis lam la gnas rnams la// shes rab 'od dge dam
105a4(mdo sde): pa mdzes par gyis// khyod kyis srid pa brgyar ni byams pa smra dang // snying rje dang ni dga' mchog btang snyoms dang // khyod dkyis spyod pa dam pa gang spyad pa// spyod pa de nyid 'gro la rnam par
105a5(mdo sde): phye phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dag gi gzi brjid kyis// yon tan me tog sna tshogs tshigs bcad 'di// sil snyan dang las rnam mang yid 'ong grag/ mal na 'dug pa'i gzhon nu de la
105a6(mdo sde): skul/ gang gi tshe na dga' byed bud med rab tu dga' ba rnams// shin tu mdzes shing rab tu snyan pa'i sil snyan sgrog pa'i tshe// phyogs bcu dag gi rgyal ba lha mi 'dul ba mdzad rnams kyang // sil snyan dag
105a7(mdo sde): las gsung mchog ha cang mi che rjes su sgrogs/ 'gro la phan byed yon tan mang po ldan khyod 'gro rnams su// rnam par rgyu ba'i che na rgyal bar yon tan gnyug mar byas// sngon gyi brtul zhugs dka'
105a8(mdo sde): thub spyad pa dran gyis te// shing mchog drung du myur song 'chi ming go 'phang thob par gyis// lha mi dag ni shin tu skom zhing rgyal ba'i yon tan bral/ khyod ni shin tu stobs ldan bdud rtsi'i ro bro rtag tu
105b1(mdo sde): sbyin// stobs bcu'i ro bro ngam pa mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod byas pa// bdud rtsi de ni mi bdag khyod kyis myur du rnam par phye// rgyal ba'i yon tan 'gro la phan pa byed la dga' ba po// khyod kyis sngon gyi srid
105b2(mdo sde): por nor dang nor bu gser rnams btang // chung ma bu sdug dag dang grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa dang // rang gi mgo dang mig dang lag pa dag dang rkang pa'ang btang // mi mchog khyod ni gna' sngon rgyal po dge bar/ 
105b3(mdo sde): gyur pa'i tshe// mi zhig khyod la mngon tu phyogs nas 'di skad tshig smras te// grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa 'di kho la byin zhes byas// de yi tshe na rab tu dga' zhing 'khrugs par gyur pa med// gna'
105b4(mdo sde): sngon khyod ni rgyal po'i bram ze dag par gyur pa'i tshe// skye bo d+ha dam bsnyen bkur byed cing gzhan la 'khu mi byed// bram ze dam ngag dang skye bo mang po dge la bkod// de nas shi 'phos sring
105b5(mdo sde): pa'i 'gro ba lha yi gnas su skyes// sngon khyod rgyal po'i bum sa drang srong dam par gyur pa'i tshe// rgyal po ngan pa khros ngas khyod kyi yan lag bcang ba na/ khyod ni yid 'khrug gyur
105b6(mdo sde): pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byas te// de yi tshe na khyod kyi rkang lag dag la 'o ma zag/ khyod sngon drang srong sngo bsangs zhes byar gang che gyur pa na// ri mchog gnas na brtul zhugs dga' zhing bla ma la yang
105b7(mdo sde): dga'// mi yi bdag pos dug mda' dag gis khyod la bsnun pa na// khyod ni rgyal po de la yid 'khrugs med cing snying brtser gyur// khyod sngon ri dgas bdag po yan tan can du gyur pa'i tshe// ri
105b8(mdo sde): gzar 'bab chu chen pos mi zhig khyer bar gyur pa na// phan dang ldan pa khyod kyis mi de phyung ste thang la bzhag/ khyod kyi dgra bo khrid de 'ongs pa ni yang yid ma 'khrugs// mi mchog khyod sngon bram ze
106a1(mdo sde): bu ni gang che gyur pa ma/ khyod kyi nor bu rgya mtsho chen po yangs par ltung ba'i tshe// khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po zad par bya bar brtsams pa dang / stobs bdam bya mchog khyod kyi nor bu ma phyir/ 
106a2(mdo sde): yang rnyed// skyes bu mchog khyod gna' sngon drang srong dam par gyur pa'i tshe// bram ze zhig gis bdag gi skyabs gyur shog ces khyod gan 'ongs// smras pa bram ze dam pa kho bo dgra las phyung zhes bya// 
106a3(mdo sde): khyod kyis rang lus btang gi bram ze de ni ma btang ngo // gna' sngon shing gi gnas su drang srong sngo bsangs drung 'ongs te// 'dod pas smras pa shing 'di lo ma du yod grongs shes byas// shing 'di lo ma ji snyed/ 
106a4(mdo sde): yod pa rab grangs rab mkhas pas// khyod kyis de bzhin nor pa med cing 'thun par tshig tu brjod// khyod sngon ne tse yon tan ldan gyur shing la gnas pa'i tshe// zad par gyur kyang sngon gyi
106a5(mdo sde): drin la bsams te de ma spangs// lha yi bdag po khyod kyi yo/ na tan dran nas rab tu dga'// snga ma kho bzhin du shing ma/ cho ga de ni dpal dang ldan par byas// khyod kyi brtul zhugs
106a6(mdo sde): dka' thub spyad pa de dag mtshungs med de// yon tan ldan pa yon tan lam la spyad pas yon tan mang // khyod kyi dus la dbab grong khyor bcas pa'i sa yang thob// 'gro ba dag ni rgyal ba'i yon tan
106a7(mdo sde): spyod pa myur du khod// gang gi tshe na bud med rin chen bzang po'i gos kyis lus brgyan te// sil snyan dam pa mchog rab yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ni rab sgrog pa// de tshe phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i gzi yis
106a8(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs pa// sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'di dag sgra las rab tu byung // rga dang shi bas zin pa'i 'jig rten dag la bdag ni skyabs gyur ces// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyis bskal
106b1(mdo sde): mang snga rol smon lam de skad btab// mi yi seng ge khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam dag ni dran gyis shig/ rkang gnyis dbang po khyod da mngon par 'byung ba'i dus ni 'di yin no// khyod 'dir srid par khrag khrig dag tu
106b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa mang po du ma byin// nor dang rin po che dang gser dang gos bzangs rin chen spras pa dang // rkang lag dag dang mig dang phangs pa'i bu dang rgyal srid 'byor pa dag/ khyod kyis btang yang khyod ni
106b3(mdo sde): slong ba rnams la tha ba zhe sdang med// khyod 'dir zla ba'i tog dang mche ba bzang dang rgyal po zhi bar gyur// snying brtse snying rje'i yid dang zla ba'i sgron dang gtsug na nor bur gyur// rgyal po dpa' bo brtan dang
106b4(mdo sde): mig bzangs dang ni de la sogs pa byas// rgyal po khrag khri dag mang po sbyin dga' rnam par 'phrul pa de nyid khyod// bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyis bskal pa mang por tshul khrims
106b5(mdo sde): spyad pa spyad// nor bu rin chen dri ma med pa lta bur tshul khrims rna ma dag gyu khyod kyis 'bri yi rnga ma ci 'drar tshul khrims pa srungs shing spyad// tshul khrims dga' bas khyod kyis 'dir
106b6(mdo sde): ni 'gro la rgya chen don yang byas// 'dir khyod glang po mchog tu gyur te rngon pa dgra yis mangs bsnun tshe// gtum po dgra la snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas de ni khyod kyis bskyabs// bzang zhing mdzes pa'i
106b7(mdo sde): mche ba yongs su btang ste tshul khrims yongs ma btang // khyod kyis de la sogs pa tshul khrims rnam par 'phrul pa mang po byas// bzod la dga' bas khyod kyis 'gro ba'i mi phan sdug bsngal stong mang
106b8(mdo sde): dang / tshig rtsub dag dang bsad pa dang ni bcing ba mang po bzod pa byas// khyod kyis gna' sngon mi gang dag la bde ba kun gyis rim gror byas// de dag phyi nas khyod kyi gshed mar gyur kyang khyod kyis
107a1(mdo sde): de dag bzod// mgon po khyod ni ri mchog gnas ni gang che dred mor gyur pa'i tshe// kha ba bab cing chu drug pa ni 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mi bzung ste// rtsab 'bras bu rnam par mang dang bde ba
107a2(mdo sde): kun gyis rim gro byas// de yis myur du khyod la gsod pa khrid 'ongs khyod kyis de la bzod// byang chub btsal phyir brtul zhugs dka' thub yon tan rnams mang ye shes la// khyod kyis brtson 'grus
107a3(mdo sde): shin tu brtan par gnas shing mi g.yo g.yo ba med// dbang sgyur bdud kyang khyod kyi brtson 'grus stobs kyis stobs ni med par byas// mi yi seng ge khyod 'dir mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la dbab po// 
107a4(mdo sde): khyod 'dir gna' sngon kha ba'i kha dog 'dra ba'i rta mchog gyur pa'i che// snying rje bskyed nas na mkha' las ni srin po'i gling du myur du song // de tshe 'phongs shing 'dug pa'i mi de blangs te bde la
107a5(mdo sde): rab tu bzhag/ khyod kyis 'di la sogs pa brtson 'grus rnam/ par 'phrul pa mang po byas// myur du 'gyur zhing g.yo la/ yul la dga' zhing rgod pa'i sems btul te// bsam gtan
107a6(mdo sde): par gyur dul des zhi gnas rnams kyis nyon mongs gtso bo bcom// khyod 'dir bsam gtan dga' bas rang gi yon tan dag gis 'gro don byas// da 'dir sems cad mchog khyod bsam gtan rnam
107a7(mdo sde): 'phrul bya ba'i dus la bag/ gna' sngon khyod ni drang srong bsam gtan dga' zhing rab tu gnas par gyur// rgyal po med pa'i mi dag gis ni khyod khrid rgyal sringad dbang yang bskur// khyod kyis skye bo dag ni
107a8(mdo sde): dge ba bcu dang tshangs pa'i lam la bkod// de yi chen mi las shi 'phos thams cad tshangs pa'i gnas su dong // phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba rnams mang shes pa'i cho ga khyod rab mkhas// 
107b1(mdo sde): gzhan gyi spyod dang 'gro ba'i skad shes pa dang dbang po shes pa dang // tshul dang dul dang blo gros rnam mang rgyu ba'i pha rol khyod phyin gyur// rgyal po'i sras khyod 'dir ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la dbab po// khyod
107b2(mdo sde): kyis gna' sngon skye bo lta ba log par zhugs par gyur pa dag/ rga shi sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos nyams thag 'khod pa 'di mthong nas// srid pa rnam par gzhig pa'i drang lam nyid kyis khong du chud byas te/ 
107b3(mdo sde): mun pa bcom pa khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la don chen rab tu byas// tshogs bcad rnam pa mang po mdzes pa yon tan ldan pa sna tshogs 'dis// sil snyan sgra bsgrags de las rgyal ba'i gzi yis dpa' bo
107b4(mdo sde): bskul bar gyur// blo mchog ldan pa khyod 'dir mngon par 'byung dpa'i dus ni dbab kyis// sdug bsngal gang ba'i skye bo 'di dag mthong nas btang snyoms ma byed cig/ bud med gos dang rin po che
107b5(mdo sde): dang do shal spos phreng sna tshogs kyis// brgyan pa dag kyang sem/ sa dang phangs pa skyes nas rab tu dga' ba rnams// semasacan mchog la sil snyan rab tu sgrog cing slong bar byed pa na/ 
107b6(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i mthu yis sil snyan dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di'ang byung // gang gi don tu khyod kyis 'gro la phan phyir bskal pa du mar ni// btang bar dka' ba btang zhing tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus shin
107b7(mdo sde): tu spyad// bsam gtan shes rab shin tu bsgoms pa khyod kyi dus la dbab kyis// 'dren pa mngon par 'byung ba'i blo la myur sems phyi shol ma byed cig/ sngon chad rin chen mdzod dang gser dang pa lha dang
107b8(mdo sde): rgyan rnams rab tu btang / skye ba de dang de dag tu ni mchod sbyin rnam pa mang po byas/ khyod kyis chung ma bu pho bu mo lus dang rgyal sring srog btang ste// byang chub don tu btang bar dka' ba dpag tu med pa khyod kyis
108a1(mdo sde): btang / khyod ni rgyal po mi dman bsod nams dpal gyis rnam par grags par gyur// mu khyud 'dzin dang mu khyung nag po tshangs pas byin dang ral pa can// mchod sbyiran stong ldan dang ni chos sems
108a2(mdo sde): 'od 'phro can dang nor brtan dang // shin tu don bsams gyur te sems can dman la gtang bar dka' ba btang // zla ba'i bu dang brtson 'grus 'bar dang bsod nams 'od zer can du gyur// gtong ba tshe dang ldan zhing
108a3(mdo sde): mthu ldan khyod ni byas pa gzo bar gyur// rgyal po drang srong zla ba gzugs ldan dpa' bo bden pa 'phel ba dang // rgyal po legs par smra ba tshol dang blo gros bzang dang nges par gyur// zla ba'i 'od dang khyad par 'gro
108a4(mdo sde): dang rdul dang phyogs kyi bdag por gyur// rab sbyin dpa' bo ka shi rgyal dpo rin chen gtsug pud zhi ba ston// mi dbang de dag rnams da dang gzhan du gyur te gtang bar dka' ba dang // khyod kyis ji
108a5(mdo sde): ltar gtong ba'i char phab de bzhin chos kyi char pa phog/ khyod kyis sngon chad sems can snying po gang ga'i bye ma snyed cig mtho/ nga // sems can thar par bya phyir byang chub dam pa'i mchog
108a6(mdo sde): ni tshol ba na// khyod kyis mchod pa dpag med bsam mi khyab pas sangs rgyas de dag mchod// dpa' bo grong khyer dam pa 'di nas 'byung ba'i dus la dbab bo// thog mar khyod kyis don yod mthong las
108a7(mdo sde): la'i me tog gis ni mchod// rnam par snang mdzad la ni dang ba'i sems kyis skad cig bar du bltas// rnga dbyangs ldan pa la ni khyod kyis a ru ra yi 'bru gcig phul// tsan dan mthong nas khyod kyi rtsa yi mi
108a8(mdo sde): sgron blangs te khyim du bzung // rdul po grong khyer 'jug pa mthong nas phye ma spar gang rab tu gtor// chos kyi dbang phyug chos 'chad pa na legs shes bya ba rab tu byin// kun tu gzigs pa mthong nas
108b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshigs brjod// 'od 'phro chen po'i phung po la ni khyod kyis dga' bas gser phreng gtor// 'od zer rgyal mtshan la ni kha tshar phul zhing gsal la bal sran gtor// ye shes tog
108b2(mdo sde): la mya ngan med pa'i me tog kha lo sgyur la 'jams// rin chen gtsug tor can la mar me pad+ma ldan la sman yang phug thams cad zil gnon mu tig do shal rgyal tsho lo d+da rbaka/ pad+ma'i snying po la ni bla re seng ge la ni
108b3(mdo sde): char gding phul// sa la'i dbang po rgyal la mar phul me tog rgyas la 'o ma phul// grags sbyin kun ta'i me tog phul te bden pa gzigs la zhal zas phul// ye shes lhun la lus btud klus byin la ni na
108b4(mdo sde): bza' dbul ba byas// rab mthor gshegs dang tsan dan mchog dang 'od ldan la ni tsha spar re// bkod pa che la pad+ma dbul byas da'od gzer rgyal la rin chen phul// shAkya thub la spar gang
108b5(mdo sde): gser phul dbang po'i tog la bstod pa byas// nyi ma'i zhal la me/ tog rna rgyan blo gros bzang la gser cod pan// klu zil ba zhon pa nor bu phul te rgyal la ras bcos gding ba phul// sman
108b6(mdo sde): gyi rgyal la rin chen gdugs phul seng+ge'i tog la khri gtan phul// yon tan mchog ldan rin chen dra ba 'od srung la ni glu dbyangs kun// spos mchog me tog phul zhing 'od 'phro'i tog la rtag tu me tog phul/ 
108b7(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs rgyal la khang brtsegs phul zhing 'jig rten mchod la phreng ba phul// rgyal spos gtsug lag rgyal srid dbul byas rgyal bar dga' la spos kun phul// sgron ma che la bdag phul pad+ma'i mchog la
108b8(mdo sde): rgyan rnams dbul ba byas// rmo bya sa sa oM sna tshogs sgron ma mdzad la ud pa la// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad gzhan dang gzhan dag byed pa na// khyod kyi sems can snying po de dag rnams dang
109a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang sngon chad chod// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang ston pa de dag khyod mchod dran par gyis// sems can mgon med mya ngan gang ba yal bar mdor mngon par byung // mar me
109a2(mdo sde): mdzad pa mthong ba tsam gyis khyod kyis bzod pa mchog thob ste// rjes su 'thun pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po nyams pa med pa thob// de nas rab tu dga' bas bskal pa grangs med 'jig rten khams kun tu// sangs
109a3(mdo sde): rgyas dag ni re re la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab byas// bskal pa dpag med de dag zad gyur sangs rgyas de dag mya ngan 'das// khyod kyi lus rnams thams cad dang ni de dag ming yang gang du song / 
109a4(mdo sde): dngos po thams cad tha mar 'dzad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa med// 'dod pa rgyal srong longs spyod rtag pa min gyis grong khyer mchog nas byung // bskal pa zad par 'gyur tshe gzi brjid
109a5(mdo sde): drag po 'jigs pa'i me 'od ltar// rga dang na dang 'chi ba mi bzad / 'jigs pa chen po 'ong bar 'gyur// dngos po thams cad tha mar 'dzad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa med// shin tu
109a6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal sems can ltos la yon tan ldan pa mngon par byung // rgyal po bde ba'i mal na nyal gyur cing // gang tshe mo tshogs gling bu rgyud gcig dang // sil snyan sna tshogs sgra yis slong byed pa// de tshe
109a7(mdo sde): sil snyan sgra las 'di dag byung // srid gsum rga dang nad kyi sdug bsngal 'bar// 'chi med rab 'bar 'di ni mgon med pa// srid las 'byung la 'gro ba rtag tu rmongs// bum par chud pa'i bung ba 'khor ba
109a8(mdo sde): bzhin// srid gsum mi brtan ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra// 'gro ba'i skye 'chi gar la lta dang mtshungs// 'gro ba'i tshe 'gro na mkha'i glog 'dra ste// ri bzang 'bab chu lta bur myur 'gyogs 'gro/ srid sred ma
109b1(mdo sde): rig dbang gis skye bo rnams// mi dang lha gnas ngan song lam gsum po// 'gro ba lnga po dag tu mi mkhas 'khor// dper na rdza mkhan phang lo bskor ba bzhin// rtag tu gzugs sdug mchog dang sgra snyan dang // 
109b2(mdo sde): dri zhim ro mchog reg pa bde byed pa// dus ngan snyil 'gro ba 'di dag thogs// dper na rngon pa'i snyi la spre'u thog pa bzhin// 'dod pa'i yon tan mya ngan gnod pa mang // 'jigs bcas rtag tu dgra byed nyon
109b3(mdo sde): mongs bcas// ral gri so 'dra drug sdong los tshungs// ngan sogs snod ltar 'phags pa'i skye bos spangs// 'dod pa'i yon tan 'jigs bcas nyon mongs bcas// rtag tu rjed par byed pa mun pa
109b4(mdo sde): 'dra// rtag tu 'jigs pa'i rgyu byed sdug bsngal rtsa// srid pa 'i sred pa'i khri shing 'phel bar byed// ji ltar me 'bara'obs ni 'jigs bcas pa// de ltar 'dod 'di 'phags pa'i skye
109b5(mdo sde): bos rig/ 'dam rdzab che 'dra ral gri gshegs gnas 'dra// ral gri so la sbrang rtsis bskus dang mtshungs// ji lta ra sbrul gyi mgo dang ngan skyugs snron// de ltar 'dod 'di mkhas pa
109b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis rig/ bya sha kham bu 'dra zhing gsal shing 'dra// ro la khyi ltar dgra dang bcas pa yin// 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di dag chu zla 'dra// gzugs brnyan mtshungs shing brag cha 'dra ba dang // 
109b7(mdo sde): mig yor 'dra zhing gar la lta 'dra dang // rmi lam mnyam par 'phags pa'i skye bos rig/ 'dod pa'i yon tan skad cig ya ma brla// sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra zhing brdzun pa can// chu bur dbu ba lta bur
109b8(mdo sde): yang dag min// yongs su btags las byung bar mkhas pas rtogs// na chod thog mar gzugs mchog 'dzin pa'i tshe// 'phags shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod// rgan sdug
110a1(mdo sde): bsngal gzi brjid lus bcom nas// rnam par spyod stor dgas klung rnam pazhin// nor 'byungam pa'i rnas mang spobs ldan che// rangs shing sdug 'dod 'dzin byis pa'i spyod
110a2(mdo sde): nyams sdug bsngal bar ni gyur pa'i tshe// rnam par spong ste mi yis 'brog stong bzhin// ji ltar me tog shing dang 'bras bcas shing // de ltar sbyin 'dod mi la dga' bar byed// nor nyams rgabs nyen gyi
110a3(mdo sde): spong ba na// de tshe dga' bar mo 'gyur bya rgod bzhin// rdzas ldan gzugs mchog ldan che dpon po bzhin// phrang na sdug cing dbang po dga' bar byed// rgan sdug bsngal nyen cing nor zad na// de che 'dod par mi/ 
110a4(mdo sde): 'gyur 'chi bdag bzhin rga bas rga byas na chod yal gyur na// sdong po gnam lcags kyis ni bcom pa bzhin// rgabs 'kho/ dgas na 'jigs bcas khang rul 'dra// rga las byung ba thub pa
110a5(mdo sde): myur du spros// bud med skyes pa'i tshogs rnams rga bas skems/ ma lu'i 'khri shing sa la'i nags sdug bzhin// rgabs pa rtson 'grus rtsal dang shugs 'phrog ste// dper na skyes bu
110a6(mdo sde): 'dam du bying ba bzhin// rga bas gzugs sdug gzugs ni mi sdug byed// rga bas gzi brjid 'phrog cing mthu stobs 'phrog/ rga bas bde ba 'phrog cing brnyas par byed// rga bas 'chi byed rga bas mdangs
110a7(mdo sde): kyang 'phrog/ nad brgya mang dang nad thibs sdug bsngal gyis// 'gro ba gtses te mi yis ri dgas bzhin// rga dang na bas bcom pa'i 'gro ltos la// sdug bsngal las ni 'byung ba myur shod cig/ dper
110a8(mdo sde): na dgun smad rlung dang kha ba che// rtswa shing gel ba nags sman mdangs kyang 'phrog/ de ltar nad 'di 'gro ba'i mdangs 'phrog cing // dbang po gzugs dang stobs ni nyams par byed// nor 'bru nor ches
110b1(mdo sde): thamar zang par byed// nad ni rtag tu 'gro ba brnyas par byed// gnod pa byed cing sdug la sdang bar byed// yongs su gdung byed mkha' las nyi ma bzhin// 'chi dang 'pho dang 'chi 'pho dus byed pa// pangs shing sdug
110b2(mdo sde): pa'i skye bo rtag tu 'bral// phyir mi 'ong zhing 'phrad par 'gyur ma yin// shing las lo 'bru 'dra zhing klu yi rgyan dang mtshungs// 'chi ba dbang yod pa dag dbang med byed// 'chi ba 'phrog byed chu bos shing de bzhin
110b3(mdo sde): mi ni gnyis min grogs med gcig pu 'gro// rang las 'bras bu ldan pas dbang yang med// 'chi bas srog chags brgya phrag mang 'dzin te// 'byung po'i tshogs la rgya mtsho'i chu srin bzhin// klu la mapar ldo
110b4(mdo sde): glang chen seng ge 'dra// rnga ci 'byung ngo'i tshogs la me dang mtshungs / skyon brgya mang po 'di 'dra 'di dag las// 'gro ba dgrol zhe das khyod kyis smon lam btag/ sngon gyi smon lam spyod pa de dran
110b5(mdo sde): byos/ khyod ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bag// gang tshe bungaming tshogs ni rab dga' zhing sil snyan dag gis thub chen slong byed pa// de tshe bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis mthus/ 
110b6(mdo sde): tshogs bcang sna tshogs sil snyan sgra las byung // 'dus byas thams cad myur du 'jig pa ste// mkha' la glog rgyun ring du mi gnas bzhin// khyod kyi dus 'di nye bar gnas gyur gyis// brtul zhugs bzag
110b7(mdo sde): po mngon 'byung dus la bab// 'du byed mi rtag brtan pa ma yin te// rdza se ma btang lta bur 'jig pa'i bdag/ gzhan gyi rdzas ni brnyan po byas dang mtshungs// bye ma'i grong khyer lta bur ring mi thogs// 'du
110b8(mdo sde): byed 'di dag 'jig pa'i chos can te// dbyar gyi zhal la ji ltar 'gogs pa bzhin// chu ngogs bye ma yod pa 'dra ba ste// rkyen la rag las rang bzhin nyam chung ba// 'du byed mar me'i 'od 'phro 'dra ba ste/ 
111a1(mdo sde): myur du 'byung zhing 'gag pa'i chos can yin// rlung dang mchung bar ring du mi gnas la// dbu ba lta bur nyam chung snying po med// 'du byed g.yo ba med cing stong pa ste// brtags na chu shing
111a2(mdo sde): dag gi phung po 'dra// sgyu ma lta bu sems ni rmongs par byed// lag bcangs stongs pas byis pa 'bring dang mtshungs// 'dus byas gyur pa thams cad rgyu dag dang // rkyen rnams kyis ni rab tu 'byung ba ste/ 
111a3(mdo sde): gcig gis gcig rgyu byas te brten nas byung // byis pa'i skye bos 'di 'dra de ma rtogs// dper na gres ma mun dza brten byas la// rtsol ba'i stobs kyis thag par sbyar ba dang // zo chun rgyud mo 'khor lor
111a4(mdo sde): bcas pa yang // de dag re res 'grub par 'gyur ba med// de ltar srid pa'i yan lag kun grub pa// gzhan dang gzhan tshogs pra la brten nas ni// de dag so so re rer 'grub par 'gyur// sngon
111a5(mdo sde): gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs// sa bon yod na myu gu ji/ bzhin te// sa bon gang yin myu gu de nyid min// de las/ gzhan min de yang ma yin te// de ltar rtag min chad min chos
111a6(mdo sde): nyid do// ma rig pa'i 'du byed rkyen yin te// 'du byed de yang yang dag nyid du med// ma rig pa dang 'du byed de dag kyang // rang bzhin stong ste g.yo ba med pa yin// rgya las rgya yi 'bur ni snang mod kyi// 
111a7(mdo sde): rgyu de 'phos par dmigs pa'ang yod ma yin// de las de med gzhan las ma yin te// de ltar 'dus byas rtag med chad pa med// mig dang gzugs la brten pa byas nas su// mig gi rnam par shes pa
111a8(mdo sde): 'dir 'byung yang // mig ni gzugs la rten pa ma yin la// gzugs kyang mig la 'pho ba yod ma yin// 'di dag bdag med mi sdug chos can yang // de dag bdag dang sdug par btags pa ste/ 
111b1(mdo sde): nor ba yang dag ma yin btags yin yang // de las mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung // rnam par shes pa 'gags nas 'byung 'gyur te// mkhas pas skye dang 'jig pa rnam par mthong // gang du ma song gang
111b2(mdo sde): nas 'ongs pa min// rnal 'byor pas ni stong pa sgyu ltar mthong // dper na gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan dang // lag pas rtsal ba byas pa gsum tshogs pa// de la brten nas me ni 'byung 'gyur te// byung nas/ 
111b3(mdo sde): ring por mi thogs 'gag par 'gyur// de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te// 'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu brtags byas na// de yi 'ong ba 'am 'gro/ 
111b4(mdo sde): ba mi dmigs so// phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams kyi// rkyen ni ma rig pa dang sred dang las// de dag tshogs pa sem ngas can zhes brjod kyang // de ni dam pa'i don tu dmigasu med// 
111b5(mdo sde): mchu dang lkog ma rkan la brten nas ni// lce bsgyur ba las yi ge'i/ sgra 'byung yang // rkog mar brten nas ma yin rkan las/ min// re re la ni yi ge dmigs su med// tshogs pa de la
111b6(mdo sde): brten nas ngag de ni// yid kyi blo yi dbang gis 'byung mod kyi// yid dang ngag ni mi snang gzugs med de// nang dang phyi rol na yang dmigs su med// mkhas pas ngag skad sgra dang dbyangs rnams kyi// skye
111b7(mdo sde): dang 'jig la rnam par brtags byas na// de tshe ngag kun brag cha lta bu dang // skad cig pa dang snying po med par mthong // dper na shing dang rgyud la brten byas la// lag pas rtsol ba byas pa gsum tshogs na/ 
111b8(mdo sde): sgra snyan pi bang gling bu la sogs pa// de dag las ni sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te// 'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
112a1(mdo sde): kun tu brtags byas na// sgra yi 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba mi dmigs so// de ltar rgyu ga dang ni rkyen rnams las// 'du byed gyur pa thams cad byung ba ste// yang dag mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pa
112a2(mdo sde): yis ni// 'du byed stong pa g.yo ba med par mthong // phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams ni// nang yang stong la phyi rol stong pa ste// thams cad bdag gis dben zhing gnas med la// chos kyi
112a3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid// chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra 'di dag ni// mar me mdzad pa mthong nas khyed kyis rtogs// ji ltar nyid kyis rjes su rtogs pa ltar// de bzhin lha mir bcas pa rtogs par
112a4(mdo sde): gyis// gnod pa yang dag ma yin brtags pa yi// 'dod chags ne sdang dag gis 'gro ba gdungs// snying rje'i sgra na las zhi ba bsil ba'i chu// 'dren pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab
112a5(mdo sde): tu phog/ byang chub dam pa yang dag thob nas ni// 'phags ba'i nor gyis srog chags bsdu'o zhes// mkhas pa khyod kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir// bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa
112a6(mdo sde): byin/ sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// 'phags pa'i nor gyis dman dbul sdug bsngal la// sems can kha lo sgyur ba ma g.yel bar// 'phags pa'i nor gyis de dag bsdu bar gyis// 
112a7(mdo sde): ngan song sa yi lam ni bcad pa dang // mtho ris bdud rtsi'i sgo mo'i mchog de ni// sems can bye ba mang la bstan zhes te// khyod kyi rtag tu tshul khrims shin tu bsrungs// tshul khrims ldan pa'i
112a8(mdo sde): bsam pa 'grub 'gyur gyis// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// ngan song gsum po'i sa yi sgo chod de// mtho ris bdud rtsi'i son dbye ba gyis// srog chags rnams kyi khong khro khro gzhi la
112b1(mdo sde): dang / srid pa'i mcholas sems can bsgra byas te// ni bde mas nad med la dgod da shes// khyod kyis rtag tu bzod pa shin tu bsgoms// rgyun gyi spyong de rjes su sbyis te// ngagra dang gnod sems 'a/ 
112b2(mdo sde): bas dkrugs pa yi// 'tshe ba spyod pa yal bar ma dor bar// 'gro ba 'di dag bzod pa'i sa la 'khod// chos kyi gru ni legs par sbyar byas la// srid po'i mtsho las 'gro ba rnams bsgral te// ni
112b3(mdo sde): bde rims nad med la dgod do zhes// gang gi don tu khyod kyis brtson 'grus brten// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// 'gro ba chu bo bzhi yis khyer gyur pa// sems can mgon med pa dag
112b4(mdo sde): brtson stobs dang // brtul ba'i shugs kyis myur du 'di da dag thon// dbang po 'khrul dang phal pa'i dbang po dang / spre'u 'dra'i sems las zhi gnas ngas dgod ces// 'dren pa
112b5(mdo sde): khyod kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir// nyon mongs gzhil ba'i bsam gtan bsgoms gyur pa// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// nyon mongs dra bas dkrugs par gyur pa yi// 
112b6(mdo sde): 'gro la ma g.yel nyon mongs gtses pa las// bsam gtan mchog la skye dgu 'di dag khong// gti mug ma rig mun pa bsgribs pa yi// 'gro ba chos brgya mang po mthong byed pa// yang dag mthong
112b7(mdo sde): ba'i mig ni sbyin no zhes// khyod kyis sngon chad shes rab shin tu bsgoms// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// gti mug ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa yi// 'gro la shes rab dam pa 'od
112b8(mdo sde): bzang ba// chos mig dri med nyon mongs med pa byin// bud med rnams kyi sil snyan glu dbyangs la// tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'dra 'ang byung ste// de thos nas ni rgyags pa rnams spangs nas/ 
113a1(mdo sde): byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems btang ngo // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i che// chos mnyan pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// chos yod
113a2(mdo sde): la byed pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas chos dang chos smra ba rnams la gus pa dang bcas par gyur cing / bsam pa thag pa
113a3(mdo sde): nas chos don tu gnyer ba/ chos 'dod pa/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par gyur pa/ chos tshol bas ngoms mi shes pa ji ltar thos pa'i chos yang dag par ston pa/ bla na med pa'i chos
113a4(mdo sde): chen po'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa/ zang zing med par chos ston pa// chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna med pa// slob dpon gyi dpe/ mkhyud dang bral ba// chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos sgrub
113a5(mdo sde): pa/ chos la nan tan byed pa la dpa' ba/ chos la gnas su 'a dzin pa/ chos la skyabs su 'dzin pa/ chos la dbu nga gnyen du 'dzin pa/ chos la rton pa/ chos la nges par
113a6(mdo sde): sems pa'i bzod pas nges par byung ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa ste// thabs la mkhas pas rtogs par khong du chud pa yin no// dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs
113a7(mdo sde): mkhas pa chen pos rnam par rtse zhing btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin tu spyod lam ni bstan// sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las yang dag par
113a8(mdo sde): 'das pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dang 'thun par bya ba'i chos nyid dang 'thun par ni byas// yun ring po nas 'dod pa'i skyon shin tu rtogs pa yin yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang gis
113b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i longs spyod ni kun tu bstan// dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs kyi tshogs kyi khyad par gyis 'jig rten gyi dbang du bya ba ma tshungs pa med pa ni kun tu bsam/ 
113b2(mdo sde): lha'i dang mi'i las shin tu 'das pa snying po dang ldan zhing rgya che la/ rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg mchog tu dga' ba nyams dga' ba'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba bde ba ni bstan/ 
113b3(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i yul thams cad la 'dzin pa med par rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba ni bstan// sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis grogs su gyur pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems can rnams
113b4(mdo sde): ni mtshungs par gnas pas yongs su smin par byas nas 'jig rten gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad kyis ni sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa med par btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas
113b5(mdo sde): te/ ji ltar 'gron du gnyer ba'i sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus la lta zhing // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rgya cher sngon gyi dam bcas pa rjes su dran no// 
113b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang chos kyang mngon du byed do// smon lam gyi stobs kyang mngon par bsgrub bo// sems can rnams la yang snying rje chen po gtong ngo // sems can rab tu thar par bya bar yang sems
113b7(mdo sde): so// 'byor pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgud pa yin par yang so sor rtog go// 'khor ba la gnod pa dang 'jigs pa mang po du ma yod par yang rtog go// bdud dang nyes pa'i zhags pa yang yang dag par gcod do// / 
113b8(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i rgyud las kyang bdag nyid 'da' bar byed do// mya ngan las 'das pa la yang sems yang dag par gtong ngo // 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
114a1(mdo sde): mdo kham po dgu pa/ dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mtha' nyid nas kyang 'khor ba'i skyon shin tu rig pa yin/ 'dus byas la bsam pa zag pa nas don du mi gnye
114a2(mdo sde): ba yin/ nye bar len pa yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad don du mi gnyer ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos don du gnyer ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin/ 'khor ba la rgyab kyis
114a3(mdo sde): bltas pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la mngon du dga' ba yin/ bdud kyi spyod yul dang ma 'dres pa yin/ srid pa la 'bar bar skyon du mthong ba yin/ khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i
114a4(mdo sde): bsam pa can yin/ 'khor ba'i skyon dang nyes dmigs dang 'a dbyung ba la mkhas pa yin/ rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa yin/ mdo ngan par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can yin/ dben pa la gzhol ba
114a5(mdo sde): yin/ dben pa la bab pa yin no// dgon pa dang bas ma tha' la mngon par dga' ba yin/ rab tu dben pa bsten pa rab tu zhi bar 'dod pa yin/ bdag dang gzhan la phan par
114a6(mdo sde): zhugs pa yin/ bla na med pa'i nan tan la dpa' ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi don tu 'dod pa yin/ phan par 'dod pa yin/ bde bar 'dod pa yin/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa yin/ 'jig rten la
114a7(mdo sde): snying brtse ba can yin/ phan par 'dod pa can yin/ byams pa la gnas pa can yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/ bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa yin// rtag tu yid yongs su mi g.yo ba yin// 
114a8(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sdug pa sems pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/ dngos po thams cad la
114b1(mdo sde): mi lta bar yongs su btang ba yin/ sbyin pa 'god pa la dga' ba yin/ lhug par gtong ba yin/ lag brkyang ba yin/ gtong ba la dpa' ba yin/ mchod sbyin byas pa yin/ bsod nams shin tu phun
114b2(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa yin/ bsod nams kyi yo byad shin tu bzung ba yin/ dri ma dang ser sna dang bral ba yin/ sems kun tu ma bzung ba yin/ bla na med pa'i sbyin bdag chen po yin/ byin nas kyang rnam par
114b3(mdo sde): smin pa la mi re ba yin/ sbyin pa la dpa' ba yin/ 'dod pa dang 'dod pa che ba dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / gti mug dang / ser sna la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i
114b4(mdo sde): dgra'i tshogs phyir rgol ba thams cad tshar gcad pa'i phyir/ mngon par byung ba yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems pa skyed pa'i rgyun las mi g.yo ba yin/ gtong ba chen po'i
114b5(mdo sde): sems kyi go cha shin tu bgos pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying / brtse ba can yin/ phan pa 'dod pa can yin/ ya lang ba gos pa yin/ go cha bgos pa yin/ sems can rab tu
114b6(mdo sde): thar par bya ba la dmigs pa yin/ snying rje chen po'i stobs dang rnam par gnon pa dang pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa yin/ phyir mi ldog pa yin/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yin/ gtong ba'i
114b7(mdo sde): lag cha can yin/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang re ba ji lta bzhin du tshim par byed pa yin/ byang chub kyi snod du gyur pa yin/ dus dang phyed par chos rtogs pa yin// smon lam byang chub tu yongs su
114b8(mdo sde): bsngos pa yin/ rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal ba yin/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon cha sra ba dang ldan pa yin/ nyon
115a1(mdo sde): mongs pa'i phyir rgol ba shin tu tshar gcod pa yin/ tshul khrims dang yon tan dang spyod pa la zhugs pa yin/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' legs par bsrungs pa yin/ kha na ma
115a2(mdo sde): tho ba phra rab tsam la yang 'jigs par lta ba yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin/ dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral la dri ma spangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ ngan du smras pa dang / ngan tu brjod pa'i
115a3(mdo sde): tshig gi lam dang / rgyad pa dang / spyo ba dang / smad pa dang / bshung ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / gzung ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis sems ma rnyog
115a4(mdo sde): pa yin/ sems ma 'khrugs pa yin/ bzod pa dang nges pa phun sum tshogs pa yin gnod par mi sems pa yin/ dganod pa mi byed pa yin/ gnod sems med pa'i sems
115a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa yin/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus 'bar ba brtsams pa yin/ yi dam la brtan/ pa yin/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub
115a6(mdo sde): pal phyir mi ldog pa yin/ dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ shes bzhin can yin/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yin/ sems ma g.yengs pa yin/ bsam gtan la rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa yin/ 
115a7(mdo sde): chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ snang ba thob pa yin/ mun pa mun nag dang bral ba yin/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam par sems
115a8(mdo sde): yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / byang chub
115b1(mdo sde): kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis shin tu dkar bar byas pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par
115b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba lta ba yin/ bden pa rjes su rtogs pas gzhan gyi dring mi 'jig pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis rnam par rtse ba yin/ chos thams cad kyi tshul sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / 
115b3(mdo sde): brag cha dang / mig yor lta bur rtogs pa yin no// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' de ni de ltar rang bzhin gyis chos la gnas pa yin/ de ltar ye shes la gnas pa yin/ de ltar yon tan gyi
115b4(mdo sde): che ba nyid la gnas pa yin/ de ltar sems can gyi don la ba rtson par gnas pa yin te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas sil snyan
115b5(mdo sde): dang / glu dbyangs las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dgagis rgya cher bskul ba dang / de'i tshe sngon gyi don gyi byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha mar bar gyur pa rnams kyi btsun
115b6(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor yongs su smin par bya ba'i chos kyi sgo bzhi mngon du byed do// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don bya ba dang / don 'thun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la
115b7(mdo sde): sbyor ba/ bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i bsam pa chud mi za ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i
115b8(mdo sde): sems smon lam gyi stobs bskyod pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa snying rje chen po'i
116a1(mdo sde): stobs la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / don la rnam par nges pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs
116a2(mdo sde): kyi stobs kyi khyad par yang dag par bsgrub pa bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon tu byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpas chos kyi sgo bzhi po de dag mngon tu byas nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor thams
116a3(mdo sde): cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe rnam pa ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus sil snyan dang glu dbyangs de dag las chos kyi sgo
116a4(mdo sde): rnam pa 'di lta bu brgya stong 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon pa ru 'du byed mngon par byed do// mos pa rgya chen dang ni bas dam pa dang // lhag pa'i bsam dang srog chags snying rje
116a5(mdo sde): bas byang chub dam pa'i mchog tu sems skye zhes// de 'dra'i sgra dag sil snyan rnams las byung // dang zhing dang / dang mos dang gus pa dang // nga rgyal med cing bla la 'dud
116a6(mdo sde): pa dang // dri dang dge ba ci zhes tshol ba dang // rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i sa byung ngo // sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang tshul khrims sgra// bzod pa'i sgra dang de bzhin brtson 'grus sgra// bsam
116a7(mdo sde): gtan mngon par bsgrub dang ting 'dzin sgra// shes rab dang ni thabs kyi sgra yang byung // byams pa'i sgra dang de bzhin snying rje'i sgra// dga' dang btang snyoms mngon par shes pa'i sgra// bsdu ba'i
116a8(mdo sde): dngos po bzhi po rnam nges pas// sems can yongs su smin bya'i sgra yang byung // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rab phye sgra// yang dag spong dang de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang // dbang po lnga dang stobs
116b1(mdo sde): rabang dbye dang // byang chub yan lag sman sil skar byung / yan lag brgyad pa'i 'phags lam mchog dbye dang // zhi gnas sgra dang de bzhin lhag mthong sbra// mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal bdag med smra/ 
116b2(mdo sde): mi sdug sgra yang sol snyan rnams las byung // 'dod chags bral sgra de bzhin dben pa'i sgra// zad pa shes pa'i sgra dang mi skye ste// 'gog pa'i sgra dang de bzhin gnas med sgra// mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra
116b3(mdo sde): yung sal snyan byung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni// sil snyan dag las 'di 'dra'i sgra byung ste// sgra de thos nas bud med thams cad kyis// sems can mchog rab rjes
116b4(mdo sde): bslabs byang chub smon// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dadapa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pas/ bud med brgya dang khri bzhi stong dang / lha'i bu brgya stong mang po gang dag der
116b5(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung ba'i dus la
116b6(mdo sde): ba pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu khrel yod pa'i lha zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa des mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na/ lha'i bu 'bum phrag
116b7(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzangs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas// na mkha'i dkyil na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems
116b8(mdo sde): dpa' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ shi 'pho ba ni shin tu bstan// skyes bu seng ges tshe yang bstan// btsun mo'i 'khor kyang bstan pa mdzad// khyod kyis 'jig rten rjes 'thun
117a1(mdo sde): mdzad// 'jig rten chos ni rjes thob pas// lha mi mang po yongs smin mdzad// mngon par 'byung ba'i blo dgongs pa'i// de yi dus la deng bab bo// ma grol bas ni dgrol mi nus// los
117a2(mdo sde): bas lam yang ston mi nus// grol bas dgrol bar byed par nus// mig ldan long ba lam ston nus// sems can gang dag 'dod pas 'khol// khyim nor bu dang chung ma chags// de dag khyod kyi rjes slob cing / 
117a3(mdo sde): mngon par 'byung bar bzhed par mdzod// dbang phyug 'dod pas rtse ba dang // gling bzhi rin chen bdun spangs te// khyod ni mngon par 'byung rig nas// lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos// khyod ni 'dod la mi
117a4(mdo sde): dgyes te// bsam gtan bde bas gnas mdzad kyang // lha mi ba rgya phrag mang po dag/ gnyid kyis log nas sad par mdzad// dadar la bab 'di shin tu 'dab// ri gzar 'bab chu 'gyogs 'gro
117a5(mdo sde): bzhin// dar la bab pa yal gyur nas// mngon par 'byung ba ma/ dzes ma lags// de slad thog mar gzhon pa'i tshe// dar khab dam par mngon byung ste// thugs dam nyam 'og chud mdzod
117a6(mdo sde): la// lha mi'i don ni mdzad pa'i rigs// 'dod pa'i yon tan mi ngoms te// dper na lan tshwa'i chu dang mtshungs// 'phags pa rdul med 'jig rten 'das// shes rab gang ldan de dag ngoms// khyod 'dir
117a7(mdo sde): rgyal po'i zas gtsang dang // yul 'khor rnams kyi yid 'ong sdug/ 'dab ma brgya'i zhal 'dra ba// mngon par 'byung bar dgongs su gsol// nyon mongs gdung bas rab gdungs shing // 'byung med
117a8(mdo sde): bcings pas dam bcings rnams// dpa' bos myur du mtshungs med pa// thar lam zhi la dgod du gsol// khyod ni sman pa khams la mkhas// sems can yun ring na rnams la// chos kyi sman ni sbyar
117b1(mdo sde): mdzod de// mya ngan 'das pa bde myur 'khod// mig med mun pa gti mug glags// lta ba'i dra bas dkris pa yi// lha rnams dang ni mi'i mig/ shes rab sgron mas myur du sbyongs// byang chub thob par blta bya
117b2(mdo sde): zhing bla na med pa'i chos mnyan ces// lha dang lha min klu dag dang // gnod sbyin dri za mang po sdong // klu yi rgyal pos rang gi gnas// khyod kyi dpal gyis snang bar mthong // mchod pa dag ni mtha' yas
117b3(mdo sde): bgyid// de yi brtul zhugs bsam pa skongs// byang chub shing drung yid rdzogs la// lhung bzed bzhi ni dbul lo zhes// 'jig rten skyong bzhi sder bcas pa// de dag khyod la sdod cing mchis// tshangs pa
117b4(mdo sde): rab tu zhi spyod pa// byams ldan snying rje thob pa yang // bla med la 'khor lo rab bskor bar// mi dbang gsol snyam sdod cing mchis / byang chub bsnyen bkur byed pa'i lha// byang chub snying por gnas
117b5(mdo sde): rnams kyang // byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba// blta'o zhes te/ sdod cing mchis// byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i nang // // bya ba ston pa gzhan yang mchis// de dag thog mar khyod
117b6(mdo sde): gyur mdzod// de dag 'og tu lus sa re// dbyangs snyan cing ni dbyangs 'jam pa// mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dgongs// yang dag de bzhin ma nor ba// rgyal ba'i sgra dbyangs bsgrag tu gsol// 
117b7(mdo sde): bskul ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu des byang chub sems dpa' bskul ma thag tu rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rlolam 'di bstan to// rgyal po
117b8(mdo sde): zas gtsang ma gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du rmis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na/ lha'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ mngon par 'byung zhing mngon par byung nas kyang rab tu byung ste/ gos
118a1(mdo sde): ngur smrig gyon pa rmis so// de nas de sang bdang / rings pa ngas par nyung rung la dris pa/ gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gam/ des smras pa lha bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po zas
118a2(mdo sde): gtsang ma 'di snyam du gzhon nu gdon mi 'tshal bar mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ snga ltas su snang ba ni 'di dag yin snyam nas/ khong pa'i snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par gyur to// de yang 'di snyam
118a3(mdo sde): dusems te/ bdag gi gzhon nu ni skyed mos tshal gyi sar yang nam yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ bud med kyi tshogs kyi nang na mngon par dga' bas 'di nyid du chags par 'gyur te/ mngon par 'byung bar
118a4(mdo sde): ni mi 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzho na nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ dpyid dang dbyar dang ston gyi dus ji lta ba bzhin du khang bzangs gsum byed du bcug go// de la
118a5(mdo sde): dbyidangs gang yin pa de ni shin tu bsil ba'o// dbyar sa ga/ nga yin pa don grang dri ran pa'o// dgun sa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin gyi dro ba'o// khang bzangs re re'i gru skas rnams
118a6(mdo sde): kyang mi lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'dzugs shing 'debs so// de dag de ltar 'dzugs shing 'degs pa na gzhon nu sus kyang ma tshor bar mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes sgra dpag tshad phyed du grag pa byung ngo // 
118a7(mdo sde): ltas pa dang / mtshan mkhan kun gyis kyang gzhon nu ni chab sgo bkra shis pa nas/ mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de nas rgyal pos bkra shis kyi sgo'i sgo 'phar chen po byed du bcug ste/ 
118a8(mdo sde): sgo 'phar re re yang mi lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'byes cing gcod do// de dag gi sgra yang dpag tshad phyed du grag go// de la 'dod pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa med pa yang sbyor ro// glu dang rol mo'i sgra dbyangs len pa
118b1(mdo sde): dang / gar byed pa'i na chung dag kyang rtag tu bzhag par gyur to// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas la lo sgyur ba la smras pa/ deng bskyed mos chal gyi sar 'gros shing myur du sbyor cig/ de n+d+has
118b2(mdo sde): kha lo sbyar brgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces smras so// lha gnon nu skye mos tshal gyi sar 'byung ngo zhes gsung ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis
118b3(mdo sde): gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar nam yang ma byung bas sa bzang po blta bar bya ba'i phyir bdag gis gzhon nu skyed mos 'tshal gyi sar phyung na/ 'on tang gzhon nu bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ dga' ba
118b4(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur bas/ mngon par mi 'byung ngo snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma byang chub sems dpa' la byams pa/ dang / rim gro byed pas nga ste zhag bdun na gzhon nu sa bzang
118b5(mdo sde): polta ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'byung gis der khyed kyis gzhon nu mig tu mi 'ong ba mthong bar mi 'gyur bar yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad ni sol cig/ yid du 'ong ba dang / yul
118b6(mdo sde): nyams dga' ba thams cad ni sbyor cig ces grong khyer du dril bsgrags so// de nas zhag bdun gyi nyin par grong khyer thams cad brgyan to// bskyed mos tshal yang mdzes par byas te/ ras bcos bu kha
118b7(mdo sde): dog tha dad pa'i bla re ni bres/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis ni legs par brgyan to// byang chub sems dpa' lam gang nas 'gro ba'i lam de yang chag chag btab ste/ phyags nas spos
118b8(mdo sde): chu'i chag chag btab ste/ me tog sil ma ni chal bar bkram/ pog bor nas ni bdugs/ bum pa gang bas ni mdzes par byas/ chu shing ljon pa ni bsgreng / dar tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi bla re ni bres/ 
119a1(mdo sde): rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / rgyan 'phreng dang chun po ni sbyangs/ dpung bzhi'i bkod pa ni byas so// g.yog 'khor kyang gzhon nu'i btsun mo'i 'khor brgyan pa'i phyir brtson par
119a2(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas bskyed mos tshal gyis sar byung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi mthus gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
119a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams kyis/ mi rgan po gtugs pa/ 'khogs pa/ lus la rtsa rgyus 'thon pa/ so rgal ba/ lus gnyer mas gang ba/ skra byi ba/ skur ba/ gdung rten ltar dgu pa/ zhom pa khar ba la rten pa/ 
119a4(mdo sde): mthu zad pa/ dar yal ba/ mid pa nas sgra ngar ngar po 'byung dab/ lus dgu pas khar ba la brten nas/ yan lag dang de nying lag thams cad 'dar ba zhig/ lam kar bstan par
119a5(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha la sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur ba mi ring nya/ ma chung zhing // sha khrag skams la rgyus lpags nyi ces dkris
119a6(mdo sde): mgo dkar so rgal lus ni rab skem la// khar brten cing mi bder 'khyor 'gro su// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha cig mi 'di rga bas zil gyis non// dbang po nyams shing sdug bsngal brtson
119a7(mdo sde): stobs nyams// gnyen gyi skye bos brnyas shing mgon med gyur// don bgyid mi nus nags khrod shing ltar bor// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di'i chos 'di rigs kyi yin nam 'on tam na
119a8(mdo sde): 'gro po 'di kun la yang 'di srid de smros shig/ tshig 'di yang dag ji bzhin myur du smros shig dang / thos nas de bzhin don la 'dir ni tshul bzhin bsam/ kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha 'di rigs
119b1(mdo sde): chos ma lags yul 'khor chos ma lags// skye bo kun gyi dar la bab pa rga bas 'jom// khyod kyi yab dang yum dang nye du gnyen tshogs kyang // rga las mthar 'gro ba'i thabs ni gzhan ma mchis// 
119b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba byis pa'i skye bo mi mkhas pa'i// blo ngan gzhon pas rgyags shing myos pas rga ma mthong // da ni slar 'gro nga yi shing rta myur du sbyar// nga'ang
119b3(mdo sde): rgal gnas pas rtse dgas ci zhig bya// de nas byang chub sems dpas shing rta'i mchog de slar bsgyur te/ phyir grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan
119b4(mdo sde): zhig na/ bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo na/ sa bskyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / des lam dka na mi nad kyis nyen pa/ dmu rdzing can lus nyam chung ba
119b5(mdo sde): rang gi gcin rkyag tu bying ba/ mgon med pa/ skyabs med pa shin tu sha thang bar dbugs dbyung zhing brngub dgos pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang yang byang chub sems dpas/ 
119b6(mdo sde): shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur ba mi rtsub lus kyi mdog ngan la// dbang po thams cad nyams shing dbugs dbyung rab tu dka'// yan lag lus skams lto bas
119b7(mdo sde): dkrugs shing nyam thag gyur// rang gi gcin rtug smad pa'i gnas na 'dug 'di su// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha gcig mi 'di shin tu nad kyis btab pa ste/ nad kyi 'jigs pa nye bar
119b8(mdo sde): mchis pas 'gum la thug/ nad med gzi brjid ma mchis stobs kyang rnam pa nyams// mgon dang skyabs dang gling dang dpung gnyen ma mchis lags// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ nad// 
120a1(mdo sde): med pa yang rmi lam na ni rtse dang mtshungs// nad kyi 'jigs pa 'di ltar shin tu mi bzang pa// skyes bu ma bas pas gnas 'di mthong nas ji lta bur// rtsel dga' dang sdug pa'i 'du she
120a2(mdo sde): skyed par 'gyur// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta'i mchog de slar bsgyur te phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na bkod
120a3(mdo sde): pa chen pos/ grong khyer gyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas bskyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / nges lam ka na mi shi bar gyur pa// khyogs la bzhag pa ras kyi bla re phub pa/ nye du'i tshogs kyis bkor te/ 
120a4(mdo sde): kun kyang ngu zhing skad phyung ste/ ngul smre sngags 'don cing / skra dgashig la mgo la sas 'thor zhing brang rdung la cho nge 'don cing phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur pa mthong ngo // mthong nas
120a5(mdo sde): kyang yang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur ba mi 'di khyogs la bzhag nas ni// mi dag skra bshig mgo la sa yi 'thor
120a6(mdo sde): byed cing // sna tshogs dag gi tshig ni rjod la brang rdung bas// kun nas bskor ba byas te khyer ba su zhig yin// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha cig mi 'di 'dzam bu gling du gum pa ste// slan chad
120a7(mdo sde): pha ma mchis brang bu rnams mthong mi 'gyur// longs spyod khyim dang mdza' gshes gnyen tshogs spangs nas ni// 'jig rten pha rol mchis te slan chad gnyen mi mthong // byang chub sems dpas/ 
120a8(mdo sde): smras pa/ rgabs gnod par 'gyur ba'i gzhon pa cir mi rung // sna tshogs nad kyis gnod 'gyur nad med cir mi rung // ring du mi gnas gson pa mkhas la cir mi rung // rgal chags pa skyes
120b1(mdo sde): bu ma pas la cir mi rung // gal te rga med nad med 'chi ba med gyur kyang // 'on kyang phung po lnga 'dzin sdug bsngal che yin na// rgan 'chi ba rtag tu 'brang ba smos ci dgos// legs par slar
120b2(mdo sde): zlog rab tu thar par bya ba bsam// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta mchog de slar bzlog ste/ phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus
120b3(mdo sde): gzhan zhig na grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas/ bskyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / byang chub sem dpa'i mthus lha'i bu de dag nyid kyis lam ka der dge slong zhig mngon par sprul pa dang / byang chub
120b4(mdo sde): sems dpas dge slong zhi ba dul ba yang dag par bsdams pa/ tshadangs par spyod pa mig phab pa/ gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba / spyod lam mdzes pa/ phun sum tshogs pa/ 'gro ba dang
120b5(mdo sde): ldog pa mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ mdun du lta ba dang / g.yas g.yos su lta ba mdzes pa/ bskum pa dang bskyang ba/ mdzes pa/ chos gos snam sbyar dang lhung bzed dang / chos
120b6(mdo sde): gos thogs pa mdzes pa zhig lam kan 'dug pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur ba skyes bu sems zhi rab zhi zhing / 
120b7(mdo sde): mig phab 'gro la gnya' shing gang tsam lta byed cing // ngur smrig gos gyon shin tu rab tu zhi bar spyod// lhung bzed thogs nas mi rgod ma khengs su zhig yin/ kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha cig mi 'di/ 
120b8(mdo sde): dge slong zhes ni bgyi ba lags/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs shing shin tu dul bar spyod// bdag nyid zhi ba 'chol zhing rab tu byung bar gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang bral ba bsod snyoms spyod
121a1(mdo sde): cing rgyu// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dzin dge bar legs smras nga yang 'dod pa ste/ rab tu byung ba mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags// don bdag la phan zhing sems can
121a2(mdo sde): gzhan la'ang phan// 'tsho ba bde zhing nyams mthun 'chi med 'bras bur 'gyur// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas shing rta mchog de slar bsgyur te/ phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong
121a3(mdo sde): ngag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la bskul ba rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag rgyal po zas gtsang mas mthong zhing thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/ rab rgya chen po byed du bcug ste/ 
121a4(mdo sde): 'obs kyang nor bcug/ sgro brtan po yang 'jugs su bcu/ ga/ srung ma yang bkod/ dpa' bo rnams kyang sbyin pa/ zhon pa yang sta gon byas go cha yang gyon du bcug go/ byang chub
121a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir// grong khyer chen po'i sgo bzhi 'i lam gyi mdo sum rnams su dpung chen po'i bkod pa bzhag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ta re zhes
121a6(mdo sde): de dag de srung du bcug go// btsun mo'i 'khor la yang res 'ga' tsam yang glu dbyangs kyi rgyun bcad de/ dga' ba dang rtse ba thams cad kyang sbyor cig ci nas kyang gzhon nu chags nas rab tu 'byung bar
121a7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur bar bud med kyi sgra yang ston ces sgo'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thab mo mos pa'i skyes bu lag na ral gri mtshon thogs sgo gar bkod// go bgos mi rta glang
121a8(mdo sde): bo shing rta mi bskyon glang po 'phreng ba'ang bkod// 'obs dang shing thags dag dang rta babs phyir mthon po'ang byed du bcug/ sgo mo rgyang grags grag pa'i sgra 'byung ba yang gtan pa dam po bcug/ 
121b1(mdo sde): shAsh+ya'i tshogs rnams thams cad yid mi dga' zhing nyin mtshan srung bar byed// dpung chen rnams kyang sgra skad shin tu grag par byed// nges pa 'di nas 'byung du 'ong zhes grong khyer 'khrugs shing yid
121b2(mdo sde): spangs skrag/ shAkya'i rigs skyes song na rigs 'di chad par mi 'gyur grang snyam byed// skye bo bud med dag la bsgo ba rtag tu glu dbyangs rgyun ma gcad// rtsi bas dga' ba rnams kyi bsnyen bkur gyis
