121b3(mdo sde): shing yid kyang mgu bar gyis// bud med sgyu thabs spyod pa gang yin rnam pa du ma mang po ston// nges pa 'gror mi 'gyur bar bsrung bar byos shing bgegs kyang rab tu byos// kha lo sgyur ba mchog
121b4(mdo sde): de mngon par 'byung ba'i lnga ltas 'di dag ste/ ngang pa khrung khrung dag dang rma bya ri skegs dag dang ne co rnams/ khang bzangs skar khung rta babs mchog dang yang thog khri la 'khor
121b5(mdo sde): nas ni// dman zhing dman la mi dga' mi bde mgo smad sa mas shing sgra mi 'byin// rdzing dang rdzing chen dag gi pad+ma dag kyang rnyis shing rnyis par 'gyur// shing ljon skams shing
121b6(mdo sde): yal ga me tog lhags la me tog slar mi 'chags// pi bang gling bu rgyud gsum gyis ni brgyan pa de tshe glo bur chad// rnga dang rdza rnga dag kyang lag pas brdungs na 'chag cing sgra mi 'byung // grong khyer de
121b7(mdo sde): dag thams cad 'khrugs par gyur cing shin tu gnyid kyis non// gang gi yid kyang gar byed pa dang glu len pa la dga' ba med// rgyal po'ang mchog tu rab tu yid dman gyur te sems khongs
121b8(mdo sde): chud cing 'dug/ e ma ma rung shAg rigs rdzu 'phrul rgya chen mi tshig grang snyam byed// sa 'tshe ma dang rgyal bu mal cig na ni nyal zhing 'khod pa'i tshe// nam phyed tsam na sa mtsho ma'i rmi lam du ni
122a1(mdo sde): / 'di dag rmis// sa 'di thams cad rtse mor ldan pa'i dang bcas te g.yos par gyur// shing ljon rnams kyang rlung gis bskyod nas rtsa nas 'thon te sa la skyel// nyi mtha bskar ma'i rgyan
122a2(mdo sde): dang bcas te mkha' las sa la lhung // lag pa g.yon pas skra yang rab tu 'bal zhing cod pan lhung ba mthong // lag pa chad la de bzhin rkang pa'ang chad cing bdag ni sgren mor mthong // bdag gi mu
122a3(mdo sde): tig do shal nor bu gser gyi 'og bag chad par mthong // nyal khri de yi rkang pa bzhi chags yi stang na nyal ba mthong // rgyal po'i gdugs kyi yu ba spras pa dpal ldan mdzes pa chag par mthong / 
122a4(mdo sde): rgyan rnams kun kyang rnam par 'thor cing chu yis khyer bar gyur/ ra pa dang // khyim thab rgyan yang gos dang cod pan pa cas te mal steng 'thor bar mthong // grong khyer dag nas me sgron
122a5(mdo sde): phyir byung grong khyer mun pas non pa dang // rin po che las bya sa pa'i dra ba mdzes pa'ang chad par gyur pa rmis/ mu tig do shal 'phyang ba lhung nas rgya mtsho chen po dkrugs pa
122a6(mdo sde): dang / de yi tshe na ri yi rgyal po ri rab gnas nas g.yos pa rmis// shAkya'i bu mo rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra 'di dag rmis gyur nas// de sad mig nas mchi ma zag cing rang gi khyo la 'di skad smras// 
122a7(mdo sde): lha cig rmi lam 'di 'dra rmis pa cir 'gyur ba ni bka' stsol cig/ bdag ni dran pa 'khrul cing mig kyang 'khrul la yang ni mya ngan non// de yis de thos ka la bing ka rnga sgra tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan
122a8(mdo sde): bas pas 'chom la smras pa khyod ni rab tu dgar gyur sdig pa med// sems can gang dag bsod nams sngon spyad de dag rmil ma de 'dra mi// sdug bsngal du mas nyen pa rmi lam 'di 'dra rmib ga la yong/ 
122b1(mdo sde): khyod kyis sa 'di rab tu g.yos pa dang // ri rtser bcas te sa la lhung rmis pa// lha dang klu dang srin po 'byung ba'i tshogs// kun gyis khyod mchod gtso mor byed par 'gyur// khyod kyis shing rnams rtsa
122b2(mdo sde): nas 'thon rmis shing // lag pa g.yon pas skra 'bal rmis pa ni// sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs dra ba bcing // 'du byas dag las lta ba'i dra ba 'byin// khyod kyis nyi zla sa la lhung rmis shing // skar ma/ 
122b3(mdo sde): rnams kyang lhung bar rmis pa ni// sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs dgra bcom ste// khyod ni 'jig rten mchod rten mchod pa bsngags par 'gyur// khyod kyis mu tig do shal 'thor rmas shing // lus kun
122b4(mdo sde): chang dang sgren mi rmis pa ni// sa 'tsho myur du bud med lus spang sa te// ring por mi thogs skyes pa'i lus su 'gyur/ khyod kyis khri rkang chag par rmis pa dang / gdugs yu rin chen
122b5(mdo sde): spras pa cheg rmis pa// sa 'tsho myur du chu bo bzhi rgal cig/ nga ni 'jig rten gdugs gcig 'gyur ba mthong // khyod/ kyis rgyan rnams chus khyer rmis pa dang // nga yi gos dang cong
122b6(mdo sde): ban khri steng rmis// sa 'tsho myur du mtshan gyis brgyan nas ni// 'jig rten kun gyis nga la stod pa mthong // khyod kyis me sgron brgya phrag bye ba dag/ grong khyer byung nas mun nag gyur rmis pa// sa
122b7(mdo sde): 'tsho myur du ma rig rmongs pa'i mun// 'jig rten kun la shes rab snang byed 'gyur// khyod kyis mu tig do shal chad pa dang // gser gyi cong cong spras pa chang rmis pa// sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs dra
122b8(mdo sde): bcad pa// 'dus byas dag las 'du shes skud pa 'byin// sa 'tsho gang phyir nga la gus par ni// rtag tu rim gro mchog gis mchod byed na// khyod la ngan 'gro med cing mya ngan med// myur du dag
123a1(mdo sde): / zhing mchog tu dga' ba 'thob// ngas ni sngon chad sbyin pa gya nom byin// tshul khrims bsrungs dang rtag tu bzod pa bsgoms// de bas ngal dad pa gang rnyed pa// de dag thams cad dga'
123a2(mdo sde): zhing rab dga' rnyed// 'khor bar bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su// ngas ni byang chub lam mchog rnam par sbyangs// de bas nga la dad par gang byed pa// de dag thams cad ngan song gsum po chad/ 
123a3(mdo sde): dga' ba thob kyis mi dga' ma skyed cig/ tshim pa thob par gyis la mgu skye cig/ dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba myur 'thob ste// khyod kyi rmi ltas bzang gis sa 'tsho nyol// sngon chad dge ba'i las ni
123a4(mdo sde): gang dag bsags gyur pa// mi mchog rnams ni mngon par 'a byung ba'i dus bab che// mtshan ma 'di dag bsod nam sa gzi brjid bsags pa dang // dpal gyi gzi brjid
123a5(mdo sde): snying po can des rmi lam 'gyur// de ni rkang pa dag dang lag pa chen po yis// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag gi chu dkrug da nga // sa 'di thams cad sna tshogs mal char gyur pa dang // 
123a6(mdo sde): ri bo lhun po mchog kyang sngas su gyur par rmi// rmi lam na ni 'od rab bkye bas 'jig rten na// mun pa mun nag chen po rnam par bsal ba dang // sa las gdugs shig byung bas 'jig rten gsum/ 
123a7(mdo sde): khyab dang // 'od kyis reg pas log lhung sdug bsngal rab zhi rmi// dkar gnag srog chags bzhi zhig rkang pa ldag pa dang // kha dog bzhi pa'i bya 'ongs kha dog gcig gyur dang // mchog tu ngan pa
123a8(mdo sde): smad pa ngan skyugs ri la yang // 'jigs nas 'gro yang den gos pa med pa TI// rmi lam na ni chu bo chu yis rab gang nas// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po khyer ba las// de ni grur byas/ 
123b1(mdo sde): bsgral de gzhan dag bsgral nas ni// de yis 'jigs med mya ngan med mchog thang bkod ni// rmi lam na ni nad pa mang po nad btab pa// nad med gzi brjid bral zhing stobs kyang nyams rnams la// de ni sman
123b2(mdo sde): par gyur nas rtsi sman mang byin pas// nad btab sems can khrag khrig mang po thar byed cing // ri rab ngos la seng+ge'i khri la 'dug nas ni// slob ma thal mo sbyor cing lha rnams phyag 'tshal la// bdag
123b3(mdo sde): ni g.yul las rgyal zhing lha rnams na mkha' las// kun tu dga' ba'i sgra skrag par ni rmi lam rmi// bkra shis brtul zhugs bzang po yongs su rdzogs par yang // byang chub sems dpa' rmi lam
123b4(mdo sde): rnam pa de dag rmi// de thos nas ni 'di ni ring po mi thogs par/ mo yi lha y-i ltar 'gyur snyam ste lha mi dga'/ rmilam kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// 
123b5(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rgyal po chen zas gtsang ma la yang / ma byas shing / phas gnang ba med par mngon par 'byung
123b6(mdo sde): ba 'di ni bdag la mi rigs te/ byas pa gzo ba ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na/ rang gi gnas kyi khang bzangs nas byung ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khang bzangs
123b7(mdo sde): su phyin nas 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dug ma thag tu khang bzangs thams cad kyang 'od kyis gsal bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po sad pa dang 'od de mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang myur ba
123b8(mdo sde): myur bar nyung rum la smras pa/ kye nyung rum ci nyi ma shar tam/ gang gis na 'di 'od kyis rnam par mdzes// nyung rum gyis smras pa/ lha da dung du dgung phyed kyang ma bso// lha gzhan yang ti
124a1(mdo sde): ma'i 'od ni shing dang rtsig pa thal mi phyin// lus la gdung bar bgyid cing tsha bar rab tu bgyid// nang par dus na ngang pa dag dang rma bya dang // ne tse khu byug ngur pa dag kyang rang sgra 'byin/ 
124a2(mdo sde): 'o 'di lha yi yid du mchi zhing bde ba ste// rab tu sim bgyid dge bgyid gdung bar bgying ma lags// shing dang rtsig pa thal phyung sgrib pa yong mo mchis// yon tan ldan pa gcig cig deng ni 'dar
124a3(mdo sde): byon nges// rgyal po de ni mi dga' phyogs bcur bltas pa dang // sems can dag pa pad+ma'i mig can de mthong nas// de ni mal nas ldang bar 'dod na ma nus te// rnam dag blo can dam pa pha la gus pa
124a4(mdo sde): skyed/ de ni rgyal po mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras// lha ci ngag bdag ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus pab rigs// dgegs kyang ma mdzad mi dgyes pa yang ma mdzad cig/ rgyal
124a5(mdo sde): po gnyen gcas yul 'khor bcas te bzod par gsol// / la po de ni mchi mas mig gang 'di skad smras// khyod na phyir ldog pa'i dgos pa ci zhig yod// bdag la dam pa ci
124a6(mdo sde): slong smros shig thams cad sbyin// bdag la dang pho brang 'khor dang yul 'khor 'di phan thogs// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas snyan pa'i tshig smras pa// lha cig dam pa bzhi 'tshal de ni bdag
124a7(mdo sde): la stsol// gal te stsal par spyod na mnga' ni khyod la mchis// 'on tang rtag tu khyim na gzigs shing 'byung mi 'gyur// lha cig bdag ni rga bas tshugs par mi 'gyur zhing // rtag tu mdog bzang
124a8(mdo sde): dar la bab par gnas pa dang // nad ma mchis par thob cing nad kyis mi btab dang // tshe dpag ma mchis pa dang gung par mi 'gyur 'tshal// rgyal pos tshig thos shin tu sdug bsngal nyam thag ste/ 
124b1(mdo sde): gzhon nu gnas min slong bas bdag la mthu med do// bskal par gnas pa'i drang srong rnams kyang nam du yang // rgan 'chi ba'i 'jigs dang rgud las mthar to// rgan 'chi ba'i 'jigs dang rgung par mi 'gyur
124b2(mdo sde): pa lha cig gal te mchog bzhi 'di dag mi stsal na// gzhan yang mchog cig gsol gyis rgyal po gsan du gsol// 'di nas shing 'phos nying mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur mdzod// mi yi dam pa'i
124b3(mdo sde): tshig ni de skang thos pa dang // sred pa bsrabs te bu la chags pa yongs su gcod// phan byed 'gro ba thar byed rjes su yi rang ngo // khyod kyi bsam pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs gyur cig/ dge slong dag de
124b4(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' slar song ste// rang gi khyim du phyin na/ sa mal na 'dug pa dang / de song ba 'am/ 'ongs par su/ sa kyang ma tshor ro// dge slong dag de'i nam nangs pa dang / rgyal
124b5(mdo sde): bo zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad sogs te/ de'i lo rgyus rnams smos nas/ gzhon ni mngon par 'byung na da ji ltar bya zhes smras so// shAkya rnams kyis smras palha
124b6(mdo sde): bsrungs par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shAkya'i tshogs 'di ni mang la// de ni gcig pur gyur pas/ mthus mngon par 'byung ba'i nus pa de la ma mchis so// de nas shAkya de dag dang / rgyal
124b7(mdo sde): po zas gtsang mas shAkya gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyangs pa/ 'os su gyur pa/ 'phong bslabs pa/ chen po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi
124b8(mdo sde): shar sgor bkod de/ byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ shAkya gzhon nu re re la yang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shing rta re re la yang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// byang
125a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir de bzhin du grong khyer gyi lho dang / nub dang / byang gi sgor yang shAkya gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyangs pa 'os su gyur pa/ 'phong bslabs pa/ chen po che chen
125a2(mdo sde): po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shAkya gzhon nu re re la yang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shing rta re re la yang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// byang chub sems dpa' bsrung
125a3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams kyang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / lam po che mang po thams cad na 'khod do// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgyas bskor
125a4(mdo sde): cing / mdun gyis bltas te/ rta dang glang po che dag la zhon nas rang gi khyim sgron mel che byed do// skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo 'ge'u ta mis kyang rang gi bran mo'i tshogs la smras pa/ 
125a5(mdo sde): mar me dri ma med pa bus la nor bu thams cad rgyal mtshan rtse mor thogs/ mu tig rgyan 'phreng rnams kyang sbyongs la khyi ma 'di kun tu 'od kyis snang bar byos// klu dbyangs dag kyang
125a6(mdo sde): sbyor la do mod g.yel ba med par mel tshe dam du gyis// gzhon nu ci nas ma tshor bar ni 'gro bar mi 'gyur tshul du bsrung bar gyis// go bgos lag na lag cha ral gri dang // mdung thung mda' dang
125a7(mdo sde): mtshon cha rtse gnyis thogs// sdug pa'i bu ni bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// kun kyang rab tu bsgrim pa chen po gyis// sgo kun chong la gtan pa dam du chug/ sgo 'phar sra ba rkeng par gtan chug la// 
125a8(mdo sde): dudu'am bab par ni sgom dbye// sems can dam pa 'di ni shor ta re// nor bu do shal mu tig do shal thogs// me tog zla gam seng gi shing lo ris// ska rags sor rngub rna rgyan chings shing
125b1(mdo sde): thogs// nang rngub dag kyang shin tu legs par thogs// lha mi phan pa mang po glang po dregs bzhin 'gro// gal te glo bur mngon par byung nga re// ci nas mi bde rnyed par ma gyur par// ngo lta de ltar nan tan
125b2(mdo sde): cher gyis shig/ bud med gang dag mdung thung thogs pa dag/ dri ma med pa lam na 'dug pa skor// ci nas gnyid kyis log par ma gyur pa// phye ma leb bzhin mig gis bsrung bar gyis// rgyal bu
125b3(mdo sde): 'di ni srung bar bya ba'i phyir// khyim 'dir rin po che'i dra ba bres// gling bu dag kyang rab tu bud cing long // do mod rdul dang bral ba bsrung bar gyis// phan tshun gcig la gcig ni sgron byas te// ngo
125b4(mdo sde): mod ma nyal shin tu bsrung bar gyis// rgyal srid dang ni yul 'khor spangs nas su// khyim nas mngon tu 'byung bar gyur ta re// 'di ni mngon par byung bar gyur na go/ rgyal po'i pho
125b5(mdo sde): brang 'di kun nyams mi dga'// rgyal po'i rigs rgyud yu/ na ring gnas pa yang // rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyud ni chang bya' gyur// dge slong dag de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lngas rtsen
125b6(mdo sde): la sogs pa/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya rnams gcig tu 'dus nas/ 'di skad ces smras te/ grogs po dag do nub byang chub sems dpa' mngon
125b7(mdo sde): par 'byung gis// khyed cag de la mchod pa byed pa'i las la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang lcang lo can gyi pho brang du zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor chen po la smras pa/ grogs
125b8(mdo sde): bopo dag de mang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gis/ khyed kyis bcibs pa'i rga lag nas theg la 'byung bar gyis shig/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gyis smras pa/ sku ni sred med bu yi stobs
126a1(mdo sde): ldan rdo rje lta bur mi phyed sral lnga// sems can kun gyi dam pa de ni brtson 'grus stobs ldan g.yo ba mi mnga' ste// ri yi dam pa lhun po chen po chang nas byung sternam par gzung nus
126a2(mdo sde): kyirgyal po'i yon tan lhung ba ri lci bsod nams ye shes gnas pa sus kyang gang du bkur mi nus/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ mi gang nga rgyal 'gying ba de la ston pa lnga// gang dag dga'
126a3(mdo sde): gus gnas pa de dag yang bar tsher// bsam pa thag pas brtson par byos la gus pa yis// bya yis sha kham bzhin du yang bar shes par gyis// kho bo mdun nas 'gro yis khyed cag rnams
126a4(mdo sde): kyis bcibs pa theg/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung tshe bsod nams mang po sogs// dge slong dag dre nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
126a5(mdo sde): rnams la smras pa/ kye grogs po dag ngo nub byang chub sem/ sa dpa' mngon par 'byung gis/ de la khyed thamasacad mchod pa'i las la spro bar gyis shig/ de nas lha'i
126a6(mdo sde): bu zhi ba'i blo gros shes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad gnyid kyis log par
126a7(mdo sde): bgyi'o// lha'i bu rtse ba bkod pa zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni rta dang / glang po che dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / 
126a8(mdo sde): khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi sgra mi grag par bgyi'o// lha'i bu bkod pa'i blo gros shes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni namakha'i dkyil na shing rta chen po bdun rin po che'i
126b1(mdo sde): stegs bus 'khor bar bskor ba// nor bu rin po che me shel gyi 'od 'bar ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ me tog sna tshogs chal par bkram pa/ pog por nas/ bdug pos
126b2(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa dag byang chub sems dpa' lam gang nas 'byung ba'i lam der dgod par bgyi'o// klu'i rgyal po sa srung gis bu shes bya bas 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni bdag
126b3(mdo sde): nyid kyi sna la khang pa brtsegs pa dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bgyis te/ der lha'i bu mo dag bkod la sil snyan dang glu dbyangs len du sbal// glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra chen pos/ byang chub
126b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchi ba ngar bgyi'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyid kyis 'di skad ces smras so// kho bos ni sgo dbye'o// lam mtshon par bya'o// 
126b5(mdo sde): lha'i bu chos spyod kyis 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gi sa ni btsun mo'i 'khor rnams mi sdug par bstan par/ bgyi'o// lha'i bu yang dag skul pos smras pa/ bdag
126b6(mdo sde): gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gzims mal nas bzhengs gsol bar bgyi'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa
126b7(mdo sde): dang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bos 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi sprin mngon
126b8(mdo sde): par sprul te/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char dbab po// dge slong dag de ltar lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bsam pa nges par bsams te/ 
127a1(mdo sde): brtsams so// byang chub sems dpa' chos sems pa la zhugs pa glu dngas len pa'i dang bzangs na mal bde ba la 'dug pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa ni sngon gyi sangs
127a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi spyod pa rnam par sems shing sems can la phan pa bya ba rjes su sems la sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi mngon du byed do// bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon rang byung gi bdag po 'dod cing thams cad/ 
127a3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid don du gnyer ba na/ go cha 'di lta bu bgos par gyur te/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong nas/ kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten gnas pa bcings te 'khor ba'i brtson ra chen
127a4(mdo sde): bor bcug pa la/ 'khor ba'i btson ra dral te bcings pa ba dkrol ba'i sgra bsgrag go// sred pa'i zhags pa dang / sgrog dam pos bcings pa'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu
127a5(mdo sde): dgrol lo zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig dang po 'di ma don du gyur to// kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten ma ri/ ga pa'i mun pa mun nag thibs po chen por zhugs pa mi
127a6(mdo sde): shes pa'i ling rtog dang / rab rib kyis mig bsgribs pa/ shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba/ ma rig pa dang / gti mug gis ldong bal chos kyi snang ba chen po bya zhing ye shes kyi sgron ma yang nye bar
127a7(mdo sde): bsgrubs la rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum shes pa'i mig sman ril lu dang / sman thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang ldan pa btang ste/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang / gti mug
127a8(mdo sde): gi mun pa dang / rab rib dang / ling tog dang / rnyog pa thams cad bsal nas shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyang ngo zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig gnyis pa 'di mngon du gyur to// kye ma'o// 
127b1(mdo sde): bdag gis 'jig rten nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'i yid can 'du shes dang / sems dang lta ba
127b2(mdo sde): phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa/ gzung ba ngan pas zin pa la 'phags pa'i lam bstan te/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal brnyal bar bya'o zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig gsum pa 'di mngon du
127b3(mdo sde): gyur to// kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten rnam par ma zhi ba/ thags 'khrugs pa lta bur gyur pa/ dru bu 'dzings pa lta bur gyur pa/ 'ong ba dang 'gro bar gyur pa/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol
127b4(mdo sde): dang 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'a 'khor la 'khor ba las mi ldog pa/ mgal mo'i 'khor lo lta bur gyur pa la/ nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i shes rab kyi
127b5(mdo sde): chog par byed pa'i chos kyang bstan to zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi po 'di mngon tu gyur te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi po de dag mngon du gyur to// skad cig
127b6(mdo sde): de la lha'i bu chos spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis btsun mo'i 'khor mi sdug par bsgyur te mi sdug par gnas pa dang / smad pa'i gzugs su bstan nas/ nam mkha' la
127b7(mdo sde): 'khod de/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ de nas lha bu rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyis// pad+ma rgyas pa yangs pa'i spyan la smras// dur khrod dbus 'dir zhugs par gyur lags na/ 
127b8(mdo sde): khyod ni ji ltar dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur// lha yi dbang phyug rnams kyis de bskul nas// yud tsam btsun mo'i 'khor la lta zhing rtog/ bltas nas smad par gyur pa de dag mthong // dur khrod gnas
128a1(mdo sde): / par gyur pa bden snyam byed// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi tshogs la rnam par bltas pa dang / kha cig ni gos lhung bar gyur/ kha cig ni sgra zhig kha cig ni rgyan grus/ 
128a2(mdo sde): cig ni cod pan lhung / kha cig ni phrag pa mi sdug par gyur/ kha cig ni lus rnam par 'khrugs/ kha cig ni bzhin mi sdug par gnas/ kha cig ni mig gyur/ kha cig ni kha chu zag/ kha cig ni sngur/ kha
128a3(mdo sde): cig ni lud pa lu/ kha cig ni rgod/ kha cig ni brdol/ kha cig ni so 'khrig/ kha cig ni bzhin mdog gyur/ kha cig ni gzugs mi sdug par gyur te/ lag pa ring por gyur/ kha cig ni rkang pa
128a4(mdo sde): phral kha cig ni mgo phyung / kha cig ni mgo g.yogs/ kha cig ni bzhin gyi dbyibs gyur/ kha cig ni lus ma rungs par gyur/ kha cig ni lus sgren mor gyur/ kha cig ni lus
128a5(mdo sde): bskums shing sbur/ kha cig ni rdza rnga la 'khyud nas lus ga/ na rgyal du 'gyel/ kha cig ni pi bang dang / rgyud gsum pa'i// steng du lag brkyang / kha cig ni gling bu la sos 'debs/ kha
128a6(mdo sde): cig ni rol mo'i cha byad/ kim pa la dang / na gu la dang / khar bi'o sil khrol dang / pheg la 'dzin/ kha cig ni mig 'dzums shing 'bye da ba gyur/ kha cag na kha cig ni kha gdangs par gyur te/ de ltar
128a7(mdo sde): sa la mi sdug par gnas par gyur pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor la lta zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'jig rten mgon des de mthong yid byung ste/ 
128a8(mdo sde): snying rjes shugs phyung nas ni 'di skad smras// e ma skye dgu dag ni sdug bsngal gyur// srin mo'i tshogs la dga' ba ji ltar rnyed// 'dod pa'i yon tan yod min yon tan 'dzin// gti mug mun
128b1(mdo sde): bas rab bsgribs blo gros ngan// dper na bya ni bya rgyar chung ba bzhin// nam yang 'byung ba rnyed par 'gyur ma yin/ 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
128b2(mdo sde): babam po bcu pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpas chos snang ba'i sgo 'dis/ yang btsun mo'i 'khor la rtog cing / snying rje chen po'i skye bas/ sems can gyi phyir smre ste/ 'di ni byis pa de dag ni gsod pa ste/ 
128b3(mdo sde): bsad pa'i gnas su bsad par bya ba gsod pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni chags pa ste/ ngan skyugs kyis gang ba'i snod ri mo can rnams la mi mkhas pa chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'di
128b4(mdo sde): na byis pa de dag ni 'bying ba ste// glang po che chur 'bying ba dang ma tshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni btsas pa ste/ btson ra'i da nang gi btson bcas pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag
128b5(mdo sde): ni mngon par dga' ba ste/ phag mi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang ma/ tshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni chags pa ste/ khyi keng ru sa la chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni
128b6(mdo sde): rab tu ltung ba ste/ phye ma leb mar mo'i me lcer lhung ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni thogs pa ste/ spre'u rnyong la thogs pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su bzung ba ste/ 
128b7(mdo sde): rgyas zin pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su gtugs pa ste/ sha 'tshong gi gnas kyi lug dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni gtsugs pa ste/ sdig pa byed pa gsal shing gi
128b8(mdo sde): rtse mo la btsugs pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'gying zhing thogs pa ste/ glang po che rgan po 'dam du song ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni phongs pa ste/ rgya mtsho chen por
129a1(mdo sde): gru'i snam bu zhig pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni rab tu lhung ba ste/ dmus long g.yang sa chen por lhung ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su zad par 'gyur ba
129a2(mdo sde): ste/ sa'i gting gi mtshams su song ba'i chu dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni du ba 'thul ba ste/ bskal pa zad pa'i sa chen po dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'khor ba ste/ rdza mkhan
129a3(mdo sde): gyi 'khor lo'i shugs dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'brog 'chol ba ste/ dmus long ri la phyin pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni btags shing 'khor ba ste/ khyi ldong gis
129a4(mdo sde): btags pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni brnyis pa ste/ dpyid kyi rtswa dang nags tshal dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su nyams pa ste/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i zla ba
129a5(mdo sde): dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la za ba ste/ klu la na mkha' lding dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnam sa la 'cha' ba ste/ gru bo che la chu srin chen po dang mtshungs so// 
129a6(mdo sde): 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'joms pa ste/ 'dron pa la chom po mang po dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'jigs pa ste/ shing sa la la rlung dmar chen po dang mtshungs so// 'di dag
129a7(mdo sde): nini byis pa rnams la gsod pa ste/ skye ba po la sprul mig gdug pa dang mtshungs so// byis pa rnams ni ro myang ba'i 'du shes kyis mchod pa ste/ ral gri'i so sbrang rtsis bskus pas chong pa bzhin no// 
129a8(mdo sde): 'di dag ni byis pa rnam khyer ba ste/ shing gi phung po la chu bo'i chus khyer ba dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la rtsed pa ste/ byis pa chung ngu rang gi gcin drug la rtse ba dang mtshungs so// 
129b1(mdo sde): 'di dag ni byis pa rnams kun tu sgyur ba ste/ glang po che la lcags kyu dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la slu ba ste/ g.yon can gyis byis pa'i rang bzhin can dag brid pa bzhin no// 'di dag
129b2(mdo sde): ni byis pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa bzang par byed pa ste/ rgyan po la dga' ba'i nor dang mtshungs so// 'di dag gis byis pa rnams la 'chos pa ste/ srin mo rnams kyis tshong ba 'chos pa dang mtshungs so// 
129b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis btsun mo'i 'khor la yongs su brtag pa byas nas/ lus la mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par sgom/ mi mthun pa'i 'du shes nye bar sgrub/ 
129b4(mdo sde): smad pa'i 'du shes skyed/ rang gi lus la yang de dang 'dra bar rnam par sgom/ lus kyi nyes dmigs yang dag par ma thong / lus la lus su mngon par zhen pa las spyod/ sdug
129b5(mdo sde): pa'i 'du shes rnam par 'jig/ mi sdug pa'i 'du shes 'ju/ ga par byed/ 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil na/ steng gi klad pa man chad mi gtsang ba las byung ba dang / mi gtsang ba las
129b6(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / rtag tu mi gtsang ba zag par mthong ngo // de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// las kyi zhing las skyes shing sred pa'i chu las byung ba'i 'jig tshogs ming du btags/ 
129b7(mdo sde): mchi ma rdul dang mchil mas brlan la gcin gyis bsgyur cing khrag gi thigs pas gang / zhag dang rnag dang lgang pa dang ni klad rgyas dag dang sdig pa rnams kyis gang // rtag tu ngan skyugs zag
129b8(mdo sde): cing kun kyang dri ma sna tshogs tha dad pa// lpags pa so dang skra dang spu yis bsgyur cing lpags pas g.yogs la spu dang ldan// rgyu ma mchin pa mcher pa chu ser kha chu 'di dag bsags pa
130a1(mdo sde): nyam chung ba// rkang dang chu rgyus dag gis sbrel te 'khrul 'khor 'dra zhing sha yis mdzes par byas// sna tshogs nad kyis gang zhing mya ngan khyab la dkres dang skom pas kun tu nyam/ 
130a2(mdo sde): skye ba po dag lus ni bu ga mang zhing 'chi dang rga ba'i gnas gyur pa// mthong nas mkhas pa su zhig rang gi lus la dgra dang mtshungs par sems mi 'gyur/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lus la
130a3(mdo sde): lus su song ba'i dran pas gnas par gyur to// namakha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi lha'i bu chos spyod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po don grub 'di ni btsun mo'i 'khor la rnam
130a4(mdo sde): par lta zhing 'dzum yang ston// sems ni mi dga' mig ni phyi dar zhing lta na phyi shol byed dam cing // yang na 'di ni rgya ma de tshe'i zabs dang mtshungs te 'di tshad gzung bar mi nus so// 
130a5(mdo sde): yang na chags pa med pa 'di yul rnams la yid chags par ni mi 'gyur grang // lha rnams kyis bskul ba'i yid ma brjed par ma gyur grang // lha'i bu chos spyod kyis smras
130a6(mdo sde): de skad smra ci dgos/ 'di sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na yang mngon par 'byung ba dang / gtong ba la rnam pa de lta bur chags pa med par gyur pa/ khyed la mngon sum du gyur pa yin na/ da
130a7(mdo sde): srid pa tha ma par gnas pa chags par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' nges par byas pa/ yid byung bar gyur pa/ blo brtul ba/ tshul du shes shing / 
130a8(mdo sde): rings thabs med par skyil mo krung bshig ste/ glu dbyangs len pa'i khang bzangs na/ shar phyogs su lta zhing 'dug nas/ lag pa g.yas pas rin po che'i dra ba smad de/ khang bzangs kyi
130b1(mdo sde): steng du song nas sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsams nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/ na mkha'i dkyil du bltas pa dang / des mthong ba na mkha'i dkyil na/ 
130b2(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po mig stong dang ldan pa lho brgya stong gis bskor cing / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me/ 
130b3(mdo sde): tog rna rgyan dang / rin po che'i do shal gyi chun po thogs te/ lus btung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang gnod sbyin dang / 
130b4(mdo sde): srin po dang / dri za dang / klu'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / go cha sra ba bgos/ ya lang bgos te/ ral gri dang / dada' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / mtshon rtse gnyis dang / 
130b5(mdo sde): rtse gsum pa lag na thogs shing tshul du shis par nor bu'i chudapan dang / gtsug pud 'phyang bar byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // lha'i bu'i
130b6(mdo sde): ma dang / zla ba gnyis kyang / blo g.yas g.yon na 'dug par mthong ngo // skar ma'i bdag po rgyal yang nam phyed na shar bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la smras pa/ 
130b7(mdo sde): nga yi bkra shis 'di ni don kun 'grub// do nub gdon mi za bar don grub kyis// 'dun pa phyi shol ma byed la gor du// rta rgyal rgyan gyis brgyan pa'ang nga la byin// de nas 'dun pas tshig de
130b8(mdo sde): thos nas yid mi dga' zhing 'di skad ces smras so// smin ma ring zhing pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas 'dra'i spyan mnga' mi yi seng+ge ston ka'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang // me tog ku mu da dang zla ba dang ni dga' ba'i
131a1(mdo sde): / pad+ma'i rdzing bu sar par 'jam pa'i pad+ma rgyas 'dral nal// sbyangs pa'i gser dang nyi ma shar ma thag dang zla ba dri med gzi dang mar blugs me yi 'od 'phro nor bu glog 'od 'bar ba'i gzi brjid
131a2(mdo sde): can// glang po rgyags pa 'gying ba'i glang po'i stobs can ba lang khyu mchog ri dgas rgyal dang ngang ba'i stabs can stabs mdzes shin tu zhabs legs gang du bzhud// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 
131a3(mdo sde): 'dun pa gang gi shin tu nga yis sngon chad lag pa rkang pa mig dang de bzhin mgo dang lus btang zhing // chung ma dang ni phangs pa'i rgyal srid nor gser gos dang rin chen gang ba'i shing rta glang po rlung
131a4(mdo sde): mgyogs shugs ldan rta po rtsal mchog ldan pa btang // ba skal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas tshul khrims ngas bsrung sa bzod pa yongs bsgoms brtson 'grus stobs dang bsam
131a5(mdo sde): gtan shes rab dag/ de lta mod kyi byang chub zhi ba shis pa tho kha nas rga shi'i rgya mor chud pa'i sems can nga yis yod sa su dgrol ba'i dus la bab// 'dun pas smras pa/ jo bo khyod/ 
131a6(mdo sde): bltams ma thag tu lta khri phyir/ bram ze ltas mkhan rnams la bstan na/ de dag gis khyod rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i spyan sngar/ lha khyod kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan ces bdag
131a7(mdo sde): gis thos so// smras pa/ ji lta bur 'gyur/ smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di ni bsod nams brgya mtshan ldan// khyod kyi bu btsas bsod nams gzi brjid can// de ni gling bzhi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur/ 
131a8(mdo sde): nor bdun dang ni rab tu ldan par 'gyur// gal te 'jig rten sdug bsngal bltas nas ni// btsun mo'i 'khor spangs mngon par byung gyur na// byang chub rga shi med pa'i gnas thob ste// chos kyi chu yis skye
131b1(mdo sde): dgu 'di tshim byed// jo bo lung bstan pa 'di ni mchi ste/  mtshas masas mang sa 'on gyis kyang phan par 'tshal ba bdag gi tshig gsan par gsol/ smras pa ci zhig smras pa lha cig gang gi don tu 'dim pa/ 
131b2(mdo sde): cig brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub rnam pa du ma rtsom ste/ ri dgas kyi lpags pa dang / ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / rtswa dang / shing shun gyon pa dang / sen mo dang skra dang / ag tsem ring por 'jog pa dang / 
131b3(mdo sde): lus la gdung ba dang / yongs su gdung ba rnam pa du ma spro bar bgyid de/ bdag cag ji ltar lha dang / mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhes brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub drag po rtsom mo// 
131b4(mdo sde): po phun sum tshogs pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes lags te/ dal srid 'byor cing rgyas la bde zhing lo legs te/ nyams dga' zhing mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba 'ang dang bskyed mos tshal
131b5(mdo sde): dam pa mchog me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ bya'i tshogs sna tshogs sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa 'di dag dang / rdzing me tog dang / ud pa la dang / pad+ma
131b6(mdo sde): dang ta ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos mdzes par gyur pa ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / khu byug dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ngang skya sgra skad 'byin pa/ shing a mra dang / mya ngan 'chang dang / tsam pa ka dang
131b7(mdo sde): ku ra ba ka dang / ge sa ra la sogs pa shing me tog chags pa sna tshogs kyis 'gram 'khor ba/ rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kyi phreng gis legs par brgyan pa/ mig mangs ris su bkod pa/ rin po che sna
131b8(mdo sde): tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyad pa/ dgun dang dbyar dang ston dang dpyid gnas par bde ba rnams dang / khang bzangs chen po chos dang / 
132a1(mdo sde): chos bzang dang / bde ba dang / mya ngan bral ba la sogs pa rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa lta bu ston ka'i sprin 'dra ba/ gangs ti se lta bu stegs bu dang / sgo khang dang / rta bangs dang / skar khung dang / 
132a2(mdo sde): bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyams kyis legs par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba sgra 'byung ba 'di dag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / rol mo'i cha spyang rgyud gcig pa dang / bi
132a3(mdo sde): bang dang / khar rnga dang / gling bu dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg dang / kim pa la dang / na gul dang / sgra snyan pa dang / rdza rnga dang / pa Ta ha dang / glu dang / gar dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / glu dbyang
132a4(mdo sde): sbyar ba legs par bslabs pa dgod pa dang / 'jo ba dang / rtse ba nga dang / dga' ba dang / tshul du shes pa dang / spyod pa mdzes rapa 'di dang ni ldan la/ lha khyod kyang dar ni ma yol te/ gzhon pa
132a5(mdo sde): thor bu dar la bab pa/ lus 'jam pa/ lang 'tsho la bab pa/ dbu skra gnag pa/ 'dod pa la ma rol pa lags kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po mig stong dang ldan pa/ lha'i bdag
132a6(mdo sde): bopo lta bur re shig dgyes par rol la/ slad kyis bgres nas mngon par 'byung bar mdzod cig/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// sum cu rtsa gsum 'jig rten lha dbang ltar// dgyes pa'i
132a7(mdo sde): cho ga mkhyen pa dgyes par rol// slad kyis bgres par gyur nas brtul zhugs dang // dka' thub dag ni yang dag brtsam par mdzod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa mi dgos te/ 'dod pa 'di dag ni mi rtag pa
132a8(mdo sde): mi brtan dazer zug ma yin pa/ 'gyur ba'i chos can myur du 'gro ba/ g.yo ba ri gzar po'i chu'i shugs dang 'dra ba/ zil pa'i thigs pa ltar ring du mi gnas pa/ lag pa bcangs pa stong pas byis pa bring pa
132b1(mdo sde): ltar snying po med pa/ chu shing gi snying po ltar mthu med pa/ snod so ma btang ba ltar mthar 'jig pa/ ston ka'i sprin ltar skad cig byung nas med par 'gyur ba/ na mkha'i glog ltar ring du mi gnas pa/ dug da
132b2(mdo sde): bcas pa'i snod ltar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal can/ 'khri shing ma lu ta ltar mi bde ba 'byin pa/ byis pa'i blo can rnams kyis 'dod par bya ba/ chu'i chu bur lta bur myur du 'gyur ba'i chos can/ smig
132b3(mdo sde): rgyu ltar 'du shes phyin ci log las byung ba/ sgyu ma ltar sems phyin ci log gis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ rmi lam ltar lta ba phyin log gis yongs su zin pa/ rgya mtsho dgang dka' ba ltar ngoms mi
132b4(mdo sde): shes par byed pa/ tsha chu ltar skom par byed pa/ sbrul gyi mgo lhur reg par bya dka' ba// g.yang sa chen po ltar ma kha ngas pa rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa/ shes rab can gyis
132b5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang / rtsod pa dang bcas pa dang / nyes pa dang bcas pa dang / skyon dang bcas parashes nas/ rnam par spangs pa/ rig pa rnams kyis smang
132b6(mdo sde): pa'aphags pa rnams kyis bshungs pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis ma sngags pa/ mi mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ byas pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin no// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
132b7(mdo sde): 'di yang smras so// mkhas pa rnams kyis sbrul gyi mgo bzhin spangs// ngan skyugs snod bzhin mi gtsang rnam par spangs// 'dun pa dge ba thams cad 'jig byed par// 'dod pa shes nas pa
132b8(mdo sde): ni dga' ma skye// de'i tshe bdun pa zug rngus zug pa bzhin du skad phyung ste ngu zhing de nas mig nas mchi ma zag la/ sdug bsngal zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so// lha cig gang gi don du 'di na kha cig
133a1(mdo sde): / brtul zhugs rnam pa mang po rtsom ste ri dgas lpags pa 'chang // skra dang sen mo a gcom ring du 'jog cing de bzhin shing shun gyon la yan lag skams shing brtul zhugs gnas// sred pa dang
133a2(mdo sde): ni ldam ldum dag dang ma 'drus 'bras ze kha cig spyi tshugs 'dug dang ba lang brtul zhugs gnas// ji ltar bdag cag 'gro ba'i gtso bo khyad 'phags 'khor los sgyur ba mchog dang de bzhin 'jig rten
133a3(mdo sde): skyong ba dang // brgya byin rdo rje 'chang dang 'thab bral lha dbang 'phrul bar 'gyur snyam tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bsam gtan bde ba 'dod// mi yi dam pa khyod kyi rgyal srid 'di ni shin tu 'byor cing rab tu rgyas la
133a4(mdo sde): shin tu lo legs pa/ de bzhin kun dga'i ra ba dag dang ba skye mos tshal dang khang bzangs mthon po rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa mtshungs// bud med 'di dag rnams kyang pi bang dang ni gling bu dag
133a5(mdo sde): dang glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra len cing mchis// dga'/ bar bgyid dang gar dang glu dbyangs sbyar ba shin tu bslab/ sa pa 'di dag spyod cing nges pa ma bzhud cig/ byang chub sems
133a6(mdo sde): dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa nyon cig 'dod pa'i rgyus ni sngon gyi tshe rabs dag na bcings dang bcos dang brdegs dang bsdigs pa sdug bsngal brgya dag ngas ni bzod byas 'dus byas rnams la nga yis
133a7(mdo sde): yid byung byas ma gyur// sngon chad bag med dbang du song zhing gti mug dkrugs la lta ba'i dra bas dkris shing mun gyur chos 'di mi shes pa las byung ste bdag tu 'du shes 'dzin dang tshor ba po las 'das/ 
133a8(mdo sde): dngos po 'di dag thams cad g.yo zhing 'gyur la mi rtag sprin dang mtshungs shing glog dang 'dra ste zil pa'i thigs pa 'dra zhing gsog gsob snying po med la bag yod ma yin stong par gyur pa ste/ 
133b1(mdo sde): nga yi yid ni yul la chags pa med kyis 'dun pa rta rgyal dam pa bsngags ldan da byin nga sngon bsams pa'i bkra shis rdzogs kyis thams cad zil gnon chos kun dbang phyug chos rgyal thub par
133b2(mdo sde): 'gyur// 'dun pas smras pa/ pad+ma 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan zhing // do shal nor bu rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// mkha' la sprin tshegs dag las byung ba'i glog 'dra ba// mal
133b3(mdo sde): na rnam par mdzes pa 'di la mi gzigs sam// pir lding dang ni kha rnga dag dang sgra snyan dang // rdza rnga dag dang gling bu glu dbyangs len pa dang // bya ba nga rma bya ka la bing ka sgra 'byin pa// mi 'am ci'i khyim 'dra
133b4(mdo sde): 'di yang dor lags sam/ sum na dang ud pa la dang bar sha ka/ tsam pa ka dang dri mchog 'phreng ba me tog brgyus// dus kyi a ga ru mchog bdug pas rab bdugs dang // byug pa
133b5(mdo sde): dam pa de dag la yang mi gzigs sam// shin tu dri ba ngang dri ldan ro bro gya nom dang // skyu rum dag dang bshos/ gtsang shin tu legs sbyar dang // skyems kyi ro yang khar bcas
133b6(mdo sde): par rab sbyar ba// 'di la'ang mi gzigs par ni lha khyod gang du bzhud// grang ba'i dus na byug pa dro ba dam pa dang // tsha ba'i dus na tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang // ka shi pa yin bza' bzang po mang
133b7(mdo sde): po dang / de dag la yang mi gzigs lha khyod gang du bzhud// lha yul dag na lha rnams dag ni ci 'dra bar// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di dag rab 'byor pa// dga' zhing bde dang ldan la dgyes par
133b8(mdo sde): rol mdzod de// de nas shAkya'i dam pa nags tshal bzung bar mdzod// de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa ngas ni bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med par gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro pa/ 
134a1(mdo sde): / reg dang mi dang lha yi 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyad kyang ngoms par 'gyur ba med// rgyal po'i sras mchog gyur te dbang phyug byas shing gang tshe gling bzhi dag tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i
134a2(mdo sde): rgyal por gyur nas rin chen sna bdun ldan zhing bud med dag gi nang na 'dug pa dang // sum cu rtsa gsum dbang dang 'thab bral rab kyi lha dbang byas shing de dag nas ni shi 'phos 'dir 'ongs sprul pa'i
134a3(mdo sde): lha yi nang na yid 'ong dpal ldan dam pa nga yis sngon chad spyad// lha yi gnas su dbang sgyur bdud kyi dbang po byas shing 'dod pa mchog tu spyad kyang ngoms ma gyur na da ci dman pa 'di la bsten pas
134a4(mdo sde): nga ngoms 'gyur ram de ni gnas min no// gzhan yang 'dun pa da ni sdug bsngal mya ngan dgon pa'i 'khor bar gnas pa nyo// rten mongs gdug pas dkrugs shing nyams ngas rtag tu
134a5(mdo sde): khyer te mgon med skyabs med cing // gti mug ma rig mun pa dang ga na rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dag gis nyen la skye ba'i sdug bsngal dgra yis kun tu gnon cing rnam par
134a6(mdo sde): gnod pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// ngas 'dir chos kyi gru bzang gtong dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs bzod pa brtson 'grus stobs can dag gi shing tshogs bsogs te sbyar nas lhag pa'i bsam
134a7(mdo sde): pa snying po ldan pa rdo rje lta bus brtan pos gzungs btab sbyar// gru de rang nyid zhugs nas bdag nyid rgal te bdag gis 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dag 'khor ba'i chu bo 'dol par che ba khro ba'i dpa'
134a8(mdo sde): rlabs ldan pa 'dod chags 'dzin khri glong 'khyil dgra yis rnam par dkrugs pa rgal bar dka' las bsgral lo snyam ste nga sems de 'dra'o// de phyir srid mtsho dgrar bcas lta ba'i 'dzin khri
134b1(mdo sde): dang // nyon mongs srin po yod pa'ang las bdag rgal te// bdag nyid rgal bar gyur nas 'gro ba mtha' yas pa// rga med 'chi med zhi ba'i thang la dgod par bya// de'i tshe 'dun pa de bas kyang rab
134b2(mdo sde): tungu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// lha de ltar nges par mdzad dam/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa nga yis nges par byas pa nyon// sems can dgrol phyir phan par bya phyir bcom
134b3(mdo sde): mi g.yo las kyang mi g.yo gnod pa med// ri rgyal lhun po lta bur brtan mi g.yo// 'dun pas smras pa/ jo bo'i nges pa ci 'dra ba cig lags/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rdo rje gnam
134b4(mdo sde): lcags dgra sta mdung thung mda' char dang / lcags bskol glog dgi tshogs ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang // ri rtse kun tu 'bar ba mgo steng rab 'bab kyang // nga ni khyim la 'dod pa'i phyir
134b5(mdo sde): yang mi skyed do// de'i tshe lha'i bu na mkha' la 'khod pa dag gi sa ca co dang gzha'i sgra brgya stong phyung ste/ me tog gi char yang phab nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 
134b6(mdo sde): yul rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags shing // sems can dag pa snying rje snying brtser ldan// blo gros mchog ldan rgyal gyur rgyal gyur cig/ mgon po 'gro la mi 'jigs sbyin mdzad pa/ 
134b7(mdo sde): mkha' la rdul gnag du ba 'jug rings dag/ mi chags bzhin du skyes mchog thugs mi chags// dri med yul gyi bde bas mi gos te// chu las pad+ma ji ltar 'phags pa bzhin// dge slong
134b8(mdo sde): dag de nas lha'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros dang / lha'i bu rtse ba bkod pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa ri gnas/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u
135a1(mdo sde): dang / bu mo thams cad gnyid kyis log par byas so// sgra thams cad kyang mi grag par byas so// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad
135a2(mdo sde): gnyid kyis log par rig/ nam gyi gung la bab par rig nas/ skar ma'i bdag po rgyal dang ldan par rig/ de kho na mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab par rig nas/ 'dun pa la smras pa/ 'dun pa nga
135a3(mdo sde): skyo bar ma byed par rta bsngags ldan legs par brgyan te/ ma thogs par nga la byin// byang chub sems dpas tshig de skad smras ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de nyid la rgyal po chen po bzhis/ byang chub
135a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshig thos nas/ rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rang rang gi bkod pas rings rings par yang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer
135a5(mdo sde): chen por 'ongs so// de ni dri za'i bdag po rgyal po yul 'khorasrung ni dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang / lhan cig tu sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing / 
135a6(mdo sde): shar phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur to// 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gan sa kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i shar phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' la
135a7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po ni grul bum mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'phyang ba nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa/ spos chu sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i
135a8(mdo sde): bum pa thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ 
135b1(mdo sde): ltar 'ongs pa'i lho phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang ni klu mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin
135b2(mdo sde): po che sna tshogs thogs pa/ spos kyi phye ma dang / me tog gi char gyi sprin kun nas slong ba'i rlung dal zhing dri zhim pa sna tshogs gtong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu nub phyogs
135b3(mdo sde): nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
135b4(mdo sde): zhing 'dug go// rgyal po chen po lus ngan ni gnod sbyin nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer thog pa lag na maradame thogs pa/ sgron ma 'bar ba lag na thogs pa
135b5(mdo sde): mda' gzhu dang / ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / tshon rtse gnyis pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang 'khor lo dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / 'phang mdung
135b6(mdo sde): la sogs pa/ mtshon cha sra ba thogs/ go cha dang ya lang sra ba bgos pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas
135b7(mdo sde): kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i byang phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// lha'i dbang po
135b8(mdo sde): brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me tog rna brgyan dang / rgyan thog
136a1(mdo sde): rnams dang lhan cig tu 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i steng gi bar snang la 'khor dang bcas te/ 
136a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ dge slong dag de ltar 'dun pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas/ mig mchi mas gang zhing byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces
136a3(mdo sde): smras so// jo bo khyod ni dus mkhyen pa/ tshed mkhyen pa/ ran pa mkhyen pa lags na/ da ltar ni bzhud pa'i dus dang chod ma lags na/ ci'i slad du bka' de skad sprul/ byang chub sems
136a4(mdo sde): dpes smras pa/ 'dun pa da ni dus la bab po// smras pa/ jo bo gang gi dus la bab/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sems can rnams kyi don ni tshol ba na/ byang
136a5(mdo sde): chub rga shi med pa'i gnas thos nas// 'gro ba dgrol zhes nga yis yun ring nas// smon lam btab pa de yi dus la bab// de la 'di ni chos nyid de// de la
136a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bya ste// sa bla pa dang bar snang de bzhin skyong // lha dbang brgya byin rang gi phyogs dang bcas// 'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang
136a7(mdo sde): byed lha rnams brtson par 'gyur// klu rgyal chu lha dang ni gzi can dang // ma dros pa dang de bzhin rgya mtsho yang // mi mchog mngon par 'bang ba'i dus bab pas// de dag rnams kyang mchod
136a8(mdo sde): phyir brtson par gyur// gang dag gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang // rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul rab zhi spyad// de dag rnams kyang 'jig rten gsum mchod pa// mi mchog de la
136b1(mdo sde): mchod phyir mngon par brtson// sngon spyad spyod che grogs por gyur pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu lhags pa yang // rgyal ba mngon par 'byung ba lta byed cing // rjes su 'thun
136b2(mdo sde): bas mchod pa bya snyam byed// gsang po'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po de// rdo rje 'bar thogs nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas// lus la go bgos stobs brtson rtsal dang ldan// gsang ba lag
136b3(mdo sde): na rdo rje 'bar ba thogs// lha'i bu nyi ma zla ba de gnyis kyang // g.yas dang g.yon na rab tu gnas par gyur// sor mo bcu yi thal mo sbyar byas te// mngon par 'byung la rjes su rtog par
136b4(mdo sde): byed/ skar ma rgyal de 'khor dang bcas pa yang // rang nga gi lus ni rgya chen sprul byas te// mi yi dam pa de'imadun 'dug nas// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ni rab 'byin te/ 
136b5(mdo sde): skar ma rgyal ldan bzhud pa'i dus la bab// do nub khyod dge bkra shis thams cad grub// bdag kyang khyod dang thabs gcig mchi bar bgyi// 'dod chags sol ba bar
136b6(mdo sde): chad 'byung ma gyur// lta bu yang dag skul pos bskul byas pa// stobs dang brtson 'grus 'phags pa myur du bzhengs// sdug bsngal nyen pa'i sems can thams cad sgrol// da ni mngon
136b7(mdo sde): par 'byung ba'i dus la bab// lha rnams bye ba stong phrag mang po yang // yid 'ong me tog char pa 'bebs shig lhags// de ni skyil mo krung bcas mchog la 'dug/ lha yis bskor cing mdzes
136b8(mdo sde): la gzi brjid 'bar// grong khyer na ni skyes pa bud med khye'u dang bu mo gang yod pa// de dag thams cad yid ngal gyur nas nyal te spyod lam rnams las nyams// rta dang glang po ba lang ne tse
137a1(mdo sde): // drung khrung chubyar glegs rnams// de dag kun kyang yid ngal gyur la nyal te de dag gzugs mi mthong // shAkya'i bu gang rdo rje srab mtshon ma rtse gnyis thogs bkod dang / glang chen rta dang shing \u0f7f\u0f7f
137a2(mdo sde): babs mchog drung bkod pa de dag nyal// rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo kun kyang gnyis kyis log par gyur// bud med tshogs rnams gnyid log gos bral gcer bur gyur kyang yong ma tshor// de ni
137a3(mdo sde): tshangs dbyangs yid du 'ong tshig ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs kyis// nam phyed 'das te nam gyi gung la bab nas 'dun pa de la smras// 'dun pa rta po bsngags ldan bzang po legs par nga la byin// gal
137a4(mdo sde): te nga la byams par sems na bgegs ma byed par myur du byin// 'dun pas tshig thos mchi mas mig gang rang gi jo bo de la smras// sems can kha lo sgyur mchog gar bzhud bcibs
137a5(mdo sde): pas khyod la ci zhig bgyi// dus mkhyen cing ni chod mkhyen chos spyod gang du'ang gshegs pa'i dus ma lags// khyod/ kyi sgo bkum gtan pa dam stsal su yang chab sgro 'byed mi
137a6(mdo sde): 'gyur// brgya byin gyi ni yid kyi sems pa'i dbang gis sgo yang bye bar gyur// 'dun pas de 'dra mthong nas dga' zhing sdug bsngal de ni mchi ma 'khor// kyi hung bdag grogs su yod ji ltar bya
137a7(mdo sde): zhing phyogs ni gar brgyug snyam// gzi brjid ldan pas drag shul can gyi tshig smras brgya byin 'ba' shig thos// yan lag bzhi ldan dpung bcas 'di yang 'di na ci zhig byed// rgyal po rgyal bu
137a8(mdo sde): rgyal po'i skye bo de dag rnams kyis de mtshor// bud med tshogs kyang gnyid log lha rnams kyis ni grags ldan gnyid log byas// kyi hud 'di yis sngon chad bsams pa'i smon lam thams cad grub
137b1(mdo sde): gyur cig/ lha stong bye ba de dag dga' ba'i yid kyis 'dun pa de la smras// 'dun pa rta mchog bsngags ldan legs par phul cig 'dun pa skyo mi bya// lha dang lha min ngag gis rnga dung rdza rnga rol mo khrag khrig
137b2(mdo sde): byas/ 'on kyang lhas bskal pa'i grong khyer mchog 'di sad par yong ma gyur// 'dun pa bar snang dri ma med pa lha yi 'od rab mdzes la ltos// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' bye ba mang po mchod phyir
137b3(mdo sde): gang lhags ltos// bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin dpung bskor sgo na mdzes par 'dug pa dang // lha dang lha min mi 'am ci tshogs gang dag mchod phyir lhags la ltos// 'dun pa des kyang lha tshig
137b4(mdo sde): de thos bsngags ldan rta bo de la smras// sems can kha lo sgyur mchog 'di bzhud khyod ni rta skad sgrogs shing shog/ de yi das dbyar gyi kha dog can de rmig pa gser gyis brgyan byas
137b5(mdo sde): nas/ yid mi dga' bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i chi bas par dbul ba byas// mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan mdza nga khyod kyi chibs 'di rigs bzang dge ba legs// khyod kyi
137b6(mdo sde): sngon chad gang bgos smon lam de grub gyur cing gshegs su gsol// gang dag bgegs bgyid zhi bar gyur cig dgongs pa'i brtul zhugs grub gyur cig/ 'gro ba kun la bde dang mtho ris pa
137b7(mdo sde): dang zhi ba sbyin gyur cig/ de ni gang che mal nas langs tshes 'di thams cad rnam drug g.yos// rta rgyal dam pa zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba de la zhon// skyong ba'i lag pa rnam dag pad+ma dri med 'dra
137b8(mdo sde): bas rta mchog bteg/ brgya byin tshangs pa de gnyis de yi mdun na lam ni 'di zhes ston// de yis gsal ba dri ma med pa'i 'od btangs sa rnams snang bas gsal// de tshe ngan song kun zhi
138a1(mdo sde): sems can bde ldan nyon mongs gnod pa med// me tog char bab sil snyan bye ba sgra byung lha min bstod// thams cad dga' dang ldan nas grong khyer mchog la bskor ba byas te dong // skyes
138a2(mdo sde): bu chen po song bas grong khyer dam pa'i lha yang yid ni dman par gyur nas 'ongs// mdun du 'dug nas snying rjer ngu ba'i yid ldan de yis pad+ma 'dra bzhin la smras// khyod bral sgren mor mi mdzes sa 'di grong
138a3(mdo sde): khyer thams cad mun pas kun tu dkrugs par gyur// do nub khyod kyis khab 'di spangs na bdag la dga' bde bgyid pa 'di na 'ga' ma mchis// slan chad bya tshogs rnams kyi sgra dag dang // grags pa
138a4(mdo sde): mtha' yas khyod ni sad bgyid pa'i// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gli dang bu snyan pa dang // bkra shis sgra dang glu sgra thos mi 'gyur // nyon mongs bcom pa khyod ni gshegs gyur na// gdugs
138a5(mdo sde): mtshan khyod la mchod pa bgyid pa yi// lha dang grub tshogs slan chad mthong mi 'gyur// lha yi dri yang slan chad sna ma mi 'gyur// phreng ba btags nas zhag lon gyur pa ltar// 
138a6(mdo sde): khyod kyis ngo nub pho brang de bzhin spangs// khyod bzhud slan chad gzi brjid dpal ma mchis// gar la lta ba bzhin du bdag la lta// grong khyer kun gyi byin dang stobs phrogs te// 'di ni dgon pa
138a7(mdo sde): 'dra zhing mdzes ma lags// gang gis sa 'dir 'khor lo stobs can du// lung bstan drang srong tshig ni deng brdzun gyur// bsod nams sdong po chen po khyod byung na// sa 'dir shAkya'i stobs ni stobs ma
138a8(mdo sde): mchis// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir gdung yang 'chad// shAkya'i tshogs 'di bsam pa rab tu nyams// dri med dri bral khyod ni gar bzhud par// bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig mchi bar bgyi// 
138b1(mdo sde): 'on kyang thugs brtse thugs rje bskyed nas ni// khyod kyis pho brang 'di la gzigs su gsol// blo gros ldan pa khyim la bltas nas ni// snyan pa'i nga ros 'di skad tshig smras te// skye 'chi mthar phyin ma
138b2(mdo sde): thob bar du ni// nga yis ser skya'i grong khyer 'jug mi bya// rga shi med pa'i gnas mchog 'chi med pa// byang chub dam pa nga yis ma thob par// nga ni ser skya'i gnas su mngon phyogs te// 'greng
138b3(mdo sde): 'dug nyal dang 'chag par mi bya'o// gang tshe 'gro ba'i gtso bo pa// byang chub sems dpa' de byung zhing // de ni mkha' las 'gro ba'i tshe// lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod// 'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas
138b4(mdo sde): chen yin// 'di ni bsod nams zhing chen yin// 'di ni bso dad nams 'dod pa'i zhing // 'chi med 'bras bu smin ma dzad pa// sems can rnams la thugs rje bas// 'di yis
138b5(mdo sde): bskal pa bye mang du// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis// 'i das ni byang chub yang dag bsgrubs// 'di'i tshul khri mas yongs su dag/ brtul zhugs bzang zhing spyod ma
138b6(mdo sde): nyams// 'dod pa dag dang longs spyod rnams// don tu mi gnyer tshul khrims srung // sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir// 'di ni rtag tu bzod pa gsungs// yan lag nying lag bcad
138b7(mdo sde): gyur kyang // khro ba mi mnga' sdang mi mnga'// 'di ni rtag tu brtson 'grus ldan// bskal pa bye bar skyo mi mnga'// 'di yis byang chub yan lag bsgrubs// mchod sbyin dag ni bye ba mdzad// 'di
138b8(mdo sde): rtag bsam gtan bsam gtan pa// thugs ni zhi zhing rab tu zhi// nyon mongs thams cad bsregs nas ni// sems can bye ba 'grol bar 'gyur// 'di ni shes rab chags mi mnga'// rtog dang
139a1(mdo sde): rnam par rtog ldan las// grol zhing thugs ni rnam grol te// rang byung ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'di ni rtag tu byams thugs ldan// thugs rje yi ni pha rol byon// dga' dang btang snyom/ 
139a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan pa// tshangs pa'i lam gyi cho ga mkhyen// 'di ni shin tu lha yi lha// lha rnams kyis ni mchod pa'i 'os// thugs dge dag cing dri ma bral// yon tan khrag khrig pha rol byon// 'jig
139a3(mdo sde): pas nyen pa rnams kyi skyabs// mig med rnams kyi sgron ma ste// gnod pa rnams kyi skyabs kyang lags// rings nas na ba'i sman pa lags// rgyal po dam pa chos kyi rgyal// dbang po lta bur
139a4(mdo sde): spyan stong mnga'// tshangs pa lta bur rang byung gyur// lus dang sems ni rab sbyangs pa// brtan zhing shes rab rab tu mang // dpa' zhing thugs ni 'dod chags bral// nyon mongs
139a5(mdo sde): 'joms pas dpa' bo ste// ma rgyal dgra las rgyal ba la gas// seng+ge lta bur brnyengs pa spangs// glang po lta bu ra rab dul thugs// khyu mchog lta bur tshogs kyi gtso// 
139a6(mdo sde): bzod de 'khrugs pa rab tu spangs// zla ba lta bur rab tu gsal// nyi ma lta bur snang ba mdzad// sgron ma lta bur gsal mdzad pa// skar ma lta bur mun pa bral// pad+ma lta bur chags mi mnga'
139a7(mdo sde): me tog lta bur khrims mi bda'// ston pa lhun po ltar mi g.yo// dog sa lta bur gsos su gyur// rin chen 'byung gnas ltar mi 'khrugs// 'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal// 'di ni
139a8(mdo sde): 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal// 'di ni lha yi bdud kyang bcom// 'di ni ded dpon chen po ste// lam ngan dag na gnas rnams la// yan lag brgyad pa lam gyi mchog/ ring por mi thogs
139b1(mdo sde): ston par 'gyur// rga shi nyon mongs 'jom pa po// mun pa rab rib rnam par grol// sa dang lha yul grags pa yi// rang byung rgyal bar byon pa lags// skyes bu mchog gi gzugs mnga' ba// dpag tu
139b2(mdo sde): med la bstod pas bstod// khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams des// smra ba'i seng ge 'dra bar shog/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung nas// shAkya'i yul dang / ko'u ta'i
139b3(mdo sde): yul dang / gyad yul las 'das te/ me ne ya'i yul gyi grong rdal rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba nas/ dpag tshad drug tu byang chub sems dpa' phyin pa dang / nam nangs par gyur to// de nas byang chub
139b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rta bsngags ldan las babs te/ sa la 'dug na das/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yi/ dan dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i
139b5(mdo sde): tshogs chen po slar bkye'o// slar bkye nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyan 'di dag dang / rta bsngags ldan yang 'dun kha'i lag tu gtad de/ slar btang ngo snyam mo// de nas byang
139b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpas 'dun pa la bos te/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'dun pa khyod song la rgyan 'di dag dang rta bsngags ldan khyer te slar log shig/ sa phyogs gang nas 'dun pa slar log pa der mchod
139b7(mdo sde): rten brtsigs te/ deng sang du yang mchod rten de la 'dun pa slar log pa'i mchod rten zhes grags pa yin no// yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar na gtsug pud kyang yod la rab
139b8(mdo sde): tu byung ba zhes bya bar yang 'gyur snyam nas/ des ral gris gtsug pud bcad de bar snang la bor ba dang / de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyir blangs te/ deng sang du yang sum cu
140a1(mdo sde): rgya gsum pa'i lha rnams gtsug phud kyis dus ston byed do// der mchod rten yang byas te/ deng sang du yang mchod rten de gtsug phung blangs pa'i mchod rten zhes ming du chags so// yang byang chub
140a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ rab tu byung nas yang gos ka shi ba gyon pa ji ltar rung gi gal te nags tshal gyi gnas nas/ tshul dang 'thun pa'i gos shig rnyed na ni/ legs so snyam du sems pa dang / 
140a3(mdo sde): de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' la ngur smrig bgos par gyur to snyam mo// de na lha'i bu gcig gcig lha'i gzugs mi mngon par byas te/ rngon pa'i
140a4(mdo sde): gzugs lta bus gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ byang chub sems dra ba'i mdun du phyin to// de nas byang chub sems dpas de la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te grogs po khyod kyis gos ngur smrig
140a5(mdo sde): de rnams/ kho bo la byin na kho bo'i gos ka shi ba 'di rnams kyang khyod la sbyin no// des smras pa/ gos 'di dag kyang khyod la mdzes la// 'o ni rnams kyang kho bo la mdzes so// byang
140a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho bos khyod la bslang ngo // de nas lho'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu des gos ngur smrig rnams byang chub sems dpa' la byin te/ gos ka shi ba rnams kyang blangs so// de
140a7(mdo sde): nas lha'i bu des gus pa bskyed de// lag pa gnyi gas gos de dag blangs nas spyi bo la bzhag ste/ de dag la mchod pa dang / bkur bsti bya ba'i phyir/ de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo // de yang
140a8(mdo sde): 'dun pas mthong bar gyur nas der mchod rten brtsigs te/ deng sang du yang mchod rten ngur smrig blangs pa zhes ming du chags so// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas gtsug pud bcad nas/ gos
140b1(mdo sde): ngur smrig rnams bgos pa de'i tshe/ lha'i bu brgyad stong dag dga' zhing mgu la tshim zhing yid rangs te/ mchog tu rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ kye grogs po dag gzhon nu
140b2(mdo sde): don grub rab tu byung ngo // kye grogs po dag gzhon nu don grub rab tu byung ngo // de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar
140b3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ sems can skye ba'i chos can grangs med pa dag skye bas yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ba nas/ rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / na ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
140b4(mdo sde): dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las sems can rna dmas yongs su bkrol te/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu bsgral nas/ bde ba/ 'jigs pa med pa/ mya ngan med pa/ 
140b5(mdo sde): gnod pa med pa/ zhi ba/ rdul dang bral ba/ 'chi ba med pa 'i chos kyi dbyings la 'god par 'gyur ro zhes pa nas a la la zhes bya ba dang / ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra skad phyung
140b6(mdo sde): bar gyur to// sgra de yang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud nas/ 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du grag par gyur to// de nas btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyis gzhon nu ma mthong nas/ dpyid dang dgun dang dbyar
140b7(mdo sde): gnas pa'i khang bzangs rnams dang / khri rnams dang / khyim rnams su tshol zhing gang gi tshe/ ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/ gcig tu 'dus nas/ bya kur ra mo bzhin du ngud mo 'thon par gyur to// de na bud med kha
140b8(mdo sde): cig ni shin tu mya ngan gyis nyam thag nas/ kha cig ni kyi hud bu zhes 'dzer cing ngu'o// kha cig ni kyi hud ming po zhes 'dzer cing ngu'o// kha cig ni kyi hud khyim thab ces 'dzer to// kha cig ni rje bo zhes
141a1(mdo sde): // 'dzer to// kha cig ni sdug pa'i tshig sna tshogs smra'o// kha cig ni lus rdeb cing ngu'o// kha cig ni mgo 'bal lo// kha cig ni gcig gi gdong du gcig lta zhing du'o// kha cig ni mig bsgyur
141a2(mdo sde): cing ngu'o// kha cig ni lag pa brla la rdeb cing ngu'o// kha cig ni brang rdung zhing ngu'o// kha cig ni lag pa dpung par rdob cing ngu'o// kha cig ni mgor rdung zhing ngu'o// kha cig ni mgo las 'thor zhing du'o// 
141a3(mdo sde): kha cig ni sgra 'jig cing ngu'o// kha cig ni skra 'bal zhing ngu'o// kha cig ni lag pa bstod de bsgreng nas cho nge 'don to// kha cig ni ri dgas mo dug mangs phog pa bzhin du blo bur du rgyug cing ngu'o// kha
141a4(mdo sde): cig ni gdong gos kyis g.yogs shing ngu'o// kha cig ni chu shing rlung mar gyis bskyod pa bzhin du lus 'khyor zhing du'o// kha cig ni sa la 'gyel te ma shi tsam du gyur to// kha cig
141a5(mdo sde): ni nya chu nas bton pa bzhin du sa la 'gre ldog cing ngu'o// kha cig ni shing rtsa nas bton pa bzhin du glo bur du sa la 'a gyel nas ngu'o// sgra de yang rgyal pos thos nas shAkya rnams la
141a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ ci'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor na sgra chen po 'di grag/ shAkya rnams kyis shes nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor na mi gda' zhes ganga'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ myur du
141a7(mdo sde): grong khyer gyi sgo rnams chod la nang du gzhon nu tshol cig/ de dag gis phyi nang du btsal kyang ma rnyed nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi smre sngags 'don te/ sa la 'gre ldog cing / rgyal po zas
141a8(mdo sde): gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag bu dang myur du sprad du gsol/ de nas rgyal pos phyogs bzhir po nya rta pa bkye ste/ khyod deng la gzhon nu ma rnyed kyi bar du slar ma ldog
141b1(mdo sde): shig/ mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan rnams kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' ni bkra shis kyi chab sgo nas mngon par 'byung ngo // zhes lung bstan nas de dag bkra shis kyi sgor dong ba dang / lam
141b2(mdo sde): gyi bar zhig na me tog gi char bab par mthong ngo // de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu ni lam 'di dag nas byung ngo snyam nas/ de dag chung zad cig pa zad du song ba dang / lha'i bu byang chub
141b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i gos ka shi pa rnams mgo la thogs te/ 'gro ba de mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag ni gzhon nu'i gos ka shi ba rnams yin na/ gos 'di dag gi phyir 'dis gzhon
141b4(mdo sde): nu bsad de 'di dag khyer bar ma gyur tam snyam mo// de nas/ yang de dag gis de'i phyi bzhin du 'dun pa rta bsngags da ldan dang rgyan rnams thogs te 'ong ba mthong ngo // de nas de dag
141b5(mdo sde): phan tshun du smras pa/ kye 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan khri de'o nga gis de lam dris kyi bar du hur 'dums ma byed cig ce sa smras nas/ de dag gis 'dun pa la dris pa/ kye 'dun pa
141b6(mdo sde): gos ka shi pa 'di dag gi phyir mi 'dis gzhon nu bkrongs par ma gyur grang 'dun pa smras pa/ de la ni ma yin/ 'dis kyang gzhon nu la gos ngur smrig rnams phul lo// gzhon nus kyang na bza' ka shi pa 'di
141b7(mdo sde): rnams la byin no// de nas lha'i bu des de dag mchod pa'i phyir/ gos de rnams lag pa gnyi gas spyi bo la thogs te/ de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo // de dag gis 'dun pa la yang dris pa/ 'di
141b8(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems/ kho bo cag shAkya gzhon nu zlog du 'dong na nus sam/ des smras pa/ mi nus so// gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang rtul ba brtan pa yin te/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
142a1(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du nga ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por mi 'jug go zhes de skad gsung bas phyir mi ldog ste/ gzhon nus ji skad gsungs pa de de
142a2(mdo sde): bzhin du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang brtul pa brtan pas slar mi ldog go// de nas 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan dang rgyan rnams khyer te/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du phyin
142a3(mdo sde): to// de nas ring zhig lon pa dang / rgyan de dag shAkya gzhon nu bzang po dang / ming chen dang / ma 'gags pas bteg pa dang / sred med kyi bu chen po ltar mkhregs pa dang / sred med kyi bu phyed ltar
142a4(mdo sde): mkhregs pa'i rgyan de rnams de dag gis ma theg go/ gang dgi tshe de dag gang gis kyang theg par ma nus pa de'i tshe/ skye dadagu'i bdag mo go'u ta mi 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
142a5(mdo sde): gis ji srid du rgyan 'di dag mthong ba de srid du bdag gi snyi nga la mya ngan du 'gyur gyis bdag gis rgyan 'di dag rdzi'i/ du dor ro snyam mo// de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u
142a6(mdo sde): ta mis rgyan de dag rdzing du dong te deng sang du rgyan gyi rdzing bu zhes ming du chags so// de la 'di skad bya ste/ gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dpa' bo byung // de'i ser skya'i grong khyer pa dag mtha'
142a7(mdo sde): dag sad // kun gyi snying lam gzhon nu mal na nyam snyam sems// mgu zhing rab tu dga' nas phan tshun tshig kyang sgra// sa 'tshe ma dang de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rnams sad// mal du bltas na
142a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong nas// kyi hud bdag bslus byang chub sems dpa' gar bzhud ces// rgyal po'i khyim du ngung mo'i sgra yang byung bar gyur// rgyal pos sgra de thos nas sa la 'gyel
142b1(mdo sde): gyur te// e ma nga'i bu gcig pa zhes ngung mo phyung // de nas de la bum pa'i chu blugs khrus byas nas// shAkya mang po dag gis de ni dbugs kyang phyung // sa 'tshom yang mal dus sa la lhung bar
142b2(mdo sde): gyur/ sgra rnams 'bal zhing rgyan rnams dag kyang bkrol bar gyur// sdug pa kun dang 'bral ba ring por mi thogs shes// 'dren pas bdag la sngon gsungs kye ma legs par gsungs// gzu
142b3(mdo sde): ni gzugs bzang shin tu dri med yan lag spras// gsal zhing rnam dag 'gro ba rnams kyi yid 'ong sdug dpal yon ldan pas bsngags pa lha mis mchod pa'i 'os// bdag ni mal du bor te khyod
142b4(mdo sde): ni gang du bzhud// yon tan mnga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong bar// skom yang mi 'tshal rgyags pa rnams kyi ngas rgyags mi bgyid// sa la nyal zhing ral pa rnams kyang
142b5(mdo sde): thogs par bgyi// khrus bgyi spangs te brtul zhugs dka'/ thub spyad par bgyi// bskyed mos tshal kun lo ma me to// ga 'bras ma mchis// rnam dag se mo do yang mun rdul
142b6(mdo sde): phyag dar 'dra// mi mchog dam pa khyod kyis spangs par gang gyur pa'i// grong khyer khyim rnams mdzes pa ma lags 'brog dang mtshungs// kyi hud glu dbyangs rab tu snyan pa'i sgra skad can// kyi
142b7(mdo sde): hud lcug lhug po'i rgyan thogs btsun mo'i 'khor// kyi hud gser gyi dra bas khyab pa'i bar snang yang // yon tan ldan dang bral bas phyin chad mi blta'o// sru mo de yang shin tu sdug bsngal
142b8(mdo sde): thob gyur cing // shAkya'i bu mo ma ngu shig ces dbugs kyang 'byin// nga ni 'jig rten dag na rga shi thar byed ces// mi mchog dam pa des ni sngon yang smras pa yin// drang srong chen po dge
143a1(mdo sde): pa stong dag spyang ba de// nam phyed nas ni dpag tshad drug tu song gyur nas// 'dun pa de la rta mchog dang ni rgyun rnams gtang // 'dun pa 'di dag khyer la ser skya'i grong song shig/ yang
143a2(mdo sde): dang yum dag la yang nga yi tshig gis ni// gzhon nu song gis slar zhing thug ngan ma mdzad cig/ byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni slar 'dir mchi bar bgyi// chos rnams gsan nas thugs kyang zhi bar 'gyur
143a3(mdo sde): zhes smos// 'dun pas de bzhin 'dren pa la ni slar smras pa// 'dun pa legs ldan byang chub sems dpa' gar khrid ces// mi mchog gnyen gyi tshogs rnams bdag la rdeg 'gyur gyis// bdag la
143a4(mdo sde): nus pa ma mchis stobs dang mthu ma mchis// byang chub sem das dpas slar smras 'dun pa ma 'jigs shig/ nga yi ga/ dan gyi tshogs rnams dga' bar gyur nas ni/ khyod la ston po'i
143a5(mdo sde): 'du shes rtag tu sgom 'gyur te// nga la byams pa bzhin du khyod la'ang byams par 'gyur// 'dun pas rta mchog dang ni rgyun rnams khyer nas su// mi mchog dam pa de yi skyed mos tshal du
143a6(mdo sde): phyin// bskyed mos tshal gyi srungs ma dga' ba'i shugs skyes nas// kun tu dga' ba'i sgra ni shAkya rnams la smras// gzhon nu 'di yin rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa yang // bskyed mos tshal du phyin gyis thugs/ 
143a7(mdo sde): ngan ma mdzad cig/ rgyal pos de skad thos nas shAkyas bskor nas ni// rab tu dga' ba'i shugs skyes skyed mos tshal du phyin// sa 'chos byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan rig nas// tshig de la ni
143a8(mdo sde): yid ma ches te dag ra ma gyur// gzhon nu byang chub ma thob bar du phyir 'dir yang // byon cing ldog par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin// rgyal pos rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa de mthong nas// ngud mos
143b1(mdo sde): btab ste sa'i steng du 'gyel bar gyur/ kyi hung nga'i bu gru dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra mkhas// rgyal srid thams cad bor te khyod ni gang du song // 'dun pa khyod kying la 'dir ni legs par smos// byang chub sems/ 
143b2(mdo sde): dpa' gar song sbyor ba ci 'dra zhig/ sgon su yis phye zhing gang gis khrid par gyur// lha tshogs rnams kyis de la mchod pa ji ltar byas// 'dun pas smras pa/ rgyal po'i dbang po bdag la gson// dgung
143b3(mdo sde): byeng srong khyer bris pa rgan po gtung me ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dbyangs bdag la 'di skad du// 'dun pa na rgyal nga la myur du byin gos gsug dgugs skyes pa'i tshogs du da chog kya ngas
143b4(mdo sde): de dag log cing rab tu log pas tshig ma thos// bdag ni du zhi bdag gis chibs kyi rgyal po phul// phan par mdzad pa gang du dgyes par gshegs shes bgyis// brgya byin gyis ni
143b5(mdo sde): 'khrul 'khor ldan pa'i chab sgo phye// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi/ sa ni chibs kyi rkang lag bteg/ dpa' bo bcibs nas/ stong gsum lam rnam rab tu g.yos// namakha' shin tu yangs
143b6(mdo sde): pa 'di las gshegs gyur te// 'di ni rab tu btang bas mun pa mun nag bsal// me tog bab cing sil snyan brgya dag sgra yang byung // lha dang de bzhin lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod// nam mkha' las ni lha
143b7(mdo sde): / tshogs rnams kyis bskor te gshegs// 'dun pa rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams khyer nas su// de ni ngu zhing btsun mo'i 'khor du phyin pa dang // sa 'chos 'dun pa de dang rta mchog mthong gyur nas// 
143b8(mdo sde): rab tu brgyal bar gyur te sa'i steng du 'gyel// bud med tshogs mang thams cad rab tu brtson par ni// chu dag blangs shing shAkya'i bu mo 'khru bar byed// mya ngan rnyed pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur du 'ong/ 
144a1(mdo sde): phangs pa gnyis dang bral bar gyur tu 'ong snyam byed// shAkya'i bu mo sdug bsngal gyur pa mthu bskyed nas// rta yi rgyal po rta mchog de'i mgul nas 'jus// sngon chad dga' bas rtse ba dag
144a2(mdo sde): kyang dran byas nas// mya ngan gyur cing sna tshogs tshig kyang rab tu smra// kyi hud bdag gi dga' skyed kyi hud bdag gi mi mchog dri med zla ba'i zhal mnga' ba// kyi hud bdag gi gzugs mchog gzugs
144a3(mdo sde): can gyi hud bdag gi mtshan mchog gi med gzi brjid ldan// kyi hud bdag gi yan lag ma smad legs par 'khrungs pa rim gyis 'phags pa mnyam med pa// kyi hud bdag gi yon tan mchog ldan lha
144a4(mdo sde): mis mchod pa thugs rje chen por mchog ldan pa// kyi hud ba dag gi stobs ldan sred med bu yi mthu dang ldan pa dgra'i tshogs bcom pa// kyi hud bdag gi shin tu 'jam dbyangs ka la
144a5(mdo sde): bing ka'i sgra skad tshangs dbyangs snyan ldan pa// kyi hud bdag gi grags pa mtha' yas bsod nams brgyas 'phags/ bsod nams rgya chen mnga' ba po// kyi hud bdag gi bsngags
144a6(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas yon tan tshogs brgyan drang srong tshogs rnams dga' mdzad pa// kyi hud bdag gi nags mchog bung ba sgra 'byin lum bi ni der bltam pa legs bltams pa// kyi hud bdag gi sgra
144a7(mdo sde): grags lha mi rnams kyis mngon par mchod pa'i ye shes sdong po che// kyi hud bdag gi ro bro dam pa bim pa'i sgros can pad+ma'i spyan mnga' gser mchog 'dra// kyi hud bdag gi shin tu rnam dag chems
144a8(mdo sde): ldan pa zho ba mo lta bu'o chems ldan pa/ kyi dung bdag gi shangs legs smin legs smin mtshams par na dri med mdzod spu gnas pa po// kyi hung bdag gi dpung mgo rab zlum gzhu 'dra'i rked pa e/ 
144b1(mdo sde): ni'i byin pa rked pa zlum// kyi hud bdag gi glang po'i sna 'dra bar ldan phyag zhabs rnam dag mdzes pa'i sen mo can// de yi rgyan rnams 'di dag bsod nams dag gis byas pa rgyal po'i rab tu dga' byed pa/ 
144b2(mdo sde): kyi hud bdag gi glu dang dbyangs sgra dam pa me tog byug pa bzang po'i dus bzang ba// kyi hud bdag gi me tog spos rnams glu len dag dang btsun mo'i 'khor ni dga' byed pa// kyi hud bsngags ldan legs
144b3(mdo sde): skyes nga yi khyim thab grogs po yin na khyod kyis gang du khrid// kyi hud 'dun pa snying rje med pa mi yi dam pa bzhud tshe sbron cing slong ma phod// do nub grong khyer dam pa 'di nas mi yi kha lo bsgyur ba thugs
144b4(mdo sde): rje ldan gshegs te// phan pa mdzad pa 'di ni gshegs shes skabs der tshig cig tsam zhig ci yi phyir ma smras// phan dpa mdzad pa ji ltar gshegs shing rgyal po'i pho brang 'di nas su
144b5(mdo sde): yis phyung ba byas// gang gi phyogs gshegs nags tshal ge/ la ba'i lha mo de yi grogs su 'gyur ba dpal yon ldan// 'dun pa kho mo shin tu sdug bsngal gter bstan nas ni mig
144b6(mdo sde): phyung 'dra bas mig byin cig/ 'dun pa rgyal ba kun gyi pha dang ma dag mchod pa'i 'os shes rtag tu bsngags mdzad na// de dag rnams kyang spangs te byung na bud med 'dod pa'i dga' ba 'di lta smos ci
144b7(mdo sde): dgos// kyi hud sdug pa rnams dang bral ba gar la lta ba'i rang bzhin 'dra ste rtag ma yin// byis pa 'du shes kyis bzung blta ba phyin ci log pas skye dang 'chi 'pho gnas par gyur// de yis sngon
144b8(mdo sde): chad rga shi ldan pa'i 'dus byas dag la grogs po 'ga' yang med ces bstan// khyod kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs nas shing mchog drung du byang chub dam pa mchog thob gyur// rdul med byang chub
145a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nas ni grong khyer dam pa 'dir ni slar yang gshegs su gsol// 'dun pa de yang mchog tu yid mi dga' zhing sa 'tsho ma yi tshig ni zos gyur nas// de ni nga ro 'don cing tshig tu
145a2(mdo sde): smras pa sa 'tsho ma khyod bdag tshig legs par gson// nam gyi gung thun bud med tshogs rnams thams cad rab tu gnyid kyis log ste dben gyur pa// de yi tshe na bsod nams brgyas 'phags de
145a3(mdo sde): yis bdag la bsngags ldan nga la byin zhes gsung // de skad tshig thos nas ni de ma thag tu bdag gis khyod ni gzims mal gzims la bltas// de tshe khyod kyi sdug pa 'di ni gshegs kyis sa 'tsho
145a4(mdo sde): bzhengs shes sgra skad chen po phyung // lha yis tshig de bkag par gyur pas bud med rnams las 'ga' tsam zhig kyang sang ma gyur// bdag ni rab tu ngu zhing rta yis rgyal po brgyan pa bgyis
145a5(mdo sde): nas mi mchog de la phul// bsngags ldan drag shul can gyi/ gzi ldan sgra phyung de yi sgra ni rgyang grags tsam du grags// // 'on kyang lha yis gnyid kyis log par bgyis pas grong
145a6(mdo sde): khyer pa las 'ga' yang sad ma gyur// gser dang dngul dang nor bu rnams kyis g.yogs pa'i sa la bsngags ldan rkang lag rab tu brdabs// de las snyan dang 'jigs dang mdzes pa'i
145a7(mdo sde): sgra byung 'on kyang mi las 'ga' tsam sad ma gyur// de yi bar skabs skar ma rgyal dang ldan gyur zla ba skar ma dag kyang mkha' la gnas// mkha' las lha rnams bye bas thal mo sbyar te btud nas phyag kyang
145a8(mdo sde): rab tu 'tshal// gnod sbyin srin po'i tshogs rnams nye bar gnas shing 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che ldan bzhis// pad+ma'i ze ba lta bur rnam dag dri med lag pas bsngags ldan gyi ni rkang lag btags// 
145b1(mdo sde): bsod nams gzi brjing rgyas 'phags de yang ku mu dang bar sha lta bu de la chibs// sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing sangs rgyas zhing rnams dri med 'od kyis khyab// bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin lha
145b2(mdo sde): yi gtso bo nyid kyis de tshe chab sgo dbye ba bgyis// de ni bye ba khrag khrig lha yis mdun du bdar de lha dang klu yis rab mchod nas// bsngags ldan gyis ni 'du shes tsam gyis nges pa 'jig rten mgon
145b3(mdo sde): po mkha' las bkur bar shes// lha dang lha ma yin tshegs dbang por bcas pa de dag chibs te bde bar gshegs pa gshegs// lha yi bu mo glu dbyangs mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub sems
145b4(mdo sde): dpa'i yon tan rab brjod cing // de dag bsngags ldan la ya dang stobs btud byed la snyan la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin// bsngags ldan 'jig rten 'dren pa myur ba myur bar
145b5(mdo sde): khyer la skyo bar mi dga' ma skyed cig/ 'jig rten mgon po mnyes par byas na khyod la 'jigs dang ngan song ngan 'a gro med par 'gyur// lha rnams re re zhing yang bdag la 'jig
