170a2(mdo sde): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi
170a3(mdo sde): 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba
170a4(mdo sde): dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas char ba/ cad pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa kun tu bstan pa dang / chos thaMd la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes
170a5(mdo sde): par mdzad pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis de la/ grogs po dag khyed byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i las thams cad la spro bar gyis
170a6(mdo sde): shig/ de nas tshangs pa chen po dbang sgyur gyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang gi bsod nams ngag dang gzi brjid dpal gyis byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang / 
170a7(mdo sde): btang snyoms dang ni bsam gtan dag dang de bzhin mngon shes tshangs pa'i lam snang ba// bskal pa stong du spyod pa spyad pa de ni byang chub shing drung chas par gyur// thub pa de la bsam pa'i
170a8(mdo sde): brtul zhugs sgrub par byed pa'i mchod pa legs par bya// de la skyabs su song na ngan 'gro'i 'jigs dang mi phrad mi khom mi 'gyur te// lha'i nang du 'dod pa'i bde ba rnyed nas tshangs pa'i
170b1(mdo sde): gnas yangs 'gro bar 'gyur// lo drug par du ga/ 'a baspyad pa spyad nas 'di ni byang chub shing drung bzhud// kun kyang dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis de la mchod pa legs par bgyis// de ni stong
170b2(mdo sde): gsum rgyal po dbang phyug dam pa chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po ste// brgya byin tshangs pa gnyi zla'i grong khyer dag na de dang mnyam pa gang yang med// gang bcas chen zhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig rnam pa drug
170b3(mdo sde): tu g.yos gyur pa// de ni de ring bdud kyi dpung las rgyal bar mdzad phyir shing chen mchog drung bzhud// gang gi spyi gtsug tshangs pa'i gnas 'dir gnas kyang blta bar nus pa ma yin zhing // gang gi sku la mtshan/ 
170b4(mdo sde): rab dam pa ldan zhing sum cu rtsa gnyis legs brgyan la// gang gi gsung 'dir yid du 'ong zhing snyan la rnar 'thad tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan cing // gang gi thugs ni rab zhi khro dang bral ba de la mchod
170b5(mdo sde): pa byed du 'dong // gang dag blo gros brgya byin tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan bde bas 'da' bya dang / nyon mongs 'ching ba'i 'khri shing kun dang dra ba de dag gcod par byed 'dod dang // 
170b6(mdo sde): gzhan las ma thos par ni rang rgyal byang chub zhi ba 'chi med thob 'dod dang // gal te sa gsum dag na sangs rgyas nyid 'dod de dag 'dren pa mchod par gyis// gang gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang
170b7(mdo sde): de bzhin rin po che rnams mtha' yas dang // khang bzangs skar khung bsi ga dang mang ldan pa dang zung du sbrel dang bzhon pa dang // me tog phreng ba shin tu mdzes pas brgyan pa bskyed mos tshal gyis rab brgyan
170b8(mdo sde): dang // rkang lag mgo dang mig rnams yongs su btang ba de ni byang chub snying por zhugs// dge slong dag de ltar stong gsum gyi tshangs pa chen po de skad cig de la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
171a1(mdo sde): / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin te/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ gyo mo dang rngo med pa/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang // 
171a2(mdo sde): dngul mang ba/ rtsa sngo zhing 'jam la g.yas su 'khyil cing g.yung drung 'khyil pa/ ka tsa lin di ka'i gos ltar reg na bde ba dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa 'dir phyin
171a3(mdo sde): de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po thams cad sa lta bur gyur kyang chun rgyu ba'i sems can rnams la gnod pa chung zad kyang med do// 'jig rten gyi khams de ltar brgyan pa 'di phyogs bcu'i brgya byin dang / tshangs
171a4(mdo sde): ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong legs par brgyan to// byang chub sems dpa'
171a5(mdo sde): la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang lha'i dang mi'i las shin tu 'das pa'i mchod/ pa bkod pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag
171a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig lta bur snang bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi bar dag dang / ri nag po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po
171a7(mdo sde): dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyis gsal bar snang ngo // byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba'i lha'i bu bcu drug yod de/ 'di
171a8(mdo sde): lta ste/ lha'i bu ud ka li zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu mud ka li zhes bya ba dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang / dpa' stobs dang / dpung rgyan stobs dang / rab brtan dang / sa 'dzin dang / snang
171b1(mdo sde): byed dang / dri ma med pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chos kyi rtog dang / 'gro grub dang / mig thogs pa med pa dang / bkod pa chen po dang / tshul khrims rnam dag dri ldan dang / pad+ma'i 'od de lha'i bu
171b2(mdo sde): bcu drug po de dag ni byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba dag ste/ thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob pa sha stag go// de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i
171b3(mdo sde): phyir byang chub kyi snying po brgyan te/ dpag tshad brgyad cu khor yug du rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis ni bskor/ shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu
171b4(mdo sde): g.yer ka'i dra bar mi bdun dang / rin po che brgyus pa rim dpa bdun gyis bskor// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi glegs dab ma rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa dag dang / gser gyi tshong
171b5(mdo sde): tshong dag dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma dag gis khe khas par byas// snying po mchog gi spos kyis ni bdu gas/ rin po che'i dra ba ni bres so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
171b6(mdo sde): gyi khams tha dad pa dag na shing sna tshogs mngon par 'phags pa/ bzang ba/ mngon tu mchod pa/ lha yul ba dang / mi yul pa gang dag na yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying
171b7(mdo sde): po der snang bar gyur to// phyogs bcu dag na chu nas skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa'i me tog rnaM pa sna tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to// 
171b8(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa'i bkod pa dag gis/ byang chub kyi snying po brgyan par byed pa
172a1(mdo sde): de dag kyang / byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to// de ltar lha'i bu byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa de 'dra ba dag sprul par gyur te/ 
172a2(mdo sde): de dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dag gis mthong nas/ rang rang gi gnas la dur khrod tsam gyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to// bkod pa de dag mthong nas shin tu ngo
172a3(mdo sde): mtshar cher 'dzin te/ e ma ho bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa legs so zhes ched du brjod pa'ang tshong du brjod do// byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi yod de/ 'di
172a4(mdo sde): lta ste/ 'od ma dang snyan ldan dang / yid bzangs dang / mdang das ldan ma ste/ byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi po de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ 
172a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi shing rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa/ sdong po phun su/ mtshogs pa/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa/ khrun dang sboms
172a6(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ shin tu 'gol ba/ 'phang du shing ta la bdun srid tsam du mtho ba de dang 'tsham par 'gel ba/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ 
172a7(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ rin po che'i shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim pa bdun dang / rin po che brgyus pa'i
172a8(mdo sde): phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor cing phyir rim bskor ba/ shing yongs 'dus brtol dang 'dra ba/ mig gis blta bas mi ngoms pa bskyed do// gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug
172b1(mdo sde): nas /  byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs de ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i dkyil te/ sra ba/ snying po yod pa/ mi phyed pa/ rdo rje'i rangab
172b2(mdo sde): bzhin du gnas par gyur pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na/ lus las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'gyed de/ 'od des ngan song thams cad zhi bar
172b3(mdo sde): gyur to// mi khom pa thams cad gcad par gyur to// ngan 'gro'i tshor ba thams cad skams par gyur to// sems can gang dag dbang po ma tshang ba de dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa thob par
172b4(mdo sde): gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad sos par gyur to// / mi bde ba thams cad ni bde ba thob par gyur to// 'ji dgas pas nyen pa rnams ni dbugs phyin pa thob par gyur to// 
172b5(mdo sde): bcing bas bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las grol bar gyur to// sems can dbul po rnams ni longs spyod dang ldan par gyur to// nyon mongs pas gdungs pa ni yongs
172b6(mdo sde): su gdung ba med par gyur to// bkres pa rnams ni lto 'drangs par gyur to// skom pa rnams ni skom pa med par gyur to// sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar bcas par gyur to// zhum pa nyam chung ba rnams
172b7(mdo sde): ni stobs phun sum tshogs par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can gang la yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / khro ba dang / 'chab pa dang / tha ba dang / gnod sems dang / phrag
172b8(mdo sde): dog gi gnod pa med par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can gang yang 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ skye ba med do// de'i tshe sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang
173a1(mdo sde): ldan zhing gcig la gcig pha mar 'du shes skyed par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar// dmyal ba mi bzang snang ba yi// sems can rnams kyi
173a2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zhi// bde ba'i tshor ba thob par gyur// dud 'gro'i skye gnas sems can rnams// phan tshun gnod byed ji snyed pa// thub chen 'od kyis reg pas na// de dag byams pa'i sems
173a3(mdo sde): kyang skyes// yi dgas 'jig rten yi dgas rnams// bkres skom nyen pa ji snyed pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis// de dag zas sgom rnyes par gyur// mi khom thams cad chad
173a4(mdo sde): gyur cing // ngan 'gro rnams kyang skams par gyur// so dmas can thams cad bder gyur te// lha yi bde bas ra rab tu tshim// mig dang rna ba med pa dang // gzhan yang gang
173a5(mdo sde): ngag dbang po nyams// de dag dbang po kun rdzogs shing // yan lag thams cad mdzes par gyur// 'dod chags zhe/ sdang la sogs pa'i// nyon mongs rnams kyis sems can gang
173a6(mdo sde): gnod gyur de tshe nyon mongs kun// zhi bar gyur te bde dang ldan// smyos pa dag ni dran ldan zhing // dbul po dag kyang nor dang ldan// nad kyis btab pa nad sos shing // bcing bas bcings pa grol
173a7(mdo sde): bar gyur// ser sna med cing dgra med de// gnod sems dang ni rtsod pa dag/ phan tshun byed pa med gyur te// de tshe byams pa'i sems su gnas// pha dang ma dag bu gcig la// ji ltar phangs par
173a8(mdo sde): sems pa ltar// de bzhin sems can phan tshun du// de tshe bu phangs bzhin du sems// byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'dra yis// phyogs bcu'i phyogs ni kun tu yang // gang ga'i bye ma'i grangs
173b1(mdo sde): rnyed kyi// zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab gsal// ri bo nag po rnams dang ni// 'khor yug dag kyang mi snang gyur// rgya chen zhing rnams de dag kun// gcig po ji bzhin de ltar snang // lag
173b2(mdo sde): mthil lta bur gyur pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// zhing rnams thams cad legs rgyan pas// thams cad rin chen nyid du snang // byang chub snying po'i rim gro pa/ 
173b3(mdo sde): lha ni de ltar bcu drug yod// dpag tshad brgyad cu'i sa khyon nang // byang chub snying por brgyan par gyur// zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na// bkod pa chen po gang yod pa// byang chub sems
173b4(mdo sde): dpa'i gzi brjid kyis// de dag thams cad der yang snang// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // mi 'am ci dang lto 'a daphye che// rang rang gzhal med khang rnams la// dur khrod tsam
173b5(mdo sde): du shes par gyur// 'dir ni bkod pa de mthong nas// lha dang nga mi rnams ngo mtshar gyur// bsod nams gang gi rgyu 'thun 'dir// phun sum 'di 'dra 'di legs mtshar// 
173b6(mdo sde): lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// brtson par byed pa med par yang // de yi yid la 'dod pa dang // bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// ji ltar bsam pa gzhan dag kyang // sngon
173b7(mdo sde): spyod tshe na rdzogs gyur pa// las de'i rnam par smin pa yis// 'di 'dra'i phun sum tshogs 'di byung // byang chub shing gi lha mo bzhis// lha yi shing ni yongs 'du ba// de bas khyad par 'pha
173b8(mdo sde): po yis// byang chub snying por brgyan par byas// byang chub snying po'i bkod pa gang // lha yis mngon par 'dus byas pa// yon tan de dag tshig gis ni// thams cad brjod pa yongs
174a1(mdo sde): mi nus// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'od phyung ba// rnam par dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ lus dang sems tshim par byed cing dga' ba skyed pa/ nyon mongs pa
174a2(mdo sde): thams cad sel ba/ sems can la dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba thams cad skyed pa des/ klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas snang bar byas par mthong nas/ de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po
174a3(mdo sde): nag po rang gi 'khor gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang phyir bdag gi gnas 'di gser gyi 'od kyis brgyan par lhang nger gyur pa las// ji ltar 'khor ba 'jig gi 'od mdzes
174a4(mdo sde): mthong zhing gser zhes bya ba mthong ba dang // ji ltar 'od srung chos kyi rgyal po skyon med pa'i dri med 'od mthong ltar// mtshan ma chog ldan zhing phan mdzad ye shes 'od ldan pa zhig byung du the
174a5(mdo sde): chom med// sngon chad nyes par byas pa'i las kyis bdag gi khyi/ ma ni shin tu mun pas gang // khyim 'di na ni nyi ma zla ba dgagi rgya chen 'od kyang yong mi snang // me dang nor bu dag dang dri
174a6(mdo sde): med glog dang skar ma rnams kyi 'od mi snang // brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha min rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang na// de ring khyim 'di nang du nyi ma'i 'od 'dra ba yi dge bas mdzes gyur la// sems kyang dga'
174a7(mdo sde): bskyed cing lus kyang bde bar gyur la lus ni bsil gyur te// lus kyi steng du bye tshan 'bab pa de yang bdag la bsil bar gyur pa las// bskal pa bye ba mang por spyad pa byang chub shing drung bzhud par shin tu
174a8(mdo sde): gsal// klu yi me tog mdzes dang bzang la dri zhim gos dang mu tig do shal dang // rgyan dang gdu bu dag phye ma rnams dang bdug pa mchog rnams myur thogs la// glu dbyangs dag dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra/ 
174b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis shig rnga dang rdza rnga dag/ brdung zhing 'gro ba gun gyi mchod 'os phan pa mdzad la mchod pa byed du 'deng // don langs te klu yi bu mo rnams dang lhan cig phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang / de nas ri bo ldan po/ 
174b2(mdo sde): lta bur gzi brjid rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig/ lha dang lha min bye ba dag dang tshangs pa'i dbang dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis bskor// dga' ba'i yid kyis de la mchod byed shul ni 'di zhes ston cing
174b3(mdo sde): 'dong ba mthong // klu yi rgyal de rab tu dga' zhing mgu nas 'jog rten mchog la mchod byas te/ gus dang bcas pas de yi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal thub pa'i mdun du 'dug/ klu yi bu mo rnams kyang
174b4(mdo sde): dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis thub la mchod pa byed// me tog rnams dang spos dang byug pa dag kyang 'thor zhing sil snyan nadams kyang byed// klu yi rgyal po rab tu dga' nas thal sbyar yang
174b5(mdo sde): ngag yon tan rnams kyis bstod// 'dren pa 'jig rten dam pa dgung zla nya ba'i zhal 'dra mthong bar gyur pa legs// bad ga gis sngon chad drang srong rnams kyi mtshan ma mthong ba khyod
174b6(mdo sde): kyang de 'dra ste// de ring khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom ste bzhed pa'i go 'phang brnyes par 'gyur// gang gi don du sngon chang dus dang sbyin dang bsdams shing bdog pa kun btang la// gang gi don du
174b7(mdo sde): dul dang tshul khrims byams dang snying rje ba dang bzod pa bsgoms// gang gi don du brtson 'grus brtan dang bsam gtan dgyes dang shes rab 'bar mdzad pa// khyod kyi smon lam de dag thams cad rab tu
174b8(mdo sde): rdzogs nas de ring rgyal bar 'gyur// ji ltar ljon shing lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas pa byang chub shing la 'dud// ji ltar bum pa chab kyis gang ba stong dag khyod la skor ba rab bgyid cing // ji ltar
175a1(mdo sde): sha'i tshogs rnams rab tu dga' ste snyan pa'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang // ji ltar ngang pa khrung khrung tshogs kyang mkha' la mchi zhing tshul du shis ldan pa// dang ba'i yid kyis drang srong la ni skor ba
175a2(mdo sde): bgyid las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur// ji ltar gser gyi kha dog lta bur mdzes pa'i 'od rnams zhing ni brgyar mchi ste// ji ltar ngan song mtha' dag zhi bar bgyid cing skye dgu'i sdug bsngal thar bgyid
175a3(mdo sde): dang // ji ltar nyi ma zla ba'i gnas kyis rgyun chad ser mnga' dal bus ldang ba las// srid pa gsum du skye dang rga ba thar mdzad pa'i ded dpon da rang 'gyur// ji ltar lha rnams 'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs
175a4(mdo sde): te khyod la mchod du lhags pa dang // tshangs dang tshangs pa'i ma dun na 'don dang lha rnams bsam gtan bde ba spangs pa dang // gang yang srid pa gsum na dbang phyug dam pa mchis
175a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad 'dir lhags las// srid pa gsum du skye na/ thar par mdzad pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po de ring byon// ji lta/ ra lha rnams dag gis phyag dar bgyis pa'i shul de nas ni
175a6(mdo sde): khyod gshegs la// bcom ldan 'khor ba 'jig dang gser zhes bgyi dang 'od srung dag kyang de nas gshegs// ji ltar pad+ma bzang po dri ma ma mchis rnam dag dogs sa brtol byung ste/ de la stobs chen
175a7(mdo sde): ldan pa zhabs kyi gom pa 'dor las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur/ bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma'i gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud// de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing drung nas ni khyod la bskyod pa
175a8(mdo sde): 'am g.yos ma nus// mchod sbyin khrag khrig phrag stong rnam pa du ma gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed// khyod kyis mdzad cing 'gro la phan phyir spyad pa des na 'dir ni rnam par mdzes// rgyu skar zla bar
175b1(mdo sde): bcas shing skar ma nyi mar bcas pa mkha' las sar lhung gdag// ri mchog chen po rang gi gnas nas g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams par 'gyur yang gdag// skyes bu mkhas pa la las khams bzhi po
175b2(mdo sde): dag re re nas ni ston nus gda'// khyod ni shing gi rgyal po'i drung du gshegs nas byang chub ma thob bzhengs mi gda'// gang gi slad du kha lo sgyur ba mthong zhing mchod pa gyis yon tan brjod pa dang / 
175b3(mdo sde): byang chub tu yang spro bas bdag gis rnyed pa 'phel ba rgya chen rnyed par gyur// bur bcas bdag dang klu'i bu mo thams cad skye gnas 'di las thir gyur cing // glang po dregs pa'i stabs su bzhud pa khyod
175b4(mdo sde): kyi stabs des bdag cag mchi bar bgyi// dge slong dag de ltar klu'i rgyal po nag po'i chung ma dam pa gser 'od ces bya ba/ daklu'i bu mo rin po che'i gdugs sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil
175b5(mdo sde): snyan sna tshogs thogs pa dang // mu tig gi do shal sna chogs thogs pa dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang / lha'i dang mi'i phreng ba brgyus pa sna tshogs thogs pa da
175b6(mdo sde): pog phor sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs len pa rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'dong zhing rin po che'i
175b7(mdo sde): me tog sna tshogs mngon par gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis kyang bstod do// 'khrul pa mi mnga' mi snyengs mi 'dzem bag mi tsha// ma zhum mi dman rab tu dgyes par gdul dka' ba// ma
175b8(mdo sde): chags mi sdang ma rmongs brkam pa mi mnga' ba/ chags bral rnam grol drang srong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sman pa zug rngu bral ba gdul ba gdul mdzad pa// 'gro ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar
176a1(mdo sde): / mdzad sman pa mchog/ gnas dang skyabs ma mchis shing dman pa mkhyen nas ni// 'jig rten gsum 'dir gnas dang skyabs su khyod byung ngo // ji ltar lha tshogs rab tu dad cing dgar/ 
176a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te// me tog char pa chen po mkha' las 'bebs pa dang // 'di dag ji ltar gos chen 'thor bar bgyid pa las// de ring rgyal bar 'gyur gyis rab tu dgyes pa mdzod// shing dbang drung du
176a3(mdo sde): gshegs la bsnyengs pa mi mngar bzhugs// bdud kyi sde las rgyal mdzod nyon mongs dra ba drol// sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas ltar// byang chub zhi pa dam pa mchog tu ni
176a4(mdo sde): 'tshang rgyar mdzod// khyod kyis gang gi don tu bskal pa bye/ dmang du// 'gro ba sgrol ba'i don du dka' ba spyad pa ma dzad// khyod kyi dgongs pa rdzogs te dus la dbab kyis/ 
176a5(mdo sde): shing dbang drung du gshegs te byang chub mchog reg mdzod// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bsams te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ci zhig
176a6(mdo sde): la bzhugs nas// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas snyam mo// de nas des yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ rtswa bting nas bzhugs so/ 
176a7(mdo sde): snyam mo// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i tshogs brgya stong par snang la 'khod pa dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshig 'di skad ces smras
176a8(mdo sde): so// de de bzhin no// skyes bu dam pa de de bzhin te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rtswa bting ba la bzhugs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
176b1(mdo sde): rgyas so// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' lam gyi g.yas rol na rnga 'tshong bkra shis pa zhes bya ba rtsa sngo ba 'jam pa/ shin tu gzhon pa/ nyams dga' ba/ lcang lo 'khyil par 'dug pa g.yas
176b2(mdo sde): su 'khyil pa/ rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu/ ka tsa lin di'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ dri rab tu zhim pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba dag rnga zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas byang chub sems dpas
176b3(mdo sde): lam bor te/ rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rtswa 'tshong ba bkra shis pa la snyan pa'i tshig gis smras te/ tshig de ni kun shes par byed pa dang / rnam par shes par byed pa dang / 
176b4(mdo sde): rnam par gsal ba dang / mi chod pa dang / chags par bye/ dad pa dang / snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / mnyan par 'os dpa dang / snum pa dang / go bar byed pa dang / skul ba dang / 
176b5(mdo sde): tshim par byed pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / sha sha bo ma yin pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / mi brkam pa dang / 'jam pa dang / snyan pa dang / rnar bde ba dang
176b6(mdo sde): lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa sel ba dang / ka la bing ka'i sgra skad lta bu dang / bya kun la dang / 
176b7(mdo sde): shang shang te'u la sogs pa sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang / rnga bo che dang glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyi nga ro dang ldan pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / bden pa dang / gsal ba dang / yang dag pa dang / 
176b8(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i gdangs lta bu dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / ri rdob pa'i sgra lta bu dang ldan pa dang / lha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang pos mngon par bstod pa dang / 
177a1(mdo sde): zab pa dang / gting dpag dka' ba dang / bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i smra ba 'jom pa dang / seng ge'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / rta dang glang po che'i
177a2(mdo sde): sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang / glu sgra sgrogs pa lta bu dang / 'brug zer ba'i sgra lta bu dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / gdul ba'i sems can thams cad
177a3(mdo sde): tshim par byed pa dang / tab tab bo ma yin pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / mi shol ba dang / 'tsham pa dang / rigs pa dang / dus su smras pa dang / dus las mi yol ba dang / chos brgya stong leg pa brgyus pa/ 
177a4(mdo sde): dang gnyen pa dang / thogs pa med pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / skad cig gis skad thams cad sgrogs pa dang / bsam pa thams cad shes par
177a5(mdo sde): byed pa dang / bde ba thams cad skyed pa dang / thar pa'i lam yang dag par ston pa dang / lam gyi tshogs smra ba dang / 'khor las mi 'da' ba dang / 'khor thams cad tshim par
177a6(mdo sde): byed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang 'thun pa ste/ byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i tshig gis/ rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bkra shis rtswa dag pa
177a7(mdo sde): myur du byin// de ring nga la rnas ni don chen 'gyur// dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud ni bcom nas su// byang chub dam pa zhi ba reg par 'gyur// gang gi ched du nga yis bskal stong du// sbyin dang
177a8(mdo sde): dul dang sdom dang gtong byas dang // tshul khrims brtul shugs dka' thub rab spyad pa// de ni de ring nga yis thob par 'gyur// bzed pa'i stobs dang de bzhin brtson 'grus stobs// bsam
177b1(mdo sde): gtan stobs dang de bzhin shes rab stobs// bsod nams dang ni mngon shes rnam thar stobs// de ni de ring nga la 'grub par 'gyur// shes rab stobs dang thabs kyi stobs dag dang // rdzu 'phrul dang ni
177b2(mdo sde): chags med byams pa'i stobs// so so yang dag rig dang bden pa'i stobs// de ni de ring nga la 'grub par 'gyur// de ring ngal rtswa sbyin byas na ni// khyod la bsod nams stobs ni mtha' yas te/ 
177b3(mdo sde): de ni khyod kyi ngan pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur// khyod kyang ston pa bla na med par 'gyur// bkra shis pas ni 'dren pa'i tshig snyan rab tu mdzes thob nas// dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ni// 
177b4(mdo sde): rtswartsa 'jam gzhon zhing bzang la reg par ldan pa spar gang thogs// / mdun du 'dug nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis 'di skadad smras// gal te rtswa yis byang chub go 'phang dam pa 'chi med pa/ 
177b5(mdo sde): mchog gyur zhi ba blta dka' sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam 'thob na// yon tan chen po'i rgya mtsho'i grags pa dpag med khyod bzhes shig/ bdag gis gong 'phang dam pa 'chi med thog mar
177b6(mdo sde): 'tshang rgyar bgyi// brtul zhugs dka' thub rnam mang bya dka' bskal mang ma spyad par// bkra shis rtswa mchog bting bas byang chub 'di ni thob mi 'gyur// gang tshe blo gros ldan pa shes rab bsod nams thab
177b7(mdo sde): kyis 'phags// de nas rgyal ba thub pas rdul med 'gyur zhes lung ston to// bkra shis gal te byang chub skye bo gzhan la sbyin nus na// srog chags bsdu ba byas te sbyin par yid gnyis khyod ma za// gang tshe
177b8(mdo sde): nga'i byang chub thob shes bdud rtsi rnam par dbyes// khyod 'ongs chos kyi dam pa nyon dang rdul dang bral bar 'gyur// 'dren pa shin tu mchog tu 'jam pa'i rtsa na spar gang blangs// seng ge ngang pa'i stabs kyi chas
178a1(mdo sde): nas sa ni rab tu g.yos// lha klu tshogs rnams thal mo sbyar te bu dga' yid kyis// deng 'dis bdud dpung bcom nas bdud rtsi reg par 'gyur snyam sems// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems
178a2(mdo sde): dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba na/ lha'i bu rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' deng 'dir 'dug nas byang chub thob par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
178a3(mdo sde): snyam ste/ byang chub kyi shing brgyad khri brgyan par gyur to// de nas byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni me tog gi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad brgya pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni spos kyi rang bzhin can la/ 
178a4(mdo sde): 'phang du dpag tshad stong pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni tsan dan gyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum rab yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni gos kyi rang bzhin can la
178a5(mdo sde): 'phang du dpag tshad lnga 'bum pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che'i rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tsha/ da 'bum 'phrag bcu pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni
178a6(mdo sde): rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pa yang yod do// byang chub kyi shing de dag thams cad kyi drung na yang ji ltar 'tsham pa'i seng ge'i khri/ lha'i ras bcos
178a7(mdo sde): bu sna tshogs bting ba bshams par gyur to// byang chub kyi shing kha cig gi drung du ni pad+ma'i khri stan bshams par gyur to// kha cig gi drung du ni spos kyi khri stan no// kha cig gi drung du ni rin po che rnam pa
178a8(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi khri stan no// byang chub sems dpa' ni rol pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di la byang chub sems
178b1(mdo sde): dpa' snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus kyi byang chub kyi shing drung gi seng ge'i khri de dag thams cad
178b2(mdo sde): la 'dug par kun tu snang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha'i bu so so'i yid la yang / byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyi seng ge'i khri la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dug go/ gzhan gyi la ni ma
178b3(mdo sde): yin par shes so// ji ltar de dag gis shes pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di nyid kyi mthus sems can dmyal ba pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i
178b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa thams cad dang lha dang mi thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i khri la
178b5(mdo sde): 'dug par mthong ngo // de lta mod kyi 'on kyang dman pa la mos pa 'i sems can rnams kyi blo gros yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsa sbyar gang thogs te/ byang
178b6(mdo sde): chub kyi shing ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi shing la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bdag nyid kyis rtswa'i rtse mo ni nang du bstan/ rtsa ba ni phyir bstan nas/ rtswa'i gding ba kun nas bzang
178b7(mdo sde): po bting ste/ seng ge lta bu dang / dpa' bo lta bu dang / stobs lta bu dang / brtan pa lta bu dang / brtson 'grus lta bu dang / mthu lta bu dang / glang po lta bu dang / dbang phyug lta bu dang / rang byung
178b8(mdo sde): lta bu dang / ye shes can lta bu dang / bla na med pa lta bu dang / khyad par du 'phags pa lta bu dang / mngon par 'phags pa lta bu dang / grags pa lta bu dang / brjod pa lta bu dang / sbyin pa lta bu
179a1(mdo sde): / dang / tshul khrims lta bu dang / bzong ba lta bu dang / brtson 'grus lta bu dang / bsam gtan lta bu dang / shes rab lta bu dang / ye shes lta bu dang / bsod nams lta bu dang / bdud phyir/ 
179a2(mdo sde): rgol ba bcom pa lta bu dang / tshogs lta bur skyil mo bkrus bcas nas/ rna bting ba de la shar phyogs su ltas te 'dug nas/ lus drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon du gzhag nas 'di 'dra ba'i yi
179a3(mdo sde): dngam brtan po byas so// stan 'dir bdag gi lus ni skams kyang rung // lpags pa rus pa sha rnams zhig kyang rung // bskal mang rnyed dkar byang chub ma thob par/ lhan 'di las ni lus bskyod mi
179a4(mdo sde): bya'o// byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu dgu'o// / da'aphags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 
179a5(mdo sde): bam po bcu gsum pa dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ris drug gi lha rnams/ byang chub sems dpa' la
179a6(mdo sde): bar chad byed pa mi 'byung grang snyam ste/ shar phyogs logs su gnas par gyur to// de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs kyang lha rnams kyis yongs su bsrung bar gyur to// dge slong dag de
179a7(mdo sde): ltar byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' skul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od byung nas/ 'od des phyogs bcu kun tu grangs med/ dpag tu med pa/ chos kyi
179a8(mdo sde): dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam pa'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang thams cad snang bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig
179b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams dri ma med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing
179b2(mdo sde): mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du bya
179b3(mdo sde): ba de lta bu byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de byas pas phyogs bcur na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'khor gyi khyams bai DUr+ya sngon po dag las byas pa cig tu
179b4(mdo sde): bstan to// 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi ma dadun du yang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par bstan to// sems can de dag kyang phan tshun du
179b5(mdo sde): sdo mo gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' ston cing / sems can tshul du shis pa'i gzugs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa su zhi/ ga/ 'di ltar rnam par mdzes pa'i sems can 'di su zhig zhes/ 
179b6(mdo sde): 'dzer to// sems can de dag gi mdun du byang chub sems dpa' des byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang sprul te/ de na byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// 
179b7(mdo sde): ci yang med pa'i 'dod chags zhe sdang rnyog pa gang yin bag chags bcas bton pa// gang gis lus las 'ang phyung phyogs bcu'i 'od rnams thams cad 'od ni med par byas// gang gis bsod
179b8(mdo sde): nams ting 'dzin ye shes tshogs ni bskal pa mang por kun spel ba// shAkya thub pa thub pa chen po dam pa 'di ni phyogs rnams kun tu mdzes// de na lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin
180a1(mdo sde): chen 'od 'phro'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bkod par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gdugs brtsegs pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba 'ong sa
180a2(mdo sde): bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 
180a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo// de na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
180a4(mdo sde): dag phan tshun 'di skad 'dzer to// gang gi phyir rin po che'i ga dugs bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di snang bar gyur pa 'di su'i 'bras bu zhes 'dzer to// de nas rin po che'i gdugs de las tshigs
180a5(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis rin po che dang spos gdugs stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig dag byams pa'i yid kyis ngo zla med par bzhugs dang mya ngan 'das la phul// de yis mtshan
180a6(mdo sde): mchog ldan pa phan mdzad sred med bu yi mthu ldan pa// yon tan mnga' ba byang chub shing drung gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas// de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog phreng ba dang nags tshal gyi/ 
180a7(mdo sde): phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams me tog tsam pa ka'i kha dog tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po'i dra ba can zhes bya ba 'od des
180a8(mdo sde): bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang
180b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rin po che'i dra ba gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo// de na phyogs bcu'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dag phan tshun du
180b2(mdo sde): 'di skad 'dzer te/ 'od kyi bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes 'dzer to// de nas rin po che'i dra ba de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // rin chen 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum dga' rin chen tog/ 
180b3(mdo sde): rini chen dam pa rin chen grags pa de chos dgyes// dkon mchog gsum po rgyun mi 'chad pa'i brtson 'grus brnyes// byang chub mchog brnyes 'gyur te de yi mchod pa 'di// de nas byang phyogs na de bzhin
180b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa nyi zla zil du rlag par byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i sa rangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma 'khor bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes
180b5(mdo sde): bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba la/ sa 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba
180b6(mdo sde): der dong ste/ phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi las thaMd kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji snyed 'khor gyi khyams der kun tu bstan to// de na byang
180b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di skad 'dzer te// bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes 'dzer to// de nas bkod pa de dag thams cad las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis bsod nams
180b8(mdo sde): ye shes shin tu mang pos lus ni rnam sbyangs shing // gang gis brtul zhugs dka' thub dag dang bden pa'i chos kyis dag sbyangs la gang gis khrel yod mos pa byams dang de bzhin snying rjes sems
181a1(mdo sde): sbyangs pa// de ni shing rgyal drung gshegs shAkya khyu mchog de la mchod pa byed// de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
181a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi blo gros shes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis
181a3(mdo sde): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ 'khor gyi khyams
181a4(mdo sde): der yon tan gyi bkod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs dpa mngon par sprul te khang pa brtsegs pa de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gi yon tan dag gis lha dang lha
181a5(mdo sde): min dang // gnod sbyin lto 'phye che dag rtag tu yon tan bsgos// rmo/ na tan can de yon tan ldan pa'i rgyal rigs skyes// yon tan rgya mtsho byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs// de nas lho dang / 
181a6(mdo sde): nub kyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen srog shing gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che 'byung bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che 'byung ba zhes
181a7(mdo sde): bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste/ 
181a8(mdo sde): byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ 'khor gyi khyams der rin po che'i mkha' rten grangs med dpag tu med pa mngon par sprul te/ rin po che'i mkha' rten de dag las tshigasu
181b1(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin chen rnams ngag dang / khang bzangs skar khung bsil khang mchog dang zung dang bzhon pa mkha' rten brgyan// me tog phreng ba mdzes
181b2(mdo sde): dang 'dun sa dag dang bskyed mos tshal rnams dang / rkang pa lag pa mgo dang mig btang ba de byang chub snying por 'dug/ de nas nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i rgyal
181b3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sprin dang ldan par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin brtsegs 'brug bsgrags dbyangs shes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems/ 
181b4(mdo sde): dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang churab sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas/ byang chub sems
181b5(mdo sde): dpa' la mchod pa las kyi phyir/ dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sa / ru'i sprin mngon par sprub te/ 'khor gyi khyams do hU~M nang na sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char mngon par phab bo// dus kyi
181b6(mdo sde): rjes su 'brang ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor de las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // rigs dang rnam par grol ba'i 'od kyi sprin gyis srid gsum thams cad khyab// dam chos 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi mya
181b7(mdo sde): ngan 'das pa thob byed char pa 'bebs// 'dod chags nyon mongs 'ching ba'i 'khri shing thams cad bag chags bcad te gcod par 'gyur// bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul stobs dang dbang po'i me tog rgyas pa dang / 
181b8(mdo sde): bar byed pa 'byin// de nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas khebs
182a1(mdo sde): pa na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing // 
182a2(mdo sde): mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad
182a3(mdo sde): dang / rin po che'i mkha' rten rnams su byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag mngon par sprul te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang
182a4(mdo sde): lha dang mi'i me tog gi phreng ba thogs shing / byang chub sems dang da' ga la ba logs su lus btud nas/ me tog gi phreng rab dpyangs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// gang gis sangs
182a5(mdo sde): rgyas khrag khrig sngon bstod cing // gus dang bcas pas dad pa che ba skyeng la// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig smras pa// byang chub snying por byon la mgos phyag 'tshal// de nas
182a6(mdo sde): 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rnam par bltas par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i snying po zhes
182a7(mdo sde): bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song
182a8(mdo sde): ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ bai DUr+ya'i 'khor gyi khyams der 'dzam+bu'i gling gi gser gyi pad+ma rnams mngon tu 'byung bar bstan to// pad+ma de dag gi snying po la bud med
182b1(mdo sde): lus phyed snang ba/ kha dog dang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bstan te/ lag pa g.yas g.yos na mgul gdub dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser srung dang / 
182b2(mdo sde): mu tig gi do shal la sogs brgyan rnam pa mang po thogs shing / me tog dang / dar gyi lda ldi dbyangs nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der logs su lus btud te ni/ 
182b3(mdo sde): su bcang ba 'di smras so// gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas nyan thos dang // rang rgyal dag dang bla ma rnams la 'dud// khrims ldan rtag dran dga' la nga rgyal med// yon tan ldan pa de la 'dud pa byos// de nas
182b4(mdo sde): steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyis zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs kyi dam bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par mdzod
182b5(mdo sde): ces bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das bdag gis yongs su bskor cing / mdu/ na du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems
182b6(mdo sde): dpa' ga la der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ nam pa'i dkyil na 'dug bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams can sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me
182b7(mdo sde): tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / bdug spos dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i khang
182b8(mdo sde): pab dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mu tig dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / bzhon pa dang / shing ljon pa dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 
183a1(mdo sde): 'bras bu dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
183a2(mdo sde): dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang mi dang 'i ma yin pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nam po'i dkyil nas char chen po mngon par phab ste/ thams cad dga' ba dang / bde ba skyed kyi/ sems can gang la yang 'jigs pa
183a3(mdo sde): 'am/ gnod par mi byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// phyogs bcu de dag rnams nas rgyal ba'i sras po gang // phan pa byed pa mchod par byang chub lhags gyur pa// 'gro la phan pa de dag
183a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi bkod rim dang // rtsal dang rim pa mdzes pa dag gi dpe tsa dam nyon// kha cig do shal khrag khrig rab tu spangs byas te// na mkha' las ni 'brug ltar shin tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha/ 
183a5(mdo sde): cig mkha' las me tog gzhal med khang ston cing // cod pan rin chen thogs la gtsug pud 'phyang zhing lhags// kha cig stong / pa mtshan med smon med mchog rjod cing // sa las seng ge lta bur
183a6(mdo sde): shin tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig sngon chad ma mthong me tog mdzes 'thor zhing // khyu mchog ci 'dra de 'drar shin tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig rang gi lus kyi kha dog stong ston cing // rma bya lta bur mkha'
183a7(mdo sde): las shin tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig bde gshegs sras kyi yon tan phreng brjod cing // zla ba lta bur mkha' las shin tu rgyas shing lhags// kha cig nyi ma lta bur 'od zer rab 'gyed de// bdud kyi gnas
183a8(mdo sde): rnams thams cad mog mog byed cing lhags// bsod nams tshogs bsags kha cig dbang po'i mchod sdong 'dra'i// dri med tog thogs byang chub snying po der yang lhags// kha cig mkha' las nor bu rin chen
183b1(mdo sde): dra ba 'thor// zla ba zla bzangs thang skyes rnam mdzes man da ra// bar sha tsam pa ka dang sna ma'i me tog phreng // byang chub sems dpa' shing rgyal drung na bzhugs la 'thor// kha cig rkang pa gnyis kyis sa ni rab bskyod la/ 
183b2(mdo sde): sa bskyod nas kyang skye bo dga' bar byed cing lhags// kha cig ri bo lhun po lag na thogs byed la// bar snang gnas te me tog skon bu 'thor zhing lhags// kha cig rgya mtsho bzhi po mgo la thogs nas ni// sa la
183b3(mdo sde): spos chu 'thor te chag chag 'debs shing lhags// kha cig rin chen mchod sdong sna tshogs thogs nas ni// rgyang rings 'dug ste byang chub sems dpa' ston cing lhags// kha cig tshangs pa lta bur zhi ba'i gzugs
183b4(mdo sde): bsgyur te// yid zhi rab zhi gnas shing bsam gtan bsam gtan pa de dag pa spu dag las byams dang snying rje dang // dga' dang btang snyoms tshad med yid 'ong sgra 'byin lhags// kha cig brgya byin lha/ 
183b5(mdo sde): ltar stong phrag khrag khrig gi/ lha rnams ngag gis mdun du bdar na/ sa lhags gyur cing // de dag byang chub shing drung phyin nas thal sbyar te// brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin chen sna tshogs 'thor// 
183b6(mdo sde): kha cig phyogs bzhi dag gi skyong ba ji lta bar// dri za srin po mi 'am tsa yis yongs bskor te// klog ltar gsal ba'i me tog char pa 'bebs shing lhags// dri za mi 'am ci'i skad kyis ston pa bstod/ 
183b7(mdo sde): kha cig me tog rgyas pa'i ljon shing 'bras bur bcas// me tog bcas shing mchog gi dri ni rab 'byin la// lo mar sangs rgyas sras po lus phyed gnas thogs lhags// btung nas sa'i snying por me tog
183b8(mdo sde): rnams kyang 'thor// kha cig pad+ma ung bal pad+ma dkar po rgyas// pad+ma'i snying por sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan gnas// de 'drar me tog rgyas pa'i rdzing bu thogs te lhags// chags med yid ldan byang chub
184a1(mdo sde): / sems dpa' ma bas la bstod// kha cig lhun po lta bur lus chen bsgyur te lhags// bar snang gnas nas rang gi lus kyang rab tu 'dor// bor ma thag tu me tog phreng ba rnams su gyur/ 
184a2(mdo sde): stong gsum dag gi rgyal ba'i zhing rnams khebs par byed// kha cig mig gnyis sreg pa'i skal pa lta bu dang / de bzhin chags pa dang ni 'jig par ston cing lhags// de dag lus las chos kyi sgo mo mang grag ste// 
184a3(mdo sde): de dag thos pas sems can khrag khrig sred pa spong // kha cig mchu ni bim pa 'dra la bzhin mdzes shing // kha bzhin rdzogs la mi 'am ci 'dra'i sgra sgrogs lhags// do shal sna tshogs legs brgyan bu mo chas
184a4(mdo sde): pa'adra// de la lta bas lha'i tshogs rnams ngoms mi 'gyur/ kha cig rdo rje lta bur mi phyed lus can te// rkang pas 'og dgi chu'i phung po 'bog cig lhags// nyi ma 'dra zhing zla ltar bzhin
184a5(mdo sde): rgyas snang byed la// 'od byed nyon mongs skyon rnams bcom pa kha cig lhags// kha cig rin po ches brgyan lag na rin chen thogs// zhing mang bye ba stong dag khebs par byed cing lhags
184a6(mdo sde): sems can mang la phan dang bde dang tshim bya'i phyir// rin chen me tog dam pa dri zhim char pa 'bebs// kha cig gzungs chen rin po che'i mdzod gyur cing // ba spu rnams nas mdo sde khrag khrig rab brjod
184a7(mdo sde): la spobs par ldan zhing blo gros ldan la blo mchog ldan// rgyags shing rab dregs skye bo rtogs par byed cing lhags// kha cig ri bo lhun po rnga ltar thogs nas ni// rab tu rdung zhing mkha' las yid 'ong
184a8(mdo sde): sgra 'byin lhags// de'i sgra ni phyogs bcur bye ba'i zhing song ste// bdud rtsi mthob ston pa do mod 'tshang rgyar sgrog/ byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu'o// 
184b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag mngon par byas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'
184b2(mdo sde): nyid kyis kyang phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ji snyed cig
184b3(mdo sde): yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po der kun tu bstan to// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod pa'i khams 'di'i bdag po
184b4(mdo sde): dbang phyug dbang sgyur ba bdud sdig can de la bdag gis ma sgra ngan par/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni bdag gi mi chas/ 
184b5(mdo sde): bdag gis bdud sdig can bskul bar bya'o// de las rnam pa/ ra rgyal na/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha la sogs pa thams/ cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang bdud kyi 'khor na
184b6(mdo sde): bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'khod pa dag gis/ nga'i seng ge rnam par rol pa mthong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyuraro snyam mo// dge
184b7(mdo sde): slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar bsams nas/ de'i tshe smin mtshams kyi bar gyi mdzod spu nas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jom par byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gcig phyung ste/ 'od
184b8(mdo sde): zer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyi bdud kyi gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/ mog mog por byas te/ rab tu g.yos par byas par yang gyur to// 
185a1(mdo sde): / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos yongs su khyab par gyur to// bdud sdig can gyis 'od de las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di yang
185a2(mdo sde): thos so// sems can shin tu dag pa bskal mang spyod spyad pa// zas gtsang sras pos rgyal srid dag ni rab spangs te/ phan byed de ni bdud rtsi mngon par 'dod pas byung // byang chub shing drung 'ongs kyis
185a3(mdo sde): de ring bsgrim pa gyis// de ni bdag kyang rgal la gzhan yang sgrol bar byed// de ni bdag nyid grol bas gzhan yang grol bar byed// de ni bdag kyang dbugs phyin gzhan dag dbugs kyang 'byin// yongs
185a4(mdo sde): su mya ngan 'das nas gzhan dag mya ngan zla// ngan song gsum po dam lus stongs par byed par 'gyur// lha mi rnams kyi gro dang khyer gang bar byed par 'gyur// phan pa byed pa de ni bdud rtsi
185a5(mdo sde): thob gyur nas// bsam gtan mngon shes bdud rtsi bde mcho/ ga sbyin par 'gyur// gang tshe rang byung nyid kyis chos char mngon phab tshe// nag po'i rtsa lag khyod kyi grong khyer stongs
185a6(mdo sde): byed 'gyur// stobs med pas kyang stobs med 'gyur de dpung nyams 'gyur// phyogs ni phyogs min ci bya gar 'gro shes mi 'gyur// dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad
185a7(mdo sde): pa 'di dag gis bskul nas/ rmi lam rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis rmis so// rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gi gnas mun pas khyab par rmis pa dang / rang gi gnas rdul gyis
185a8(mdo sde): gang shing gyo mo dang / gseg mas gang bar rmis pa dang / bdag nyid sngangs skrag nas phyogs su 'bros par rmis pa dang / bdag cod pan dang bral zhing rnam lhung bar rmis pa dang / bdag mchu dang / gres
185b1(mdo sde): pa dang /  ga ma mas pang/  mamam ma mas mam ma pa dang 'ang mam mams rnam
185b2(mdo sde): dza ma dang / zlabardung dang / byadang // gam nga dang / gargyal dang / shing shang rgyas chags bya tshags rnams mngapa gsheg thegs par rnam pa dang / dza dang / rlung dang / rngarda dang / 
185b3(mdo sde): dzang / rgyud gcig pa dang pi dang dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / leg rdo ba dang / khar pa'i sil khrol la sogs pa rol mo'i ma srung rnams chagazugs te/ sa la lhung bar rmis pa dang / 'khor sdug
185b4(mdo sde): pas kyang bdud spungs te ngo mdzum gnag cing / phyogs gcig dadong nas/ sems shing 'khod par rmis pa dang / rlung ma'i dam pa phreng ba can yang ma la nas sa la lhung ste/ lag
185b5(mdo sde): gnyis mgo la rdob par rmis pa dang / bdud kyi bu gang dgashin tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dang / shin tu gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / shin tu
185b6(mdo sde): shes rab dang ldan pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa la phyag 'tshal bar mis pa dang / bdag gi bu mo rnams kyang kyi drung yab/ kyi drung yang
185b7(mdo sde): ces cho nge 'don par rmis pa dang / bdag lus la gos dri ma can gyon par rmis pa dang / bdag mgo rdul gyis gang la skya'o bseng bseng pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / mdangs nyams par rmis pa
185b8(mdo sde): dang bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung dang / rta babs rnams kyang rdul gyis gang nas rdib par rmis pa dang / de'i sde dpon gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / 
186a1(mdo sde): dri za'i bdag po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang skom tshugs bcas te snying chongs btab nas byer bar rmis pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ yul
186a2(mdo sde): 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos bu dang / brgya byin dang / rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dang / dbang sgyur la sogs pa gang / 
186a3(mdo sde): yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bdud la mi gus shing / byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs par rmis pa dang / thab mo'i nang na de'i ral gri shugs nas ma phyin cing / bdag mi shis pa'i sgra 'byin par
186a4(mdo sde): rmis pa dang / rang gi 'khor gyis bdag por bar rmis pa dang / bkra shis kyi bum pa sgor lhung bar rmis pa dang / bram ze mis byin bu yang bkra mi shis pa'i sgra sgrogs par
186a5(mdo sde): rmis pa dang / sgo ba kun tu dga' byed kyang kun tu mi dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa dang / na mkha'i dkyil mun pas/ khebs par rmis pa dang / 'dod pa'i gnas na gnas pa'i
186a6(mdo sde): dpal yang ngu bar rmis pa dang / bdag gi dbang yang dbang med par gyur par rmis pa dang / rang gi phyogs kyang phyogs ma yin par rmos pa dang / nor bu dang / mu tig gi dra ba rnams kyang chad cing
186a7(mdo sde): rnam par chad nas 'brul bar rmis pa dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos par rmis pa dang / shing rnams kyang bcad cing ba gam yang lhung bar rmis pa dang / bdud kyi sde bkod
186a8(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyang khas bub du skyel bar rmis pa ste/ dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi rmi lam du rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta bu rmis so// de sad pa dang / 'jigs skrag spangs nas
186b1(mdo sde): nang mi thams cad bsogs te/ dpung dang bcas pa dang / 'a khor dang sde pon dang slo ba dang de dag 'dus par rig nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdud des rmi lam de dag mthong nas nyam thag
186b2(mdo sde): ste sde dpon bdud po seng ge za 'gram zhes bya dang // bu rnams dag dang 'khor rnams gang dag yin la smras// nag po'i rtsa lag de dag kun la yongs su dris// shAkya'i nang du skyes pa mtshan mchog
186b3(mdo sde): yan lag smras// lo drug bar du bya dka' brtul zhugs drag po spyad// byang chub shing drung 'ongs kyis rab tu sgrims shig ces// mdang sum par snang las ni tshigs bcad de skad grog/ byang chub
186b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' de nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas// sems can bye bo khrag khrig mang po rnam rtogs byed// gang tshe bdud rtsi thob ste bsil ba'i dngos reg tshe// des ni ngaganas ma
186b5(mdo sde): lus stong par byed par 'gyur// dpung chen rnams dang lhan cig der ni rab dong la// shing dbang drung 'dug dge sbyong nga gcig de gzhom par bya// yan lag bzhi pa'i sde rnams
186b6(mdo sde): myur du rab tu sgrims// gal te nga la sdug sems phyi shol ma byed cig/ dgra bcom rang sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gang gyur kyang // mya ngan 'da' bas bdag dpung nyam chung yong mi 'gyur// 
186b7(mdo sde): de yang cig pu rgyal ba chos rgyal gyur na ni// bgrang las 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i rigs ni gzhar mi 'chang // dge slong dag de nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya bas/ bdud sdig can de la tshigs
186b8(mdo sde): su bcad de smras pa/ yab cig ci nangs zhal gyur cing ni zhal mdog nyams// thugs kyang 'phar la khyod kyi yan lag nying lag 'dar// khyod kyis ci gsan ci gzigs myur du bka' stsol
187a1(mdo sde): cig/ yang dag bsams nas de bzhin sbyong ba 'tshal bar bgyi// nga rgyal med bdud smras pa bu cig nga las nyon// ngas ni sdig pa'i rmi lam shin tu mi bzang rmis// de ring 'khor/ 
187a2(mdo sde): 'dir de kun ma lus smras na ni// khyed rnams brgyal te so la rab tu skyel bar 'gyur// ded dpon gyis smras pa/ gal te 'thab dus bab ste rgyal na nongs ma mchis// gal te der ni bcom par gyur na
187a3(mdo sde): nongs dang bcas// gal te khyod kyi rmi lam de 'dra'i ltas las na// gzhag na dge ste g.yul ngor yongs su gnas mi 'gyur// bdud kyis smras pa/ brtsal ba grub pa'i skyes bu g.yul ngor grags
187a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur// gal te brtan la brten te logs byas bdag dag rgyal// kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa mthong nas langs na sa su// kho bo'i rkang par mgos phyag mi 'tshal nges mi nus// 
187a5(mdo sde): ded dpon gyis smras pa/ rgya chen dpung bdog kyang ni shin tu ma thu chung ste// stobs ldan dpa' bo gcig pu mchis na g.yul las rgyal// gal te srin bu me khyer stong gsum
187a6(mdo sde): gang gyur kyang // nyi ma gcig pu'i zil du rlag ste 'od mi bgyidas// gzhan yang gang la nga rgyal gti mug mchis la dpyod ma mchis// mkhas dang mi mthun bgyid pa de ni gso mi nus// dge slong dag
187a7(mdo sde): de ltar bdud sdig can gyis ded dpon gyi tshig ma mnyan nas// yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung chen po stobs che ba// thab mo la dpa' ba 'jigs su rung ba/ spu zing zhes byed nus pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyis
187a8(mdo sde): sngon ma mthong ma thos pa/ bzhin bsgyur ba/ rnam pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bsgyur ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/ rkang lag sbrul brgya stong gis dkris pa dang ldan pa/ ral gri dang / mda' gzhu
187b1(mdo sde): ba mdung chu dang/  dang / slar dang / tsu gsum la gang nga dang / bong pa dang / gdun shing dang / ba con dang / gags pa dang / dbyug to dang / 'kho lo dang / rdorje dang / rdo rmyi gcig bathogs pa/ 
187b2(mdo sde): rus la go cha bzang po dgos pa/ mgo dang nang lag dang mig log par 'dug pa/ mgo dang mig dang gdong 'bar ba/ lo dang nang lag dbyibs mi sdug pa/ bzhin gzi brjid drag po dang ldan pa/ shin tu
187b3(mdo sde): bzhin pargyu zang mo gtsigs paM/ 'jigs su rung bar mche ba gtsigs pa/ lce stu ga cig sheng che ba mang po 'phyang ba/ lce 'bar 'bur can re ldi dang 'dra ba/ mig me dang / sbrul nag po drug gis
187b4(mdo sde): rgyam pa'i tshig ltar dmar bdag char bcug ste/ de la nga kyi dgra ni sbrul gadrug pa sdug/ kha cig ni rnam par lding gis rgyas mtshonas byung ba bzhin du la gi mthil du sbrul gdus
187b5(mdo sde): ba bzhag ste za/ kha cig ni mo'i sha dang / khrag dang / rkang / lag dang / mgo dang / mngal ma dang / nang grol dang / ngan skyugs la sogs pa za/ kha cig ni gzugs sngo bas
187b6(mdo sde): dang kham pa po dang / sngon po dang / dmar po dang / ser por 'dug ste/ 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs sna tshogs can/ kha cig ni mig zhigs pa dang / mig khron pa lta bu dang / mig phyung ba lta bu
187b7(mdo sde): dang / mig 'bar ba dang / mig bzung ba mi sdug pa kha cig ni mig log pa dang / 'bar ba dang / mi sdug pa/ kha cig ni ri 'bar ba thogs te/ 'gying zhing ri gzhan la zhon te 'ong / kha cig ni shong rnga zon
187b8(mdo sde): byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i logs su rgyug cing 'ong / kha cig go rna ba ni phag rnal bu dang / zhib ma lta bu dang / glang po'i rnabs bu dang / 'phyang ba dang / phag rna lta bur 'dug pa/ kha cig

189a1(mdo sde): bsdus te gi char 'bebs pa dang / mda'i sbyin bsdus te char du 'bebs pa dang / mun nag ston pa dang / sgra sbyin cing byang chub sems dpa'i logs su rgyug bdag go// kha cig ni zhags

189a3(mdo sde): dang / nying lag 'thor ba dang / lus skor ba dang / gang mo cher rgod pa dang / brang rdung ba dang / brang la rdob pa dang / mgo gsig pa dang / mgo 'bar zhing sgra gyen du 'greng ba dang / phan tshun shugs

189a5(mdo sde): buH kyi hung nga'i bu/ longs shig longs la myur du bros shig/ ces 'dzer ro// srin mo'i gzugs dang / sha za mo'i gzugs dang / yi dgas long batheng po rke ba bkres pas
189a6(mdo sde): ring pa lag pa sgreng ba/ kha gcus pa dag kyang ngu zhing 'jigs pa ston te/ spangs par byed cing byang chub sems dpa' mdun na rgyug go/ bdud kyi dpung 'dus pa rnam pa de lta bu des dpag tshad brgyad
189a7(mdo sde): cu kho ra khor yug tu gang bar gyur to// bdud gcig gi ji lta ba de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po bye ba phrag brgyar gtogs pa'i bdud sdig can rnams kyi dpung dag gis/ thad ka dang steng gang
189a8(mdo sde): bar gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs// srin po yi dgas sha za'i gzugs dang bcas// 'jig rten mi sdug drag gzugs ji snyed pa// thams
189b1(mdo sde): cad sgra yis de ni sprul pa byas/ mgo gcig mgo gnyis mgo gsum ldan pa nas// mgo stong bar du ldan zhing gnod sbyin mang // lag cig lag gnyis lag gsum ldan pa nas// lag stong par
189b2(mdo sde): tu ldan pa rab tu mang // rkang gcig rkang gnyis rkang gsum ldan pa nas// rkang stong bar du ldan pa gzhan yang mang // kha bzhin sngo la lus ni ser ba dang / kha bzhin ser la lus ni sngo ba dang / kha bzhi/ 
189b3(mdo sde): dkar la lus ni gnag pa dang // kha bzhin gnag la lus ni dkar ba dang // kha bzhin gzhan la lus kyang gzhan pa dang // de 'dra'i gzugs brnyan dag gi dpung rnams lhags// stag dang sbrul dang
189b4(mdo sde): phag gi gdong can dang // glang po rta dang bong bu rnga mo'i gdong / spre'u dang seng ge dred kyi gdong can dang // de 'dra'i ba gdo dang ldan pa'i dpung rnams lhags// ral pa rjes la 'jig pa'i
189b5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin mang // lug mgo rus pa 'bar 'bur lba ba can/ lus ni mi'i khrag gis rab tu sbags// gnod sbyin de 'dra ba dag der yang lags// rkang pa dag ni dgo ba'i rkang pa
189b6(mdo sde): 'dra ba mig gi 'bras bu spre'u gyi mig dang mtshungs// mche ba dag ni glang po'i mche ba 'dra// kha gdong de 'dra'i dpung rnams der yang lhags// lus kyi dbyibs ni chu srin 'dra ba ste// mig gi 'bras bu
189b7(mdo sde): gnyis ni rab tu 'bar/ rna ba dag ni ra yi rna ba 'dra// kha gdong de 'dra'i dpung rnams der yang lhags// kha cig dag ni lag na dbyig pa thogs// tho ba mdung thung rtse gsum lag na thogs// kha cig ri
189b8(mdo sde): bo lhun po lag na thogs// 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can gnod sbyin lhags// gshol thogs 'khor lo thogs shing mig bsgyur dang // ri rtse chen po lag na thogs pa dang // rlung dang rdo dang gnam
190a1(mdo sde): ljags rab 'bebs shing // gnod sbyin 'jigs su rung ba der yang lhags// rlung ni rab tu gtong zhing char yang 'bebs// brgya phrag stong gi glog kyang rab tu 'byin// 'jug gi sgra yang sgrog cing / 
190a2(mdo sde): shing sngon skyel// byang chub shing gi lo ma tsam mi g.yo// char pa rab tu 'bengs shing rlung yang gtong // chu bo 'bebs shing chu yis sa yang gang // de ltar 'jigs su rung ba mtshan mo byung // de yi nub mo sam/ 
190a3(mdo sde): med shing yang skyel// thams cad dbyibs mi sdug cing gzugs mi sdug/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs ldan de dag mthong nas kyang // yon tan mtshan dang gzi brjid ldan pa po// lhun po lta bur sems ni
190a4(mdo sde): g.yo ba med// sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs pa dang // sprin dang 'dra bar chos rnams kun la rtog/ de ltar chos kyi tshul la rto/ dag pas na// legs gnas bsam gtan byed cing chos la gnas
190a5(mdo sde): gang zhig nga dang nga yi snyam sems shing // dngos dang lus la yang dag mngon zhen pa// mi mkhas 'dzin par gnas des mthong nas ni// 'jigs par gyur cing bdag kyang rab tu
190a6(mdo sde): myos// shAkya'i sras pos chos rnams brten byung ba// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs// namakha' lta bu'i sems dang rab tu ldan// dpung bcas g.yo sgyu mthong yang myos pa med// dge slong dag
190a7(mdo sde): de ltar bdud sdig can gyi bu stong po de dag gi nang nas ded dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi bu gang dag byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par dad pa de dag ni bdud kyi g.yas rol du 'khod par gyur to// gang
190a8(mdo sde): dag bdud kyi phyogs byed pa de dag ni bdud sdig can gyi g.yon rol du 'khod par gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis rang gi bu de dag la smras pa/ yu bu cag ci 'dra ba'i dpung gis/ byang chub

190b5(mdo sde): bltas pas ri bo lhun po 'jog 'gyur yang // de yi mdun du khyod ni mig 'byed yong mi nus// gzhan yang / ma gang rgya mtsho lag pa gnyis kyis rgal 'dod cing // de yi chu ni

190b7(mdo sde): gi lus 'di lag pa brgya mchis pa// gcig gis kyang ni mda' brgya 'phang bgyi ste// dge sbyong de'i lus ni dbug par bgyi// yab cig bder 'gyur ma shol khyod gshegs shig/ g.yas rol
190b8(mdo sde): nas blo bzang po zhes bya bas smras pa// ba spu rnams kyang ci phyir lag pa min// lag pa brgya dang khyad par ci zhig yod// lag pa re rer de ltar mdung yod kyang // de dag gis kyang de la ci mi nus// 
191a1(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ni 'jig rten 'das pa'i byams pa bsgoms// byams ldan thub pa de yi sku la ni// dug dang mtshon dang me yis mi tshugs te// mtshon cha 'phangs pa thams cad me
191a2(mdo sde): tog 'gyur// gzhan yang / mkha' dang sa dang chu la stobs ldan gang // mi 'am gnod sbyin ral gri dgra sta thogs// mi dbang bzod pa'i stobs ldan de drung phyin// stobs chen stobs ldan de kun
191a3(mdo sde): stobs chung 'gyur// g.yon rol nas gzi brjid drag shul can zhes bya bas smras pa// bdag ni de yi lus bzang gi/ khong du zhugs te bsreg par bgyi// 'brog gi me ltar chung ngu yis// rkang dang

191a5(mdo sde): byed snyed kyis// rdo rje'i thugs ldan de ni bsreg mi nus// zhan yang / ri bo thams cad 'gul yang srid// rgya mtsho chen po zad kyang srid// nyi zla sa la ltung yang srid// sa ni zhu bar
191a6(mdo sde): 'gyur yang srid// 'jig rten don tu rlom mdzad pa// thugs dam nges par mdzad pa po// byang chub dam pa ma thob par// shing chen drung nas bzhengs mi srid// g.yon rol nas lag rings kyis bsgyings

191a8(mdo sde): par chab kyang blang // yab cig dge sbyong de bzung ste// rgya mtsho'i pha rol dor bar bgyi// yab cig dpung 'di bzhag du gsol/ khyod ni thugs ngan chen ma mdzad// byang chub shing de drudus phyung ste/ 
191b1(mdo sde): sug pas phyogs phyogs gtong bar bgyi// g.yas rol nas dang ba thob pas smras pa// gal te khyod ni dregs bsgyings te// lha dang lha min dri zar bcas// sa dang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas// de dag lag

191b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ dpung gi nang na bzhugs bzhin du// yab khyod ci slad rab tu brnyengs// de la dpung grogs ga la mchis// ci slang khyod 'dir de la brnyengs// g.yas rol nas blo gros rtse gcig gis smras
191b4(mdo sde): pa/ 'jig rten dag na nyi zla dpung ma mchis// 'khor los sbyar dang seng ge dpung ma mchis// byang chub sems da dpa' 'di ni dpung ma mchis// 'on kyang gcig pus bdud ni

191b6(mdo sde): bdag gis// do modo dgum gyis chung zad ma bsnyengs yab// g.yas rol nas bsod nams brgyan gyis smras pa// sred med bu ltar mi phyed mi shigs sku dang ldan// bzod stobs go mnabs
191b7(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtan pa'i ral gri mnga' rnam par thar gsum bzhon pa shes rab gzhu lags yab// bsod nams stobs kyis de ni bdud kyi dpung las rgyal// g.yon rol nas phyir mi ldog
191b8(mdo sde): bas smras pa/ 'brog me rnal tshig pa phyir mi ldog/ lobs pas 'phangs pa'i mda' yang phyir mi ldog/ mkha' las rdo rje 'bab pa phyir mi ldog/ shAkya'i bu las ma rgyal bdag gnas med/ 
192a1(mdo sde): // g.yas rol nas chos 'dod kyis smras pa/ gsher ba'i rtsa dang phrang na me yang ldog/ brag gi rtse mor bab na mda' yang ldog/ rdo rje sar bab de nas gang du 'gro// zhi ba bdud rtsi ma thob de mi ldog/ 
192a2(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ yab cig par snang la ni ri mo bro bar nus kyang gda'// sems can ji snyed kun gyi sems ni gcig bsdur nus kyang gda'// yab cig nyi zla rlung ni zhags pas bcing du nus kyang
192a3(mdo sde): gdal/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub snying po las ni bskyod mi nus// g.yon rol nas nye bar ma zhi bas smras pa/ lta ba'i gdug pa chen pos lhun po bsreg par gyis// rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyi
192a4(mdo sde): chab kyang bskam par bgyi// bdag gis do mod de gnyis thal dpar klag par bgyis// yab cig byang chub dang ni dge sbyong gzigs su gsol// g.yas rol nas don grub kyis
192a5(mdo sde): smras pa/ gal te dug gis 'di kun gang gyur la// stong ga sum dam pa rab tu 'bar gyur kyang // yon tan 'byung gnas kyis ni gzigs tsam gyis// dug ni dug ma yin par
192a6(mdo sde): rab tu 'gyur// srid pa gsum na gdug pa drag po ni// 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug ste// de dag de yi sku dang thugs la med// mkha' la rdzab dang rdul ni med pa bzhin// sku dang gsung
192a7(mdo sde): dang thugs kyang rab tu dag/ sems can kun la byams pa'i thugs dang ldan// de la mtshon dang dug gis yong mi tshugs// de bas yab cig thams cad bzlog du gsol// g.yon rol nas dga'
192a8(mdo sde): ba chags pas smras pa// bdag gis sil snyan stong dag rab bgyis ste// lha'i bu mo brgyan pa byed stong gis// chags par bgyis ste grong khyer mchog tu bkri// 'dod la dga' bar khyod kyi/ 
192b1(mdo sde): dbang du bgyi// g.yas rol nas chos dgas smras pa// de 'dir rtag tu chos la dgyes pa dgyes// bsam gtan dgyes shing bdud rtsi don la dgyes// sems can thar par mdzad dang byams la dgyes/ 
192b2(mdo sde): 'dod chags dga' la de ni dgyes mi mdzad// g.yon rol nas rlung gi shugs shes/ bya bas smras pa/ bdag gis shugs kyis nyi zla mid bgyis la// nam mkha' las na rang yang rab gtang zhing // yab
192b3(mdo sde): cig do mod dge sbyong bzung nas ni// rlung gis phub ma bzhin du gtor bar bgyi// g.yas rol nas bdud kyi blo gros mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar khyod kyi shugs mgyogs
192b4(mdo sde): drag pa ltar// gal te lha dang mi rnams de 'drar 'gyur//  de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus pas kyang // zla med gang zag de la gnod mi nus// g.yon rol nas tshangs pa'i blo
192b5(mdo sde): gros kyis smras pa// de 'dra'i drag po phal cher gyur kyang ni// khyod kyi nga rgyal chung zad 'jom mi nus// bgyi ba thams cang mang pos 'grub lags na// gcig pus khyod la ci bgyi
192b6(mdo sde): smos ci 'tshal// g.yas rol nas seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa// sa la seng ge khyus 'khod sngon ma byung // lta ba'i gdug pa dag kyang khyus mi 'khod// gzi ldan bden pa pha rol gnon pa po// 
192b7(mdo sde): skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyis khyus mi 'khod// g.yon rol nas thams cad du gdol pa zhes bya bas smras pa// ji ltar khyod kyi sras po brtson 'grus dang // shugs dang stobs dang ldan pa sgra
192b8(mdo sde): sgrogs pa// tshig 'bar de 'dra yab kyis sngon gsan tam// myur du dge slong de ni gzhom du bzhud// g.yas rol nas seng ge sgra sgrogs shes bya bas smras pa// nags tshal dag gi khrod na
193a1(mdo sde): wa mang po// seng ge med pa de ni sgra yang sgrogs// seng ges sgra bsgrags 'jigs pa thos pa dang // skrag nas phyogs phyogs dag tu rab tu 'bros// de ltar bdud bu mi mkhas 'di dag
193a2(mdo sde): kyang mi mchog gsung ni ma thos de bar du// de dag spyi rdol byed cing byung rgyal smra// mi yi seng ges gsung bsgrags 'bros par 'gyur// g.yon rol nas nyes par bsam pa sems dpas smras pa// 
193a3(mdo sde): bdag gis gang bsams myur du 'dir 'grub na// de ni ci slad dpung tshogs 'di mo lta// gang phyir langs te myur du mi 'bros pas// de ni glen pa cho ga ma 'tshal ba// g.yas rol nas don legs par
193a4(mdo sde): bsam pa sems pa zhes bya bas smras pa/ da ni mi glen pha ro// del gnon pa ste// khyed cag glen zhing shin tu ma bsdams dpa// khyed kyis de yi mthu rtsal yong mi shes// de yi shes rab
193a5(mdo sde): stobs kyis thams cad pham// bdud kyi bu ni gang ga'i bye ma snyeng// khyed cag rnams kyis de 'dra'i mthu rtsal can// de yi ba spu gcig kyang g.yos mi nus// bsad par bsams pa
193a6(mdo sde): mi 'grub smos ci dgos// khyod ni de la yid kyis gnod ma sems// gus dang bcas par dad pa'i sems su gyis// 'di ni srid gsum rgyal por gyur pas na// thab mo ma byed par ni slar log shig/ 
193a7(mdo sde): de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs pa dang / nag po'i phyogs pa stong du tshang ba de dag thams cad kyis// so so nas bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad de smras so// de nas
193a8(mdo sde): bdud sdig can gyi sde dpon sde bzang po zhes bya ba des/ bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// gang dag khyod kyi rjes 'brang brgya byin dang // skyong dang mi 'am ci'i tshogs rnams dang // lha
193b1(mdo sde): min dbang dang mkha' lding dbang po rnams// thal mo sbyar te de la phyag 'tshal na// khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma lags pa// tshangs pa 'od gsal la yi bu rnams dang // gnas gtsang ris kyi lha rnams de dag
193b2(mdo sde): kun// de la phyag 'tshal ba ni smos ci 'tshal// khyod kyi sras po shes rab can// stobs dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa// de dag byang chub sems dpa' la// snying dang 'thun 'gyur phyag 'tshal lo// 
193b3(mdo sde): dpag tshad brgyad cur khyab pa yi// gnod sbyin la sogs bdud dpung 'di// phal cher rab tu dang yid kyis// kun kyang nyes pa med pa lta// 'jigs su rung zhing drag bsgyur ba// dpung tshogs mi
193b4(mdo sde): bzang 'di gzigs nas// ngo mtshar ma gyur zhum mi mngal/ nges par ngo modo 'di rgyal 'gyur// gang na dpung 'di gnas pra der// wa dang 'ug pa sgra 'byin la// bya rog bong bu sgra 'byin
193b5(mdo sde): bas myur du slar ni ldog pa'i rigs// byang chub snying po ra gzigasu gsol// pa ta kun ta ngang pa dang // khu b+h+ya/ garma bya mngon skor bar// nges par do mod 'di rgyal 'gyur/ 
193b6(mdo sde): gang na dpung 'di gnas pa der// rdul dang snag cha'i char 'bab la// sa dkyil me tog char 'bab pas// bdag gi tshi ga bzhin ldog pa'i rigs// gang na dpung 'di gnas pa de// shang shod
193b7(mdo sde): gyur cing tsher mas gang // sa dkyil dri med gser gyur pas// shes rab can dag ldog pa'i rigs// gal te mi 'dod sngar rmis pa'i// rmi lam de dag mngon sum 'gyur// drang srong rnams
193b8(mdo sde): kyis yul brlag pa// de bzhin dpung 'di thal bar klog/ rgyal po 'gro ba drang srong mchog/ tshangs pas byin gyis khros byas pas// dan ta ka'i nags tshal tshig/ le mang zhig tu rtsam skyes// 
194a1(mdo sde): // drang srong bcul zhugs spyod pa bo// dka' thub ldan pa'i 'jig rten na// ji snyed 'khod pa kun gyi mchog 'byung po kun la mi 'tshe 'di// gang gi lus la mtshan rab 'bar// khyim nas
194a2(mdo sde): ni byung ba der// nyon mongs pham byas 'tshang rgya zhes// khyod kyis sngon chang ma gsan nam// rgyal sras rnams kyis mchod don tu// 'byor pa 'di 'dra 'di dag sprul// de bas nges par sems can
194a3(mdo sde): mchog/ sbyin bsreg dam pa len par 'gyur// 'di yi mdzod spu dri med pa// bye ba khrag khrig zhing du mdzes// de yis bdag cag mog mogo bgyis// bdud dpung des bcom gdon mi 'tshal// 
194a4(mdo sde): srid pa'i rtse gnas lha rnams kyis// de yi spyi gtsug bltar/ mi nus// nges par gzhan gyis ma bstan par// thadams cad mkhyen nyid thob par 'gyur// ji ltar lhun po khor
194a5(mdo sde): yug dang // nyi zla brgya byin tshangs pa dang // shing ljon rnams da nga ri mchog kun// sa dkyil phyag 'tshal bgyid las na// bsod nams stobs can shes rab stobs// ye shes
194a6(mdo sde): stobs can bzod pa'i stobs// brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan pa de// bdud phyogs stobs med mdzad par nges// glang pos so ma btang snod dang // seng ges ji ltar wa bcom dang / nyi ma srin bu me khyer ltar/ 
194a7(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pas dpung bcom 'gyur// tshig de skad thos pa dang / bdud kyi bu gzhan zhig shin tu khros nas mig dmar por gyur te smras pa// khyod ni gcig po de yi bsngags pa dag/ shin tu dpag
194a8(mdo sde): tu med par brjod byed na// gcig pu des ni ci zhig bya bar nus// 'jigs su rung ba'i dpung chen ma mthong ngam// de nas g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu bdud rab tu 'jom pa zhes bya bas smras pa// 'jig
194b1(mdo sde): rten nyi zla seng ge dang // 'khor los sgyur la grogs byed med// byang chub zhugs nas nges pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' grogs mi dgos// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud mthu chung bar bya ba'i phyir// 
194b2(mdo sde): gang mthong bas bdag gi dpung byang chub sems dpa'i kha'i nang du zhugs so snyam du sems shing // bdud bros par gyur pa dang / blos nas kyang ci yang ma yin no snyam nas/ yang slar log ste/ 'khor dang
194b3(mdo sde): bcas pas/ mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs byang chub sems dpa'i steng du 'phen cing / ri rab tsam gyi ri de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i steng du 'phangs pa dang / me tog gi bla re dang / gzhal med khang du
194b4(mdo sde): gyur te gnas pa dang / gang dag mig gdug pa dang / myur du ga dug pa dang / dbugs gdug pa rnams me lce gtor ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor de yang / byang chub sems dpa' la 'od kyi
194b5(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ pad+ma mdab ma ba rgya ba/ rgyas pa lta bu'i bzhin bskyed do// de nas yang / byang chub sems dpas lag pa g.yas pas mgo la byugs
194b6(mdo sde): pa dang / bdud kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lag na ral gri thogs par mthong nas/ lho phyogs su bros pa dang // ci yang ma yin no snyam nas yang slar log go/ slar log nas kyang byang chub sems
194b7(mdo sde): dpa'i steng du mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / mda' bo che dang / dgra sta dang / bong ba dang / gtun shing dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / dbyug tho dang / 'khor
194b8(mdo sde): lo dang / tho ba dang / shing drungs phyung dang / pha bong dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyi thu lum shin tu 'jigs pa du ma 'phen te/ de dag kyang 'phangs ma thag tu me tog gi phreng ba dang / me tog gi
195a1(mdo sde): bla rer gyur te gnas so// me tog sil mar yang gyur nas sa la 'thor ba dang / phreng ba'i chun por yang 'phyang bas/ byang chub kyi shing brgyan par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i bkod
195a2(mdo sde): pab 'byor pa de dag mthong nas/ bdud sdig can phrag dog dang / ser snas sems la gnod de/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ kye rgyal bu gzhon nu bzhengs bzhengs/ rgyal srid la spyod cig/ khyod
195a3(mdo sde): kyi bsod nams de tsam gyis// khyod kyis thar pa ga la 'thob// de nas byang chub sems dpas brtan la zab cing rgya che ba dang / 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// 
195a4(mdo sde): sdig can khyod kyis ni gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin gcig/ gis 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thob tu zad do// ngas ni ma/ chod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gtan pa
195a5(mdo sde): med pa'i mchod sbyin byas so// lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mi ga dang / mgo dag kyang bcad cing slong ba rnams la byi na no// sems can rnams thar bar bya ba'i phyir/ khyim dang /

195a7(mdo sde): dpa' la slar smras pa/ sngon chad kho bos mchod sbyin kha na ma tho med// gtan pa med pa byas pa khyod 'dir dbang du yod// khyod la 'di na dbang po gang yang yod min pas// smras kyang phan
195a8(mdo sde): pa ci yod khyod ni pham par gyur// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// sdig can sa 'di ni nga'i dbang yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpas bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi 'khor la byams pa dang
195b1(mdo sde): snying rje sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis khyab par byas nas/ seng ge ltar mi 'jig mi skrag la bag tsha ba med cing / mi dman la ma zhum pa dang / ma 'khrugs pa dang / ma rnyogs pa dang / 'jigs
195b2(mdo sde): pab dang / spu zing zhes byed pa med par lag mthil na/ dung dang / rgyal mtshan dang / nya dang / bum pa dang / bkra shis pa dang / lcags kyu dang / 'khor lo'i mtshan ma yod pa/ sor mo bar dra bas
195b3(mdo sde): 'brel pa/ sen mo shin tu mdzes shing zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pas brgyan pa/ 'jam zhing mnyen la shin tu gzhon pa/ bskal pa dpag tu med par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pas
195b4(mdo sde): grub pa'i lag pa g.yas pas lus thams cad la byugs nas/ tshul du shis par sa la brdabs te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// sa 'di 'gro ba kun gyi gnas
195b5(mdo sde): yin te/ rgyu dang mi rgyu snyoms shing nye mgon med// 'di ni bang/ ga gi dbang ste bdag brdzun med// 'di la khyod ni ba ngag gi dbang byos shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sa chen
