195b7(mdo sde): brdab khar sgra 'byung zhing // sgra rgyun ring ba de bzhin du sa chen po 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i lag pas bsnun ma thag tu sgra 'byung zhing sgra rgyun ring du byung ngo // 
195b8(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bcu bzhi pa'o// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sa'i lha mo chen mo brtan ma zhes bya ba
196a1(mdo sde): sa'i lha mo'i 'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang ldan pa gang yin pa des/ sa chen po thams cad g.yos par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu sa brtol te/ 
196a2(mdo sde): lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyed phyung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su lus btud de thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// de de bzhin no// skyes
196a3(mdo sde): bu chen po de de bzhin no// khyod kyis ji skad gsungs pa bzhin te/ 'di ni bdag la mngon gsum mo// de lta lags mod kyi/ 'on gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dbang du

196b1(mdo sde): chub kyi snying por song la ci byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags dang bcas pa 'am/ 'on te 'dod chags med/ ci gti mug can nam/ 'on te shes rab can nam/ ci ldongs pa zhig gam/ 'on te phyogs shes pa

196b7(mdo sde): te/ gser gyi phag ska dang bcas pa'i rked pa ston pa dang / kha cig ni rkang gdub sgra sil sil 'byin pa dang / kha cig ni nu ma'i bar nas phreng ba gcig nye bar ston pa dang / kha cig ni brla phyed tsam

197a2(mdo sde): ste/ phan tshun 'chag pa dang / kha cig ni gar byed pa dang / kha cig ni glu len pa dang / kha cig ni bsgegs shing ngo tsha ba ltar yang 'chos pa dang / kha cig ni chu shing rlung gis bskyod pa ltar brla skul pa/

197a6(mdo sde): phan tshun dran par byed cing yang ngo tsha ba ltar 'dug pa dang / kha cig ni gzhon nu'i gzugs dang / bu ma bcas pa'i gzugs dang / na chung tshad la bab pa'i gzugs ston pa dang / kha cig ni 'dod pa
197a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' la skyugs pa dang / kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la me tog sil mas mthor ba dag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa'i
197a8(mdo sde): bsam pa la rtog cing gdong du yang lta ste/ 'di ni chags pa'i dbang pos lta 'am/ 'on te mig rgyang ring du lta 'am/ g.yo 'am mi g.yo zhes bltas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzhin dag cing
197b1(mdo sde): dri ma med la/ sgra gcan las thar pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur 'dug pa dang / nyi ma thog ma shar ba lta bu dang / gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu dang / pad+ma mdab ma stong pa rgyas pa lta bu dang / gtor
197b2(mdo sde): bar bya ba gtor ba'i me lta bu dang / lhun po ltar mi g.yo ba dang / khor yug ltar mngon par 'phags pa dang / dbang po shin tu bsrungs pa dang / glang po ltar sems shin tu dul bar mthong ngo // 
197b3(mdo sde): de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu chags par bya ba'i phyir/ glu dang gar du sbyar ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dus kyi dam pa sos ka bzang la bab// 
197b4(mdo sde): zhugs shing me tog rgyas kyis dgyes par rol// khyod kyi ga dazugs ni gzugs bzang mdzes pa ste// mtshan gyis spras pa'i dbang du bdag cag gyur// bdag cag skyes pa legs
197b5(mdo sde): skyes dbyibs legs te// lha mi bde ba'i rkyen du bdag ga byung // byang chub rnyed dkas thugs ni slar sbyar la/ myur du bzhengs te dar la bab pa spyod/ khyod kyi ched du chas
197b6(mdo sde): nas rab tu brgyan te lhags gyur pa// lha yaM bu mo legs par brgyan pa 'di dag rnams la gzigs// gzugs 'di bltas nas shing rul lta bur srog tsam lus pa yang // chags par gyur/ 
197b7(mdo sde): na chags pas dga' ba su zhig chags mi 'gyur// skra 'jam shin tu dri zhim dri ngad ldan// cod pan rna cha 'dab ris bzhin rgyas la// 'phral ba legs shing legs byugs bzhin dang ldan// pad+ma
197b8(mdo sde): rgyas pa lta bur mig yangs legs// kha bzhin zla ba nya ba lta bu ste// shing tog bim pa smin 'dra'i mchu dang ldan// dung dang kun da kha ba dkar dang ldan// sdug pa dga' la chags pa rnams la gzigs/ 
198a1(mdo sde): nu ma shin tu mkhrang zhing rgyas la 'bur// lto ba'i rkeng na gnyer gsum shin tu mdzes// rked pa 'khor sa lta bur yangs shing mdzes// na chung shin tu mdzes la mgon po gzigs// glang
198a2(mdo sde): bo'i sna 'dra ba yi brla ldan zhing // lag pa gdu bus chal par gang ba can// rkeng pa gser gyi phag ska rab mdzes brgyan// khyod kyi bran mo 'di la mgon po gzigs// ngang pa'i stabs ldan dal gyis
198a3(mdo sde): mchi bgyid pa// 'jam zhing yid 'ong 'dod ldan mdzes smra ba// rnam pa 'di ltar shin tu legs brgyan la// lha yi dga' ba rnams la shin tu mkhas// glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gar rab bslabs// 
198a4(mdo sde): dga' ba'i ched du mdzes pa'i gzugs can skyes// 'dod la rab dga' gal te mi bzhed na// 'jig rten dag na khyod ni shin tu bslus// mi glen nor gyi bde ba mi shes 'ga'// gter
198a5(mdo sde): mthong nas ni 'bros par bgyid pa ltar// khyod kyang 'dod chag sa mi mkhyen rang lhags pa// na chung rnams la mi spyod de dang 'dra// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig mi
198a6(mdo sde): 'dzums par 'dzum dmyal te/ bzhin gyi 'dzum phyung zhing / dbang po rnam par ma 'khrugs pa dang / lus ma bcos pa dang / brjid pa dang / ma chags pa dang / mi sdang ba dang / ma rmongs pa dang / ri'i
198a7(mdo sde): dbang po ltar mi g.yo ba dang / ma zhum pa dang / ma gyur pa dang / 'dzem pa med pa dang / blo shin tu legs par gnas pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu spangs pa'i phyir/ rang gi kha na las pa'i
198a8(mdo sde): ye shes kyi sgo dang / 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig dang / tshangs pa las lhag pa'i nga ro dang / bya ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs dang / snyan pa dang / yid du 'ong bas bdud kyi bu mo de dag la tshigs su bcad
198b1(mdo sde): pas slar smras pa/ 'dod pa sdug bsngal mang po sogs shing sdug bsngal rtsa ba ste/ mi mkhas rnams la bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dka' thub nyams par byed// bud med 'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa med
198b2(mdo sde): ces mkhas pas smras// nga ni ma mkhas rnams la shes rab chog par byed par 'gyur// 'dod pa bsten na sred pa phyir zhing rnam par 'phel 'gyur te// dper na mi 'ga' la la tsha chu 'thungs par
198b3(mdo sde): gyur pa bzhin// de la zhugs pa bdag gi de don min gzhan gyi don kyang min// nga ni bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don la spro ba yin// khyod kyi gzugs ni chu bur dag dang dbu ba mtshungs shing 'dra/ 
198b4(mdo sde): sgyu ma'i tshe na ltar rang gi blo yis rnam par bsgrubs pa ste// rmi lam dag na rtse ba lta bur mi brtan mi rtag kyang // byis pa mi mkhas rnams kyi sems ni rtag tu rmongs par byed// mig ni
198b5(mdo sde): chu'i chu bur mtshungs shing 'dra ste lpags pas g.yogs// khrag brlang mkhrang zhing 'bur ba dper na nad kyi 'bras da/ nga mtshungs// lto ni gcin dang phyi sa sogs te shin tu mi
198b6(mdo sde): gtsang ba dang ldan// sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor las dang nyon mongs pa las yang dag byung // byis pa'i blo can dag ni rmongs gyur phyin ci log pa yis// lus gang la ni sdug par rtog pa ma bas
198b7(mdo sde): pa de lta min// sdug bsngal rtsa bar gyur pa'i 'khor bar yun ring 'khor byed na// sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal mi bzang mang po myong // rked pa nas ni rab tu ying mi 'ong ba'i dri can
198b8(mdo sde): 'dzag/ brla dang byin pa rkang pa dag ni 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas// nga yis khyed la yang dag brtags na sgyu ma ji bzhin te// phyin ci log gi rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar gyur pa yin// 'phags pa'i
199a1(mdo sde): // ye shes lam las gol ba phyin ci log gyur pa// me dang dug gi lo ma 'dra zhing sbrul chen khros 'dra ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan min zhing yon tan nyams mthong na// de la byis pa bde ba'i
199a2(mdo sde): 'du shes skyed cing brgyal bar gyur// mi gang 'dod pas bud med rnams kyi khol por gyur pa dang // gang zhig chos kyi dga' ba bor te 'dod pas dga' byed cing // dga' la brkam pa de ni tshul
199a3(mdo sde): khrims lam las gol gyur cing // bsam gtan lam gol blo nyams ye shes las ni rab ring gnas// nga ni 'dod chags zhe sdang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin te// rtag dang sdug dang bdag dang lhan
199a4(mdo sde): cig gnas par byed ma yin// mi dga' ba dang dga' dang lhan ci/ ngag gnas pa ma yin la// nga yi sems ni rab tu grol te/ mkha' la rlung dang 'dra// gal te khyed 'dra'i 'gro ba kun gyis
199a5(mdo sde): 'dir ni gang gyur la// bskal par de dag rnams dang lhan ci/ ga 'dre zhing gnas kyang ni// nga la tha ba med cing chags med gti mug mi 'gyur te// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs ni nam
199a6(mdo sde): mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra phyir ro// lha dang lha mo shin tu dri med la// khrag dang rus pa med cing rab bzang ba// de dag kun kyang 'jigs pa cher gnas te// rtag dngos bral zhing ther zug med phyir ro// 
199a7(mdo sde): de nas bdud kyi bu mo bud med kyi rgyu rnams shin tu bslabs pa de dag de bas kyang // cher 'dod chags dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa bskyed de/ steg pa bstan nas/ lus rnams brgyan te/ bud med kyi
199a8(mdo sde): g.yo nye bar bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la rjod do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// bu mo'i nang na gces mchog sred dang dga' dang dga' can lhan cig tu// bdud kyis btang ba shin tu tshul du
199b1(mdo sde): shis par rings par lhags gyur te// shing gi lcug ma gzhon nu lo mar bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// gar byed cing ni rgyal po'i sras po shing drung 'dug la rjod par byed// dus kyi nang na dam pa mchog tu
199b2(mdo sde): bgyi ba sos ka'i dus 'di lta ste// skyes pa dag dang bud med dga' bar bgyid cing mun pa rdul yang bcom// khu byug dang ni ngang pa rma bya sgra 'byin bya tshogs rnams kyis gang // 'dod pa'i yon tan dga' ba
199b3(mdo sde): myong bar bgyi ba'i dus la da bab bo// bskal pa stong du tshul khrims dga' zhing brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad gyur pa// ri yi rgyal po lta bur mi g.yo nyi ma shar ma thag pa'i gzugs// 'brug bsgrags
199b4(mdo sde): lta bur sgra snyan ri dgas dbang pos sgra bsgrags 'dra ba bo// 'gro dal phan pa byed pa de yis don dang ldan pa'i tshig smras pa/ 'dod pa rtsod dang dgra dang 'thab dang nyon mongs bcas dang 'jigs
199b5(mdo sde): byed pa// byis pa'i skye bos nye bar bsten gyi mkhas pa'i skye bo sa rtag spangs pa// gang du bde gshegs rnams kyis bdud rtsi brnyes pa'i dus la bab gyur gyis// ngo mod bdud
199b6(mdo sde): las rgyal te stobs bcu rnams dang ldan pa dgra bcom 'gyur// sgyu rnams bstan nas smras pa zhal ras pad+ma 'dra ba bstan du gsol// khyod ni rgyal po dbang phyug dam pas bdag stobs dang ldan pa 'gyur
199b7(mdo sde): bud med dam pa'i tshogs kyis sil snyan stong dag rab tu bgyid 'gyur na// thub pa'i cha byad kyis ni ci bgyi spongs la dga' ba bsten du gsol// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ nga ni srid pa gsum na
199b8(mdo sde): dbang phyug lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod la// chos kyi 'khor los 'gro zhing stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// slob dang mi slob bu rnams khrag khrig rtag tu 'dud pa mngon du byed/ 
200a1(mdo sde): / chos kyi dga' bas dga' ba'i yul yang yi yid ni dga' ma yin// de dag gis smras pa/ re shig dang la bab pa ma yol dang po thor bur gyur pa dang // khyod ni re shig spun gyis ma btab mi shes
200a2(mdo sde): bgres par ma gyur dang // ji srid daral bab cing bdag cag grogs kyang dar la bab gyur pa// de srid bar du 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis 'dod pa dga' ba sprad du gsol// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ji srid
200a3(mdo sde): do mong dal ba dam pa 'chi med dkon pa rnyed pa dang / ji srid lha dang lha min grong khyer mi khom sdug bsngal spangs pa dang // ji srid rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i dgra yis dkrugs par ma gyur pa// de srid nga ni
200a4(mdo sde): 'jigs med grong khyer 'gro ba'i lam mchog bsgom par bya// de dag gis smras pa/ lha yi gnas na sum cu rtsa gsum pa dag po lha mos bskor ba dang // 'thab bral 'thab bral rab dang
200a5(mdo sde): dga' ldan rab dang bdud kyi grong khyer na// lha mchog bstod pa/ bzhin du bud med dbang du gyur nas 'dod dga' la// rol cing spyod la bdag cag rnams dang lhan cig dgyes pa rgya chen
200a6(mdo sde): mdzod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dod pa rtswa rtse'i zil thigs bzhin du myur la ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs// klu yi bu mo khro ba lta bur shin tu 'jigs par byed pa yin// brgya byin 'thab bral rab
200a7(mdo sde): lha dga' ldan pa dag bdud kyi dbang du song // 'phags min rnams kyis 'dod pa sdug bsngal ldan pa 'di la su zhig dga'// de dag gis smras pa/ shing mchog 'di dang lo ma gzhon dang ldan zhing me tog
200a8(mdo sde): rgyas gyur na// shang shang te'u dang khu byug sgra 'byin bung ba sgra 'byin ldan pa gnigs las rtswa 'khrungs rab sngo 'jam zhing snum la lcang lo can mchis pa// gnas mchog mi ci tshogs kyis bsten par na chung rnams
200b1(mdo sde): dang dgyes par mdzod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lo mar bcas pa'i shing rnams 'di dag dus kyis dbang gi me tog rgyas// bung ba dag kyang bkres dang skom pas nyen nas me tog rnamasu lhags/ 
200b2(mdo sde): gang zhig dus nas las skyes pa rnams kyang nyi mas skams par 'gyur// nga 'dir sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis spyad pa bdud rtsi nges par spyad// bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis smras pa/ zla 'dra'i zhal mnga'
200b3(mdo sde): gzigs shig pad+ma sar po 'dra ba'i kha bzhin can// snyan can yid du 'ong ba'i tshigs ldan so ni dngul dang kha ba 'dra// 'di 'dra lha'i gnas na dkon na mi'i gnas na ga la mchis// gang dag lha mchog
200b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis rtag tu 'dod par bgyi ba khyod kyis brnyes// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// lus ni ngan skyugs mig cang srin bu'i rigs kyis gang ba shig shig po// myur du 'gyes
200b5(mdo sde): shing 'jig pa bde ba ma yin rnams dang ldan par mthong / rgyu bar bcas dang mi rgyu ba'i 'gro la bde ba mchog byed pa/ go 'phang 'chi 'pho med pa skye bo mkhas pas mchid pa de thob
200b6(mdo sde): bya/ de dag 'dod pa'i sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi myong bar gyur pa ste// nang gdub gser gyi phag skra 'khrol zhing gos kyang shag shig byas nas ni// 'dod pa'i mnga' yis phog brgyags pa 'dzum zhing 'di
200b7(mdo sde): skad smras// jo co khyod la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na 'di dag bsten mi bgyi// srid pa kun gyi nyes pa rig nas rdul dang bral bas 'di skad smras// 'dod pa ral gyi mdung thung rtse gsum sbrang rtsi can
200b8(mdo sde): gyi spu gro 'dra// sbrul gyi mgo dang me mur 'dra bar ngas 'dir rab tu rig pas ma gabud med yon tan 'phrogs pas de phyir nga yis bud med tshogs rnams spangs// bud med yon tan rnam pa mang
201a1(mdo sde): khrag khrig bye ba de dag gis// gang gi tshe na glang po phrug gu'i stabs can de brjod ma nus che// ngo tsha bskyengs nas thub pa'i rkang pa gnyis la rab tu phyag 'tshal te// dga' zhing mgu ba bskyed/ 
201a2(mdo sde): nas phan pa byed pa de la bstod pa byas// pad+ma dri ma med pa'i snying po 'dra zhing ston zla lta bu'i zhal// mar gyis sbyin bsreg bgyis pa'i 'od 'phro me 'dra gser gyi ri 'dra ba sring pa brgya nas spyad cing
201a3(mdo sde): dgongs dang smon lam btab pa grub gyur cig/ bdag nyid rgal nas sdug bsngal dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba bsgral du gsol// de dag rnams kyis dong ka'i shing dang tsam pa ka 'dra rnam mang bstod// 
201a4(mdo sde): mchog tu gyur pa ri ltar mi g.yo ba la bskor ba byas nas ni/ song ste pha yi rkang la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig kyang smras// yab cig lha dang mi yi bla ma de la khong khro
201a5(mdo sde): spangs na legs// bzhin ni 'dzum par gyur nas pad+ma'i mdab/ ma 'dra ba'i mig gis lta// de ni chags pas skye bo ma/ lha de la khro gnyer mchis ma lags// lhun po g.yo zhing / 
201a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho skams la nyi zla ltung bar 'gyur yang gda'// srid pa gsum gyi nyes mthong de ni bud med rnams kyi dbang mi 'gyur// de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig de skad thos nas// de bas kyang
201a7(mdo sde): cher sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la/ yid ma rangs shing tshig pa za ba'i yid kyis rang gi bu mo de dag la smras pa/ kye mi shes shing glen te// khyod kyi gzugs dang da 'od ma mthong ngam// ji ltar
201a8(mdo sde): gyur na/ de byang chub kyi snying po las bslang bar ma nus// de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag gis// rang gi pha la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ snyan cing 'jam por smra yang chags pa ma mchis
201b1(mdo sde): te// gsang ba chen po lta yang sdang ba mchis ma lags// spyod lam dag dang spyod pa lta yang rmongs ma mchis// lus rnams thams cad rtogs kyang bsam pa shin tu zag/ bud med nongs pa rgya chen the
201b2(mdo sde): tsam ma mchis rtogs// 'dod las dben pa'i yid ldan 'dod chags chags ma mchis// gang zhig de yi sems dang spyod pa yongs 'tshal ba// lha yul mi yul 'di na lha mi de ma mchis// de la
201b3(mdo sde): bud med sgyu rnams gang lags bstan na yab// chags bcas gang lags de yi snying zhu 'gyur rigs na// de dag mthong yang de yi sems ni gcig ma g.yos// ri dbang rgyal po bzhin du de ni
201b4(mdo sde): mi g.yo mchis// bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas bltam yon/ tan gzi brjid rdzogs// bskal pa bye ba mang por tshul khri/ mas brtul zhugs spyad// lha dang tshangs pa sems can
201b5(mdo sde): gzi brjid rnam dag dge/ de dag de yi rkang par mgos gtugs phywa ga kyang 'tshal// sde dang bcas pa'i bdud rnams bcom nas sngon chad kyi// rgyal bas bzhed pa byang chub dam pa
201b6(mdo sde): 'thob 'gyur nges// yab cig bdag cag g.yul ngor 'thab pa mi 'tshal te// stobs ldan dag dang 'thab par sbyor 'di chags rab che// yab cig mkha' la nor bu rin chen gtsug bud can// rdzogs
201b7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig gus par gnas// rin chen 'byung gnas yan lag me tog phreng bas brgyan// stobs bcu mnga' bas mchod phyir 'dir btang rnams la gzigs// gang dag
201b8(mdo sde): sems pa mchis dang gang dag sems ma mchis// shing ri lha dbang gnod sbyin mkha' lding dbang po dag/ yon tan ri bor mngon par 'dud cing phyogs pa las// yab cig do mod slar log na ni/ 
202a1(mdo sde): / legs pa 'dra// gzhan yang gang gi pha mthar mi byin der ni rgyal mi bgyi// gang zhig rtsa nas mi phyin don brkom mi bgyi// gang la bzod pa yang gsol de ni dkrug mi bgyi// gang gis ying
202a2(mdo sde): mi bde bar 'gyur ba de mi bgyi// dge slong dag de nas do'i tshe shing gi lha mo brgyad la 'di lta ste/ dpa' ldan dang / 'phel mo dang / dka' thub dang / dge ma dang / mkhas ma dang / mdangs stobs dang / 
202a3(mdo sde): bden smras dang / ldan ma ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par mchod nas/ dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed/ mngon tu bstod par byed de/ sems
202a4(mdo sde): can dag pa khyod ni dgun zla yar gyi ngo ltar mdzes pa'o// blon dam par dag pa khyod ni gdugs dang po shar ba ltar ldang dbya'o// sems can dag pa khyod ni chab kyi nang na pad+ma ltar rab tu
202a5(mdo sde): rgyas pa'o// sems can dag pa khyod ni nag dang nags mngab na r+m+ma/ ba'i seng ge ltar sgrogs pa'o// sems can dag pa khyod/ ni rgya mtsho'i dbus na ri'i rgyal po ltar mdzes pa'o// sems
202a6(mdo sde): can dag pa khyod ni khor yug gi ri ltar mngon par 'phags pa'o// sems can dag pa khyed ni rgya mtsho ltar rin po ches bltam zhing gting dpag par dka' ba'o// 'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni nam
202a7(mdo sde): mkha' ltar thug pa ma mchis shing thugs kyi rgya che ba'o// sems can rnam par dag pa khyod ni dog sa ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cing thugs shin tu brtan pa'o// sems can dam
202a8(mdo sde): pa khyod ni mchom dros pa ltar rtag tu dang zhing thugs rnyog pa mi mnga' ba'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni rlung mar ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rtag tu mi chags shing thugs gnas pa ma
202b1(mdo sde): mchis pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni gzi brjid kyi rgyal po ltar rlom sems can thams cad spangs shing bsnyen par dka' ba'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni sred med kyi bu ltar thul par dka' zhing
202b2(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni byang chub kyi snying po las mi bzhengs pas dam bcas pa brtan pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni dbang po'i lag gis 'phangs pa'i rdo rje
202b3(mdo sde): ltar slar mi ldog pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni ring po mi thogs par stobs bcu dang ldan par byon pas brnyes pa legs par brnyes pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo
202b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed do// dge slong dag de na gnas ga/ tsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis
202b5(mdo sde): bdud nyams dmas par byed do// rnam pa bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po ltar sems khong du chud cing ngams pa'o// sdig can khyod ni
202b6(mdo sde): glang po rgan po 'dam du bying ba ltar nyam chung ba'o// sdig can khyod ni dpa' bor khas 'ches pa pham pa ltar gcig pur gyur pa'o// sdig can khyod ni nad kyis nyen pa 'brog tu bor ba
202b7(mdo sde): ltar gnyis su med pa'o// sdig can khyod ni glang bu khal gyis nyon mongs pa ltar stobs med pa'o// sdig can khyod ni shing rlung gis btab pa ltar sbrel pa'o// sdig can khyod ni 'dron pa
202b8(mdo sde): lam stor ba ltar lam ngan par gnas pa'o// sdig can khyod ni mi dbul po bu lon can ltar dman pa bas kyang dman pa'o// sdig can khyod ni bya rog byung rgyal ba ltar mu cor smra ba'o// 
203a1(mdo sde): sdig can khyod ni ma dul ba byas pa mi gzo ba ltar nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa'o// sdig can khyod ni seng ge'i sgras wa 'bros pa ltar deng 'bros par 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni rnam par
203a2(mdo sde): 'thor rlung gis gtor ba'i bya bzhin du deng 'dar bar 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni sprang po bsod nams zad pa ltar dus mi shes pa'o// sdig can khyod ni snod chags pa rdul gyis gang ba ltar/ deng rnam par
203a3(mdo sde): spang bar 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni sngags la dpa' ba sprul la bab pa ltar deng tshar chod par 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni mi rkang lag bcad pa ltar stobs thams cad dang bral ba'o// zhes bya
203a4(mdo sde): ba'o// dge slong dag de ltar gan gtsang ma'i ris kyis lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gi bdud sdig can nyam smad par byas so// dge slong de dag de la byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyi rnam pa bcu
203a5(mdo sde): drug gis/ bdud sdig can zlog par byed de/ bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig can khyod ni dpa' bos pha rol gyi sde bcom pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpas do mod pham par byas par
203a6(mdo sde): byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni gyang stobs chung ngul gyang stobs chen po bab pa ltar do mong byang chub sems dpas char bcad par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni srin bu me khyer la nyi ma'i dkyil
203a7(mdo sde): 'khor bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni phub ma sbar ba gang la rlung mar bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas gtor bar 'gyur ro// 
203a8(mdo sde): sdig can khyod ni wa la seng ge bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas spangs par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni shing sa la chen po rtsa ba nas bcang ba ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas
203b1(mdo sde): bsgyel par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod na mi mdza' pa'i grong khyer la rgyal po chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas brlag par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni brjes kyi tshul nyin chan chen po bab bltar/ 
203b2(mdo sde): domeng byang chub sems dpas yongs su zad par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni mi g.yon can bsad par bya ba shor ba ltar ngo mang byang chub sems dpas 'bros par byed par 'gyur ro// sdig can
203b3(mdo sde): khyod ni mo'i tshabs bung ba'i khru ltar ngo mod byang chub sems dpas mgo 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid nyams pa ltar ngo mod byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du
203b4(mdo sde): bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po mngab dam bregs pa ltar ngo mod byang chub sems dpas sems khong du bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni 'brog dgon par
203b5(mdo sde): lam brgyags chad pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas phra ngas par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni rgya mtsho chen po ra gru zhig pa ltar ngo mod byang chub sems dpas smre sngags
203b6(mdo sde): 'don tu bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni sreg pa'i bskal pas rtswa dang nags tshal ltar ngo mod byang chub sems dpas rnyis par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni ri'i rtse mo la rdo rje bab pa ltar
203b7(mdo sde): ngo mod byang chub sems dpas brnyil bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par byed kyang / bdud sdig
203b8(mdo sde): can phyir ma log go// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lha'i tshogs kyis yang dag bskul pa thos kyang bdud ni phyir log ma gyur te// slongs shig rgyob shig 'di ni brlag par gyis shig srog kyang sbyin par ma byed
204a1(mdo sde): / cig/ 'di na rang nyid rgal nas nga'i yul nas gzhan yang sgrol bar byed par 'gyur// langs te bros pa ma gtogs dge sbyong 'di la thar gzhan nung zad med ces smras// byang chub sems dpas
204a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ ri'i rgyal po lhu po gnas nas g.yo sringad 'gro ba thams cad med 'gyur srid// skar ma'i tshogs rnams thams cad zla ba bcas par mkhar las sa la ltung yang srid // sems can kun gyi bsam pa
204a3(mdo sde): gcig byed 'gyur srid rgya mtsho chen po skam srid kyi// nga 'dra shing gi rgyal po'i drung na 'dug pa la ni g.yo ba yong mi srid// bdud kyis smras pa/ kho bo 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten 'di kun dbang // lha dang
204a4(mdo sde): lha mon tshogs bcas mi dang dud 'gro rnams// kho bos khyab ste thams cad kho bo'i dbang du gyur// kho bo'i yul na gdu dgas pa 'ongs la tshig bzhin gyis// byang chub sems dpas
204a5(mdo sde): smras pa/ gal te 'dod dbang khyod yin gsal bar khyod dbang min// yang dag nga ltos nga yang chos kyi dbang phyug yin/ gal te ngan 'gror mi 'gro khyod ni 'dod dbang phyug/ dbang med
204a6(mdo sde): khyod ni lha bzhin byang chub ngas thob 'gyur// bdud kyis smras pa/ dge slong bdag nyid gcig pu dgon par ci zhig byed// khyod kyis gang btsal de dang phrad par sla ma yin// rab 'gro shes ldan la sogs
204a7(mdo sde): dka' thub rab bsgrims kyang // go 'phang mchog de ma thob mor gyur khyod ci smos// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho bo'i zil non blo dang lha yul 'dod pa dang / bdag la rtag dang mi rtag ste dugan pa dang / yul du 'grob
204a8(mdo sde): gnas pa thar snyam gnas pa yi// drang srong mi shes sngon du 'gro bas dka' thub spyad// de dag yang dag don dang bral zhing skyes bu smra// khyab dang phyogs gcig ches dang kha cig rtag ces sA// khros
204b1(mdo sde): can lus min yon tan min dang yon tan can// byed pa po dang byed po min zhes gzhan dag 'dzer// stan 'dir 'dug ste nga rgyal bcom pa sde dpung bcas// khyod pham byas te byang chub rdul med deng thob nas/ 
204b2(mdo sde): 'gro ba 'di la 'byung dang byung dang mya ngan 'das// sdug bsngal zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po bstan par bya// bdud ni khros shing 'khrugs te tshig pa zos nas mdun du rtsub pa'i tshig tu smras pa dge sbyong
204b3(mdo sde): 'di zung shig/ gcig pu dgon pa bro bar gyur pa 'di ni nga'i mdun nas zung la song ste myur du dbang du gyis// nga'i khyim du myur du song la shing sgrog dang ni lcags sgrog phrugs su chug ste sgo ba byed du
204b4(mdo sde): chug sdug bsngal nyen nas ku co rnam pa mang po 'don cing lha yi khol po yin par bdag gis bdag mthong byos// byang nga chub sems dpas smras pa/ na mkha' la nI ri mo rnam pa sna
204b5(mdo sde): tshogs cha tsha ris ris phye ste so sor bri bar nus kyang srigaphyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba'i shugs can rlung ni/ ma yis rab tu bsgrims te zhags pas bcing du nus kyang srid
204b6(mdo sde): nyi ma zla ba mun pa rab rib med byed mkha' las sa la ltung bar byed par nus srid kyi// khyod dang 'dra ba rab tu mang po bgrang las 'das pa dag gis shing drung nas ni nga bskyong nus mi 'gyur// bdud dpung
204b7(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa langs te ha zhes zer// dung dang rnga dang rdza rnga mchog gi sgra 'byin langs// bdud dpung shin tu 'jigs pa 'di dag mthong nas ni// kyi hud bu sdug khyod ces ma rung gyur ces zer/ 
204b8(mdo sde): 'dzam gling gser dang tsam pa'i snying po 'dra bar ser// shin tu gzhon nu lha mis bstod cing mchod pa'i 'os// khyod deng g.yul ngo chen po rab tu rlag 'gyur te// dbang bas lha min lta bur bdud
205a1(mdo sde): kyi dbang du 'gyur// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la bing ka'i sgra skad kyis// bde bar gshegs pas gnod sbyin srin tshogs de la smras// mi mkhas gang zhig na mkha' skrag par byed 'dod pa/ 
205a2(mdo sde): doni shing mchog drung nas nga 'dra spong bar 'dod// gang zhig stong gsum chen po bshig nas rdul 'grang dang // gang zhig ba spu yis ni rgya mtsho chu 'byin dang // skad cig gis ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin ri 'thor
205a3(mdo sde): ba/ des kyang shing drung 'dug pa ngal 'tshe mi nus// bdud khros sems kyis gnya' shing gang gi bar tsam 'dug/ shungs nas phyung ba ral gri rnon po lag na thogs// dge slong myur du longs la ngami
205a4(mdo sde): bsam pa bzhin du song // 'od ma'i myu gu sngo ltar do mod bcad du dare// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te stong gsuM dam sa rnams 'di dag thams cad bdud kyis rab tu gang gyur
205a5(mdo sde): la// kun gyi lag na ri bo lhun po mchog 'dra ba'i ral gri thog/ sa gyur kyang // de dag nga'i ba spu bskyod par mi nus ngal gnod byed smos ci dgos// sun 'byin ma rings zhig dang
205a6(mdo sde): de'u re btags te nga yis brtan por dran par bya// rnga mo ba lang glang tshon mgo dang 'jigs mig dang // myur gdug sbrul dang mig gdug mi bzad 'dra ba dag/ me 'bar kha dag rtse mor bcas pa'i ri 'phen
205a7(mdo sde): cing rtsa bar bcas pa'i shing dang zangs dang lcags rnams 'phen// sprin ltar langs te phyogs bzhi dag tu sgra sgrog cing // rdo rje'i lce dang lcags kyi thu lum char pa 'bebs// ral gri mdung thung rna
205a8(mdo sde): dang dgra sta dug can 'bebs// sa ni brtol bar byed cing shing dag rab tu 'joms// kha cig lag pa brgya dag gis na mda' brgya 'phen// kha nas myur du 'dug pa'i sbrul dang me yang 'thor// chu
205b1(mdo sde): skyes chu srin la sogs pa dag mtsho nas len// kha cig na mkha' lding du bsgyur nas klu yang 'phen/ kha cig khros nas lcags kyi thu lum ri rab tsam// me 'bar kha dog rtse mor bcas pa rnams kyang
205b2(mdo sde): 'phen// sa la lhags nas sa ni rab tu 'khrugs par byed// 'og gi chu'i phung po'i chu yang rnam par 'khrug kha cig de'i mdun dang de bzhin rgyab du mchod/ kye ma bu zhes g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon du
205b3(mdo sde): mchod // rkang pa lag pa log par 'dug cing mgo 'bar la// glog ltar rab tu 'bar ba mig nas mngon tu 'byin// bdud kyi dpung ni bsgyur ba mi sdug byas mthong nas// sems can dag pa sgyu ma byas pa/ 
205b4(mdo sde): ji bzhin tog/ 'di la bdud med stobs med 'gro med pa dag kyang me/ chu zla'i tshul 'dra ba'i 'jig rten gsum po 'khor// mig da skyes pa bud med med cing bdag gi med// rna ba sna dang de
205b5(mdo sde): bzhin lce dang de bzhin lus// chos 'di byed pa po dang tshor ba ba dang bral// brten nas skyes te nang yang stong zhing phyi yang stong // bden tshig gang gis 'dir chos shin tu stong zhe na// 
205b6(mdo sde): 'dul mthun gnod sbyin nges pa gang yin de dag gis// lag pa'i mtshon cha me tog phreng bar mthong gyur ces// rtag tu bden smras de yis bden pa'i tshig byas te// de yis lag mthil g.yon pa dra
205b7(mdo sde): ba mchog spras pa// sen mo zangs mdog rab mdzes rtsibs stong 'khor lo can// 'jam gling gser 'bar 'dra ba bsod nams dgyes bsten pas// tshul du shis par mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du
205b8(mdo sde): byugs// mkha' las glog 'dra bar ni lag pa brkyang byas nas// tshig tu smras pas 'di nga'i dbang yin te// ngas ni sngon chad mchod sbyin khrag khrig sna tshogs byas/ rdzong mi sbyin snyam ste don mang
206a1(mdo sde): / gzhan ma byim// mu dang me dang rlung ni nga yi dbang yin te// tshangs pa skye dgu bdag dang skar bcas gnyi zla dang // gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // bdag khrims brtul zhug
206a2(mdo sde): byang chub yan lag 'phags pa dbang // sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa nga yi dbang // brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan de ltar shes rab dang // tshad med bzhi dang de bzhin mngon shes nga yi dbang // 
206a3(mdo sde): rim gyis byang chub spyod pa thams cad nga yi dbang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sems can mtha' dag ji snyed pa// de dag rnams kyi bsod nams tshul khrims ye shes dang // gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa
206a4(mdo sde): bsdoms kyang ni// de dag nga yi ba spu'i brgya yi char mi phod// de yis tshul du shis par lag pa sa la brdabs// khar ba'i snod ltur sa 'di sgra yang byung bar gyur// bdud kyis sgra thos nas ni sa la skyel
206a5(mdo sde): gyur te// nag po'i rtsa lag rgyob shig zung shig sgra yang thos// mu sa las rdul byung gzi brjid nyams shing bzhin mdog gyur// rgabs bcom par bdud de nyid kyis mthong bar 'gyur// brang rdung
206a6(mdo sde): chonges 'don cing 'jigs nyen mgon yang med// bdud kyi yid 'khrul gyur cing sems ni myos par gyur// glang po rta dang bzhon pa shing rta sa la lhung // srin po grul bum dag dang sha za sngangs shing rgyug/ mgo
206a7(mdo sde): rmongs lam mi rnyed cing gnas med skyabs kyang med// rlung btab nags mes byas ltar bltas nas song bar gyur// pha ma bu dang sring mo de bzhin phu nu dag/ gang na mthong zhing gang du dong zhes 'dri bar byed// de'i
206a8(mdo sde): rkyen gyis de dag phan tshun 'thab cing rtsod// bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur te 'tsho ba'i skabs kyang med// bdud dpung rgya chen mang ba mi 'khrugs snyed po de// thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing tha dgur gyes 'gyur te// 
206b1(mdo sde): zhag bdun 'das kyi bar du phan tshun phrad ma gyur// mthong nas smras pa gal te gson na dga' zhes 'dzer// shing gi lha mos de tshe de la snying rje byas// chu yi bum pa thogs te nag po'i rtsa lag gtor// myur du
206b2(mdo sde): longs la phyi shol ma byed skyen du song // bla ma'i tshig ma mnyan pas de ltar gyur pa yin// bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag gi bu'i snyan tshig phan pa ma mnyan te// sems can shin tu dag la nyes pa byas pas na// 
206b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal 'jigs 'phongs mya ngan brlag dang brnyas pa dang // cir mi rung ba'i sgra dang dman nyid bdag gis thob// lha mos smras pa/ mi mkhas gang zhig nyes pa med la nyes byed pa// de ni nyes dang
206b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang 'phongs pa dang // cir mi rung zhes bya ba'i sgra dang dman nyid dang // bsang dang bcing dang nyes pa du ma rnyed par 'gyur// lha dang lha min mkha' lding mi ci srin po'i
206b5(mdo sde): dbang // tshangs pa brgya byin gzhan 'phrul 'og min bcas pa dag/ 'di ltar khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i bdud kyi dpung bcom pa sa// 'jig rten dpa' bo rgyal zhes de yi rgyal brjod// rgyan phreng
206b6(mdo sde): chun po zla ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan 'bul// me tog a ga ru dang rgya spos tsan dan phye char 'bebs// sil snyan dag kyang rab tu dkrol ba byed cing tshig rjod pa// dpa' bo dgra tshogs
206b7(mdo sde): rgyal rnams khyod la dgab pa mdzad par 'gyur// stan mchog 'dir ni byams pas g.yon can bdud kyi phyogs// rgya chen pham mdzad dpa' bo de mod byang chub brnyes// stobs bcu ma 'dres so/ 
206b8(mdo sde): so yang dag rig pa dang // sangs rgyas yul rnams thams cad do mod brnyes par 'gyur// bdud 'dul ched du 'dir ni g.yul ngor rab tu zhugs// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rtsal sus
207a1(mdo sde): / mthong ba// bye ba sum cu drug dang khrag khrig nyi shu bzhi// de dag sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu yid kyis smon// bdud brtul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu gcig go// 
207a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ dgra brtul ba/ g.yul ngor g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan bsgreng bas 'dod pa rnams
207a3(mdo sde): las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas/ 
207a4(mdo sde): te gnas so// de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med/ rab/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / 
207a5(mdo sde): bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gan/ sa so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas/ btang / snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde
207a6(mdo sde): ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnaMs kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de
207a7(mdo sde): bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs
207a8(mdo sde): su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba
207b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa/ las su rung bar gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi cha stod la lha'i mig las ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir/ 
207b2(mdo sde): sems mngon par sgrub cing / mngon par gtod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig yongs su dag pa/ mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang kha dog bzang po dang / 
207b3(mdo sde): kha dog ngan pa dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa rnams mthong ngo // las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu shes te/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan
207b4(mdo sde): pa/ ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ 'pha/ dgas pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba da/ dag ste/ log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus
207b5(mdo sde): lus zhig te/ shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltu nga ba/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dag go/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang
207b6(mdo sde): ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de dag yang dag par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i
207b7(mdo sde): rgyus lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba dag ces bya bar rab tu shes so// de ltar lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho
207b8(mdo sde): ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bde 'gror song ba dang / ngan 'gror song ba dang / ngan pa dang / bzang po dag dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams mthong ngo // dge slong
208a1(mdo sde): / dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi cha stod la rig pa mngon sum du byed do// mun pa sel to// snang bskyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhu sems
208a2(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byung ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa/ las su rung bar gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi gung thun la
208a3(mdo sde): sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtong ngo // de dag dang / sems can gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes
208a4(mdo sde): su dran te/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / da bzhi bcu dang / skye ba lnga bcu dang / skye ba brgya dang / skye ba stong
208a5(mdo sde): dang / skye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye/ ba dang / skye ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / skye ba bye ba phrag stong dang / skye ba bye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / 
208a6(mdo sde): skye ba bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nas/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa dang / chags pa'i bskal pa dang / 
208a7(mdo sde): 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang / 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dag kyang rjes su dran no// bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rus ni 'di zhes
208a8(mdo sde): bya'o// rigs ni 'di zhes bya'o// kha dog ni 'di lta bu'o// kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za'o// tshe'i tshad ni 'di tsam zhig thub bo// yun ni 'di srid cig gnas gnas so// bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig
208b1(mdo sde): myong ngo // bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so// de nas shi 'phos nas kyang che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so// de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so// zhes rnam pa dang bcas// yul
208b2(mdo sde): phyogs dang bcas par bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i/ sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su
208b3(mdo sde): byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa/ las su rung bar gnas pa rmi g.yo bar gyur pas/ nam gyi cha smad skya reng 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rnga brdung ba'i
208b4(mdo sde): namachod tsam na/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba nub par bya bdang / zag pa zad pa shes pa mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod
208b5(mdo sde): de/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni 'di lta ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye bas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa yin na// 'on kyang
208b6(mdo sde): rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di las 'byung bar bya ba mi shes te/ e ma ho rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi phung
208b7(mdo sde): po chen po 'ba' shig 'di thams cad zad par bya bar shes na ci ma rung snyam nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas rga ba dang / 'chi ba 'byung / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i
208b8(mdo sde): rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas des 'di snyam du sems te/ skye ba yod pas rga shi byung ste/ rga shi'i rkyen ni skye ba yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas/ 
209a1(mdo sde): skye ba byung / skye ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ srid pa yod pas skye ba byung ste/ skye ba'i rkyen ni srid pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems
209a2(mdo sde): dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas srid pa byung / srid pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ len pa yod pas srid pa byung ste/ srid pa'i rkyen ni len pa yin no snyam mo// 
209a3(mdo sde): de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas len pa byung / len pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ sred pa yod pas len pa byung ste/ len
209a4(mdo sde): pa'i rkyen ni sred pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas sred pa byung/ sred pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams
209a5(mdo sde): te/ tshor ba yod pas sred pa byung ste/ sred pa'i rkyen ni tshor ba yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di/ snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas tshor ba byung / tshor ba'i rkyen
209a6(mdo sde): ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ reg pa yod pas tshor ba byung ste/ tshor ba'i rkyen ni reg pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod
209a7(mdo sde): pas reg pa byung / reg pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ skye mched drug yod pas reg pa byung ste/ reg pa'i rkyen ni skye mched drug yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub
209a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas skye mched drug byung / skye mched drug gi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ ming dang gzugs yod pas skye mched drug
209b1(mdo sde): byung ste/ skye mched drug gi rkyen ni mong dang gzugs yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas ming dang gzugs byung / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni gang min
209b2(mdo sde): snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ rnam par shes pa yod pas ming dang gzugs byung ste/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni rnam par shes pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'
209b3(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas rnam par shes pa byung / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ 'du byed yod pas rnam par shes pa byung ste/ rnam
209b4(mdo sde): par shes pa'i rkyen ni 'du byed yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod/ dpas 'du byed byung / 'du byed kyi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ 
209b5(mdo sde): des 'di snyam du bsams te/ ma rig pa yod pas 'du bye nga byung ste/ 'du byed kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa yin no snyam mo// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ ma
209b6(mdo sde): rig pa'i rkyen gyi 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyi ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis
209b7(mdo sde): reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan
209b8(mdo sde): dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
210a1(mdo sde): / snyam mo// dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la kun 'byung kun 'byung zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed cing mang du byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/ mig skyes/ 
210a2(mdo sde): rig pa skyes/ mang po shes pa skyes/ yid gzungs pa skyes/ shes rab skyes so// snang ba byung ngo // de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang med pas rga shi med par 'gyur/ gang
210a3(mdo sde): 'gags pas rga shi 'gag snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ skye ba med na rga shi med par 'gyur te/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag go snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam
210a4(mdo sde): du sems te/ gang med pas skye ba med par 'gyur/ gang 'gag/ das pas skye ba 'gag snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsam sa te/ srid pa med na skye ba med par 'gyur te/ srid pa 'gags
210a5(mdo sde): pas skye ba 'gag go snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems da pa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang med pas shes bya ba/ nas rgyas par sbyar te/ 'du byed med par 'gyur/ gang 'gags
210a6(mdo sde): pas 'du byed 'gag snyam pa'i bar du'o// des 'di snyam du bsams te/ ma rig pa med pas 'du byed med par 'gyur te/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag go// 'du byed 'gags pas rnam
210a7(mdo sde): par shes pa 'gag go zhes bya ba nas/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar
210a8(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'gag par 'gyur ro// snyam pa'i bar du'o// dge slong dag de ltar sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin yid la byed cing mang du byed pas/ byang chub
210b1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/ mig skyes/ rig pa skyes/ mang po shes pa skyes/ yid gzhungs pa skyes/ shes rab skyes so// snang ba byung ngo // dge slong dag ngas de'i tshe 'di ni sdug bsngal lo zhes yang
210b2(mdo sde): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni zag pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni zag pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni zag pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di
210b3(mdo sde): ni 'dod pa'i zag pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'i zag pa'o// 'di ni ma rig pa'i zag pa'o// 'di ni lta ba'i zag pa'o// 'dir zag pa ma lus par 'gag go// 'dir zag pa ma lus par mi snang bar 'gyur
210b4(mdo sde): zhing / nub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni ma rig pa'o// 'di ni ma rig dpa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni ma rig pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni ma rig pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag
210b5(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'dir ma rig pa ma lus parami snang bar 'gyur te/ nub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar de bzhin du sbyar ro// 'di dag ni 'du byed rnams so// 'di ni
210b6(mdo sde): 'du byed kyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni 'du byed 'gog pa'o// 'di ni 'du byed 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni rnam
210b7(mdo sde): par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni ming dang
210b8(mdo sde): gzugs so// 'di ni ming dang gzugs kyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni ming dang gzugs 'gog pa'o// 'di ni ming dang gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
211a1(mdo sde): shes sa// 'di ni ste mchang drug go// don skye mched drug gingan 'byung ba'o// 'din skye mched drug / 'gog par// nga na skye mched drug 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa
211a2(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni rig pa'o// 'di ni reg pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// dadi ni rig pa 'gog pago 'di ni rig pa gog 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du she so/ 'di ni tshor ba'o 'di ni
211a3(mdo sde): tshor ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni tshor ba 'gog pa'o// 'di ni tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni sred pa'o// 'di ni sred pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni srid pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni skye
211a4(mdo sde): pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni len pa'o// 'di ni len dpa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni len pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni len pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni srid pa'o// 
211a5(mdo sde): 'di ni srid pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di na srid pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni srid pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni skye ba'o// 'di ni skye ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni skye ba 'go/ 
211a6(mdo sde): pa'o// 'di ni skye ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni rga ba'o// 'di ni rga ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni rga ba 'gog pa'o// 'di ni rga ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni 'chi ba'o// 'di ni
211a7(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni 'chi ba 'gog pa'o// 'di ni 'chi ba 'gog par 'gro po'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du shes so// 'di dag ni mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang
211a8(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba nas/ 'gog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag pa
211b1(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni sdug bsngal lo// 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'od ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta
211b2(mdo sde): bzhin du shes so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi cha smad skya reng 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rnga brdung ba'i namachod can na/ skyes bu dang / skyes bu dam pa dang / skyes bu mchog dang / 
211b3(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po dang / skyes bu khyu mchog dang / skyes bu glang po dang / skyes bu seng ge dang / skyes bu skyes mchog dang / skyes bu dpa' bo dang / skyes bu rtul pong dang / skyes bu cang shes dang / skyes bu
211b4(mdo sde): pad+ma dang / skyes bu pad+ma dkar po dang / skyes bu ldong khyer ba dang / skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pas/ 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis shes par bya ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / 
211b5(mdo sde): thob par bya ba dang / blta bar bya ba dang / mngon du bya ba gang yang rung ste/ de thams cad sems kyi skad cig cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
211b6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rig pa gsum thob bo// dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/ grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
211b7(mdo sde): kyis me tog gtor cig ces byas so// de nas lha'i bu gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba de dag 'dus nas/ de dag gis de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
211b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyang brda mdzad cing brda mngon par sprul pa mdzad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis brda' ma mdzad kyi bar du me tog ma gtor cig/ dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas/ lha'i
212a1(mdo sde): bu de dag yid gnyis su gyur pa mkhyen nas/ shing ta la bdun tsam du rnamapa' la mngon par 'phags te/ der bzhugs nas lam gyi rgyun ni chad do// rdul ni nye bar zhi'o// zag pa ni/ 
212a2(mdo sde): skams te yang mi zag go// lam ni chad de yang mi 'jug go// 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' zhes bya'o zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas lci bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me
212a3(mdo sde): tog gis gtor te/ de nas lha'i me tog pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mun pa mun nag dang ni bral/ 
212a4(mdo sde): sred pa ni rnam par sbyangs/ lta ba ni bzlog/ nyon mongs pa rnam das ni rnam par dkrugs/ zug rngu ni phyung / mdun pa ni bkrog// nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan ni bskal// chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni
212a5(mdo sde): bsgreng / bag la nyal rnams ni bton/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni mkhyen/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni thugs su chud/ chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su mkhyen/ sems can gyi khams ni
212a6(mdo sde): rnam par bkod/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po na bsngags/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ni smad/ ma nges pa'i phung po ni yongs su bzung / sems can gyi dbang po rnaMs la ni rnam par gzigs/ 
212a7(mdo sde): sems can gyi spyod pa ni yongs su mkhyen/ sems can gyi nad gso ba ni thugs su chud/ bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar ba ni grub/ sman pa'i rgyal por ni byung / sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu thar par mdzad
212a8(mdo sde): pa por ni gyur/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la 'jog pa por ni gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i khri chen po la ni bzhugs/ rnam par grol ba'i thabs
212b1(mdo sde): ni brnyes/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du ni zhugs/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang yang dag par ni 'dres/ chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa las dbyer med par ni gyur to// dge slong dag de
212b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ngas 'dir thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar byung ngo zhes bdun pa dang po la byang chub kyi snying po de nyid na bzhugs so// 
212b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bco lnga pa// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de nyid la phyogs
212b4(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad skad cig de dang / thang cig de dang / yud tsam de la mtshodag tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams
212b5(mdo sde): cad kyang snang ba chen pos snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi bar sdig pa/ sdig pas khyab pa/ mun nag ces bya ba snga ma ba zhon no// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam
212b6(mdo sde): pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yo so// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// 
212b7(mdo sde): chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur bur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
212b8(mdo sde): ba la legs so// zhes bya ba byin te/ chos kyi dgab pa dag kyang bskur ro// chos kyi dgab pa de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs
213a1(mdo sde): par gyur te/ rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od zer gyi dra ba byung ste/ de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag snang bar byas nas
213a2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams kyang kun dga' ba'i sgra rjod par gyur te/ sems can mkhas pa'i pad+ma ye shes kyi mtsho las byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ma
213a3(mdo sde): gos pa byung ngo // thugs rje chen po'i sprin yang dag par 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas khyab par mdzad nas 'dul ba'i skye bo'i sman gyi chos kyi char/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon thams cad kyi myu
213a4(mdo sde): gu skyed pa/ dad pa'i myu gu rnams rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ 8 rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu rnams 'byin par byed pa'i cha dar 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer to// de la 'di skad ces bya
213a5(mdo sde): ste/ skyes bu seng ge de yis dpung bcas bdud btul te/ ston pa bsam gtan bde ba mngon tu mdzad nas ni// gang tshe stobs bcus rig pa gsum po brnyes gyur tshe/ phyogs
213a6(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing mang bye ba g.yos par gyur// chos 'dod byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yongs lhags pa// zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad tshig smras ma mnyel tam/ bdag cag mngon
213a7(mdo sde): sum ci 'dra shin tu 'jigs dpung de// shes rab bsod nams stobs dang brtson 'grus stobs kyis bcom// khrag khrig zhing nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis gdugs rnams bskur// nges pa skyes bu
213a8(mdo sde): chen po bdud kyi sde rnams btul// khyod kyis gnas mchog 'chi med mya ngan med pa brnyes// srid pa gsum du dam chos char pa myur du phob// phyogs bcu'i sems can snying po rnams kyis phyag brkyang
213b1(mdo sde): ste ka la bing ka'i sgra'i gsung du brjod na ni// bdag cag ji ltar byang chub thob ltar khyod sangs rgyas/ dper na mar dang mar gyi snying khu mtshungs 'dra bzhin// dge slong dag de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo dag
213b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa/ mngon par shes pa brnyes pa dang / brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang / bdud phyir rgol ba pham par mdzad
213b3(mdo sde): pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dang / dpa' ba dang / rgyal ba 'phags pa dang / skyes bu dang / skyes bu chen po dang / sman pa'i mchog dang / zug rngu 'byin pa chen po dang / seng
213b4(mdo sde): ge'i ltar mi brnyengs shing spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga' ba dang / glang po ltar thugs shin tu dul ba dang / dri ma gsum spang sa pas dri ma mi mnga' ba dang / rig pa gsum brnyes pas
213b5(mdo sde): mkhyen pa po dang / chu bo bzhi las brgal bas pha rol tu byon pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs gcig 'dzin pas rgyal rig sa su gyur pa dang / sdig pa'i chos spangs pas 'jig rten
213b6(mdo sde): gsum gyi bram zer gyur pa dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pas dge slong du gyur pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas/ dge sbyong du gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pa
213b7(mdo sde): gsal bas gtsang sbra can du gyur pa dang / rgyal mtshan ma bskal pas dpa' ba dang / stobs bcu mnga' ba shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas ltar chos rin po che thams
213b8(mdo sde): cad yongs su rdzogs par rig nas/ byang chub kyi snying po logs su phyogs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'di ni shing gi rgyal drung du// bdud sde mngon tu pham mdzad
214a1(mdo sde): / nas/ ri rab lta bur mi g.yo bzhugs// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'bros mi mdzad// 'dis ni bskal pa bye mang du// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis// byang chub dam pa yang dag bsgrubs// des na
214a2(mdo sde): 'dir ni do mod mdzes// byang chub dam pa tshol ba na// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// tshul khrims brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis// brgya byin tshangs pa zil du rlag/ 'di yis bskal pa byi mang du/ 
214a3(mdo sde): bzod pa'i stobs kyi go mnabs te// sdug bsngal rnams ni dang du blangs// des na gser mdog 'od dang ldan// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// brtson 'grus stobs dang rtsal gyis ni// gzhan
214a4(mdo sde): dag phyir bsnyil mdzad mdzad de// des na bdud kyi sde las rgyadal// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// bsam gtan mngon shes ye shes kyis// thub pa'i dbang po yang dag mchod// 
214a5(mdo sde): des na do mod 'di la mchod// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// shes rab dang ni gsan pa bsags// sems can bye ba phan yang btags// des na byang chub myur du brnyes// 'di ni
214a6(mdo sde): phung po'i bdud las rgyal// 'chi bdag nyon mongs bdud las rgyal// 'di ni lha yi bdud las rgyal// des 'di mya ngan mi mnga'o// 'di ni shin tu lha yi lha// lha rnams kyis kyang mchod pa'i cha// 'jig
214a7(mdo sde): rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os// bsod nams don tu gnyer ba'i zhing // 'chi med 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa// 'di ni sbyin gnas dam pa ste// 'di la sbyin pa btang na de// byang chub dam pa thob par du/ 
214a8(mdo sde): bar ma dor ni chud mi za// 'di yi mdzod spu mdzes pa yis// zhing mang bye ba gsal bar bgyid// gnyi zla dag kyang zil du rlag/ sems can rnams la snang bar gyur// 'di'i gzugs ni gzugs mdzes
214b1(mdo sde): te// gzugs kyi dam pa legs pa'i gzugs// mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan bzhed pa// 'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os// 'di spyan shin tu rnam dag ste// zhing rnam dang na sems can tshogs// sems pa
214b2(mdo sde): ldan dang sems med pa// mang po dag la rang byung gzigs// 'di snyan shin tu ni dag ste// lha yi ngag dang mi yi dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi chos smra dang // mtha' yas pa yi sgra rnams gsan// 'di yi lha
214b3(mdo sde): ni yangs pa ste// ka la bing ka 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'chi med rab tu zhir 'gro ba'i// chos ni 'di las bdag cag mnyan// bdud kyi sde rnams gzigs gyur kyang // de yi thugs ni 'khrug mi mnga'// lha'i/ 
214b4(mdo sde): tshogs rnams gzigs gyur kyang // shin tu thugs gzhungs dgyes mi mnga'// 'di yis mtshon dang mnga' rnams kyis // bdud kyi sde las rgyal ma lags// bden pa brtul zhugs
214b5(mdo sde): dka' thub kyis// sdang ba'i gyad las 'di rgyal lo// gdan la/ sa ma bskyod bzhin du ni// de yi sku la gnod ma byung // de yi skabs su byams mi mnga'// zhe sdang gyur pa'ang ma
214b6(mdo sde): lags so// gang dag khyod las chos thos nas// sgrub pa bgyid par 'tshal ba yi// lha dang mi rnams de dag ni// rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags// rgyal ba bsod nams gzi mnga' ba// khyod
214b7(mdo sde): la bstod pa'i bsod nams kyis// mi yi zla ba khyod 'dra bar// kun kyang myur du 'gyur bar shog/ skyes bu khyu mchog 'dren pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas// khrag khrig zhing rnams skyod cing bdud kyang
214b8(mdo sde): pham mdzad de// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la bing ka'i sgra skad kyis// 'dren pas thog mar tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// bsod nams rnam smin bde ste sdug bsngal thams cad sel// bsod
215a1(mdo sde): nams ldan pa'i mi yi bsam pa rnams kyang 'grub// bdud bcom nas ni byang chub myur du reg par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po 'thob// de bas bsod nams bya bas
215a2(mdo sde): chog par su zhig 'dzin// bdud rtsi chos mnyan pas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin// skye bo med pa'i nags gnas chog par su zhig 'dzin// sems can don bya bas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin// byang
215a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpas lag pa brkyang ste tshig brjod pa// mchod pa byas kyis rang rang dag gi zhing du deng // kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// sna tshogs bkod pas rang rang
215a4(mdo sde): ngag gi zhing du dong // dpung rnams phan phun chen po byung ba de ga dazigs nas// bde bar gshegs pa tshul du shis par rnam dpar rol// dpung bcas bdud las rgyal de bdud rtsi reg shog
215a5(mdo sde): ces// sems can rnams kyis mtshungs med sems kyis bya nga chub smon// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs te/ mngon par
215a6(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ skad cig de la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dpag tu med pa mdzad de de dag ni bskal par yang bstan par sla ba ma yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sa ni lag
215a7(mdo sde): mthil lta bur mnyam par gnas par gyur// mdab ma brgya pa rgyas pa 'od dang ldan pa byung // lha rnams brgya stong byang chub snying por rab tu 'dud// seng ge'i sgra yi mtshan ma dang po 'di 'dir mthong / 
215a8(mdo sde): stong gsum zhing brgya dag dang ri rnams du ma dang // ri yi rgyal po lhun po byang chub snying por 'dud// stobs bcu'i gan du song ste brgya byin tshangs pa 'dud// 'di yang mi yi seng ge byang chub snying
215b1(mdo sde): bor rol// sku las 'od gzer brgya stong dag ni rab bkye ste// rgyal ba'i zhing mchog khyab nas ngan song gsum po zhi// de nas skad cig yud tsam mi khom bskams par gyur// sems can gang la
215b2(mdo sde): 'ang tha ba rgyags snang gnod pa med// 'di yang mi yi seng ge gdan la bzhugs pa'i rol// gnyi zla nor bu me dang glog dang lha yi 'od// 'od dang ldan pa'i rlabs kyis zil mnan lam me min// 'gro
215b3(mdo sde): ba gang gis kyang ni ston pa'i gtsug mi mthong // 'di yang mi yi seng ge gdan la bzhugs pa'i rol// phyag gi mthil gyis reg nas sa yang rnam drug g.yos// de yis bdud kyi sde rnams shing
215b4(mdo sde): bal bzhin du dkrugs// bdud ni mda' thogs sa la ri mo gang 'dri ba// 'di yang mi yi seng ge gdan la rol pa la dgas// mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u zhes bya ba
215b5(mdo sde): ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis so// / de nas ga nas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ byang chub rgya snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba
215b6(mdo sde): byas te/ lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par phab nas/ tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do// 'jig rten gsal bar mdzad pa byung // 'jig rten mgon po 'od
215b7(mdo sde): mdzad pa// 'jig rten ldongs par gyur pa la// nyon mongs spangs pa mig sbyin pa// khyod ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal// bsod nams ngag gis dgongs pa rdzogs// dkar po'i chos rnams kun tu
215b8(mdo sde): rdzogs// khyod ni 'gro ba tshim mdzad 'gyur// sdig pa mi mnga' 'dam las rgal// gau ta ma thang la bzhugs// sems can gzhan dag klung chen gyis// khyer ba rnams kyang sgrol bar 'gyur// shes
216a1(mdo sde): can pa ldang 'phags// ga na namam#/ log rnamathas khyang ma mas// ma mchis par da ba ma/ 'jig sa patshang ma pa/ rnan pa
216a2(mdo sde): bos gtibs pa la/ khyod ni shes rab smin ma yis// rab tu sad par mdzad pa spyod// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ring nas ni// nyon mongs nad kyis gzir ba la// nad rnams kun las thar mdzad pa// sman pa
216a3(mdo sde): rgyal po yang dag byung // 'jig rten mgon po khyod byung bas// mi khom rnams ni stongs par 'gyur// lha rnams dang ni mi dag kyang // bde ba rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// skyes bu khyu mchog nges pa khyod// lta bas
216a4(mdo sde): gang dag 'dong bgyid pa// de dag bskal pa stong rnams su/ danam yang ngan 'gror mchi mi 'gyur// gang dag chos nyan 'gyu der ba rnams// de dag mkhas shing nad med dang // zab dang phung po
216a5(mdo sde): zad pa dang // 'jigs pa med pa rnams su 'gyur// nyon mongs bcings pa bcad nas ni// kun kyang len pa ma mchis par/ myur du rab tu grol 'gyur te// dge ba mchog gi 'bras bu 'thob/ 
216a6(mdo sde): de dag 'jig rten sbyin gnas te// sbyin pa rnams ni blang ba'i 'os// de dag yon phul mi chung ste// kun kyang mya ngan 'das rgyu lags// dge slong dag de ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ de bzhin
216a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te// de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing / phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying
216a8(mdo sde): po la bzhugs pa la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis cho ga bzhin du mchod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas
216b1(mdo sde): te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// thub pa thugs zab gsung ni shin tu snyan// thub mchog tshangs dbyangs glu ltar gsung snyan mchog byang chub rab mchog shin tu dam pa brnyes// dbya
216b2(mdo sde): kun mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod skyabs khyod ni gling khyod dpung gnyen te// khyod ni 'jig rten mgon po byams thugs mdzad// khyod ni sman pa'i dam pa zug rngu 'byin// gso ba phan mdzad
216b3(mdo sde): khyod ni dam pa mchog/ mar me mdzad pa gzigs ma thag tu khyod// byams dang thugs rje'i sprin gyi dra ba bsgrubs// mgon po bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char phob la// lha mi rnams kyi gdung ba zhi bar mdzod
216b4(mdo sde): khyod ni srid gsum mi gos pad+ma 'dra// khyod ni mi g.yo mi skyod lhun po 'dra// khyod ni thugs dam mi g.yo rdo rje bzhin// yon tan mchog kun mnga' ste zla ba 'dra// dge slong dag de ltar 'od
216b5(mdo sde): gsal gyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i bu rab tshangs pa
216b6(mdo sde): la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa la nor bu rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas spras pa'i rin po che'i dra bas bkab ste/ lan
216b7(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas nas/ tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// dge ba dri med shes rab 'od dang gzi brjid ldan// mtshan gyi dam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis
216b8(mdo sde): mchog mnga' ba// dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan pa ye shes mnga'// mnyel ba mi mnga' khyod la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// dri gsum dri mi mnga' ba dri med dri ma bral// 'jig rten gsum du grags
217a1(mdo sde): shing rig pa gsum banas pa// rnam par thar pa dam pa gsum byamag sbyin pa// spyan gsum drim sa mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sa ngan rtog pa bas pa zhing rab tu ni thugs lnga
217a2(mdo sde): thugs brtse thugs rjes 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// thub pa dgyes pas 'phags pa thugs ni rab zhi pa// khyod ni yid gnyis grol bar mdzad pa btang snyoms dgyes// brtul zhugs dka'/ 
217a3(mdo sde): thub 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// rang spyod rnam par dag cing spyod pa'i pha rol byon// bden pa bzhi po ston pa rnam thar dgyes pa po// grol bar gyur nas 'gro ba gzhan yang grol mdzadag stobs/ 
217a4(mdo sde): dang brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bdung po 'dir lhags pa// shes dab brtson 'grus de bzhin byams pas pham mdzad nas// khyod dkyis go 'phangs dam pa 'chi ba med pa brnyes// g.yon can
217a5(mdo sde): dpung rnams bcom pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong dag da ltar lha'i burab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lhan mas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad ba
217a6(mdo sde): 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba
217a7(mdo sde): der song ste phyin pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang bla re chen po rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bkab nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshogs su
217a8(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// khyod stobs shin tu rgya che ba dang bdud dpung drag po bdag cag mngon sum ste// bdud dpung rab 'jigs chen po de yang khyod kyis skad cig cig la pham
217b1(mdo sde): par mdzab/ khyod ni bzhengs par ma gyur sku yang mi g.yo gsung yang brjod pa ma mdzad de// thub pa don kun grub pa 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// bdud kyi bu mo bye ba khrag
217b2(mdo sde): khrig stong phrag du ma'i gang ga'i bye ma snyed// de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing mchog drung nas khyod ni bskyod cing g.yos ma nus// mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i bye ma snyed mdzad de/ 
217b3(mdo sde): byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa des na de ring khyod ni rnam par mdzes pa lags// byang chub spyad pa dam pa spyod mdzad chen shin tu sdug pa'i btsun mo dang // phangs pa'i sras dang bran mo de bzhin bskyed mos
217b4(mdo sde): tshal dang grong khyer dang // yul 'khor grong brdal dag dang rgyalasrid rnams dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang glang po dang / dbu dang daspyan dang ljags dang de bzhin zhabs btang des na de ring rnam par
217b5(mdo sde): mdzes// nga ni sangs rgyas 'gyur te bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul blo ma go bgos nas/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po sdug pa sngal rgya mtshos khyer bar gyur pa rnams// dam chos gru yis
217b6(mdo sde): nyid kyis bsgral bar bya zhes khyod kyis lan mang gsung brjod pa// khyod kyis smon lam de ni grub lags srog chags rnams kyang sgrol bar mdzad par 'gyur// smra ba'i khyu mchog 'jig rten mig sbyin
217b7(mdo sde): mdzad pa khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams des// bdag cag thams cad dga' mgu yid gyur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab bsngags byang chub dam pa
217b8(mdo sde): mtshungs med yang dag bsgrubs nas ni// de ltar bdud sde 'khor de bcom nas thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar 'gyur bar shog/ dge slong dag de ltar bdud kyi bu rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa
218a1(mdo sde): la mngon par bstod nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su
218a2(mdo sde): bskor te mdun du bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dzam bu gling gi gser gyi pad+ma dag gis mngon par gtor te/ spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'od dag gis mngon par bstod ngo // gsung ni dpyas
218a3(mdo sde): ma mchis shing ma 'khrul rnam par ma 'khrugs pa// mun rdul bral zhing 'chi med rtogs par thugs su chud par gyur// lha yul mi yul ba yi dpal dang bgyi ba gzhal med 'os// rab tu 'bar ba'i
218a4(mdo sde): blo gros ldan la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// dka' ba mdzad pa nyon mongs spong ba rdul dang dri ma sel// shin tu dga' ba'i dgasung gis lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzod// sku mchog 'od
218a5(mdo sde): zer rgyas pa'i dri ma shin tu mi mnga' bas// lha dang mi yi bdag po bzhin du 'gro ba 'di las rgyal// pha rol tshogs rnam sa rab tu 'jom pa gzhan gyi spyod mkhas pa// lha dang mi yi
218a6(mdo sde): srid par dga' ba gzhan gyi blo sel ba// shin tu mkhas pa blo ldan gzhan gyi spyod pa rnam par phye// stobs bcu mnga' ba gshegs pa'i lam 'dir rnam par rgyu ba mdzod// srid pa 'dzin dang sdug bsngal
218a7(mdo sde): log 'dzin rgya chen 'dor sel te// lha mi blo gros 'dul ba ji lta bzhin du 'dul ba mdzod// zla ba bzhin du mkha' las phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam rgyu ba// sring ba gsum 'dir rmad byung mig dang dpung
218a8(mdo sde): gnyen gyur par shog/ lha dang mi'i srid par dga' yang yul la 'khrul mi mnga'// 'dod pa'i dga' dang bral zhing dge ba'i dga' la dgyes pa po// 'khor la sgrogs pa 'jig rten gsum na khyod dang
218b1(mdo sde): mtshungs ma mchis// khyod 'dir 'gro ba rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen lags// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin ga
218b2(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i bu rab 'phrul rab 'phrul gyi lha'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du/ 
218b3(mdo sde): bdar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dar gyi lda ldis g.yogs na/ spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// dri ma rnam gsum spangs pas khyod ni chos kyi snang ba yang dag
218b4(mdo sde): 'phags// gti mug dang ni lha dang ma rig 'joms pa mdzes dadang dpal gyis rgyas// log pa'i lam la dga' ba'i skye bo 'di dag 'chi med dgod mdzad pa// 'jig rten 'dir byung mchod
218b5(mdo sde): rten lha yul ba dang mi yul bas mchod pa/ khyod ni gso ba'i/ sman pa mkhas pa bdud rtsi bde ba sbyin pa po// lta dang nyon mongs pa dang ma rig bsags pa sngon gyi bag la nyal// lus
218b6(mdo sde): can rnams kyi nang kun sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam gyis sel ba ste// de bas sman pa dam pa 'dren pa khyod ni sa la rnam par rgyu// nyi zla'i 'od dang skar ma rnams dang me dang de bzhin nor bu dang // brgya byin tshangs
218b7(mdo sde): pa'i 'od rnams dpal sdug spyan sngar lam me ma lags te// shes rab snang ba mdzad dang 'od mdzad 'od dang dpal gyis rab tu rgyas// khyod kyi ye shes rmad byung mngon sum gyur pas mgo bos phyag
218b8(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// rnam par 'dren pa snyan pa'i gsung ldan bden dang bden min gsung // dul ba thugs zhi dbang po dul ba rab tu zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa// ston pa lha dang mi'i 'khor la bstan par bgyi ba ston
219a1(mdo sde): // mdzad pa// shAkya thub pa mi yaM khyu mchog lha mis mchod la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes mnga' ba ye shes bka' mchid mchog can srid gsum go mdzad pa// dri ma gsum bsal rig
219a2(mdo sde): gsum dang rnam par thar gsum ston pa po// thub pa blo gros ji ltar gdul ba skal dang skal med rab mkhyen pa// stong gsum rmad du byung ba lha mis mchod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong dag
219a3(mdo sde): de ltar lha'i bu rab 'phrul 'khor dang bcas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas lha'i
219a4(mdo sde): bu yongs su dga' ldan dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu dang lhan ci ga tu de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ lha'i gos kyi dra ba chen pos/ byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs
219a5(mdo sde): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bkab ste/ spyan snga/ nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod/ do// khyod ni dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs te der ni khyod kyis rgya
219a6(mdo sde): chen chos kyang bshad// khyod kyis bstan pa de ni da dung lha'i bu rnams chos spyod rgyun mi 'chad// khyod la blta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur chos mnyan pas kyang ngoms pa rnyed mi 'gyur// yon tan rgya mtsho/ 
219a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la mgo dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos te de tshe khyod kyis mi khom thams cad sbyangs// gang tshe byang chub shing drung bzhugs che 'gro ba kun
219a8(mdo sde): gyi nyon mongs rab tu zhi// gang gi ched du rgya chen byang chub btsal ba brnyes te bdud kyang pham par mdzad// khyod kyi smon lam de ni rab tu rdzogs kyis 'khor lo rgya chen myur du skor// chos 'tshal ba dag/ 
219b1(mdo sde): chos mnyan bgyi zhes te// srog chags stong phrag mang po sdod cing mchis// 'khor lo rgya chen myur du bskor du gsol// srog chags stong rnams srid las bsgral du gsol// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu
219b2(mdo sde): yongs su dga' ldan 'khor dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab
219b3(mdo sde): bral la sogs pa/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ 
219b4(mdo sde): pa la mchod de/ spyan snga nas tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su brtsadad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// tshul khrims ting dzin de bzhin shes rab kyis// khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/ 
219b5(mdo sde): la lhag/ mos dang rnam par grol la mkhas pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// byang chub snying por lha yis gang bgyis pa// bkod pa mdzes pa de dag mthong
219b6(mdo sde): lags te// ji ltar khyod la lha dang mis mchod pa// de ni gzhan gang la yang 'os ma lags// khyod byung don ma mchis pa ma lags te// gang gi don tu dka' ba mang po spyad// shin tu g.yon can sde dang bcas
219b7(mdo sde): las rgyal// khyod kyis bla na me bI byang chub brnyes// phyogs bcu dag tu snang ba mdzad par gyur// shes rab sgron mas 'jig rten gsum po gsal// khyod ni rab rib sel bar 'gyur ba ste// 'gro la bla na med
219b8(mdo sde): pa'i mig sbyin pa// khyod la bstod pa bskal par brjod kyang ni// khyod kyi ba spu'i khung bu mtha' ma mchis// yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten rnam par grags// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/ 
220a1(mdo sde): de ltar lha'i bu rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs
220a2(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu me tog dang / spos dang / drang ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bkod pa rnams
220a3(mdo sde): kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// thub pa ma 'khrul kha na ma tho mi mnga' rtag tu legs bzhugs lhun po 'dra// phyogs bcu dag tu ye
220a4(mdo sde): shes 'od grags bsod nams dag dang gzi brjid ldan pa po// thub pa khyod kyis sngon chad sangs rgyas brgya phrag mtha' yas yang dag mchod pa mdzad// de yi yul de yis ni byang chub shing / 
220a5(mdo sde): drung bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur// tshul khrims dang ni rdo/ sa dang ting nge 'dzin shes rab 'byung gnas ye shes rgyal ma tshan tog/ rga shi 'jom par mdzad pa sman pa dam pa 'jig
220a6(mdo sde): rten dag la mig sbyin pa// thub pa dri ma gsum dang tha ba spangs shong dbang po zhi la thugs zhig shAkya khyu mchog 'gro ba dag gis chos kyi rgyal po khyod la skyabs su mchi// khyod kyis brtson 'grus mthu
220a7(mdo sde): yis 'phags pa'i byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas gyur lags te// shes rab stobs dang thabs dang byams pa'i stobs dang bsod nam stongs nas dang stobs nas de dag bac+doMs khyod byang chub bzhugs pa'i chen mtha'
220a8(mdo sde): mas te// stobs dang ldan pa deng byang chub snying por bzhugs nas stobs bcu mnga' bar gyur// dpung tshogs mtha' yas mthong nas dge sbyong rdzong byang chub snying por bzhugs pa de// nyams pa
220b1(mdo sde): 'gyur grang zhes lha rnams thams cad rab tu sngangs shing skrag par gyur// khyod ni 'byung po rnams kyis bsnyengs par ma gyur sku yang g.yo ba mi mnga' ste// khur lci phyag gis brdabs nas kun tu g.yos te
220b2(mdo sde): bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur// ji ltar snga ma rnams kyi seng ge'i khri la byang chub dam pa brnyes gyur pa// de ltar khyod kyis rjes su sangs rgyas mtshungs shing mnyam ste gzhan du 'gyur ma lags// yid
220b3(mdo sde): kyang mnyam zhing sems kyang mnyam ste khyod bdag nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes// des na khyod ni 'jig rten dam pa rang byung 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams zhing // dge slong dag de ltar lha'i dbang po
220b4(mdo sde): brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig
220b5(mdo sde): tu 'dug go// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu// de bzhin ga gas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ me tog a ti mu ga ta ka
